						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Fri Sep 13, 2013 5:26 pm

			Ryoga wasn't one for eating during training, it made his stomach turn normally. [color=#DC143C]"I'm fine, i'll get something to eat afterwards, for now, go ahead and eat, i'll begin practicing my next technique."[/color] It was time Ryoga tackled something a bit more challenging with his sword training, another B rank Kenjutsu. This technique was more of a protective maneuver, meant for use should the user ever find themselves surrounded or something. It was essentially a lightning fast 360 degree spin with an Iaido slash attached to it. The taijutsu skill required to perform the maneuver, combined with how fast the slash must be, made it incredibly difficult to perform. Ryoga was bound to fail this one a few times, but the final result would be well worth the pain and toil.

Ryoga needed to set up the situation required for this technique to be used. He walked over to the stream going through the center of the area, and began forming some hand seals. A moment later, four water clones appeared around Ryoga, each at a 90 degree angle, therefore surrounding him at all sides. Each clone was about 3 feet away from him, with their hands on their weapons, as though they were ready to fight Ryoga. Of course, being a C rank clone jutsu, they weren't even close to his level, but they would serve their purpose. Ryoga prepared himself for the technique by taking his signature stance, legs spread for balance with his right hand on his sword, his left hand on his sheath, and his head tilted downwards. He began building tension in his body in his right hip and left leg, preparing to spin as fast as possible. First he would simply try the spin maneuver itself, his entire body quickly spiraling around full circle, returning to his starting position in a fraction of a second. It was a foreign thing for him, having normally been more about hip and arm movements than a full fledged spin that required leg rotation. This alone would probably prove to be the most difficult thing for him to do. Therefore, it was the thing he should work on the hardest.

Ryoga tried this spin once more, building a great amount of tension in his leg and hip again. As he preceded to start this spin, however, he would draw his sword, but not in a slash. He wanted to get a feel for the technique before he tried to really perform it. As he spun the same circle as before, the swords weight was just enough to throw him off balance, and he went spiraling to the ground, letting go of his sword which fell on his arm, creating a large gash on his right arm. [color=#DC143C]"Shit that hurt!"[/color] Ryoga winced in pain as he pulled himself from the ground, dripping blood like crazy. He quickly performed a few hand seals and clotted his wound, then performed a few more to help him produce more blood for what was lost. As he watched Tadataka finish his Water dragon, he would walk off to sit down and let his Red Cell Multiplication jutsu regenerate what was lost, as he sheathed his sword and sat down to take a break.
Jutsu usedShow *Bold Clotting

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed seals, the user will place their hand over an open wound up to five inches wide and two inches deep. After channeling Chiton chakra for a full post, the user will form a superficial blood-clot covering over the wound to prevent further bloodflow from it. While this cover doesn't completely heal the wound, it allows the target's body to recover from the wound naturally without agitation.

*Red Cell Multiplication

B-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed seals, the user will channel Chiton chakra into their own body or into the body of a willing or subdued target. After the chakra has been channeled, as long as the user or target avoids strenuous movement, the amount of blood cells in their body will regenerate 3 gallons of blood every post for a duration of four posts. If the user engages in strenuous activity, however, then they will regenerate only 1 gallon of blood instead. The technique will not end once the user returns to their maximum amount of blood, but rather simply stop multiplication until further replacement is needed or the duration of the jutsu ends.

OOC: 540/1050 for Reverse Beheading Draw

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

						[url=#top]
				[/i]
				Top
			[/url]

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: Post

Ryoga wasn't one for eating during training, it made his stomach turn normally. [color=#DC143C]"I'm fine, i'll get something to eat afterwards, for now, go ahead and eat, i'll begin practicing my next technique."[/color] It was time Ryoga tackled something a bit more challenging with his sword training, another B rank Kenjutsu. This technique was more of a protective maneuver, meant for use should the user ever find themselves surrounded or something. It was essentially a lightning fast 360 degree spin with an Iaido slash attached to it. The taijutsu skill required to perform the maneuver, combined with how fast the slash must be, made it incredibly difficult to perform. Ryoga was bound to fail this one a few times, but the final result would be well worth the pain and toil.

Ryoga needed to set up the situation required for this technique to be used. He walked over to the stream going through the center of the area, and began forming some hand seals. A moment later, four water clones appeared around Ryoga, each at a 90 degree angle, therefore surrounding him at all sides. Each clone was about 3 feet away from him, with their hands on their weapons, as though they were ready to fight Ryoga. Of course, being a C rank clone jutsu, they weren't even close to his level, but they would serve their purpose. Ryoga prepared himself for the technique by taking his signature stance, legs spread for balance with his right hand on his sword, his left hand on his sheath, and his head tilted downwards. He began building tension in his body in his right hip and left leg, preparing to spin as fast as possible. First he would simply try the spin maneuver itself, his entire body quickly spiraling around full circle, returning to his starting position in a fraction of a second. It was a foreign thing for him, having normally been more about hip and arm movements than a full fledged spin that required leg rotation. This alone would probably prove to be the most difficult thing for him to do. Therefore, it was the thing he should work on the hardest.

Ryoga tried this spin once more, building a great amount of tension in his leg and hip again. As he preceded to start this spin, however, he would draw his sword, but not in a slash. He wanted to get a feel for the technique before he tried to really perform it. As he spun the same circle as before, the swords weight was just enough to throw him off balance, and he went spiraling to the ground, letting go of his sword which fell on his arm, creating a large gash on his right arm. [color=#DC143C]"Shit that hurt!"[/color] Ryoga winced in pain as he pulled himself from the ground, dripping blood like crazy. He quickly performed a few hand seals and clotted his wound, then performed a few more to help him produce more blood for what was lost. As he watched Tadataka finish his Water dragon, he would walk off to sit down and let his Red Cell Multiplication jutsu regenerate what was lost, as he sheathed his sword and sat down to take a break.
Jutsu usedShow *Bold Clotting

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed seals, the user will place their hand over an open wound up to five inches wide and two inches deep. After channeling Chiton chakra for a full post, the user will form a superficial blood-clot covering over the wound to prevent further bloodflow from it. While this cover doesn't completely heal the wound, it allows the target's body to recover from the wound naturally without agitation.

*Red Cell Multiplication

B-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed seals, the user will channel Chiton chakra into their own body or into the body of a willing or subdued target. After the chakra has been channeled, as long as the user or target avoids strenuous movement, the amount of blood cells in their body will regenerate 3 gallons of blood every post for a duration of four posts. If the user engages in strenuous activity, however, then they will regenerate only 1 gallon of blood instead. The technique will not end once the user returns to their maximum amount of blood, but rather simply stop multiplication until further replacement is needed or the duration of the jutsu ends.

OOC: 540/1050 for Reverse Beheading Draw

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: 

[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1900753][i][/url]
								[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1900753]Philosophical Discord[/url]

		[b]Posts:[/b] [url=./search.php?author_id=1900753&sr=posts]430[/url]		[b]Joined:[/b] Wed Sep 04, 2013 6:00 pm

				[b]Contact:[/b]

					[url=#]

										Send private message
									[/url]

						[url=#p1610354][Social Training] Power is Everything[/url]

							[url=/forums/app.php/post/1610354/report]
								REPORT
							[/url]

							[url=./posting.php?mode=quote&f=58&p=1610354]
								QUOTE
							[/url]

			[url=./viewtopic.php?f=58&p=1610354&thanks=1610354&to_id=1900753&from_id=1869325]
				LIKE
			[/url]

									[url=./viewtopic.php?p=1610354#p1610354]
						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1900753]Philosophical Discord[/url][/b] » Fri Sep 13, 2013 9:23 pm

			"[b]You good[/b]," Tadataka asked as he saw Ryoga mending his injuries. He had to stifle from laughing at first. The brooding ninja that spun around and gave himself a boo boo with his own sword--now that was funny. Usually Tadataka would be more serious about injuries and the like, but this was training, and in training death is less of a possibility than in the field or sparring. They would have to spar eventually, however, Tadataka knew that would be a fun learning experience. Next was time for a new jutsu though. Something that would be the best he had ever learned. A rank A jutsu by the name of the Elite Attack Clone.

New JutsuShow[color=dodgerblue][b]*Elite Attack Clone[/b][/color]

A-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Water Clone Technique, Control Stat of 9

After performing a string of seals, the user will create a large amount of water and manipulate it to form a larger version of the normal clone. The clone stands two meters tall and is quite adept in close-ranged combat. Despite the fact that it cannot perform any techniques, it possesses whip-like arms that extend seven feet and are about one foot in diameter. Should a target get struck by one of the arms, the arm will envelop the portion of the body that made contact and can be broken out of if the target has a strength exceed the clone’s own.
Taijutsu - 7
Stamina - 4
Strength - 5
Speed - 8

This clone was not like all of the others that he possessed. It was true that it would not be able to use jutsu, but with its whip-like arms that could extend out to seven full feet and envelop anything they touched, it was safe to say it would be a very valuable addition to his rapidly growing repertoire. To begin to accomplish this venture, however, started with manifesting a good quantity of water. Tadataka could, of course, use the water from the stream like he had done for the Water Dragon jutsu, but if he should ever strike battle far enough from a water source than that would do him no good. He had decided to manifest the water himself.

Tadataka began by making a slew of hang seals that seemed to only puff out his cheeks by a large margin, but in fact it had gathered his Suiton chakra and it allowed him to vomit up enough water to form a simple water clone of himself. It was a quick start, but that was by far the least challenging bit to this formidable jutsu. The next part was tricky. Tadataka would have to alter the structure of the clone to--instead of using low rank suiton jutsu--be able to extend its arms and envelop anything it touches. Not to mention making the clone all around better on offense as opposed to a more balanced form of defense. This clone was to be use strictly for an attack while Tadataka himself would simply provide support to the clone in an actual battle. Perhaps there were even more ways that this clone to be utilized, but as for now, it was restricted to this singular purpose as Tadataka was attempting to learn this technique.

The basic water clone that Tadataka had created with a simple staple of any suiton clone jutsu. It was a completely normal--lowly skilled-clone. Tadataka had decided to take a moment to look over his own clone--he had to check and see what exactly would be the differences between the two types of water clones. At first Tadataka had thought that it would just be the offensive capabilities, but it didn't take long for him to figure out that the Elite Attack Clone would be far superior in every way. It would be stronger, faster, and be able to withstand more punishment than an average water clone. It would completely revolutionize Tadataka's battle tactics.

Next, it was time for Tadataka to try again. He summoned his suiton chakra into his mouth and it exploded outwards and formed into a new clone--after he had already made all of the hand signs--that seemed to be dripping with water. The clone started out a little taller than Tadataka himself, but it began to leak away into the stream that was still in front of him. That attempt would be marked as a complete failure. In his quest to expand the size of the water clone, it was all but disastrous. He had attempted to put too much water into it for the growth of the clone. That was a mistake that he would not make again, but how would he make the clone bigger and more able to readily expand towards the enemy?

For this attempt Tadataka took a bit longer to gather his suiton chakra before making his hand signs at a speed that showed he was growing more comfortable with them, and then, all at once he spewed out another watery mess. This time it was only identical to him in height, but it seemed to move a little bit better than the other attempts had. The bottom line was that this was still a failure. Determination was a trait that many great ninja had, and Tadataka was no exception that that lineage. He would just have to figure out how to better control his suiton chakra while it formed into a suiton clone. He knew that it would have to be larger in stature than he was in order to be able to manipulate itself and increase its own length at will. Then, to envelop anything it touched beyond that, well it was a venture worth tiring out over.

Tadataka returned to his starting stance and whipped out those hand signs as fast as the last time. He even spewed out a good amount of water for the clone to take form. It was roughly two meters tall--meaning about four inches taller than Tadataka himself. The size wasn't the best overall improvement, however, in this latest suiton clone. Although it couldn't move very well--it possessed the ability to transform its arms to various lengths and sizes. Envelopment, on the other hand, was still out of the question. Not to mention that it didn't move in the way it should from a perfect creation. Tadataka would have to try again. Hopefully he wouldn't tire himself out too much. This was a lot of jutsu in one day and he didn't exactly have the best stamina in the world. It was a good thing he had taken a lunch break to replenish all he had lost on the earlier training regimen.

Now was the time. Tadataka felt it in his body as the chakra formed in his mouth after he completed the seals for--hopefully--a final time on the day. His cheeks expanded and he released the mass of water from his mouth. From that collection of suiton chakra formed a clone that was just the right size--around two meters yet again--and after a few moments of poking, prodding, and a few drills to test the suiton clone's maneuverability, Tadataka was satisfied with his progress. There was still two things left to see, however, and those were the expansion ability and the ability to envelop anything it touched. Tadataka had to pause before he ordered the clone to attack him. He knew the risks that were involved if anything went wrong, but Tadataka felt confident in his ability not to die as much as he felt confident in his ability to get this jutsu right!

Slowly, Tadataka walked out to about seven feet away before signaling the Elite Attack Clone to begin his assault. To Tadataka's own amazement the clone's arms sprang forth like geysers headed straight for him. He moved quickly to avoid the first few strikes before the arms caught up with him and touched him at his legs. Success! His legs had became enveloped in his own suiton chakra that was controlled by his newest jutsu creation! This was the hardest he had ever trained before and this jutsu was well worth the price he had to pay in energy and patience.

"[b]Finally! I did it[/b]," Tadataka exclaimed with an overt tone of enjoyment before collapsing to the ground after his release of the newest clone in his arsenal. It was quite a feat to behold, and in such a short time. "[b]What do you think of that one Ryoga!? Can you do better[/b]," asked Tadataka in a somewhat challenging tone. This was a competition, after all. If it wasn't then they were just lying to themselves.

(1316/1300)

		[b]Posts:[/b] [url=./search.php?author_id=1869325&sr=posts]7571[/url]		[b]Joined:[/b] Sat Apr 27, 2013 6:00 pm

											[b]Location:[/b] Moline, IL
												[b]Grading Tier:[/b] Seinen

				[b]Contact:[/b]

					[url=#]

																	[url=./ucp.php?i=pm&mode=compose&action=quotepost&p=1610411]

						[url=#p1610411][Social Training] Power is Everything[/url]

							[url=./posting.php?mode=edit&f=58&p=1610411]
								EDIT
							[/url]

							[url=/forums/app.php/post/1610411/report]
								REPORT
							[/url]

						[/i]Post

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Sat Sep 14, 2013 5:29 am

			Ryoga pulled himself from the ground as he watched Tadataka finish his Water clone technique. [color=#DC143C]"An impressive display, i'll admit. But no, I can't perform a clone of that level, I don't rely on my clones too often, except for, well, what i'm using them for now."[/color] Ryoga's water clones were just training dummies to him, to be cut down by his sword. But as far as a competition would go, as long as he was capable of swinging his sword he was still good to continue training. He took his sword from it's sheath and practiced swinging it a few times, making sure that the wound on his arm wouldn't cause him any issues. There was some pain, but nothing he wasn't used to, and his blood had been completely replenished by this point.

Ryoga would get this technique right if it killed him, and he sure as hell wouldn't be made to look like a fool in front of Tadataka. The clones once more surrounded Ryoga, each at the same position as before, 3 feet away from him, just within sword's reach. Ryoga needed to perfect this spin before he tried drawing his sword again, another mishap like that and he might as well go home. He took his stance again, and began building the tension within his muscles, preparing himself to rotate on his leg, using the force of his draw and the tension in his hip to propel him in the rotation. All at once Ryoga's entire body was almost a blur, spinning a full 360 degrees without stopping, rotating on his left leg while sliding the right leg across the ground, and faking a sword draw, so that his arm might help push him in his spin. It seemed he had the hang of his spinning technique, now he just had to put it all together into one super fast maneuver.

Ryoga beckoned the clones to come closer, as they each took a single step, now within 2 feet of Ryoga. He had enough room to draw his sword, but the clones were literally where the base of the blade would be should he perform the move correctly. The fact that this spinning slash was giving him such trouble bugged Ryoga to no end, but that would soon change. Ryoga once again began building the tension in his leg and hip to their maximum potential, grabbing hold of his blade in his signature stance, left hand on his sheath to stabilize it while he drew his sword. After preparing his muscles for the final move, Ryoga performed the technique almost flawlessly, spinning on his left leg, while simultaneously pulling his katana from it's sheath as he rotated and extending it in a signature Iaido slash, following through with the strike for the full 360 degree spin. The strike wasn't a blur like his other techniques of this level, but it retained the same destructive power, as each of the clones burst into nothing when the blade passed through them. Satisfied with the results of his strike, Ryoga sheathed his sword and crossed his arms, eyes closed as he contemplated where to go from there. [color=#DC143C]"Your techniques are good, but don't get cocky Tadataka. As you see, my blade is more than quick enough to deal with anything that may come my way."[/color]

OOC 1098/1050 words for below technique
Jutsu learnedShow *[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Reverse Beheading Draw[/b][/color]

B-Rank Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: [color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Beheading Draw[/b][/color]

By building tension in two places in their body, the user unleashes a spin and then draws their katana in a swift motion without pause until returning to face their original direction, sword sheathing in the process. The attack has incredible destructive power, though lacks the visual blur in speed. The attack is still fast enough, however, to disorient opponents greatly.

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

						[url=#top]
				[/i]
				Top
			[/url]

Author: Post

Ryoga pulled himself from the ground as he watched Tadataka finish his Water clone technique. [color=#DC143C]"An impressive display, i'll admit. But no, I can't perform a clone of that level, I don't rely on my clones too often, except for, well, what i'm using them for now."[/color] Ryoga's water clones were just training dummies to him, to be cut down by his sword. After preparing his muscles for the final move, Ryoga performed the technique almost flawlessly, spinning on his left leg, while simultaneously pulling his katana from it's sheath as he rotated and extending it in a signature Iaido slash, following through with the strike for the full 360 degree spin. The strike wasn't a blur like his other techniques of this level, but it retained the same destructive power, as each of the clones burst into nothing when the blade passed through them. Satisfied with the results of his strike, Ryoga sheathed his sword and crossed his arms, eyes closed as he contemplated where to go from there. [color=#DC143C]"Your techniques are good, but don't get cocky Tadataka. As you see, my blade is more than quick enough to deal with anything that may come my way."[/color]

OOC 1098/1050 words for below technique
Jutsu learnedShow *[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Reverse Beheading Draw[/b][/color]

B-Rank Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: [color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Beheading Draw[/b][/color]

By building tension in two places in their body, the user unleashes a spin and then draws their katana in a swift motion without pause until returning to face their original direction, sword sheathing in the process. The attack has incredible destructive power, though lacks the visual blur in speed. The attack is still fast enough, however, to disorient opponents greatly.

					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1900753]Philosophical Discord[/url][/b] » Sun Sep 15, 2013 5:31 pm

			"[b]Perhaps, but you shouldn't be overconfident as well. There is always someone better. My only hope is that I don't find him or her before I have a chance to at least live some of my life[/b]," Tadataka stated in a somber tone. It was not often that he talked so glumly when not about to face a daring mission where he would risk life and limb. Somehow, however, Tadataka felt at home with this man he had just met. It was almost like the two were different paths of the same man.

Tadataka shook his head dismissively at his own words before settling down next to the steam again. He expended a lot of chakra to learn that last jutsu, but he figured that he could at least learn a low level jutsu with what he had left. The only question was which type to learn. Tadataka himself was confused on what to do next, but it was then when he figured it out after sucking in a deep breath and releasing it across the water. It seemed that nature was the biggest inspiration to Tadataka when it came to figuring out new jutsu. It was a wonder if the marvels of the outside world could ever be mastered in so many jutsu. At least Tadataka would try to master his slice of the elements...

New JutsuShow[color=lightgreen]*Wind Element • Air Gun[/color]

D-rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals, the user will take a deep breath before blowing it out in the form of a football-sized bullet. If hit by it, it can cause many small cuts at the place of impact. The further this is shot, the weaker it becomes, becoming completely ineffective at twenty-five yards.

Tadataka just squatted on the bank of the stream; he began to make some hand signs, but he wasn't exactly sure that his full interest was in creating this new jutsu after all of the others that he had created on this day alone. Nonetheless his Fuuton chakra began flowing vigorously within him as he made this hand signs. The concept was simple enough--gather Fuuton chakra in his mouth and spit it out. It was so easy even some academy students could probably figure out how to do it given some time. And so it was; as Tadataka sucked in air--as if he was dying of suffocation--before his cheeks widened and then regressed just as fast as they expanded. As they did so his mouth opened and shot out a football sized collection of Fuuton chakra that blew across the top of the stream and caused it to slightly part.

The only question now was what Ryoga would do next. He couldn't just let Tadataka show up up like that with a mighty jutsu such as the Elite Attack Clone was. After all, wasn't power the thing to be respected among these two blossoming Jounin?

(424/400)

			NameVillageRankMissionsSocials[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5733243/1/][color=dodgerblue]Kashinado Tadataka[/color][/url][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5226160/1/]Kirigakure no Sato[/url]JouninS:0 A:0 B:0 C:0 D:0ThreadsShow[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5235939/2/#new]|A Drop in the Water|[/url]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5737533/1/]|Blind-Sided|[/url]InactiveShowNameVillageRankMissionsSocials[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5243827/1/][color=red]Akamatsu Tai[/color] (Inactive)[/url]Iwagakure no SatoDS:0 A:0 B:0 C:0 D:00[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5281475/1/][color=green]Senju Akashi[/color] (Inactive)[/url]Konohagakure no SatoChuuninS:0 A:0 B:0 C:0 D:00

Author: Post

"[b]Perhaps, but you shouldn't be overconfident as well. There is always someone better. My only hope is that I don't find him or her before I have a chance to at least live some of my life[/b]," Tadataka stated in a somber tone. It was not often that he talked so glumly when not about to face a daring mission where he would risk life and limb. Somehow, however, Tadataka felt at home with this man he had just met. It was almost like the two were different paths of the same man.

Tadataka shook his head dismissively at his own words before settling down next to the steam again. He expended a lot of chakra to learn that last jutsu, but he figured that he could at least learn a low level jutsu with what he had left. The only question was which type to learn. Tadataka himself was confused on what to do next, but it was then when he figured it out after sucking in a deep breath and releasing it across the water. It seemed that nature was the biggest inspiration to Tadataka when it came to figuring out new jutsu. It was a wonder if the marvels of the outside world could ever be mastered in so many jutsu. At least Tadataka would try to master his slice of the elements...

D-rank Ninjutsu

The further this is shot, the weaker it becomes, becoming completely ineffective at twenty-five yards.

[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325][i][/url]
								[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url]

		[b]Posts:[/b] [url=./search.php?author_id=1869325&sr=posts]7571[/url]		[b]Joined:[/b] Sat Apr 27, 2013 6:00 pm

											[b]Location:[/b] Moline, IL

				[b]Contact:[/b]

						[url=#p1611233][Social Training] Power is Everything[/url]

							[url=./posting.php?mode=edit&f=58&p=1611233]

							[url=/forums/app.php/post/1611233/report]
								REPORT

						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Mon Sep 16, 2013 6:42 am

			When Ryoga heard Tadataka call him overconfident, all bets were off. [color=#DC143C]"That's just it Tadataka, as long as i keep it up, there [b]won't[/b] be anyone better than me. Allow me to demonstrate."[/color] Ryoga thought it was time to finish this training session with Tadataka, but not before putting him in his place. In order to do this technique though, he required a large amount of blood to work with. Luckily, he had techniques for this, and after performing a few seals, he stomped the ground and brought forth his Guardian Fountain, spewing forth from the ground in front of him. [color=#DC143C]"This might get messy, stand back."[/color]

Ryoga would give Tadataka some time to back off a bit, then he proceeded to perform even more hand seals, building up his chiton chakra within his palms and placing them to the ground near his fountain. In a few moments, it would turn to the blood he needed, but for the time being he would simply practice building his chakra up for this technique. He had a great many hand seals to do for this technique, as he had to mold his chakra almost perfectly to perform and maintain the jutsu in question. He began running through some hand seals, getting a feel for which seals would prove to be the most effective. After a moment, he started on the Tiger seal, then continued going through more seals, hitting the Dog seal, serpent seal, ram seal, and ending on the Tiger seal once more. There were at least fifteen seals to the technique though, as it took a lot of chakra molding to do what Ryoga was trying to do.

Ryoga now had a good feel for the hand seals he wanted to perform for the technique, and considering it was an A rank technique, it would no doubt take a large amount of chakra, especially since he would hold the jutsu as a channel. At this point, the ground was almost completely saturated with water, but no blood came from the fountain yet. [color=#DC143C]"Hmph, it doesn't matter, i'll just get a feel for molding the chakra within me." [/color] Ryoga would have to wait to practice the technique completely, but he would still try to get a feel for the jutsu itself. He began building an incredibly large amount of chiton chakra, feeling it course within his veins. The power that he felt was larger than anything else he had performed thus far, proving that this technique was definitely an A rank jutsu. Ryoga then began performing the hand seals from before, going through seal after seal, and ending on the tiger seal. He then went to draw his sword to get a feel for what he wanted to perform, but as he went to draw his blade, thus breaking the hand seal, his chakra was lost, as though it never built up to begin with. Ryoga cursed under his breath, as it seemed that performing the technique with two hands wasn't the right idea here. The plan was to use his sword to control his jutsu, however he couldn't break the hand seal to draw his blade, and he couldn't perform hand seals with the blade in his hand.

[color=#DC143C]"Well, two handed seals aren't the answer here it seems, i'll have to do this with one handed seals i think. A bit harder to perform, but it will all be worth it in the end."[/color] Ryoga couldn't let Tadataka one up him so easily, performing clone after clone. Clone jutsu weren't bad at all, but Tadataka missed the point of creating A rank jutsu. Everything he had learned so far had been straight from a scroll or manual somewhere, It seemed he hadn't yet delved into his own style of jutsu creation. Ryoga however, would show him what A ranks were truly capable of, as he began performing a string of one handed seals without chakra at first. One handed seals weren't something he was especially skilled in, but he did know how to perform them, and as such, would have no trouble getting a nice string of seals planned out for molding his chiton chakra the way he wanted. He had an idea how the technique would go, now he simply needed to wait for his fountain to turn to blood, so that he could have something to manipulate his chakra into, not just building it and releasing it inside of him.

Jutsu usedShow *Guardian Fountain

C-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Control Stat of 6

Requiring a slightly above average level of control, this technique generates a large amount of water as a defense mechanism. By performing a string of seals, the user will stomp and create a fountain of water from the ground that flows at a speed of five. The fountain is three meters in diameter and four meters in height. This technique lasts for three posts. All in all, this creates just over eight thousand cubic meters of water.

Blood Fountain

D-rank Ninjutsu

Prerequisites: *Guardian Fountain[/b], Control stat of 8

After creating the Guardian Fountain, Ryoga adds a few additional handseals and puts his palms to the ground near the fountain, channeling Chiton chakra into the stream. One post later, the fountain changes from a stream of water to a stream of blood matching Ryoga's bloodtype. The fountain is only 2 feet tall, and flows a bit slower then the Guardian Fountain, therefore producing only about 4000 cubic meters of blood. The blood will completely vanish from the field after 10 posts.

OOC: 748/1450 words for A rank chiton Technique

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

When Ryoga heard Tadataka call him overconfident, all bets were off. [color=#DC143C]"That's just it Tadataka, as long as i keep it up, there [b]won't[/b] be anyone better than me. [/color] Ryoga would have to wait to practice the technique completely, but he would still try to get a feel for the jutsu itself. A bit harder to perform, but it will all be worth it in the end."[/color] Ryoga couldn't let Tadataka one up him so easily, performing clone after clone. Ryoga however, would show him what A ranks were truly capable of, as he began performing a string of one handed seals without chakra at first. He had an idea how the technique would go, now he simply needed to wait for his fountain to turn to blood, so that he could have something to manipulate his chakra into, not just building it and releasing it inside of him.

			"[b]Maybe not today. Maybe not tomorrow. Someday we both will die. I just hope it's not too soon to have a family and not too far to waste away in old age. Maybe I'll even let you kill me one day. Who knows[/b]," Tadataka said with a probing smile. It was more of not knowing what to expect from Ryoga. It had been a long session, however, and Tadataka was content to regain some of his strength while Ryoga learned a new jutsu. The blood fountain, however, was interesting enough.

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5737533/1/]|Blind-Sided|[/url]InactiveShowNameVillageRankMissionsSocials[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5243827/1/][color=red]Akamatsu Tai[/color] (Inactive)[/url]Iwagakure no SatoDS:0 A:0 B:0 C:0 D:00[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5281475/1/][color=green]Senju Akashi[/color] (Inactive)[/url]Konohagakure no SatoChuuninS:0 A:0 B:0 C:0 D:00

Author: Post

"[b]Maybe not today. Maybe not tomorrow. Someday we both will die. I just hope it's not too soon to have a family and not too far to waste away in old age. Maybe I'll even let you kill me one day. Who knows[/b]," Tadataka said with a probing smile. It was more of not knowing what to expect from Ryoga. It had been a long session, however, and Tadataka was content to regain some of his strength while Ryoga learned a new jutsu. The blood fountain, however, was interesting enough.

Author: 

[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325][i][/url]
								[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url]

		[b]Posts:[/b] [url=./search.php?author_id=1869325&sr=posts]7571[/url]		[b]Joined:[/b] Sat Apr 27, 2013 6:00 pm

					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Mon Sep 16, 2013 7:53 pm

			[color=#DC143C]"...You're a lot deeper than you look. The only reason i'd ever have to kill you is if you bail on the village, and I won't hesitate to hunt you down. But in any case, It would be interesting. Now, back to focus."[/color] Ryoga was going to finish this technique before he left today, he had to show his supremacy. The hand seals from before began taking effect, as the fountain changed from water to blood, slowing down and covering the ground with a torrent of blood. The ground was saturated already, so the blood would sit at the top of the ground, for the most part. Ryoga watched as the ground began covered more and more in his blood, until it got to a respectable amount. Once it got to the point he thought he had enough blood, he drew his sword once more and began performing a string of seals with his left hand, building an immense amount of chiton chakra inside of him, trying to raise his blood from the ground in front of him. The blood bubbled and moved before bursting into the air in a pillar of blood about 10 feet tall. It was impressive to be sure, but not nearly as big as he wanted it to be, Ryoga would have to mold his chakra more precisely to make his blood take the size and shape that he wanted it to.

Ryoga decided to place his sword back into his sheath for the time being, to attempt simply forming the first part of the jutsu. Sheathing his sword and keeping his right hand open, he again placed his left hand out in front of him in the form of a hand seal. Ryoga felt the blood beneath his feet quiver as he began once more building a huge amount of chakra within his body. His hand was a blur, performing hand seal after hand seal in quick succession. Each seal he performed made him feel like his chakra was taking true shape, getting more powerful with each movement. Finally, after landing on the final seal, he focused hard on the large pool of blood beneath him, focusing all of his chakra into an area 10 feet away from him, molding it up into the air. The pillar of blood grew to a size of 20 meters this time, towering over the two jounin. Ryoga then poured more chakra into the pillar and watched as it took shape, forming into a giant arm of blood. This was a big step in the right direction, however the jutsu still was not complete, for as Ryoga went to move his other arm, the arm did not respond, simply staying straight in the air, immobile. Ryoga scoffed and released the final seal, the tower of blood falling down to the ground once more. Ryoga wasn't satisfied, this time he would perfect the technique.

Ryoga's right hand quickly grabbed his hilt, pulling his sword from it's sheath once more. Ryoga held his sword out to his right, pointed away from him with his arm straight, and positioned his left hand in front of him once more in a one handed seal. Ryoga's hand was once more a blur of speed, flying through the hand seals one after another, each one molding his chakra into what would be his finished technique. Ryoga's hand froze as it landed on the final seal, holding it in perfect position as his chakra saturated the blood lining the ground. He felt the blood flow beneath him as a huge amount of blood began moving to an area 5 feet in front of Ryoga, coming from all directions and shooting up into the air, forming the same 20 meter arm as before, but looking much more defined. Ryoga tested the arm by moving his right arm, and felt an ease run over him as he saw that the arm was indeed mimicking his movements. He had succeeded in retaining control over his chakra after it had taken shape, but it wasn't finished yet. Ryoga focused as much chakra as he could into the arm, and finally a 10 meter sword of blood sprang forth from the Arm's palm. Ryoga's arm dropped to his side, and the arm followed suite, pointing the sword at the ground in front of him. Finally satisfied with his technique, Ryoga glanced at Tadataka with a look of victory before he lifted his arm and swung it in front of him, watching as the arm decimated a few trees about 25 meters away. [color=#DC143C]"And that's the power of Ryoga Kazuki. Let that keep you from ever leaving Kirigakure."[/color] Ryoga said with a smirk before sheathing his blade, dropping his left arm, and watching the blood fall before him once more into the blood on the ground

OOC: 1555/1450 for A rank Bloody sword technique.

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

Author: Post

[color=#DC143C]"...You're a lot deeper than you look. The only reason i'd ever have to kill you is if you bail on the village, and I won't hesitate to hunt you down. But in any case, It would be interesting. Now, back to focus."[/color] Ryoga was going to finish this technique before he left today, he had to show his supremacy. The hand seals from before began taking effect, as the fountain changed from water to blood, slowing down and covering the ground with a torrent of blood. The ground was saturated already, so the blood would sit at the top of the ground, for the most part. Ryoga watched as the ground began covered more and more in his blood, until it got to a respectable amount. Once it got to the point he thought he had enough blood, he drew his sword once more and began performing a string of seals with his left hand, building an immense amount of chiton chakra inside of him, trying to raise his blood from the ground in front of him. The blood bubbled and moved before bursting into the air in a pillar of blood about 10 feet tall. It was impressive to be sure, but not nearly as big as he wanted it to be, Ryoga would have to mold his chakra more precisely to make his blood take the size and shape that he wanted it to.

Ryoga decided to place his sword back into his sheath for the time being, to attempt simply forming the first part of the jutsu. Sheathing his sword and keeping his right hand open, he again placed his left hand out in front of him in the form of a hand seal. Ryoga felt the blood beneath his feet quiver as he began once more building a huge amount of chakra within his body. His hand was a blur, performing hand seal after hand seal in quick succession. Each seal he performed made him feel like his chakra was taking true shape, getting more powerful with each movement. Finally, after landing on the final seal, he focused hard on the large pool of blood beneath him, focusing all of his chakra into an area 10 feet away from him, molding it up into the air. The pillar of blood grew to a size of 20 meters this time, towering over the two jounin. Ryoga then poured more chakra into the pillar and watched as it took shape, forming into a giant arm of blood. This was a big step in the right direction, however the jutsu still was not complete, for as Ryoga went to move his other arm, the arm did not respond, simply staying straight in the air, immobile. Ryoga scoffed and released the final seal, the tower of blood falling down to the ground once more. Ryoga wasn't satisfied, this time he would perfect the technique.

Ryoga's right hand quickly grabbed his hilt, pulling his sword from it's sheath once more. Ryoga held his sword out to his right, pointed away from him with his arm straight, and positioned his left hand in front of him once more in a one handed seal. Ryoga's hand was once more a blur of speed, flying through the hand seals one after another, each one molding his chakra into what would be his finished technique. Ryoga's hand froze as it landed on the final seal, holding it in perfect position as his chakra saturated the blood lining the ground. He felt the blood flow beneath him as a huge amount of blood began moving to an area 5 feet in front of Ryoga, coming from all directions and shooting up into the air, forming the same 20 meter arm as before, but looking much more defined. Ryoga tested the arm by moving his right arm, and felt an ease run over him as he saw that the arm was indeed mimicking his movements. He had succeeded in retaining control over his chakra after it had taken shape, but it wasn't finished yet. Ryoga focused as much chakra as he could into the arm, and finally a 10 meter sword of blood sprang forth from the Arm's palm. Ryoga's arm dropped to his side, and the arm followed suite, pointing the sword at the ground in front of him. Finally satisfied with his technique, Ryoga glanced at Tadataka with a look of victory before he lifted his arm and swung it in front of him, watching as the arm decimated a few trees about 25 meters away. [color=#DC143C]"And that's the power of Ryoga Kazuki. Let that keep you from ever leaving Kirigakure."[/color] Ryoga said with a smirk before sheathing his blade, dropping his left arm, and watching the blood fall before him once more into the blood on the ground

			"[b]Cute. I would imagine you would be really screwed if someone attacked you from behind while controlling that thing though[/b]," Tadataka jested. In truth it was a frightening sight that nearly caused Tadataka to use his own jutsu in a reaction, but he hadn't, nor had he shown his fear outwardly. Tadataka would never show Ryoga how much his new jutsu had stirred fear inside of him; instead he would only show a resolve to best him the next time they trained together.

"[b]We must do this again sometime. I have an inkling of a jutsu that might impress you as well[/b]," he said with a certain glimmer of scheme in his eyes. "[b]Until then... I think it is about time we go off on our own business. See you soon[/b]."

Author: Post

"[b]Cute. I would imagine you would be really screwed if someone attacked you from behind while controlling that thing though[/b]," Tadataka jested. In truth it was a frightening sight that nearly caused Tadataka to use his own jutsu in a reaction, but he hadn't, nor had he shown his fear outwardly. Tadataka would never show Ryoga how much his new jutsu had stirred fear inside of him; instead he would only show a resolve to best him the next time they trained together.

"[b]We must do this again sometime. I have an inkling of a jutsu that might impress you as well[/b]," he said with a certain glimmer of scheme in his eyes. "[b]Until then... I think it is about time we go off on our own business. See you soon[/b]."

=== THREAD: [Accepted]Renouken, Tenchu - Naruto Saigen Roleplay ===
Forum: Home Board index General Section Member Section Old Forum Archives and Discussion Archives Finished Applications > Home Board index

Author: (unknown)

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/][/url]
				Naruto Saigen Roleplay
				Naruto Saigen RP is a text-based roleplay forum set in an alternate universe of the Naruto series.
				[url=#start_here]Skip to content[/url]

Author: 

[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325][i][/url]
								[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url]

		[b]Posts:[/b] [url=./search.php?author_id=1869325&sr=posts]7571[/url]		[b]Joined:[/b] Sat Apr 27, 2013 6:00 pm

						[url=#p1610557][Accepted]Renouken, Tenchu[/url]

									[url=./viewtopic.php?p=1610557#p1610557]
						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Sat Sep 14, 2013 4:14 pm

			[b]Username:[/b] [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325/]TyDie[/url]

[b]Points:[/b] 0/0

[b]Coupon:[/b]

[b]Companions:[/b] (0/4)

[b]Renouken, Tenchu[/b]

["I will get stronger. By any means necessary."]

[b]General Information[/b]
[b]Age:[/b] 13

[b]Gender:[/b] Male

[b]Height:[/b] 5'5 Feet

[b]Weight:[/b] 140 pounds

[b]Hair:[/b] Tenchu's Hair is medium length, brown in color, with his bangs parting to the left and right side of his forehead

[b]Eyes:[/b] Tenchu's Eyes are a simple brown color.

[b]Physical Features:[/b] Tenchu's Body is pretty muscular for a genin, having a six pack and decent muscle growth on the arms and legs. He walks with confidence in his steps, and normally has a pretty easy going face, unless of course he is in a serious scenario.

[b]Clothing/Accessories:[/b] Tenchu's normal attire, the one that he almost always wears, is a dark gray short sleeved gi. He wears rope around his hands whenever he plans on fighting, a pouch on his left side to carry his thing, and ninja sandles for footwear.  He has many different changes of this outfit, as they normally get dirty during training or missions. He doesn't normally wear anything else, though there are of course occasions.

[b]Forehead Protector:[/b] His forehead protector is on display on his forehead, and the color of the cloth is black

[b]Personality:[/b] Tenchu is what some might call obsessed. Obsessed with getting stronger, training on a daily basis, and constantly researching ways to gain strength, be it over ninjutsu or taijutsu. He can usually be found with a smile on his face, as he is an overall nice person who loves to learn new things and meet new people. His favorite things to do are spar and train, and he loves having partners to help him achieve his goals.

[b]Battle Information[/b]
[b]Rank:[/b] Genin

[b]Village:[/b] Konohagakure no Sato

[b]Chakra Affinity:[/b] Katon

[b]Second Chakra Affinity:[/b]

[b]Stats[/b]
[b]Ninjutsu:[/b] 3
[b]Taijutsu:[/b] 4
[b]Genjutsu:[/b] 1
[b]Stamina:[/b] 3
[b]Control:[/b] 3
[b]Strength:[/b] 4
[b]Speed:[/b] 4
[b]Wit: [/b] 2

[b]Equipment:[/b]
Left Hip PouchShow3 pairs of Handrope gauntlets

10 Kunai knives

A canteen of water

[b]Combat Style:[/b] Tenchu is mainly an up close and personal Taijutsu fighter. Occasionally he may decide to throw some nintai into the mix, but he is primarily an expert in unarmed fighting. If he is kept at bay, he relies on his katon to whittle his opponents down.

[b]Strong Fist Style[/b]

The Strong Fist Style has a single goal in mind: overpower. The style requires above average physical prowess and muscles trained and prepped for extraneous battles and exercises. The style’s main target is the external body, inflicting blow upon blow, whittling away the opponent’s stamina while keeping the user’s own at peak. The techniques themselves are relatively simple, but require precise muscle memory to accurately place attacks efficiently.

[b]Jutsu Information[/b]
[b]Abilities:[/b]

[b]Jutsu:[/b]

Strong FistShow [b]*Leaf Gale[/b]

D-Rank Taijutsu

With the intention to disrupt, the user analyzes the opponent's movements. The user then angles a leg below or above a charging target's center of gravity. With a strike to an unprepared or vulnerable area, the user attempts to knock their opponent off balance as a means to interrupt the target's attack or set up for another attack of their own.

[b]*Dynamic Action[/b]

D-Rank Taijutsu

As a lengthening distance is commonly a weakness of many close range fighters, the principle of [b]Dynamic Action[/b] aims elliminate the option of retreat. In this technique, the user focuses on advancement in attempts to lock the target from creating distance. In a linear movement, the user "pushes" the target back with a flurry of strikes and kicks. As the attacks may generate "knock-back", the user makes the appropriate movements to keep the foe in range

[b]*Dynamic Entry[/b]

D-Rank Taijutsu

In this technique, the user builds movement and speed in order to bridge the gap between themselves and a distanced target. After collpasing an appropriate distance, the user then looses a form of distraction, like a thrown object, in order to waive the target's attention. The user then leaps with their momentum, delivering a strong kick to bridge the rest of the distance.

[b]Leaf Upper[/b]

C-rank Taijutsu

This moves primary focus is putting the target into the air for follow up techniques. The user will get within range of the target, and attempt to uppercut the enemy in their chin, sending them skyward. The target flies in the air, going up one meter for each strength point the user has over the target. The user then follows the target into the air to follow up with other techniques.

[b]Leaf Hurricane[/b]

C-Rank Taijutsu

This technique is meant to close the gap between the user and the target with a powerful hurricane kick. The user leaps into the air, performing a few rotations before hitting the target with a roundhouse kick. The buildup of the technique makes it faster and stronger, but much less precise, increasing the users strength and speed by 1 by one and decreasing the users tai by 2 for the strike.
KatonShow *[color=orangered][b]Fire Element • Flame Bullet Technique[/b][/color]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed hand seals, the user focuses Katon chakra into one of their hands. This causes a fireball to form in the palm of their hand. They can then throw the fireball the same as they would any other projectile. If hit, the fireball causes light burning, barely a first-degree burn. If not thrown within two posts, the ball will dissipate into the air. The fireball typically only travels 20 or so feet before burning out.

*[color=orangered][b]Fire Element • Cauterization Technique[/b][/color]

D-Rank Iijutsu

After performing the needed hand seals, the user concentrates Katon chakra into one of his fingers, forming a tiny flame. They then place their finger on an minor wound, no longer than 6 inches and no wider than 1/2 inch, drawing theirfinger across the wounded flesh. After a period of 1 post and a great deal of pain, the wound will be cauterized.

[color=orangered][b]Fire Element • Hands of Flame[/b][/color]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed hand seals, the user focuses Katon chakra into his hands. The chakra, when focused, causes their hand to form flames around their hands for a small period of time, lasting for roughly three posts. The chakra is not actually on the user's hands, therefore any handgear remains undamaged. Attacks made with the hands can cause first-degree burns upon contact, giving a taijutsu user an edge in battle.

[color=orangered][b] Fire Element • Great Flame Bullet Technique[/b][/color]

C-rank Ninjutsu

Prerequiste: Fire Element • Flame Bullet Technique

After performing the needed handseals the user places their palms together by their dominant side. The user then builds a large amount of Katon chakra between their hands, forming a large fireball in their hands. They can then shoot the ball at a target by thrusting their palms forward. If hit, the fireball hits with a strength of 5, causing second degree burns and searing the opponents flesh. This jutsu flies with a speed of 6 for 50 meters before dispersing.

[color=orangered][b]Fire Element • Firebird Strike[/b][/color]

C-Rank Nintaijutsu

After completing a short set of hand seals the user will flood their entire fist with Katon chakra. As they do this, their hand will be engulfed in an aura of searing hot flames that can cause up to second-degree burns on impact. The aura surrounds the users hands, leaving any handgear undamaged. The user then attempts to punch their target in their chin, performing a strong uppercut, but as they complete this initial attack the aura of flames engulfing the user’s hand will explode violently forward. The blast is very limited in range however, only extending forward about six inches and if it's not used within a post of initiating the technique it will fizzle out, wasting chakra. The blast is equal in power to three exploding tags. If executed on someone with less than six strength, this technique will blast them off of their feet, sending them flying upwards about twenty feet, and causing severe second degree burns.

[b]History[/b]
Tenchu was born to a normal family in Konoha, neither of his parents were ninja, proving to be meager members of the village, doing odd jobs to make their way, though his grandparents were among the top jounin of the village. Even as a child, the boy had a drive to become better at whatever he did, as was apparent by him always performing his chores as fast as possible, never once complaining that it was too hard or too much. Eventually, when he was 7, he began feeling that he was better than what he was doing, better than chores and meaningless work. it wasn't long after he had these thoughts that he learned from other village members that his grandparents, who he had never met, were among the elite of Konoha shinobi. From their his path was decided, and he enrolled in the academy at the age of 8.

Life in the academy wasn't too bad for Tenchu, as he proved to be an incredibly strong taijutsu user, due to his constant chores having hardened his body. One of his teachers took an interest in his physical prowess, and began teaching him the basics of Gouken Ryuu, the Strong fist style. Tenchu looked up to his teacher as a sensei of sorts, but it wasn't an official Senpai-Kohai relationship. It wasn't long after he began learning Gouken Ryuu that he discovered his affinity for Katon. It came so naturally to him that he began applying it to his fighting style just before he graduated from the academy. When he finally did graduate, His teacher told him to continue learning on his own and keep developing his skills how he saw fit. Ever since then Tenchu has strived to push himself to his absolute limits, and get as powerful as he could possibly get, to be like his grandparents were: Elite ninja of Konoha.

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

								[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url]

		[b]Posts:[/b] [url=./search.php?author_id=1869325&sr=posts]7571[/url]		[b]Joined:[/b] Sat Apr 27, 2013 6:00 pm

						[url=#p1610557][Accepted]Renouken, Tenchu[/url]

									[url=./viewtopic.php?p=1610557#p1610557]
						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Sat Sep 14, 2013 4:14 pm

			[b]Username:[/b] [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325/]TyDie[/url]

[b]Points:[/b] 0/0

[b]Coupon:[/b]

[b]Companions:[/b] (0/4)

[b]Renouken, Tenchu[/b]

["I will get stronger. By any means necessary."]

[b]General Information[/b]
[b]Age:[/b] 13

[b]Gender:[/b] Male

[b]Height:[/b] 5'5 Feet

[b]Weight:[/b] 140 pounds

[b]Hair:[/b] Tenchu's Hair is medium length, brown in color, with his bangs parting to the left and right side of his forehead

[b]Eyes:[/b] Tenchu's Eyes are a simple brown color.

[b]Physical Features:[/b] Tenchu's Body is pretty muscular for a genin, having a six pack and decent muscle growth on the arms and legs. He walks with confidence in his steps, and normally has a pretty easy going face, unless of course he is in a serious scenario.

[b]Clothing/Accessories:[/b] Tenchu's normal attire, the one that he almost always wears, is a dark gray short sleeved gi. He wears rope around his hands whenever he plans on fighting, a pouch on his left side to carry his thing, and ninja sandles for footwear.  He has many different changes of this outfit, as they normally get dirty during training or missions. He doesn't normally wear anything else, though there are of course occasions.

[b]Forehead Protector:[/b] His forehead protector is on display on his forehead, and the color of the cloth is black

[b]Personality:[/b] Tenchu is what some might call obsessed. Obsessed with getting stronger, training on a daily basis, and constantly researching ways to gain strength, be it over ninjutsu or taijutsu. He can usually be found with a smile on his face, as he is an overall nice person who loves to learn new things and meet new people. His favorite things to do are spar and train, and he loves having partners to help him achieve his goals.

[b]Battle Information[/b]
[b]Rank:[/b] Genin

[b]Village:[/b] Konohagakure no Sato

[b]Chakra Affinity:[/b] Katon

[b]Second Chakra Affinity:[/b]

[b]Stats[/b]
[b]Ninjutsu:[/b] 3
[b]Taijutsu:[/b] 4
[b]Genjutsu:[/b] 1
[b]Stamina:[/b] 3
[b]Control:[/b] 3
[b]Strength:[/b] 4
[b]Speed:[/b] 4
[b]Wit: [/b] 2

[b]Equipment:[/b]
Left Hip PouchShow3 pairs of Handrope gauntlets

10 Kunai knives

A canteen of water

[b]Combat Style:[/b] Tenchu is mainly an up close and personal Taijutsu fighter. Occasionally he may decide to throw some nintai into the mix, but he is primarily an expert in unarmed fighting. If he is kept at bay, he relies on his katon to whittle his opponents down.

[b]Strong Fist Style[/b]

The Strong Fist Style has a single goal in mind: overpower. The style requires above average physical prowess and muscles trained and prepped for extraneous battles and exercises. The style’s main target is the external body, inflicting blow upon blow, whittling away the opponent’s stamina while keeping the user’s own at peak. The techniques themselves are relatively simple, but require precise muscle memory to accurately place attacks efficiently.

[b]Jutsu Information[/b]
[b]Abilities:[/b]

[b]Jutsu:[/b]

Strong FistShow [b]*Leaf Gale[/b]

D-Rank Taijutsu

With the intention to disrupt, the user analyzes the opponent's movements. The user then angles a leg below or above a charging target's center of gravity. With a strike to an unprepared or vulnerable area, the user attempts to knock their opponent off balance as a means to interrupt the target's attack or set up for another attack of their own.

[b]*Dynamic Action[/b]

D-Rank Taijutsu

As a lengthening distance is commonly a weakness of many close range fighters, the principle of [b]Dynamic Action[/b] aims elliminate the option of retreat. In this technique, the user focuses on advancement in attempts to lock the target from creating distance. In a linear movement, the user "pushes" the target back with a flurry of strikes and kicks. As the attacks may generate "knock-back", the user makes the appropriate movements to keep the foe in range

[b]*Dynamic Entry[/b]

D-Rank Taijutsu

In this technique, the user builds movement and speed in order to bridge the gap between themselves and a distanced target. After collpasing an appropriate distance, the user then looses a form of distraction, like a thrown object, in order to waive the target's attention. The user then leaps with their momentum, delivering a strong kick to bridge the rest of the distance.

[b]Leaf Upper[/b]

C-rank Taijutsu

This moves primary focus is putting the target into the air for follow up techniques. The user will get within range of the target, and attempt to uppercut the enemy in their chin, sending them skyward. The target flies in the air, going up one meter for each strength point the user has over the target. The user then follows the target into the air to follow up with other techniques.

[b]Leaf Hurricane[/b]

C-Rank Taijutsu

This technique is meant to close the gap between the user and the target with a powerful hurricane kick. The user leaps into the air, performing a few rotations before hitting the target with a roundhouse kick. The buildup of the technique makes it faster and stronger, but much less precise, increasing the users strength and speed by 1 by one and decreasing the users tai by 2 for the strike.
KatonShow *[color=orangered][b]Fire Element • Flame Bullet Technique[/b][/color]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed hand seals, the user focuses Katon chakra into one of their hands. This causes a fireball to form in the palm of their hand. They can then throw the fireball the same as they would any other projectile. If hit, the fireball causes light burning, barely a first-degree burn. If not thrown within two posts, the ball will dissipate into the air. The fireball typically only travels 20 or so feet before burning out.

*[color=orangered][b]Fire Element • Cauterization Technique[/b][/color]

D-Rank Iijutsu

After performing the needed hand seals, the user concentrates Katon chakra into one of his fingers, forming a tiny flame. They then place their finger on an minor wound, no longer than 6 inches and no wider than 1/2 inch, drawing theirfinger across the wounded flesh. After a period of 1 post and a great deal of pain, the wound will be cauterized.

[color=orangered][b]Fire Element • Hands of Flame[/b][/color]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed hand seals, the user focuses Katon chakra into his hands. The chakra, when focused, causes their hand to form flames around their hands for a small period of time, lasting for roughly three posts. The chakra is not actually on the user's hands, therefore any handgear remains undamaged. Attacks made with the hands can cause first-degree burns upon contact, giving a taijutsu user an edge in battle.

[color=orangered][b] Fire Element • Great Flame Bullet Technique[/b][/color]

C-rank Ninjutsu

Prerequiste: Fire Element • Flame Bullet Technique

After performing the needed handseals the user places their palms together by their dominant side. The user then builds a large amount of Katon chakra between their hands, forming a large fireball in their hands. They can then shoot the ball at a target by thrusting their palms forward. If hit, the fireball hits with a strength of 5, causing second degree burns and searing the opponents flesh. This jutsu flies with a speed of 6 for 50 meters before dispersing.

[color=orangered][b]Fire Element • Firebird Strike[/b][/color]

C-Rank Nintaijutsu

After completing a short set of hand seals the user will flood their entire fist with Katon chakra. As they do this, their hand will be engulfed in an aura of searing hot flames that can cause up to second-degree burns on impact. The aura surrounds the users hands, leaving any handgear undamaged. The user then attempts to punch their target in their chin, performing a strong uppercut, but as they complete this initial attack the aura of flames engulfing the user’s hand will explode violently forward. The blast is very limited in range however, only extending forward about six inches and if it's not used within a post of initiating the technique it will fizzle out, wasting chakra. The blast is equal in power to three exploding tags. If executed on someone with less than six strength, this technique will blast them off of their feet, sending them flying upwards about twenty feet, and causing severe second degree burns.

[b]History[/b]
Tenchu was born to a normal family in Konoha, neither of his parents were ninja, proving to be meager members of the village, doing odd jobs to make their way, though his grandparents were among the top jounin of the village. Even as a child, the boy had a drive to become better at whatever he did, as was apparent by him always performing his chores as fast as possible, never once complaining that it was too hard or too much. Eventually, when he was 7, he began feeling that he was better than what he was doing, better than chores and meaningless work. it wasn't long after he had these thoughts that he learned from other village members that his grandparents, who he had never met, were among the elite of Konoha shinobi. From their his path was decided, and he enrolled in the academy at the age of 8.

Life in the academy wasn't too bad for Tenchu, as he proved to be an incredibly strong taijutsu user, due to his constant chores having hardened his body. One of his teachers took an interest in his physical prowess, and began teaching him the basics of Gouken Ryuu, the Strong fist style. Tenchu looked up to his teacher as a sensei of sorts, but it wasn't an official Senpai-Kohai relationship. It wasn't long after he began learning Gouken Ryuu that he discovered his affinity for Katon. It came so naturally to him that he began applying it to his fighting style just before he graduated from the academy. When he finally did graduate, His teacher told him to continue learning on his own and keep developing his skills how he saw fit. Ever since then Tenchu has strived to push himself to his absolute limits, and get as powerful as he could possibly get, to be like his grandparents were: Elite ninja of Konoha.

			[i]

Author:

						[url=#p1610501][Accepted]Suna Training Complete[/url]

						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Sat Sep 14, 2013 11:56 am

			[b]Username:[/b] [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325/]TyDie[/url]

[b]Application:[/b] [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5222559/1/#new]Kiyori Henrin[/url]

[b]Change:[/b] Please add the following trained jutsu to their respective areas
DotonShow *[color=saddlebrown][Earth Element • Rock Shield][/color]

E-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding a portion of earth with chakra, the user will cause a large piece of rock (2 feet x 3 feet x 1 inch) to rise from the ground. The rock is able to stay in place for up to three posts before crumbling, and can only be created within 5 meters of the user.

*[color=saddlebrown][Earth Element • Earth Clone][/color]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding the ground around them with chakra, the user will cause a clone to materialize out of the ground. The clone is made of rock, and is quite strong and durable, but can only move within a quarter mile of the user. The clone is only able to use taijutsu attacks, and has the following stats: 1 Taijutsu, 4 Stamina, 2 Strength, and 1 Speed.

*[color=saddlebrown][Earth Element • Stone Shield][/color]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: [Earth Element • Rock Shield]

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding the ground around them with chakra, the user will raise four boulders, each being three feet by four feet by two inches, out of the ground, surrounding the user.
Henrin TaijutsuShow ~Tripod – Swap the Film

E-Ranked Taijutsu

Due to the stance having a weakness of the leg that they are balancing on one leg, this style disallows for simple leg sweeps to function. Whenever a leg sweep is incoming, the clan member jumps up and over the attack, then switches the foot that they are balancing on, while evading the attack.

~Tripod - Swap Kick

D Rank Taijutsu

Prerequisite: Swap the Film

Using Swap the Film, the user will perform hop up to avoid the intended leg sweep. However instead of merely switching legs, the clan member will perform a downward kick at the offending leg in an attempt to hinder the opponent’s movement.

~Tripod - Snap Kick

D Rank Taijutsu

Prerequisite: Swap the Film

This attack is a simple in nature, while being approached by the opponent, the clan member will hop up. During the hop they will not only switch legs but bring up the one they were standing in on a snap kick aimed at the opponent's head.

[b]Payment:[/b] [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5225275/1/#new]Bring the Pain[/url]

			[i]

=== THREAD: Bring the Pain - Naruto Saigen Roleplay ===
Forum: Home Board index Role Play Wind Country Sunagakure no Sato > Home Board index

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: (unknown)

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/][/url]
				Naruto Saigen Roleplay
				Naruto Saigen RP is a text-based roleplay forum set in an alternate universe of the Naruto series.
				[url=#start_here]Skip to content[/url]

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: 

[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882][i][/url]
								[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url]

		[b]Posts:[/b] [url=./search.php?author_id=948882&sr=posts]4378[/url]		[b]Joined:[/b] Wed Dec 16, 2009 6:00 pm

											[b]Location:[/b] Site 17
												[b]Grading Tier:[/b] Mangaka

				[b]Contact:[/b]

					[url=#]
						PM
					[/url]

																	[url=./ucp.php?i=pm&mode=compose&action=quotepost&p=1606449]
										Send private message
									[/url]

						[url=#p1606449]Bring the Pain[/url]

							[url=/forums/app.php/post/1606449/report]
								REPORT
							[/url]

							[url=./posting.php?mode=quote&f=57&p=1606449]
								QUOTE
							[/url]

			[url=./viewtopic.php?f=57&p=1606449&thanks=1606449&to_id=948882&from_id=1869325]
				LIKE
			[/url]

									[url=./viewtopic.php?p=1606449#p1606449]
						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Fri Sep 06, 2013 12:34 pm

			Shigekuni unbuttoned his white mandarin shirt as he set it aside, with the rest of his equipment. His first new teammate, Henrin Kiyori, had insisted on training since both of them had a lot of ground to cover if they planned to prove themselves in the Chuunin Exam. It was a bit odd having a person he could go into hardcore training with since  most times he trained alone. As he stood there in the Henrin training area, he started stretching his arms and legs.

"[color=#95BD4F]Before I start in on any jutsu, I was thinking of trying to do work on some muscle building exercises. I'll need you to climb on my back while I do push ups.[/color]" Shigekuni stated as he started stretching his back. "[color=#95BD4F]Of course if you have a better idea, I'm all ears.[/color]"

The Genin had a plethora of jutsu he could tap into once he finished his muscle exercises, he just hoped the training ground would be able to take it. Shigekuni didn't like the idea of working to rebuild the training grounds within the clan compound, but he could always view it as training and exercise.

[url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_Oqmby3igoUKiR_pd4sGiA]Red Buster Gaming Youtube[/url] ||| [url=https://www.twitch.tv/redbustergaming]Red Buster Gaming Twitch[/url]
[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5948923/1/]Takamori Saigo[/url] - Konohagakure Banin - [color=#93DDDB][color=#93DDDB][/color]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8343194]Takamori Jubei[/url] - Konohagakure Genin - [color=#8B658B][color=#8B658B][/color]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8347040]Takamori Kanako[/url] - Konohagakure Genin - [color=#AB274F][color=#AB274F][/color]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8346116]Ryousei Genkaku[/url] - Sungakure Jounin - [color=#BE4F62][color=#BE4F62][/color]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8348325]Bayushi Kachiko[/url] - Kumogakure Jounin - [color=#FFC40C][color=#FFC40C][/color]
