								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Fri Sep 06, 2013 12:34 pm

			Shigekuni unbuttoned his white mandarin shirt as he set it aside, with the rest of his equipment. His first new teammate, Henrin Kiyori, had insisted on training since both of them had a lot of ground to cover if they planned to prove themselves in the Chuunin Exam. It was a bit odd having a person he could go into hardcore training with since  most times he trained alone. As he stood there in the Henrin training area, he started stretching his arms and legs.

"[color=#95BD4F]Before I start in on any jutsu, I was thinking of trying to do work on some muscle building exercises. I'll need you to climb on my back while I do push ups.[/color]" Shigekuni stated as he started stretching his back. "[color=#95BD4F]Of course if you have a better idea, I'm all ears.[/color]"

The Genin had a plethora of jutsu he could tap into once he finished his muscle exercises, he just hoped the training ground would be able to take it. Shigekuni didn't like the idea of working to rebuild the training grounds within the clan compound, but he could always view it as training and exercise.

Author: Post

Shigekuni unbuttoned his white mandarin shirt as he set it aside, with the rest of his equipment. His first new teammate, Henrin Kiyori, had insisted on training since both of them had a lot of ground to cover if they planned to prove themselves in the Chuunin Exam. It was a bit odd having a person he could go into hardcore training with since  most times he trained alone. As he stood there in the Henrin training area, he started stretching his arms and legs.

"[color=#95BD4F]Before I start in on any jutsu, I was thinking of trying to do work on some muscle building exercises. I'll need you to climb on my back while I do push ups.[/color]" Shigekuni stated as he started stretching his back. "[color=#95BD4F]Of course if you have a better idea, I'm all ears.[/color]"

The Genin had a plethora of jutsu he could tap into once he finished his muscle exercises, he just hoped the training ground would be able to take it. Shigekuni didn't like the idea of working to rebuild the training grounds within the clan compound, but he could always view it as training and exercise.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Sun Sep 08, 2013 8:56 am

			As Kiyori and Shigekuni approached the Henrin training ground, Kiyori was making a mental list of everything she intended to train today, almost tuning out the world around her. This was her first real training session with a partner, and she wanted to make sure everything went according to plan, so she didn't seem like a weak link. As they arrived at the grounds, Kiyori began doing similar stretches, especially on her legs. Shigekuni wanted to work on his strength first, and Kiyori had the perfect technique in mind to practice while standing on his back. [color=slategray]"That's fine, i can stand on your back and practice swapping my feet in my base stance. I should be able to maintain balance and cushion my landing enough that I don't snap your back in two. Just let me know when you're ready, and i'll hop on."[/color]

It was slightly embarrassing to admit that her leg swaps weren't very good, as it was a base technique for the Tripod style. She only hoped Shigekuni didn't know that, as she was pretty sure he had little to no knowledge of the Henrin's Taijutsu. Still, it worked out all things considering, Her partners strength training gave her the perfect opportunity to solidify this basic movement.

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: Post

As Kiyori and Shigekuni approached the Henrin training ground, Kiyori was making a mental list of everything she intended to train today, almost tuning out the world around her. This was her first real training session with a partner, and she wanted to make sure everything went according to plan, so she didn't seem like a weak link. As they arrived at the grounds, Kiyori began doing similar stretches, especially on her legs. Shigekuni wanted to work on his strength first, and Kiyori had the perfect technique in mind to practice while standing on his back. [color=slategray]"That's fine, i can stand on your back and practice swapping my feet in my base stance. I should be able to maintain balance and cushion my landing enough that I don't snap your back in two. Just let me know when you're ready, and i'll hop on."[/color]

It was slightly embarrassing to admit that her leg swaps weren't very good, as it was a base technique for the Tripod style. She only hoped Shigekuni didn't know that, as she was pretty sure he had little to no knowledge of the Henrin's Taijutsu. Still, it worked out all things considering, Her partners strength training gave her the perfect opportunity to solidify this basic movement.

------------------------------------------------------------

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Sun Sep 08, 2013 9:30 am

			Shigekuni finished his stretching and nodded to his partner as he balanced himself on his toes for a second before leaning forward, letting himself fall over. Catching himself before he truly smacked into the ground, Shigekuni immediately went into doing push ups at a steady pace. He didn't feel much of anything while working himself up and down, counting out through muffled breaths every time he completed a push up.

After he got himself up to twenty he elevated his voice a little, "[color=#95BD4F]Go ahead and get on.[/color]" He got out before continuing his count. He braced himself for the new weight that would be on his back in a few moments as he kept his pace, wondering how long he'd be able to keep his pace as he worked his body up and down. Shigekuni had long since known the benefits of doing pushups, as they were a common exercise from the academy, but he'd never challenged himself by forcing weight on his back to increase the load his arms would be dealing with. Then again it wasn't just his arms he was working during push ups.

The whole point of push up exercises were to work the pectoral muscles, triceps, and anterior deltoids. He'd also heard they were capable of ancillary benefits to the rest of the deltoids, various muscles along the underside of the arm, and a person's midsection in general since you had to keep your body rigid as well. If anything, Shigekuni would increase the benefits to those other parts of his body by having Kiyori standing on his back and applying changes in weight distribution with her Taijutsu training.

The Genin knew the benefits of working his upper body and only hoped that this idea paid off and didn't just wind up hurting his back as he continued to push himself up and down against the ground while awaiting his partner's contribution to his training.

OOC: 321/1000 words for Strength training

Author: Post

Shigekuni finished his stretching and nodded to his partner as he balanced himself on his toes for a second before leaning forward, letting himself fall over. Catching himself before he truly smacked into the ground, Shigekuni immediately went into doing push ups at a steady pace. He didn't feel much of anything while working himself up and down, counting out through muffled breaths every time he completed a push up.

After he got himself up to twenty he elevated his voice a little, "[color=#95BD4F]Go ahead and get on.[/color]" He got out before continuing his count. He braced himself for the new weight that would be on his back in a few moments as he kept his pace, wondering how long he'd be able to keep his pace as he worked his body up and down. Shigekuni had long since known the benefits of doing pushups, as they were a common exercise from the academy, but he'd never challenged himself by forcing weight on his back to increase the load his arms would be dealing with. Then again it wasn't just his arms he was working during push ups.

The whole point of push up exercises were to work the pectoral muscles, triceps, and anterior deltoids. He'd also heard they were capable of ancillary benefits to the rest of the deltoids, various muscles along the underside of the arm, and a person's midsection in general since you had to keep your body rigid as well. If anything, Shigekuni would increase the benefits to those other parts of his body by having Kiyori standing on his back and applying changes in weight distribution with her Taijutsu training.

The Genin knew the benefits of working his upper body and only hoped that this idea paid off and didn't just wind up hurting his back as he continued to push himself up and down against the ground while awaiting his partner's contribution to his training.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Sun Sep 08, 2013 11:04 am

			As her partner began stretching and doing some regular push ups to get used to the motion, Kiyori took the base Henrin stance, Setting up the equipment. as she stretched her right leg to a side kick position and extended her arms as if she were about to fight someone, she began practicing the leg swap. Hopping from one leg to the other while maintaining the same pose of a side kick wasn't an easy thing to do, it was essentially switching from a right hand dominant stance to a left hand dominant stance. Kiyori was ambidextrous, but it was still a difficult transition to make.

Once her partner was used to the basic push ups, it was time for her help to come in. She swiftly hopped on his back, landing between his shoulder blades so as not to cause lower back problems. She would have to be very careful not to apply too much pressure while swapping, she didn't want to break her partner's back. As shigekuni continued his push ups, Kiyori continued her leg swaps, starting with high, slow jumps and slowly increasing the speed while decreasing the height, getting faster and faster, until her supporting leg only left the ground for about a second. This exercise helped her get better at regulating her balance faster. As every moment counts in a fight, the faster she could perform this technique, the better off she would be.

This basic taijutsu was something that most Henrin knew long before they joined the academy, it was the simplest of the Tripod techniques. More importantly, it was something Kiyori needed to commit to muscle memory, something she had to be able to do without even thinking, a completely reactionary action. She did it over and over again, each time regulating her stance as fast as possible. Being on top of Shigekuni's back added a whole new level of difficulty to doing the technique, as it made it feel like the ground beneath her was moving up and down. She had to learn to compensate for Shigekuni's movements, easing into it when he was coming up, and dropping a bit faster as he descended. As a result, she was getting a lot better at swapping her stance. As shigekuni drew close to finishing his Exercise, Kiyori was finally starting to feel confident in her swaps, as though it were almost second nature to her at this point. Shigekuni gave her the okay, and she dismounted his back, performing a quick front flip while landing on her left leg in her basic stance before dropping back to a regular standing position. [color=slategray]"Good, i'd been meaning to do that for a while, and you gave me the excuse to do it. What's next?"[/color]

OOC 459/400 words for the below jutsu
Jutsu learnedShow ~Tripod – Swap the Film

E-Ranked Taijutsu

Due to the stance having a weakness of the leg that they are balancing on one leg, this style disallows for simple leg sweeps to function. Whenever a leg sweep is incoming, the clan member jumps up and over the attack, then switches the foot that they are balancing on, while evading the attack.

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

Author: Post

As her partner began stretching and doing some regular push ups to get used to the motion, Kiyori took the base Henrin stance, Setting up the equipment. as she stretched her right leg to a side kick position and extended her arms as if she were about to fight someone, she began practicing the leg swap. Hopping from one leg to the other while maintaining the same pose of a side kick wasn't an easy thing to do, it was essentially switching from a right hand dominant stance to a left hand dominant stance. Kiyori was ambidextrous, but it was still a difficult transition to make.

Once her partner was used to the basic push ups, it was time for her help to come in. She swiftly hopped on his back, landing between his shoulder blades so as not to cause lower back problems. She would have to be very careful not to apply too much pressure while swapping, she didn't want to break her partner's back. As shigekuni continued his push ups, Kiyori continued her leg swaps, starting with high, slow jumps and slowly increasing the speed while decreasing the height, getting faster and faster, until her supporting leg only left the ground for about a second. This exercise helped her get better at regulating her balance faster. As every moment counts in a fight, the faster she could perform this technique, the better off she would be.

This basic taijutsu was something that most Henrin knew long before they joined the academy, it was the simplest of the Tripod techniques. More importantly, it was something Kiyori needed to commit to muscle memory, something she had to be able to do without even thinking, a completely reactionary action. She did it over and over again, each time regulating her stance as fast as possible. Being on top of Shigekuni's back added a whole new level of difficulty to doing the technique, as it made it feel like the ground beneath her was moving up and down. She had to learn to compensate for Shigekuni's movements, easing into it when he was coming up, and dropping a bit faster as he descended. As a result, she was getting a lot better at swapping her stance. As shigekuni drew close to finishing his Exercise, Kiyori was finally starting to feel confident in her swaps, as though it were almost second nature to her at this point. Shigekuni gave her the okay, and she dismounted his back, performing a quick front flip while landing on her left leg in her basic stance before dropping back to a regular standing position. [color=slategray]"Good, i'd been meaning to do that for a while, and you gave me the excuse to do it. What's next?"[/color]

OOC 459/400 words for the below jutsu
Jutsu learnedShow ~Tripod – Swap the Film

E-Ranked Taijutsu

Due to the stance having a weakness of the leg that they are balancing on one leg, this style disallows for simple leg sweeps to function. Whenever a leg sweep is incoming, the clan member jumps up and over the attack, then switches the foot that they are balancing on, while evading the attack.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Sun Sep 08, 2013 11:54 am

			Shigekuni kept a steady pace as he brought himself up, then dropping back down with his nose mere centimeters from the ground. As he started to move up again he could hear his part coming up to him and he kept himself braced for the extra weight she was about to put on top of him. Kiyori wasn't much more, but it was enough to make him slow his pace a little as he readjusted himself to coop with it.

Little did he know that what she had planned would be more than just simply balancing herself on his back. He hadn't really anticipated that Kiyori would be rapidly shifting her stance from one leg to another. It was almost like she was trying to kick or stomp on him, trying to push him back to the ground as he pushed up, mind you the girl wasn't as strong as Shigekuni, but she wasn't making it easy either.

Every time he counted off a push up he grunted with the impact of her feet against his back as the Henrin Genin start to gradually increase her pace over time. As Shigekuni performed each push up, he tried to keep himself steady as the girl picked hers up, in the end it would look more like his pace was slowing down to ensure he didn't get rammed into the ground by accident. As his pace slowed, it became more deliberate and enforced as he went from your regular push ups to building steady and deliberate movements with his arms. Each time he shifted his body down or up, his arms started using more and more of their fibrous tissue to enforce each movement.

Every time he dropped himself down close to the ground he could feel his muscles tightening accordingly in order to keep him from simply falling face first into the ground and possibly slamming his nose in some painful manner. Pushing himself away from the ground, he brought himself up and felt a burning sensation start to creep up his arms as he knew his arms were going to need a break after this was done otherwise he was gonna have a hard time moving his arms. However as he was getting close to concern, the weight on his back lifted as the girl stated she was finished with her training.

Shigekuni almost thanked his lucky stars but now he needed a new way to challenge his arms with the extra weight gone. Pushing himself hard enough to make his upper body lift away from the ground, Shigekuni twisted one arm behind his back and repositioned the other, his fingers and palm quickly positioning themselves against the ground before he dropped down in a one handed push up.

"[color=#95BD4F]I'm almost done, give me a little time to finish some one handed push ups on each arm and we can continue.[/color]" Shigekuni grunted out every time he pushed himself back up and she would be able to hear him. As he struggled to not only produce push ups with one hand, he also struggled to maintain balance since he was working his his arm just as much as before. He could feel beads of sweat start to form on his forehead as he went up and down a couple of dozens times with one arm before giving a final push.

As he pushed himself up away from the ground, the extra effort he put into it allowed him to quickly swap arms as he started going into a set on his now slightly rested arm. Shigekuni managed to crank out a higher pace on his other arm now that it had less of a 'burning' sensation to it after giving it a moment to recover during his first set of one handed push ups. The Genin huffedd out numbers counting up as he raised and lowered his body at a pace that was almost equal to what he'd started with on both arms, quickly cranking out the last bit of what he had planned for physical exercise before he'd move on to training other things. As he cranked out the last push up, Shigekuni rolled over onto his back and let his muscles burn from the soreness that would in time turn into new found strength.

OOC: 1037/1000 for Strength Training

Author: Post

Shigekuni kept a steady pace as he brought himself up, then dropping back down with his nose mere centimeters from the ground. As he started to move up again he could hear his part coming up to him and he kept himself braced for the extra weight she was about to put on top of him. Kiyori wasn't much more, but it was enough to make him slow his pace a little as he readjusted himself to coop with it.

Little did he know that what she had planned would be more than just simply balancing herself on his back. He hadn't really anticipated that Kiyori would be rapidly shifting her stance from one leg to another. It was almost like she was trying to kick or stomp on him, trying to push him back to the ground as he pushed up, mind you the girl wasn't as strong as Shigekuni, but she wasn't making it easy either.

Every time he counted off a push up he grunted with the impact of her feet against his back as the Henrin Genin start to gradually increase her pace over time. As Shigekuni performed each push up, he tried to keep himself steady as the girl picked hers up, in the end it would look more like his pace was slowing down to ensure he didn't get rammed into the ground by accident. As his pace slowed, it became more deliberate and enforced as he went from your regular push ups to building steady and deliberate movements with his arms. Each time he shifted his body down or up, his arms started using more and more of their fibrous tissue to enforce each movement.

Every time he dropped himself down close to the ground he could feel his muscles tightening accordingly in order to keep him from simply falling face first into the ground and possibly slamming his nose in some painful manner. Pushing himself away from the ground, he brought himself up and felt a burning sensation start to creep up his arms as he knew his arms were going to need a break after this was done otherwise he was gonna have a hard time moving his arms. However as he was getting close to concern, the weight on his back lifted as the girl stated she was finished with her training.

Shigekuni almost thanked his lucky stars but now he needed a new way to challenge his arms with the extra weight gone. Pushing himself hard enough to make his upper body lift away from the ground, Shigekuni twisted one arm behind his back and repositioned the other, his fingers and palm quickly positioning themselves against the ground before he dropped down in a one handed push up.

"[color=#95BD4F]I'm almost done, give me a little time to finish some one handed push ups on each arm and we can continue.[/color]" Shigekuni grunted out every time he pushed himself back up and she would be able to hear him. As he struggled to not only produce push ups with one hand, he also struggled to maintain balance since he was working his his arm just as much as before. He could feel beads of sweat start to form on his forehead as he went up and down a couple of dozens times with one arm before giving a final push.

As he pushed himself up away from the ground, the extra effort he put into it allowed him to quickly swap arms as he started going into a set on his now slightly rested arm. Shigekuni managed to crank out a higher pace on his other arm now that it had less of a 'burning' sensation to it after giving it a moment to recover during his first set of one handed push ups. The Genin huffedd out numbers counting up as he raised and lowered his body at a pace that was almost equal to what he'd started with on both arms, quickly cranking out the last bit of what he had planned for physical exercise before he'd move on to training other things. As he cranked out the last push up, Shigekuni rolled over onto his back and let his muscles burn from the soreness that would in time turn into new found strength.

Kiyori Continued practicing her newfound leg swapping prowess for a few moments before realized that Shigekuni was still performing push ups. When she took notice of his one armed training, she simply watched silently, admiring the genin's drive to push himself to new limits. [color=slategray][i]"This is how everyone should think, this boy really has the willpower to push forward through the pain."[/i][/color] Kiyori continued to watch as he finished his training and rolled over to rest, clearly exhausted and already feeling the pain in his arms. [color=slategray]"We can take a break if you want. You look pretty tired."[/color]

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Sun Sep 08, 2013 2:24 pm

			Shigekuni shook his head, "[color=#95BD4F]I just need a moment to let my heart beat return to a rested state, then we can continue. Besides I have a technique to deal with my arms that I'll train next anyway. It's an iijutsu based numbing technique that will allow me to use my arms like normal without worrying about feeling pain.[/color]" After a while, Shigekuni got up off the ground as he moved his arms a bit, feeling the ache in his muscles. "[color=#95BD4F]Okay, what do you have next on your list?[/color]"

-----------Training Begin-------------

Shigekuni took a moment to go through the list of techniques in his mind until he started to remember the specifics about his Raiton Numbing technique. Bringing his hands together he went through a dry run for the hand seals he was about to use, forming each one slowly and deliberately. It also let him work out some of the ache in his arms before he started really going at forming the hand seals at his regular pace to try and see how well he'd manage.

As he went through each seal, he eventually hit the last one then let his arms drop to his sides. Letting his arms rest a moment, he then brought them back up as he formed the seals again, this time at a one-eighth increase to his speed. Once he finished he started again, this time at one-fourth his regular speed. Then at half, three-fourths, and finally forming the seals at his regular speed.

After two more dry runs at regular speed, Shigekuni thoguht it was time to throw chakra into the mix and see how well he did in distributing it. Bringing his hands together once more, he could feel his body molding the chakra as it started to course up into his hands. Finishing the last seal he poured chakra into his hands, but alas it was too much and it sparked out, almost like a miniature bolt of lightning that zapped his hands.

Shigekuni jumped around, grasping his hand as he swore up a storm. He jumped around, stomped his feet, and took several audiable deep breaths through clenched teeth before he suppressed himself back to his usual demeanor. Shaking his hand and trying to get the feeling back in it, Shigekuni looked over at Kiyori. "[color=#95BD4F]I think I'm too used to offensive techniques, my hand is almost completely numb.[/color]"

----------Training End------------------

OOC: 308/800 words for D Rank Raiton Numbing Iijutsu

[url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_Oqmby3igoUKiR_pd4sGiA]Red Buster Gaming Youtube[/url] ||| [url=https://www.twitch.tv/redbustergaming]Red Buster Gaming Twitch[/url]
[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5948923/1/]Takamori Saigo[/url] - Konohagakure Banin - [color=#93DDDB][color=#93DDDB][/color]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8343194]Takamori Jubei[/url] - Konohagakure Genin - [color=#8B658B][color=#8B658B][/color]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8347040]Takamori Kanako[/url] - Konohagakure Genin - [color=#AB274F][color=#AB274F][/color]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=6209842/1/]Matsudaira Tokoha[/url] - Sunagakure - Jounin - [color=#ED2939][color=#ED2939][/color]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5635886/1/]Ishiguro Nui[/url] - Kumogakure Chuunin -  [color=brown][color=brown][/color]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5648698/1/]Awai Mariko[/url] - Konohagakure Chuunin - [color=#B2397F][color=#B2397F][/color]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5802714/1/]Jinrai Setsuko[/url] - Kumogakure Chuunin - [color=#D60270][color=#D60270][/color]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5639545/1/]Toukai Mukade[/url] - Kirigakure Chuunin - [color=#8B7765][color=#8B7765][/color]

						[url=#top]
				[i][/i]
				Top
			[/url]

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: Post

Shigekuni shook his head, "[color=#95BD4F]I just need a moment to let my heart beat return to a rested state, then we can continue. Besides I have a technique to deal with my arms that I'll train next anyway. It's an iijutsu based numbing technique that will allow me to use my arms like normal without worrying about feeling pain.[/color]" After a while, Shigekuni got up off the ground as he moved his arms a bit, feeling the ache in his muscles. "[color=#95BD4F]Okay, what do you have next on your list?[/color]"

-----------Training Begin-------------

Shigekuni took a moment to go through the list of techniques in his mind until he started to remember the specifics about his Raiton Numbing technique. Bringing his hands together he went through a dry run for the hand seals he was about to use, forming each one slowly and deliberately. It also let him work out some of the ache in his arms before he started really going at forming the hand seals at his regular pace to try and see how well he'd manage.

As he went through each seal, he eventually hit the last one then let his arms drop to his sides. Letting his arms rest a moment, he then brought them back up as he formed the seals again, this time at a one-eighth increase to his speed. Once he finished he started again, this time at one-fourth his regular speed. Then at half, three-fourths, and finally forming the seals at his regular speed.

After two more dry runs at regular speed, Shigekuni thoguht it was time to throw chakra into the mix and see how well he did in distributing it. Bringing his hands together once more, he could feel his body molding the chakra as it started to course up into his hands. Finishing the last seal he poured chakra into his hands, but alas it was too much and it sparked out, almost like a miniature bolt of lightning that zapped his hands.

Shigekuni jumped around, grasping his hand as he swore up a storm. He jumped around, stomped his feet, and took several audiable deep breaths through clenched teeth before he suppressed himself back to his usual demeanor. Shaking his hand and trying to get the feeling back in it, Shigekuni looked over at Kiyori. "[color=#95BD4F]I think I'm too used to offensive techniques, my hand is almost completely numb.[/color]"

----------Training End------------------

OOC: 308/800 words for D Rank Raiton Numbing Iijutsu

------------------------------------------------------------

						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Sun Sep 08, 2013 3:43 pm

			Kiyori nodded as Shigekuni stated that he would be fine after a brief rest. While he rested, she went through her mental list and decided that it was time for her to tackle something she wasn't experienced in. [color=slategray]"Well, everyone has to start somewhere, so I think i'll try a basic earth clone. Seems like a good place to start."[/color] She figured he wouldn't need her supervision to practice an Iijutsu technique, so she proceeded to start.

-----------Training Start-------------------

Kiyori took a few safe steps back from Shigekuni, in case something went wrong. She was a complete and utter novice when it came to her affinity, but as she activated her doujutsu, she quickly recalled the order of the hand seals for the Earth Clone. She was an adept at performing them at top speed due to her taijutsu training, but manifesting her chakra did not come easily. She ran through the hand seals over and over, at full speed every time due to the eidetic memory of her doujutsu, but she hesitated when she tried putting chakra into it, and her first attempt resulted in a tiny pebble raising from the ground.

Kiyori looked down, then looked at Shigekuni, with no facial change, but clear blush showing. [color=slategray]"Hold on, let me try that again."[/color] Kiyori again started going through the hand seals with the help of her doujutsu, but halfway through she stopped. After a brief pause, she continued to perform the hand seals at full speed, but she wasn't utilizing her doujutsu, instead choosing to perform it off of normal memory. It was something she would have to get good at, and fast, considering she wasn't always going to be able to rely on her doujutsu. She proceeded to continue performing her hand seals, over and over again, perfecting the movements and memorizing them completely.

Now came the true test. Kiyori took a deep breath, and focused her chakra, building it as high as she could. She performed the hand seals, each one perfectly timed and perfectly structured. As she stopped on the last seal, she released the chakra into the ground around her, and tried her absolute hardest to mold the ground up into a clone of herself. She could feel the earth around her buckle slightly as her chakra entered the ground, but no matter how much she concentrated, she simply couldn't make the ground raise up in the shape of her clone. She dropped her hands to her side and shook her head slightly. [color=slategray]"I can't seem to do it, i don't know what the problem is."[/color]

-------------Training end------------------

OOC: 359/700 for Earth Clone Jutsu

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

Author: Post

Kiyori nodded as Shigekuni stated that he would be fine after a brief rest. While he rested, she went through her mental list and decided that it was time for her to tackle something she wasn't experienced in. [color=slategray]"Well, everyone has to start somewhere, so I think i'll try a basic earth clone. Seems like a good place to start."[/color] She figured he wouldn't need her supervision to practice an Iijutsu technique, so she proceeded to start.

-----------Training Start-------------------

Kiyori took a few safe steps back from Shigekuni, in case something went wrong. She was a complete and utter novice when it came to her affinity, but as she activated her doujutsu, she quickly recalled the order of the hand seals for the Earth Clone. She was an adept at performing them at top speed due to her taijutsu training, but manifesting her chakra did not come easily. She ran through the hand seals over and over, at full speed every time due to the eidetic memory of her doujutsu, but she hesitated when she tried putting chakra into it, and her first attempt resulted in a tiny pebble raising from the ground.

Kiyori looked down, then looked at Shigekuni, with no facial change, but clear blush showing. [color=slategray]"Hold on, let me try that again."[/color] Kiyori again started going through the hand seals with the help of her doujutsu, but halfway through she stopped. After a brief pause, she continued to perform the hand seals at full speed, but she wasn't utilizing her doujutsu, instead choosing to perform it off of normal memory. It was something she would have to get good at, and fast, considering she wasn't always going to be able to rely on her doujutsu. She proceeded to continue performing her hand seals, over and over again, perfecting the movements and memorizing them completely.

Now came the true test. Kiyori took a deep breath, and focused her chakra, building it as high as she could. She performed the hand seals, each one perfectly timed and perfectly structured. As she stopped on the last seal, she released the chakra into the ground around her, and tried her absolute hardest to mold the ground up into a clone of herself. She could feel the earth around her buckle slightly as her chakra entered the ground, but no matter how much she concentrated, she simply couldn't make the ground raise up in the shape of her clone. She dropped her hands to her side and shook her head slightly. [color=slategray]"I can't seem to do it, i don't know what the problem is."[/color]

-------------Training end------------------

OOC: 359/700 for Earth Clone Jutsu

								[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url]

		[b]Posts:[/b] [url=./search.php?author_id=948882&sr=posts]4378[/url]		[b]Joined:[/b] Wed Dec 16, 2009 6:00 pm

											[b]Location:[/b] Site 17

				[b]Contact:[/b]

					[url=#]

						[url=#p1607696]Bring the Pain[/url]

							[url=/forums/app.php/post/1607696/report]
								REPORT

									[url=./viewtopic.php?p=1607696#p1607696]
						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Mon Sep 09, 2013 9:16 am

			"[color=#95BD4F]Keep practicing, that's about all I can tell ya. I don't use Doton so I'm not sure how it works.[/color]" Shigekuni said as he shook his hand. The numbness from his earlier attempt at creating a medically based numbing Iijutsu had backfired a bit as he had to give it time to give him feeling back in his hand. As the feeling went away at long last and Shigekuni could feel his hand again, flexed it a few times to make sure he got all the kinks out before he'd start again.

Bringing his hands up, the male Genin went through the seals in his head again and then thought back on the ones he'd used to make sure he'd gotten them right. Sure enough his memory and his past attempt lined up, showing he'd done the seals right and just over charged the jutsu somehow. As he came back to reality, the young teen started to slip his hands through the set of seals at just below the average speed her normally made hand seals, watching his fingers weave together and his hand shift around each other.

He would have been able to get the technique right this time had he now fucked up just then as his hands slipped into the wrong seal and he swore. Dropping his hands, Shigekuni shook them out again as he could feel his arms still aching and need of that numbing effect so he could get back to his training. Deciding to work his arms a bit he started to list off the seals as he clumsily massaged his arms, muttering each seal out under his breath till he was sure he had the order down in his head.

As he finished working on arm, he moved to the other and started mentally going over how he had over charged his technique the first time. Realizing that he used practically nothing but Offensive techniques that were meant to do harm, he must have powered it like he would have any other Raiton, thus making it blast his hand like it had. Shigekuni made a noise to himself, like he'd just realized that making basic iijutsu techniques was similar yet different in regards to other ninjutsu.

"[color=#95BD4F]Seems like control over how much chakra poured into a technique determines not just potency but also effectiveness as well.... I wonder if I've been over charging all my jutsu then?[/color]" Shigekuni stopped working his arm as he decided to try using a more exact amount of chakra instead of just pouring it into the technique. As he slipped his hands through the seals required for this technique, the male Genin felt his chakra molding within him.

Reaching the final seal for his technique, Shigekuni placed his hands together as he felt chakra surging up through his shoulders, then down through his arms before it reached his hands at last. Pulling his hands apart he could feel the chakra and see a faint crackling of Raiton energy flowing around his hands. The Genin brought one hand up to his aching arms and before he could touch his Raiton covered hand to his arm, sparks of energy lashed out, closing the gap as they made contact with his arm.

Everytime a tiny crackle of Raiton licked across his skin, he could feel his arm getting numb until finally the ache was gone. Of course he couldn't feel his arm either, but that was kind of the point of a numbing technique. Moving his arm, Shigekuni discovered he still had mobility in it, just no feeling. As he brought his other hand up to touch his other, still aching arm, the Genin watched as the technique flickered out from his outs.

"[color=#95BD4F]Maybe I didn't use enough chakra that time.[/color]" He said to himself before he started redoing the hand seals. Upon reaching the last one, he watched the energy spring up around his hands again before touching his arm. Like the first, the aching sensation faded away and then soon afterward, all sensation faded. Shigekuni raised his other hand and examined it for a minute before it flickered out like before. "[color=#95BD4F]Or maybe I can only get one use out of it, perhaps I'll have to stick to just condensing the energy into one hand and going from there.[/color]"

----------Training End------

"[color=#95BD4F]Well that's one down for me, how you doing with yours?[/color]" Shigekuni asked Kiyori as he waited to see if the numbing effects would last.

OOC: 1028/800 words for D Rank Raiton Numbing Iijutsu

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5648698/1/]Awai Mariko[/url] - Konohagakure Chuunin - [color=#B2397F][color=#B2397F][/color]

Author:

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Mon Sep 09, 2013 10:44 am

			[color=slategray]"I have problems utilizing my Doton chakra it seems, i haven't quite grasped it."[/color] Kiyori had to keep searching for a way to tap into the earth, or she would never be able to make use of her affinity. She took a break for a moment and watched as Shigekuni figured out how to make his Iijutsu. Her Shutter eye still open, she would have the seals of his jutsu memorized forever, though she didn't really need to know them. She did however replay the scene a few times, to maybe get a feel for how He harnessed his affinity. Then it dawned on her. [color=slategray]"I have an idea, let me try something."[/color]

------------Training Start----------------

Kiyori began the process of building her chakra, something that never came quite easily to her. General ninpou weren't quite so bad, but her affinity alluded her. Nevertheless, she would continue to practice this jutsu and get it right if it killed her. As her chakra reached a good level, She went through the hand seals of the Earth Clone jutsu, and upon finishing the final seal, Kiyori forced her chakra downward, pushing it down through her body into the ground around her, saturating the earth with her chakra. Soon after, she began trying to mold the earth through her chakra, shaping it into her image. She felt the ground beneath her shift and move, trying hard to bring her chakra up from the ground in front of her. She envisioned herself reaching up and pulling herself up from underneath the ground. Finally, her chakra sprang up from the ground, and a hand emerged from the ground in front of Kiyori. The momentary victory caused her to lose control for a brief moment however, and the hand quickly broke apart into simple dirt and rocks.

[color=slategray]"Well, that was better than my previous attempts at least. Now I think i'm getting the hang of this, one more try."[/color] Kiyori was sure she could make this jutsu work this time, she just needed to hone her technique a bit more. She began once more performing hand seals, but she focused on each specific seal rather than blow through it as fast as possible, taking a bit longer, giving herself more time to build her chakra as high as she could. She needed to slow down and focus, rushing herself was probably not the way to do this. As she finished and landed on the final seal, her chakra hit it's absolute peak. She finally released her chakra, and it felt like it was rushing from the tip of her head all the way down to her feet. It flooded the earth beneath her, molding the earth, shifting rocks and dirt around beneath the topsoil. As it filled the ground, this time Kiyori focused on the ground in front of her, and envisioned the hand from before springing from the ground. She had something to work with now, seen that it was possible to create a clone from the earth in her image. That assurance had payed off in the end, as from the ground in front of her a hand sprang forth once more, followed by another hand. The hands pulled the rest of Kiyori's clone from the ground, which now stood before her. It almost felt like she was looking into a mirror. [color=slategray]"Alright, I think i've got a feel for the earth now."[/color]

----------Training end----------------

OOC 812/700 words for the Spoilered Jutsu
Jutsu TrainedShow [color=saddlebrown]*[i][Earth Element • Earth Clone][/i][/color]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding the ground around them with chakra, the user will cause a clone to materialize out of the ground. The clone is made of rock, and is quite strong and durable, but can only move within a quarter mile of the user. The clone is only able to use taijutsu attacks, and has the following stats: 1 Taijutsu, 4 Stamina, 2 Strength, and 1 Speed.

			[i]

[color=slategray]"I have problems utilizing my Doton chakra it seems, i haven't quite grasped it."[/color] Kiyori had to keep searching for a way to tap into the earth, or she would never be able to make use of her affinity. She took a break for a moment and watched as Shigekuni figured out how to make his Iijutsu. Her Shutter eye still open, she would have the seals of his jutsu memorized forever, though she didn't really need to know them. She did however replay the scene a few times, to maybe get a feel for how He harnessed his affinity. Then it dawned on her. [color=slategray]"I have an idea, let me try something."[/color]

------------Training Start----------------

Kiyori began the process of building her chakra, something that never came quite easily to her. General ninpou weren't quite so bad, but her affinity alluded her. Nevertheless, she would continue to practice this jutsu and get it right if it killed her. As her chakra reached a good level, She went through the hand seals of the Earth Clone jutsu, and upon finishing the final seal, Kiyori forced her chakra downward, pushing it down through her body into the ground around her, saturating the earth with her chakra. Soon after, she began trying to mold the earth through her chakra, shaping it into her image. She felt the ground beneath her shift and move, trying hard to bring her chakra up from the ground in front of her. She envisioned herself reaching up and pulling herself up from underneath the ground. Finally, her chakra sprang up from the ground, and a hand emerged from the ground in front of Kiyori. The momentary victory caused her to lose control for a brief moment however, and the hand quickly broke apart into simple dirt and rocks.

[color=slategray]"Well, that was better than my previous attempts at least. Now I think i'm getting the hang of this, one more try."[/color] Kiyori was sure she could make this jutsu work this time, she just needed to hone her technique a bit more. She began once more performing hand seals, but she focused on each specific seal rather than blow through it as fast as possible, taking a bit longer, giving herself more time to build her chakra as high as she could. She needed to slow down and focus, rushing herself was probably not the way to do this. As she finished and landed on the final seal, her chakra hit it's absolute peak. She finally released her chakra, and it felt like it was rushing from the tip of her head all the way down to her feet. It flooded the earth beneath her, molding the earth, shifting rocks and dirt around beneath the topsoil. As it filled the ground, this time Kiyori focused on the ground in front of her, and envisioned the hand from before springing from the ground. She had something to work with now, seen that it was possible to create a clone from the earth in her image. That assurance had payed off in the end, as from the ground in front of her a hand sprang forth once more, followed by another hand. The hands pulled the rest of Kiyori's clone from the ground, which now stood before her. It almost felt like she was looking into a mirror. [color=slategray]"Alright, I think i've got a feel for the earth now."[/color]

----------Training end----------------

			"[color=#95BD4F]Well then, maybe we should move on to a little more combat oriented training for the next one. I know I have some Raiton techs that will boost a persons capabilities through stimulation of certain parts of the body, but I really wanna work on this C rank explosive Raiton tech of mine first.[/color]" Shigekuni said as he moved his arms and felt little to nothing in terms of pain, let alone anything really.

Shigekuni moved himself away to a decent distance before assuming a fighting stance, "[color=#95BD4F]Let me know when you're ready, cause this is gonna be a pretty decent sized explosion.[/color]"

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Mon Sep 09, 2013 4:03 pm

			[color=slategray]"Okay, gives me a chance to actually learn something defensive with this technique. And remember, I literally just got a grasp on Doton, try not to blow me up too much."[/color] Kiyori wasn't exactly confident in her ability to use defensive Doton, but it was what the affinity specialized in, so perhaps everything would work out.

---------Training start-------------

Kiyori would attempt a very simple technique, one of the most basic of Doton jutsu. She had just wanted to start with a clone because it was similar in feel to the basic clone jutsu. This however, was a defensive technique, and required a bit of a different mindset. She went through a quick recollection of the hand seals using her doujutsu. Being such a basic technique, it wasn't too complicated to memorize, so she grasped the hand seals fairly easily. She first ran through the hand seals slow and dry, to get a feel for the order of the seals before trying it for real. considering this technique was basically just a simple rock shield, she hoped it wouldn't be too hard to perform, though her track record at current wasn't very good. Nevertheless,   she began trying the technique for real, building up her chakra as she performed the few hand seals of the simple jutsu. As she ended on the final seal, she forced her chakra into the earth beneath her once more, similar to before. Instead of trying to make a hand though, Kiyori focused on forcing the ground up straight in front of her, in the shape of a small slab of sort.

The ground quaked and buckled, but unfortunately she was still pretty inexperienced at this, and therefore undershot the chakra amount required for the jutsu, creating a tiny sharp point in the ground, no more than 3 inches tall and definitely not thick enough to be considered a shield. [color=slategray]"Huh. Still some work to do it seems, I can't even seem to manifest a basic defensive technique."[/color] Kiyori wouldn't let the failure discourage her though, she was pretty confident she had underestimated the chakra required for the technique, and that was an easy problem to fix. She began running through the seals again, building up a fairly decent amount of chakra this time, hopefully more than enough to fuel the jutsu in question. As she ended on the final seal, Kiyori once again imbued the ground with her chakra, focusing on an area of the ground about a meter in front of her. This time her jutsu took the shape she desired, as she witnessed the earth raise up in front of her about 3 feet tall and 2 feet wide. It was only an inch thick or so, but what could you expect from such a basic technique? Still, she wasn't quite sure it would defend against whatever Shigekuni was planning to do, considering it was a C rank technique according to him. As her doujutsu turned itself off, her eyes needing to take a break, she took a quick look at her clone and came up with a safer alternative.[color=slategray]"Maybe you should aim for my clone actually, this barrier seems kind of... weak."[/color]

-------Training End---------

OOC: 472/400 words for Spoilered jutsu
Jutsu learnedShow [color=saddlebrown]*[i][Earth Element • Rock Shield][/i][/color]

E-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding a portion of earth with chakra, the user will cause a large piece of rock (2 feet x 3 feet x 1 inch) to rise from the ground. The rock is able to stay in place for up to three posts before crumbling, and can only be created within 5 meters of the user.

Author: Post

[color=slategray]"Okay, gives me a chance to actually learn something defensive with this technique. And remember, I literally just got a grasp on Doton, try not to blow me up too much."[/color] Kiyori wasn't exactly confident in her ability to use defensive Doton, but it was what the affinity specialized in, so perhaps everything would work out.

---------Training start-------------

Kiyori would attempt a very simple technique, one of the most basic of Doton jutsu. She had just wanted to start with a clone because it was similar in feel to the basic clone jutsu. This however, was a defensive technique, and required a bit of a different mindset. She went through a quick recollection of the hand seals using her doujutsu. Being such a basic technique, it wasn't too complicated to memorize, so she grasped the hand seals fairly easily. She first ran through the hand seals slow and dry, to get a feel for the order of the seals before trying it for real. considering this technique was basically just a simple rock shield, she hoped it wouldn't be too hard to perform, though her track record at current wasn't very good. Nevertheless,   she began trying the technique for real, building up her chakra as she performed the few hand seals of the simple jutsu. As she ended on the final seal, she forced her chakra into the earth beneath her once more, similar to before. Instead of trying to make a hand though, Kiyori focused on forcing the ground up straight in front of her, in the shape of a small slab of sort.

The ground quaked and buckled, but unfortunately she was still pretty inexperienced at this, and therefore undershot the chakra amount required for the jutsu, creating a tiny sharp point in the ground, no more than 3 inches tall and definitely not thick enough to be considered a shield. [color=slategray]"Huh. Still some work to do it seems, I can't even seem to manifest a basic defensive technique."[/color] Kiyori wouldn't let the failure discourage her though, she was pretty confident she had underestimated the chakra required for the technique, and that was an easy problem to fix. She began running through the seals again, building up a fairly decent amount of chakra this time, hopefully more than enough to fuel the jutsu in question. As she ended on the final seal, Kiyori once again imbued the ground with her chakra, focusing on an area of the ground about a meter in front of her. This time her jutsu took the shape she desired, as she witnessed the earth raise up in front of her about 3 feet tall and 2 feet wide. It was only an inch thick or so, but what could you expect from such a basic technique? Still, she wasn't quite sure it would defend against whatever Shigekuni was planning to do, considering it was a C rank technique according to him. As her doujutsu turned itself off, her eyes needing to take a break, she took a quick look at her clone and came up with a safer alternative.[color=slategray]"Maybe you should aim for my clone actually, this barrier seems kind of... weak."[/color]

-------Training End---------

OOC: 472/400 words for Spoilered jutsu
Jutsu learnedShow [color=saddlebrown]*[i][Earth Element • Rock Shield][/i][/color]

E-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding a portion of earth with chakra, the user will cause a large piece of rock (2 feet x 3 feet x 1 inch) to rise from the ground. The rock is able to stay in place for up to three posts before crumbling, and can only be created within 5 meters of the user.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Tue Sep 10, 2013 11:24 am

			Shigekuni knew the hand seals for the technique he was about to use, it was just a stronger version of the D Rank he created shortly after graduating from the academy. The premise was so simple t was almost laughable since anyone could do it really. It was an exploding Raiton technique that detonated on impact with the force of three exploding tags at least. What Shigekuni needed to truly work on was the potency of the technique.

As he watched Kiyori work on her shield, he began forming the hand seals to create his own technique. As Raiton chakra course through him, he closed one of his hands as if he was gripping something and a bristling rod of energy sprang to life in his hand. Unlike the D Rank version which looked more like a rod of lightning that was on the verge of breaking apart into various bolts of energy, this version seemed more define in form, almost looking like a large arrow made of lightning chakra. As he held the technique in his hands, the Suna Genin felt the technique had no heft to it, almost weighing nothing as it was comprised entirely of chakra. Pulling his arm back, the Genin chucked the arrow upward into the air.

Once it reached a peak distance of what looked to be close to 10 meters away, the arrow exploded as currents of Raiton crackled through the air from the explosion. "[color=#95BD4F]Looks like the distance the thing will travel has doubled, but the explosion was maybe less than a single tag a best. I need to maintain the range and increase potency, that should get me the results I need. Might need to see about penetration power too, it is Raiton after all.[/color]" Shigekuni remarked to himself quietly before lowering his gaze and looking at Kiyori. As she mentioned trying his technique on her clone instead of a weak shield, Shigekuni nodded. "[color=#95BD4F]Might wanna back up, There might be some shrapnel from the clone going boom.[/color]"

Shigekuni started forming his hand seals again, letting Raiton chakra surge up from his core and travel down his arm into his hand. As he finished his last hand seal configuration, Shigekuni gripped at the air again and the same large arrow of Raiton burst into existence as its energy bristled about, especially where Shigekuni was holding the technique. During the creation process, Shigekuni had poured a little more chakra into the technique in order to give it more 'oomph' as it were.

Pulling his arm back, the Genin hurled the Lightning Arrow at the earth clone of Kiyori. As it traveled forward, the arrow sank into the clone and pierced through it's stomach like a fork into properly boiled potato. The arrow bristled there for a moment as Shigekuni straightened himself up and examined his handy work. "[color=#95BD4F]It didn't explode. Maybe all that extra chakra into strengthening the Raiton piercing properties instead.[/color]"

The Genin watched the clone fall apart into a pile of rubble as the Raiton Arrow fizzled out, leaving the Genin to ponder what he could do to correct his error in order make the jutsu work right.

OOC: 527/800 words for C Rank Lightning Arrow

Author: Post

Shigekuni knew the hand seals for the technique he was about to use, it was just a stronger version of the D Rank he created shortly after graduating from the academy. The premise was so simple t was almost laughable since anyone could do it really. It was an exploding Raiton technique that detonated on impact with the force of three exploding tags at least. What Shigekuni needed to truly work on was the potency of the technique.

As he watched Kiyori work on her shield, he began forming the hand seals to create his own technique. As Raiton chakra course through him, he closed one of his hands as if he was gripping something and a bristling rod of energy sprang to life in his hand. Unlike the D Rank version which looked more like a rod of lightning that was on the verge of breaking apart into various bolts of energy, this version seemed more define in form, almost looking like a large arrow made of lightning chakra. As he held the technique in his hands, the Suna Genin felt the technique had no heft to it, almost weighing nothing as it was comprised entirely of chakra. Pulling his arm back, the Genin chucked the arrow upward into the air.

Once it reached a peak distance of what looked to be close to 10 meters away, the arrow exploded as currents of Raiton crackled through the air from the explosion. "[color=#95BD4F]Looks like the distance the thing will travel has doubled, but the explosion was maybe less than a single tag a best. I need to maintain the range and increase potency, that should get me the results I need. Might need to see about penetration power too, it is Raiton after all.[/color]" Shigekuni remarked to himself quietly before lowering his gaze and looking at Kiyori. As she mentioned trying his technique on her clone instead of a weak shield, Shigekuni nodded. "[color=#95BD4F]Might wanna back up, There might be some shrapnel from the clone going boom.[/color]"

Shigekuni started forming his hand seals again, letting Raiton chakra surge up from his core and travel down his arm into his hand. As he finished his last hand seal configuration, Shigekuni gripped at the air again and the same large arrow of Raiton burst into existence as its energy bristled about, especially where Shigekuni was holding the technique. During the creation process, Shigekuni had poured a little more chakra into the technique in order to give it more 'oomph' as it were.

Pulling his arm back, the Genin hurled the Lightning Arrow at the earth clone of Kiyori. As it traveled forward, the arrow sank into the clone and pierced through it's stomach like a fork into properly boiled potato. The arrow bristled there for a moment as Shigekuni straightened himself up and examined his handy work. "[color=#95BD4F]It didn't explode. Maybe all that extra chakra into strengthening the Raiton piercing properties instead.[/color]"

The Genin watched the clone fall apart into a pile of rubble as the Raiton Arrow fizzled out, leaving the Genin to ponder what he could do to correct his error in order make the jutsu work right.

					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Tue Sep 10, 2013 5:34 pm

			Next up for Kiyori was an advanced version of the basic Doton jutsu she had just learned. She wanted to stick to the basic jutsu that everyone was taught for the time being, until she felt confident to learn her own Doton techniques. This jutsu would require a lot more chakra than the previous technique she had just learned, but if done correctly may be able to protect her from Shigekuni's Raiton technique. She put her hands together and began focusing her chakra, building it up inside of her, focusing on her tenketsu. She wished that she had an easier time building chakra, but assumed it would come with the training. She proceeded to start performing the seals from the original E ranked jutsu, then added a few extra seals after the original end of the first. This was required to bring out more power in the technique, as it also required more chakra to use effectively. When she finished the final seal and pushed what chakra she had into the earth, she focused her chakra upwards through the ground, putting as much force into it as possible. However, as she expected, she hadn't mustered enough chakra to fully create the jutsu, and as the earth rose from the ground, halfway it just stopped. The boulder that was created was only half complete, then, as Kiyori released the hand seals, the boulder fell back to the ground in a heap of dirt and pebbles.

[color=slategray]"It appears I didn't use enough chakra, the technique was only about half way complete. But it felt like that was as much chakra as I could muster. How problematic."[/color] Kiyori seemed to have difficulty building her chakra to high levels, as if she didn't truly feel the chakra pulsing inside of her. This was an obstacle she would have to overcome if she was to be a ninja of any decent measure. She could do nothing but try again, watching as shigekuni was having trouble of his own. Perhaps it wasn't just her that had issues controlling her affinity, maybe it was just something to adjust to. She began giving the Stone shield jutsu another go, putting her hands together and trying once more to conjure chakra for the technique. This time was different though, she closed her eyes and tuned out the world around her for a moment, focusing inward, on her tenketsu. Finally, as she did this, she truly felt her chakra well up within her this time, higher than any previous attempt. And it continued to build, higher and higher, as though she had just risen to a new plateau of chakra manipulation. Kiyori had not felt so much chakra before, it was an incredible feeling, as though she had finally discovered her problem.

With that in mind, she proceeded to start performing the hand seals for the original Rock shield, while adding the additional seals at the end to increase the power of the technique. She ran through each individual seal, while simultaneously focusing her chakra downward towards her feet. After landing on the final seal, Kiyori pushed the intense amount of chakra down, into the earth, saturating the earth beneath her. Kiyori then concentrated on the ground, and with a surge of chakra, the ground beneath her shot upwards. To her left, right, and front, a large boulder began materializing from the ground up, slowly drawing the dirt and rocks beneath it into one solid mass. The boulders were of a good thickness, hopefully strong enough to stop at least some D rank techniques. Kiyori came to a relaxed state, and examined her jutsu to see if her efforts had paid off. The boulders were pretty solid, all things considered, she was quite pleased with herself. [color=slategray]"Well, i'm glad I finally seem to have overcome my chakra manifesting issue, I just had to really get a feel for it I suppose. I think another part of it was realizing that it wasn't just me having issues controlling my chakra, watching you tinker with your jutsu helped me become aware of that fact. Hopefully i'll be able to tackle the rest of my Doton techniques with a little more confidence. Why don't you try fine tuning your jutsu on these boulders, I want to see how well they hold up."[/color] Kiyori took a few steps away from her technique as she said this, she knew they were reliable, but not against a C rank technique.

OOC: 744/700 words for the Spoilered Jutsu
Jutsu LearnedShow [color=saddlebrown]*[i][Earth Element • Stone Shield][/i][/color]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: [Earth Element • Rock Shield]

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding the ground around them with chakra, the user will raise four boulders, each being three feet by four feet by two inches, out of the ground, surrounding the user.

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

						[url=#top]

Author: Post

Next up for Kiyori was an advanced version of the basic Doton jutsu she had just learned. She wanted to stick to the basic jutsu that everyone was taught for the time being, until she felt confident to learn her own Doton techniques. This jutsu would require a lot more chakra than the previous technique she had just learned, but if done correctly may be able to protect her from Shigekuni's Raiton technique. She put her hands together and began focusing her chakra, building it up inside of her, focusing on her tenketsu. She wished that she had an easier time building chakra, but assumed it would come with the training. She proceeded to start performing the seals from the original E ranked jutsu, then added a few extra seals after the original end of the first. This was required to bring out more power in the technique, as it also required more chakra to use effectively. When she finished the final seal and pushed what chakra she had into the earth, she focused her chakra upwards through the ground, putting as much force into it as possible. However, as she expected, she hadn't mustered enough chakra to fully create the jutsu, and as the earth rose from the ground, halfway it just stopped. The boulder that was created was only half complete, then, as Kiyori released the hand seals, the boulder fell back to the ground in a heap of dirt and pebbles.

[color=slategray]"It appears I didn't use enough chakra, the technique was only about half way complete. But it felt like that was as much chakra as I could muster. How problematic."[/color] Kiyori seemed to have difficulty building her chakra to high levels, as if she didn't truly feel the chakra pulsing inside of her. This was an obstacle she would have to overcome if she was to be a ninja of any decent measure. She could do nothing but try again, watching as shigekuni was having trouble of his own. Perhaps it wasn't just her that had issues controlling her affinity, maybe it was just something to adjust to. She began giving the Stone shield jutsu another go, putting her hands together and trying once more to conjure chakra for the technique. This time was different though, she closed her eyes and tuned out the world around her for a moment, focusing inward, on her tenketsu. Finally, as she did this, she truly felt her chakra well up within her this time, higher than any previous attempt. And it continued to build, higher and higher, as though she had just risen to a new plateau of chakra manipulation. Kiyori had not felt so much chakra before, it was an incredible feeling, as though she had finally discovered her problem.

With that in mind, she proceeded to start performing the hand seals for the original Rock shield, while adding the additional seals at the end to increase the power of the technique. She ran through each individual seal, while simultaneously focusing her chakra downward towards her feet. After landing on the final seal, Kiyori pushed the intense amount of chakra down, into the earth, saturating the earth beneath her. Kiyori then concentrated on the ground, and with a surge of chakra, the ground beneath her shot upwards. To her left, right, and front, a large boulder began materializing from the ground up, slowly drawing the dirt and rocks beneath it into one solid mass. The boulders were of a good thickness, hopefully strong enough to stop at least some D rank techniques. Kiyori came to a relaxed state, and examined her jutsu to see if her efforts had paid off. The boulders were pretty solid, all things considered, she was quite pleased with herself. [color=slategray]"Well, i'm glad I finally seem to have overcome my chakra manifesting issue, I just had to really get a feel for it I suppose. I think another part of it was realizing that it wasn't just me having issues controlling my chakra, watching you tinker with your jutsu helped me become aware of that fact. Hopefully i'll be able to tackle the rest of my Doton techniques with a little more confidence. Why don't you try fine tuning your jutsu on these boulders, I want to see how well they hold up."[/color] Kiyori took a few steps away from her technique as she said this, she knew they were reliable, but not against a C rank technique.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Tue Sep 10, 2013 8:14 pm

			Shigekuni nodded to Kiyori as he started forming the hand seals he needed for his technique again. He started with the Rat and as things progressed he brought it to an end on the Tiger hand seal as his chakra surged forth from the core of his being and slipped into his hand as he grasped at yet another lightning arrow. He had altered a seal of two in the production this time to train and change those variables in the hopes that it would be what he needed.

Gripping the Raiton Ninjutsu in his hand, Shigekuni made sure that the Henrin Genin was out of the way before he started taking aim at his target. As he brought his arm and aimed, he held the Raiton arrow level with his neck and took a few moments to practice the motion he'd use to throw before actually pulling his arm back accordingly. As his body twisted, his left arm acted as a counter weight to his throwing arm. Once he reached the peak position to release the technique, he let his grip loosen as the Raiton arrow sailed through the air and proceeded to sink into the stone defense Kiyori had created.

Barely a moment after it entered the rock, the arrow exploded violently, sending crackling bursts of Raiton outward along with shrapnel from the Henrin's Doton technique. Shigekuni examined the distance and knew it was more than his original D rank version of the technique and figured that he could test the improved version in a moment as he was satisfied with the explosion. If anything, the technique had performed to expectations this time around and also given him an idea on how to keep working to practice it.

OOC: 817/800 words for C Rank Lightning Arrow

Shigekuni left out a breath as he looked to his training partner and nodded, "[color=#95BD4F]Well, that covers that. I might work with that technique a bit just to get the hang of it though, after all that's what practice is for. Even if we get the jutsu right on the first try we should still practice it a few times just to be sure, right?[/color]"

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=6209842/1/]Matsudaira Tokoha[/url] - Sunagakure - Jounin - [color=#ED2939][color=#ED2939][/color]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5635886/1/]Ishiguro Nui[/url] - Kumogakure Chuunin -  [color=brown][color=brown][/color]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5648698/1/]Awai Mariko[/url] - Konohagakure Chuunin - [color=#B2397F][color=#B2397F][/color]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5802714/1/]Jinrai Setsuko[/url] - Kumogakure Chuunin - [color=#D60270][color=#D60270][/color]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5639545/1/]Toukai Mukade[/url] - Kirigakure Chuunin - [color=#8B7765][color=#8B7765][/color]

						[url=#top]
				[i][/i]
				Top
			[/url]

Author: Post

Shigekuni nodded to Kiyori as he started forming the hand seals he needed for his technique again. He started with the Rat and as things progressed he brought it to an end on the Tiger hand seal as his chakra surged forth from the core of his being and slipped into his hand as he grasped at yet another lightning arrow. He had altered a seal of two in the production this time to train and change those variables in the hopes that it would be what he needed.

Gripping the Raiton Ninjutsu in his hand, Shigekuni made sure that the Henrin Genin was out of the way before he started taking aim at his target. As he brought his arm and aimed, he held the Raiton arrow level with his neck and took a few moments to practice the motion he'd use to throw before actually pulling his arm back accordingly. As his body twisted, his left arm acted as a counter weight to his throwing arm. Once he reached the peak position to release the technique, he let his grip loosen as the Raiton arrow sailed through the air and proceeded to sink into the stone defense Kiyori had created.

Barely a moment after it entered the rock, the arrow exploded violently, sending crackling bursts of Raiton outward along with shrapnel from the Henrin's Doton technique. Shigekuni examined the distance and knew it was more than his original D rank version of the technique and figured that he could test the improved version in a moment as he was satisfied with the explosion. If anything, the technique had performed to expectations this time around and also given him an idea on how to keep working to practice it.

OOC: 817/800 words for C Rank Lightning Arrow

Shigekuni left out a breath as he looked to his training partner and nodded, "[color=#95BD4F]Well, that covers that. I might work with that technique a bit just to get the hang of it though, after all that's what practice is for. Even if we get the jutsu right on the first try we should still practice it a few times just to be sure, right?[/color]"
