((Nah, its all good, i read your thread in the intro area about you having some stuff coming up, i totally understand.))

Ryoga hadn't really thought what telling his target that meant, but in the end he didn't really care. [color=#DC143C]"Believe me, It doesn't change the outcome of this fight. You're nowhere near as skilled as me, This will be over quickly." [/color] Ryoga would do everything in his power to keep himself from killing this man, but if it came down to a life or death scenario, he knew he wouldn't hesitate to off him in an instant.

As the ninja dodged the geyser Ryoga set forth, he was honestly surprised that it had hit him at all. A relatively weak defensive technique meant for producing water in a pinch, the geyser wasn't meant to actually hit the man, but rather engulf the Katon burst he caused. Ryoga made eye contact with the man, watching his every move so that he might counter with the water being produced by the fountain. [color=#DC143C]"I'm shocked that hit you at all, either you're slower than i thought or you're not paying enough attention." [/color]

No sooner had he finished saying "attention" the man made his move, stepping back and performing handseals. As he finished his seals, Ryoga saw the gust of wind leave his palms. He dashed top speed while performing handseals, making a dash to put the fountain between him and his target. at top speed, he was barely faster than the burst of wind following him, but it did still slash as his back a bit, ripping through his clothes and lashing his back with a few small gashes. It stung a bit, but he had experienced far worse.

As he put the fountain between them and finished his seals, He focused on the geyser, still gushing water, and put his hands into the water, morphing it into a large ball of water which then rolled towards the man at a speed of 7. The ball stood 4 meters tall, and had a diameter of 3 meters. Not wanting to waste time, Ryoga would proceed to dash around the other side of the fountain, away from the man's torrent of wind he hoped, and would then react to whether or not his prison engulfed the man as he planned.

Jutsu usedShow *Water Prison

B-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu

By forming a string of seals, the user is able to spew a large ball of water that stands at three meters in diameter. This ball rolls at the target at a speed of seven. Should this strike a target, they will become engulfed within the sphere. However, if this manages to strike multiple targets, it will envelop them as well, up to a total of three prisoners. One can resist being pulled into the ball if they have a strength of seven or higher. The ball will roll thirty meters, regardless of whether or not anyone has been captured. Once inside, the targets will spin with the sphere and may cause dizziness, nausea and disorientation. The technique lasts for a total of five posts, rolling included, before bursting.

			OOC:  Sorry I didn't really do anything, still trying to catch up with everything and combat is hard for me [i]

"[color=peru]I didn't want to outshine you too fast, but if you're feeling like that...[/color]"  Making a show of himself, the man showed some quick seals that did nothing other than help him focus some extra chakra into his feet and legs to help propel him around.  Performing a few simple back flips he easily moved himself back further from the man.  As the ball of water began to move towards him he once again began moving, flitting around, moving himself back into the trees.  His movements were quiet as he moved through the trees though he might purposefully make a sound every now and again.  Eventually, from behind Ryo, he would hang upside down from a branch, his voice taunting.  "[color=peru]You gonna do anything?  Or just stand there?[/color]"

			OOC: Nah, its fine, i've been pretty busy myself, no problem. Also, i hope i didn't do too much.

[color=#DC143C]"Big talk from the coward running through the trees!"[/color] Ryoga yelled into the treetops at the man as he dodged his water prison. Ryoga noticed that the ninja seemed to have sped up after those seals he performed, but he still didn't think he was a match for his speed. As the man disappeared into the treetops, Ryoga scoffed as he performed a few handseals, then began feeling the trees above for his enemies pulse. He was sure that he was within 30 yards of him, and if he was right and felt his blood, he would perform a few additional seals to focus in on his specific signature. There was no catching Ryoga off guard, not as long as it bled.

The man approached him from above, getting closer and closer. Ryoga put his left hand on his sword and waited, ready for him to come at him. He hoped he didn't think he had the element of surprise. The man hung upside down behind Ryoga, and as he began to say something, Ryoga pulled his sword out with his left hand and stabbed it backwards behind him, Knowing exactly where the man was. If the man managed to dodge his stab, he would step forward a few steps and turn to face the man.

Jutsu UsedShow Feel the Pulse

C-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Control 6

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels their chakra into the surrounding area, travelling at a speed equal to the user's control, up to 30 yards away. This allows the user to sense nearby blood pulses. At this level, it doesn't allow for pinpoint movements, but it does allow for the user to sense direction and distance.

Singled Out

C-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Feel the Pulse, control 6

After sensing someone through Feel the Pulse and adding a few additional hand seals, the user can focus in on a specific person's blood signature. The user hones in on this specific signature if it is within a 30 yard range, and begins to track it down.

*Iaido • Reverse Stab

D-Rank Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: 4 Speed

By gripping their blade, the user draws their sword as if a dagger in an earth facing grip, but instead of attacking a target in front of them they will turn their sword mid-swing in an attempt to stab a target that is behind them.

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882][i][/url]
								[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url]

		[b]Posts:[/b] [url=./search.php?author_id=948882&sr=posts]4378[/url]		[b]Joined:[/b] Wed Dec 16, 2009 6:00 pm

											[b]Location:[/b] Site 17

				[b]Contact:[/b]

					[url=#]
						PM
					[/url]

																	[url=./ucp.php?i=pm&mode=compose&action=quotepost&p=1606407]

						[url=#p1606407][Graded]Initiative[/url]

							[url=/forums/app.php/post/1606407/report]

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Fri Sep 06, 2013 11:15 am

			It was getting close to being time for him. He needed all the help he could muster, especially at this juncture. The Genin had managed to get some information on a handful of Genin that would prove to be his best shot at ensuring the success of his plans. As Tenjirou Shigekuni walked the streets of Sunagakure in the fading light of the setting Sun, he made his way to the third candidate's house, visiting each of them in the order he had been given the information.

Shigekuni looked up from his notes and saw he was standing before the Henrin compound. He'd heard the name before, yet he'd never heard about what the clan could do. He was about to find out as he assessed this Henrin Kiyori he was about to see. He was showing up to the meeting without prior introduction or warning so he was probably gonna be treated with a degree of distance he wagered.

As he entered the compound he looked around the front yard before he spotted an older member of the clan, possibly in their 30s. "[color=#95BD4F]Excuse me! I'm looking for a Henrin Kiyori. I need to a speak with her.[/color]"

"What's it pertaining to?" The man asked as Shigekuni thought for a moment before deciding to go with the direct route. "[color=#95BD4F]Recruitment. Just need to see if she's eligible and also available to join a team for the Chuunin Exams.[/color]" The man seemed to cringe as he nodded. "Yeah I remember those, I'll go get her. Oh, wait here please."

The man departed as Shigekuni waited in the front yard for the person to return with Kiyori or to hear the news about how she wasn't interested.

Author: Post

It was getting close to being time for him. He needed all the help he could muster, especially at this juncture. The Genin had managed to get some information on a handful of Genin that would prove to be his best shot at ensuring the success of his plans. As Tenjirou Shigekuni walked the streets of Sunagakure in the fading light of the setting Sun, he made his way to the third candidate's house, visiting each of them in the order he had been given the information.

Shigekuni looked up from his notes and saw he was standing before the Henrin compound. He'd heard the name before, yet he'd never heard about what the clan could do. He was about to find out as he assessed this Henrin Kiyori he was about to see. He was showing up to the meeting without prior introduction or warning so he was probably gonna be treated with a degree of distance he wagered.

As he entered the compound he looked around the front yard before he spotted an older member of the clan, possibly in their 30s. "[color=#95BD4F]Excuse me! I'm looking for a Henrin Kiyori. I need to a speak with her.[/color]"

"What's it pertaining to?" The man asked as Shigekuni thought for a moment before deciding to go with the direct route. "[color=#95BD4F]Recruitment. Just need to see if she's eligible and also available to join a team for the Chuunin Exams.[/color]" The man seemed to cringe as he nodded. "Yeah I remember those, I'll go get her. Oh, wait here please."

The man departed as Shigekuni waited in the front yard for the person to return with Kiyori or to hear the news about how she wasn't interested.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Fri Sep 06, 2013 12:41 pm

			As the sun started to set in the village of sand, Kiyori began heading from the Henrin training ground back to her house. She had been training hard for the past few hours, and was quite exhausted. As she headed back to her house on the clan compound, she was caught by another Henrin clan member. She was familiar with him of course, but for some reason the man's name escaped her, though she could easily tell he was one of the older members, looking to be about 30 or so. "Kiyori, there's a young boy at the compound entrance looking for you, something about recruitment or something, I don't know." Before she could even respond the man took his leave. [color=slategray][i]"Well. That was rude of him. Still, why would someone be looking for me? how odd..."[/i][/color]

As Kiyori puzzled over this, she decided taking a shower and cleaning up could wait, she didn't want to leave her unexpected company standing in front of the compound. The front of the compound was at least a good mile from the training grounds she had just left, so she rushed over there as fast as her dainty legs could carry her. About 13 minutes later, She was within eyeshot of the compound entrance. She approached the only non-henrin standing in the front yard, a rather tall looking boy with short black hair and a sort of white jacket. She felt weirdly dressed now, as she was dressed in her tan desert camo outfit meant for combat, mask and all, having just come from training. Regardless, she approached the boy and started off with a simple introduction, in her usual monotonous tone. [color=slategray]"Hello, i assume you were the one looking for me? I'm Kiyori Henrin. Forgive the sweat and dirty clothes, you caught me as i was wrapping up my training and was about to go home and clean up. In any case, might i ask why you are searching for me in particular?"[/color] Normally Kiyori was more goofy than this, but given she had just met this boy, she didn't quite know how she felt about him yet.

			[i]

Author: Post

As the sun started to set in the village of sand, Kiyori began heading from the Henrin training ground back to her house. She had been training hard for the past few hours, and was quite exhausted. As she headed back to her house on the clan compound, she was caught by another Henrin clan member. She was familiar with him of course, but for some reason the man's name escaped her, though she could easily tell he was one of the older members, looking to be about 30 or so. "Kiyori, there's a young boy at the compound entrance looking for you, something about recruitment or something, I don't know." Before she could even respond the man took his leave. [color=slategray][i]"Well. That was rude of him. Still, why would someone be looking for me? how odd..."[/i][/color]

As Kiyori puzzled over this, she decided taking a shower and cleaning up could wait, she didn't want to leave her unexpected company standing in front of the compound. The front of the compound was at least a good mile from the training grounds she had just left, so she rushed over there as fast as her dainty legs could carry her. About 13 minutes later, She was within eyeshot of the compound entrance. She approached the only non-henrin standing in the front yard, a rather tall looking boy with short black hair and a sort of white jacket. She felt weirdly dressed now, as she was dressed in her tan desert camo outfit meant for combat, mask and all, having just come from training. Regardless, she approached the boy and started off with a simple introduction, in her usual monotonous tone. [color=slategray]"Hello, i assume you were the one looking for me? I'm Kiyori Henrin. Forgive the sweat and dirty clothes, you caught me as i was wrapping up my training and was about to go home and clean up. In any case, might i ask why you are searching for me in particular?"[/color] Normally Kiyori was more goofy than this, but given she had just met this boy, she didn't quite know how she felt about him yet.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Sun Sep 08, 2013 9:15 am

			"[color=#95BD4F]I'm recruiting for a team to take the Chuunin exams. I need two partners that aren't completely useless, an academy teacher of mine gave me a list of people he would recommend and you were one of them. If you don't meet the test requirements, I will help get them done obviously.[/color]" Shigekuni said once the girl asked him what he wanted. He was to the point and upfront about what he wanted since there was no reason to beat around the bush.

"[color=#95BD4F]It's obvious that a Genin trying to take the exam alone won't pass unless they're already masters by the time they take the exam. Two Genin improves chances a little, but not by much. Ideally three Genin, each with different skill sets and high teamwork skills will pass the exam. I just need to know what you can do and how you'll mesh with my skill set if you do agree to join.[/color]" It was quite obvious that Shigekuni was not playing around lightly with the idea of preparing for the Chuunin Exams. Recruitment, complimentary skill sets, future team work planning to maximize chances of passing, he was obviously doing his homework on the matter.

Author: Post

"[color=#95BD4F]I'm recruiting for a team to take the Chuunin exams. I need two partners that aren't completely useless, an academy teacher of mine gave me a list of people he would recommend and you were one of them. If you don't meet the test requirements, I will help get them done obviously.[/color]" Shigekuni said once the girl asked him what he wanted. He was to the point and upfront about what he wanted since there was no reason to beat around the bush.

"[color=#95BD4F]It's obvious that a Genin trying to take the exam alone won't pass unless they're already masters by the time they take the exam. Two Genin improves chances a little, but not by much. Ideally three Genin, each with different skill sets and high teamwork skills will pass the exam. I just need to know what you can do and how you'll mesh with my skill set if you do agree to join.[/color]" It was quite obvious that Shigekuni was not playing around lightly with the idea of preparing for the Chuunin Exams. Recruitment, complimentary skill sets, future team work planning to maximize chances of passing, he was obviously doing his homework on the matter.

			[color=slategray]"I see. The chuunin exams... I haven't even given them much thought yet, I only graduated a couple weeks ago. However, i'm a bit short on training partners, I could always use some help, and it's always a good idea to plan ahead. Unfortunately i don't meet the requirements for the test, being fresh out of the academy and all, but I have a lot of training to do before any of that."[/color] Kiyori knew that the most important thing right now was to develop her skills, she had a lot of ground to cover. However, Kiyori was really happy that someone was already trying to recruit her. she didn't know if it was because of her skill, or maybe this kid Just sucked at Taijutsu and needed a fighter. Regardless, the effort to seek her out showed he was serious.

[color=slategray]"wow, you've given this a lot of thought. You're pretty smart, thats good. And of course there's strength in numbers, but i'm happy just to have someone interested in me. Being a Henrin, i bring something to a fight that no one else can. Do you know anything of the Henrin?"[/color] The Henrin were the youngest of all of the clans, being only about 90 years old, so it wouldn't be too out of the ordinary if a genin Didn't know they're abilities yet. However, if Shigekuni didn't know, she would be happy to explain and demonstrate both her taijutsu specialty, and the famous Shutter Eye doujutsu.

[color=slategray]"I see. The chuunin exams... I haven't even given them much thought yet, I only graduated a couple weeks ago. However, i'm a bit short on training partners, I could always use some help, and it's always a good idea to plan ahead. However, Kiyori was really happy that someone was already trying to recruit her. she didn't know if it was because of her skill, or maybe this kid Just sucked at Taijutsu and needed a fighter. Regardless, the effort to seek her out showed he was serious.

[color=slategray]"wow, you've given this a lot of thought. You're pretty smart, thats good. And of course there's strength in numbers, but i'm happy just to have someone interested in me. Being a Henrin, i bring something to a fight that no one else can. Do you know anything of the Henrin?"[/color] The Henrin were the youngest of all of the clans, being only about 90 years old, so it wouldn't be too out of the ordinary if a genin Didn't know they're abilities yet. 			"[color=#95BD4F]Not really, I know little about the clans save for the Kouseki from a brief encounter and my Chuunin teacher who is a Hizashi. Henrin and the remaining clans allude me.... minus the Ouji of course, what with Kage-sama being one and all. Still, I suppose it would be good to know what you're capable of in the end, see what we can accomplish and how our techniques can be used accordingly.[/color]" Shigekuni said as he nodded to her to begin.

Something dawned on him however as he had yet to introduce himself. He decided to wait until she was finished with her explanation instead of just randomly butting in. Still, With him as a Nintai and Ninjutsu use, he wondered what skill set she brought to the table and what affinities she used.

"[color=#95BD4F]Not really, I know little about the clans save for the Kouseki from a brief encounter and my Chuunin teacher who is a Hizashi. Henrin and the remaining clans allude me.... minus the Ouji of course, what with Kage-sama being one and all. Still, I suppose it would be good to know what you're capable of in the end, see what we can accomplish and how our techniques can be used accordingly.[/color]" Shigekuni said as he nodded to her to begin.

Something dawned on him however as he had yet to introduce himself. He decided to wait until she was finished with her explanation instead of just randomly butting in. Still, With him as a Nintai and Ninjutsu use, he wondered what skill set she brought to the table and what affinities she used.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Sun Sep 08, 2013 2:47 pm

			[color=slategray]"Well, I'd be happy to showcase a few basics really quickly. My affinity is Doton, but I have no techniques for it yet. it's something i should work on, i know, but i'll start with what the Henrin are known for"[/color] Kiyori would showcase her Taijutsu first, taking the basic Tripod stance, right leg aimed towards Shigekuni with her arms up in a fighting position. [color=slategray]"This is the basic Taijutsu stance of the Henrin. Almost every Henrin is an expert in Taijutsu, and also incredibly smart. My stance obviously leaves my leg open to sweep attempts, but our doujutsu helps us compensate for this."[/color] As Kiyori finished her sentence, she dropped her stance, and with a thought, activated her doujutsu as two red rings took the place of where the outer and inner edges of an iris would be in the black pit that was her eyes.

[color=slategray]"This, however, is what makes the Henrin so formidable. This is the Shutter Eye. Everything that our Doujutsu sees, it records, like perfect eidetic memory. We can later recall any information that our eye has stored, in fractions of a second. This makes us incredible Taijutsu experts, as we can record and study any move over and over again. It also makes us experts at, well, information storage. Rest assured, if my Shutter eye has seen it, you can always trust that what i'm saying is one hundred percent accurate. However, we can only keep it open for a while at a time, it needs a break every so often. There are members that have taken their doujutsu to the next level however, keeping it open permanently." [/color] Kiyori decided to pause and allow for Shigekuni to respond with any questions or anything he may have to say.

			[i]

[color=slategray]"Well, I'd be happy to showcase a few basics really quickly. My affinity is Doton, but I have no techniques for it yet. it's something i should work on, i know, but i'll start with what the Henrin are known for"[/color] Kiyori would showcase her Taijutsu first, taking the basic Tripod stance, right leg aimed towards Shigekuni with her arms up in a fighting position. [color=slategray]"This is the basic Taijutsu stance of the Henrin. Almost every Henrin is an expert in Taijutsu, and also incredibly smart. My stance obviously leaves my leg open to sweep attempts, but our doujutsu helps us compensate for this."[/color] As Kiyori finished her sentence, she dropped her stance, and with a thought, activated her doujutsu as two red rings took the place of where the outer and inner edges of an iris would be in the black pit that was her eyes.

[color=slategray]"This, however, is what makes the Henrin so formidable. This is the Shutter Eye. Everything that our Doujutsu sees, it records, like perfect eidetic memory. We can later recall any information that our eye has stored, in fractions of a second. This makes us incredible Taijutsu experts, as we can record and study any move over and over again. It also makes us experts at, well, information storage. Rest assured, if my Shutter eye has seen it, you can always trust that what i'm saying is one hundred percent accurate. However, we can only keep it open for a while at a time, it needs a break every so often. There are members that have taken their doujutsu to the next level however, keeping it open permanently." [/color] Kiyori decided to pause and allow for Shigekuni to respond with any questions or anything he may have to say.

			"[color=#95BD4F]Doton affinity but no techs, Clan Taijutsu, Clan Doujutsu. We'll need to work on the Doton jutsu thing, but so far you'll mesh well with my Skill set it seems. Shock Fist style and Raiton jutsu are my skill set. Oh, almost forgot. Name's Shigekuni. Tenjirou Shigekuni.[/color]" The Genin said before looking down at the information in his hands on potential candidates. He removed the ones he'd talked to already that had said no along with Kiyori's notes, placing them all back into his pocket.

He approached her with the remaining stack of info and presented it to her, "[color=#95BD4F]This is how I found you by the way. I talked to Academy Teachers and they gave me a list of people they regarded as potential partners I could use. The ones i put in my pocket were people that declined, but I figure we can find our third in that list somewhere.[/color]" Shigekuni seemed to have a solid plan about the Exams the more he showed how much he'd worked on it. The hard part would be the training they'd do prior to the exams in order to get themselves ready.

They'd have to strengthen their weakness, learn to move and act as a team, in fact there was a laundry list of things that needed doing to get them ready. "[color=#95BD4F]How are you planning to use Doton when you learn it? Offense, Defense, or Support? Also what does your Clan Taijutsu style do exactly? And does it have a name?[/color]"

Author: Post

"[color=#95BD4F]Doton affinity but no techs, Clan Taijutsu, Clan Doujutsu. We'll need to work on the Doton jutsu thing, but so far you'll mesh well with my Skill set it seems. Shock Fist style and Raiton jutsu are my skill set. Oh, almost forgot. Name's Shigekuni. Tenjirou Shigekuni.[/color]" The Genin said before looking down at the information in his hands on potential candidates. He removed the ones he'd talked to already that had said no along with Kiyori's notes, placing them all back into his pocket.

He approached her with the remaining stack of info and presented it to her, "[color=#95BD4F]This is how I found you by the way. I talked to Academy Teachers and they gave me a list of people they regarded as potential partners I could use. The ones i put in my pocket were people that declined, but I figure we can find our third in that list somewhere.[/color]" Shigekuni seemed to have a solid plan about the Exams the more he showed how much he'd worked on it. The hard part would be the training they'd do prior to the exams in order to get themselves ready.

They'd have to strengthen their weakness, learn to move and act as a team, in fact there was a laundry list of things that needed doing to get them ready. "[color=#95BD4F]How are you planning to use Doton when you learn it? Offense, Defense, or Support? Also what does your Clan Taijutsu style do exactly? And does it have a name?[/color]"

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Mon Sep 09, 2013 11:24 am

			[color=slategray]"Believe me, I would love to manifest Doton, but for some reason it eludes me. I have no idea what Shock fist is, but i assume it's some sort of nintai. And it's nice to meet you, You already know my name, But i'm Kiyori Henrin."[/color] Suddenly the thought dawned on her, as Shigekuni looked at the notes in his hands, that she had been recommended to this boy by academy teachers. She was curious what they had said to him about her, but she guessed it wasn't important.

As Shigekuni handed her the papers, Kiyori took a quick jot of them all with her Doujutsu, considering it was still on, then stuck them in her pocket. [color=slategray]"Sorry, impulse. If it's on i like to record as much as possible. Never know what might be worth remembering."[/color] Kiyori loved making use of her Doujutsu whenever possible, Having remembered a lot of her teachers lessons word for word, and seen many hand seals and jutsu on paper and in person. She was just as prepared to train as Shigekuni, having spent hours researching hand seal construction. She just hadn't put the time forth to figure out how to harness the earth. [color=slategray]"If you have time to spare, we could go back to my place and work this out. I just finished training, and the member you sent to me caught me as i was on my way home to shower and change."[/color]

The boy seemed to have everything in order, thinking 10 steps ahead in a long term plan. The more Kiyori thought about it, the happier she was the he sought her out, with such a sound strategy their chances at passing the chuunin exams would be much higher. [color=slategray]"Well, Doton does specialize in defense, but i'm not limiting myself to one or the other, i plan to diversify offense, defense and supportive techniques. Our Clan Taijutsu is called the Tripod style. As the name implies, the moves are named after photography, with the base stance being "Setting up the equipment". That was my one legged pose earlier. I can tell you more about it later though, and the true strength of the style."[/color]

			[i]

As Shigekuni handed her the papers, Kiyori took a quick jot of them all with her Doujutsu, considering it was still on, then stuck them in her pocket. [color=slategray]"Sorry, impulse. If it's on i like to record as much as possible. Never know what might be worth remembering."[/color] Kiyori loved making use of her Doujutsu whenever possible, Having remembered a lot of her teachers lessons word for word, and seen many hand seals and jutsu on paper and in person. She was just as prepared to train as Shigekuni, having spent hours researching hand seal construction. She just hadn't put the time forth to figure out how to harness the earth. The boy seemed to have everything in order, thinking 10 steps ahead in a long term plan. 			Shigekuni held his hand out as he nodded, "[color=#95BD4F]I'll need those notes back seeing as you won't need them with your eidetic memory and all. But yes, sparring later would be good, we can get a grasp of what the other can do and then try training new things. As for your diversty, I think we should plan more on specialization for now with our Ninjutsu skills. Doton makes great defense and Raiton is a potent offense, which when used in Shock Fist style can disable opponents easily. Shock fist is about disabling opponents using Raiton's numbing and paralytic abilities, at least that's the jist I get form it.[/color]"

Shigekuni sighed as he shook his head, "[color=#95BD4F]I still have a great deal to do in terms of training to get ready, that's the only problem I find with this Chuunin Exam. We practically have to push ourselves to the limit of being as strong as Chuunin before we even fight them and even then we can still lose since the Chuunin are capable of so much more it seems. But I suppose that's why I'm putting so much thought into the planning process, cause the more prepared we are as a team, the better a chance we stand. Still, I take it you're in on being apart of this team?[/color]"

Author: Post

Shigekuni held his hand out as he nodded, "[color=#95BD4F]I'll need those notes back seeing as you won't need them with your eidetic memory and all. But yes, sparring later would be good, we can get a grasp of what the other can do and then try training new things. As for your diversty, I think we should plan more on specialization for now with our Ninjutsu skills. Doton makes great defense and Raiton is a potent offense, which when used in Shock Fist style can disable opponents easily. Shock fist is about disabling opponents using Raiton's numbing and paralytic abilities, at least that's the jist I get form it.[/color]"

Shigekuni sighed as he shook his head, "[color=#95BD4F]I still have a great deal to do in terms of training to get ready, that's the only problem I find with this Chuunin Exam. We practically have to push ourselves to the limit of being as strong as Chuunin before we even fight them and even then we can still lose since the Chuunin are capable of so much more it seems. But I suppose that's why I'm putting so much thought into the planning process, cause the more prepared we are as a team, the better a chance we stand. Still, I take it you're in on being apart of this team?[/color]"

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Mon Sep 09, 2013 2:33 pm

			Kiyori nodded and handed back the notes to shigekuni, as she did a quick recap of the notes in her head. [color=slategray]"Not a problem. I train very often, if you ever want to train we can always use the Henrin grounds. it's where i do most of my training. I can think of a few Doton techniques i could use for defensive purposes, so that's not an issue, whenever you have time to train i'm ready, just be forewarned i'm less than average when it comes to my affinity as of now."[/color]

Kiyori was pretty impressed with her would be partner's ability to use nintai, she wish manifesting her chakra came that easily to her. [color=slategray]"So, what kind of things are you wanting to improve on before the chuunin exams exactly? you've planned this far, i'm sure you probably have a list ready for training days. Also, to answer your question, it benefits us both to do this, so of course i'm in."[/color] It was funny that Kiyori mentioned a list of techniques to train, because despite wanting to train, she hadn't really thought much about exactly what to train. She knew she wanted to learn her affinity and some more Taijutsu, but beyond that she would have to think outside the box for a while, really try to figure out what she would spend time learning.

			[i]

Author: Post

Kiyori nodded and handed back the notes to shigekuni, as she did a quick recap of the notes in her head. [color=slategray]"Not a problem. I train very often, if you ever want to train we can always use the Henrin grounds. it's where i do most of my training. I can think of a few Doton techniques i could use for defensive purposes, so that's not an issue, whenever you have time to train i'm ready, just be forewarned i'm less than average when it comes to my affinity as of now."[/color]

Kiyori was pretty impressed with her would be partner's ability to use nintai, she wish manifesting her chakra came that easily to her. [color=slategray]"So, what kind of things are you wanting to improve on before the chuunin exams exactly? you've planned this far, i'm sure you probably have a list ready for training days. Also, to answer your question, it benefits us both to do this, so of course i'm in."[/color] It was funny that Kiyori mentioned a list of techniques to train, because despite wanting to train, she hadn't really thought much about exactly what to train. She knew she wanted to learn her affinity and some more Taijutsu, but beyond that she would have to think outside the box for a while, really try to figure out what she would spend time learning.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Tue Sep 10, 2013 8:01 am

			Shigekuni slipped the notes into his pocket as he listened to Kiyori. It seemed to Henrin training grounds would become their meeting spot in the future when needing to train techniques and the like. He would have to get together with her another time and figure out what he was going to do in terms of figuring out who their third member will be, but they could always talk about that later.

"[color=#95BD4F]Well I'm roughly a well rounded genin from what I hear, but I plan to train my Ninjutus skills enough to be of proper use in the exams, especially since I plan to pursue knowledge of something later. I'm assuming it requires considerable Ninjutsu prowess to use so I'll have to work on that for now.[/color]" Shigekuni cleared his throat as he stopped himself from going on a tangent about his stupid hopes and dreams about something that might not even exist anymore. "[color=#95BD4F]Anyway, I was intending to train my Raiton abilities since I have a theory on a way to enhance performance in various fields, be it strength or speed, flexibility or wit. I also have offensive Raiton to train and an idea fr some Raiton Iijutsu. Lastly I want to train some Shock Fist jutsu.[/color]"

Author: Post

Shigekuni slipped the notes into his pocket as he listened to Kiyori. It seemed to Henrin training grounds would become their meeting spot in the future when needing to train techniques and the like. He would have to get together with her another time and figure out what he was going to do in terms of figuring out who their third member will be, but they could always talk about that later.

"[color=#95BD4F]Well I'm roughly a well rounded genin from what I hear, but I plan to train my Ninjutus skills enough to be of proper use in the exams, especially since I plan to pursue knowledge of something later. I'm assuming it requires considerable Ninjutsu prowess to use so I'll have to work on that for now.[/color]" Shigekuni cleared his throat as he stopped himself from going on a tangent about his stupid hopes and dreams about something that might not even exist anymore. "[color=#95BD4F]Anyway, I was intending to train my Raiton abilities since I have a theory on a way to enhance performance in various fields, be it strength or speed, flexibility or wit. I also have offensive Raiton to train and an idea fr some Raiton Iijutsu. Lastly I want to train some Shock Fist jutsu.[/color]"

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Tue Sep 10, 2013 10:39 am

			As she listened to her new partner explain what he had planned for the future, Kiyori thought for a moment on what she could learn. [color=slategray][i]"Well, i know i want to improve on my taijutsu, and i need to become at least somewhat skilled in my affinity. Some general Ninpou wouldn't hurt either."[/i][/color] As the thoughts went through her head, Kiyori listened to what Shigekuni had to say about increasing his Ninjutsu capabilities and plans for Iijutsu.

[color=slategray]"I could probably study some Fuuin as well, i had plans to memorize some basic seals at the library sometime soon. But these are all things that we can discuss later. You should come to my place sometime soon, i'm assuming that file on me has my address on it, right?"[/color] Kiyori was having fun discussing these things with Shigekuni, but she obviously had to wash herself soon, as she could tell she probably didn't smell too great. [color=slategray]"I'll be taking my leave, you can come by some other time and discuss these things. For now, I really need a shower. I'll talk to you soon Shigekuni."[/color] And with that, Kiyori turned and headed back to her house so that she might plan her jutsu and fix her hygiene issue.

			[i]

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: Post

As she listened to her new partner explain what he had planned for the future, Kiyori thought for a moment on what she could learn. [color=slategray][i]"Well, i know i want to improve on my taijutsu, and i need to become at least somewhat skilled in my affinity. Some general Ninpou wouldn't hurt either."[/i][/color] As the thoughts went through her head, Kiyori listened to what Shigekuni had to say about increasing his Ninjutsu capabilities and plans for Iijutsu.

[color=slategray]"I could probably study some Fuuin as well, i had plans to memorize some basic seals at the library sometime soon. But these are all things that we can discuss later. You should come to my place sometime soon, i'm assuming that file on me has my address on it, right?"[/color] Kiyori was having fun discussing these things with Shigekuni, but she obviously had to wash herself soon, as she could tell she probably didn't smell too great. [color=slategray]"I'll be taking my leave, you can come by some other time and discuss these things. For now, I really need a shower. I'll talk to you soon Shigekuni."[/color] And with that, Kiyori turned and headed back to her house so that she might plan her jutsu and fix her hygiene issue.

=== THREAD: September Event - Naruto Saigen Roleplay ===

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: (unknown)

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/][/url]
				Naruto Saigen Roleplay
				Naruto Saigen RP is a text-based roleplay forum set in an alternate universe of the Naruto series.
				[url=#start_here]Skip to content[/url]

						[url=#p1604544]September Event[/url]

									[url=./viewtopic.php?p=1604544#p1604544]

					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1624026]Lace[/url][/b] » Tue Sep 03, 2013 12:05 pm

			Apologies for the lateness. This month's forum event shall be a Social Training Event; training socials are coming back into style. Praise be to the Admins! In all seriousness, training socials are being rewarded this month in doubles.

Whatever you train in a social with another person you get a coupon of equal value in addition to the jutsu you trained. You train a D-Rank jutsu, you get a free D-Rank Coupon. It's really that simple. Training a stat in a social will yield a choice; either a jutsu coupon of your choice (up to A-Rank) or a 5 Point Weapon Coupon.

Solo training threads do not count, socials only.
To keep this nice and fair to everyone, the 3 thread per character rule is being strictly upheld for this event. There will be very little yield to this.
Your training social needs to be started after September 1st to count. The rewards will count for those starting September 30th but for a VERY LIMITED TIME into the month of October. (Don't make us Admins banhammer your thread, we shall be very disappointed so please be responsible and don't try to cheat us.)For those currently in a training thread, any posts made September 1st and onward will be accepted, those before that, no.Rewards will be given at the END of the month and it is your responsibility to keep track of your own threads. Meaning, you do not post threads for your group and/or partner, you are posting them for YOUR character only. (Everyone posts for themselves)
If you are waiting for a re-activation and are certain you're going to see it through, you can participate but you won't get your rewards until the character is active once more.
Only the character you train with gets the coupons, they are [i]not[/i] transferable to others.
If you are training with someone but are not training something yourself, you don't get your partner's rewards.

[b]Template:[/b]

[quote]
Quote:[b]Social Training Link:[/b] The link to your finished training social.

[b]Jutsu Trained:[/b] List the ranks of each jutsu you trained in this social (i.e. D D D D C C)

[b]Training Posts:[/b] Either link or list the number of the posts where your character's trainings are for quicker reference. (i.e. Post # 1, 3, 7; whichever post houses the training itself)

[/quote]NocodeShow[quote][b]Social Training Link:[/b]

[b]Jutsu Trained:[/b]

[b]Training Posts:[/b]

[/quote]

Author: Post

Apologies for the lateness. This month's forum event shall be a Social Training Event; training socials are coming back into style. Praise be to the Admins! In all seriousness, training socials are being rewarded this month in doubles.

Whatever you train in a social with another person you get a coupon of equal value in addition to the jutsu you trained. You train a D-Rank jutsu, you get a free D-Rank Coupon. It's really that simple. Training a stat in a social will yield a choice; either a jutsu coupon of your choice (up to A-Rank) or a 5 Point Weapon Coupon.

Solo training threads do not count, socials only.
To keep this nice and fair to everyone, the 3 thread per character rule is being strictly upheld for this event. There will be very little yield to this.
Your training social needs to be started after September 1st to count. The rewards will count for those starting September 30th but for a VERY LIMITED TIME into the month of October. (Don't make us Admins banhammer your thread, we shall be very disappointed so please be responsible and don't try to cheat us.)For those currently in a training thread, any posts made September 1st and onward will be accepted, those before that, no.Rewards will be given at the END of the month and it is your responsibility to keep track of your own threads. Meaning, you do not post threads for your group and/or partner, you are posting them for YOUR character only. (Everyone posts for themselves)
If you are waiting for a re-activation and are certain you're going to see it through, you can participate but you won't get your rewards until the character is active once more.
Only the character you train with gets the coupons, they are [i]not[/i] transferable to others.
If you are training with someone but are not training something yourself, you don't get your partner's rewards.

[b]Training Posts:[/b] Posts [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=?p=1608651&t=5228550]#13[/url], [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=?p=1609007&t=5228550]#15[/url], and [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=?p=1609041&t=5228550]#17[/url]

Quote:[b]Social Training Link:[/b] [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5235813/1/#new]Demons in the Mist[/url]

[b]Jutsu Trained:[/b] Water Clone TechniqueShow*Water Clone Technique

C-ranked Suiton Ninjutsu

After performing the required seals, the user will be able to create clones made of water. Unlike a normal clone, the water clone has the ability to interact more with the environment due to it having physical substance. This allows the clone to carry out limited attacks on its target. The range of the clone is limited, only able to travel about fifty meters from the user. The user distributes a sufficient amount of chakra equally amongst their other clones, allowing them to use any C or D-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu the user knows.

Taijutsu – 1

Stamina – 3

Strength – 1

Speed – 3
Water VortexShow*Water Vortex

C-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: The intended target must be on top of water

This technique is meant to immobilize and capture a target without dealing any type of fatal blow. After performing the required seals, the user will churn chakra in a body of water. The water will then engulf the target, trapping them in a vortex about two meters in diameter. However, for this technique to be used, the user must be within five meters of the target when the vortex is initially created and must stand within one meter of the vortex after the target is caught. Once the target is inside, the user must hold the last seal and cannot use any other techniques. The technique lasts one post for every two points of stamina the user has. In order to escape, the target must have a strength higher than the user’s control and physically make their way out, or the user must be disrupted. Most shinobi would pass out after two posts due to a lack of oxygen. However, if a target possesses a stamina stat of six or seven, it would require three posts for them to pass out. Should the target possess a stamina stat of eight or nine, it would require five posts for them to pass out, but anything higher would allow them to resist passing out altogether.
Water Dragon ProjectileShow[color=dodgerblue][b]*Water Dragon Projectile[/b][/color]

B-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu

Water Dragon Projectile is a technique that uses the rushing force of water to cause devastating damage. By performing the required seals, the user will utilize a preexisting body of water in front of them before molding it into the form of a dragon head. Once it has been created, the user can launch the two-meter wide projectile towards a target at a speed equal to the average of their ninjutsu and control, with a maximum of ten. Following the head is a long body and tail, stretching nearly ten meters. This technique is able to travel up to thirty meters and is able to be maneuvered to an extent by the user. Up to three times the user may alter the course of the dragon, allowing it to complete a U-turn per alteration.
[b]Training Posts:[/b]

Water Clone - [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=?p=1614034&t=5235813]#6[/url] & [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=?p=1614073&t=5235813]#10[/url]

Water Vortex - [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=?p=1614169&t=5235813]#12[/url] & [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=?p=1614686&t=5235813]#14[/url]

Water Dragon Projectile - [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=?p=1616962&t=5235813]16[/url]

[/quote]
NaomiShow[quote]
Quote:[b]Social Training Link:[/b] [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5225309/1/#new]Something New[/url]

[b]Jutsu Trained:[/b] Exploding TagShow [b]*[Remote Exploding Tag][/b]

E-Ranked Ninjutsu

After doing the needed hand seal, the user is able to detonate an explosive tag. This is able to be used on an exploding tag that the user has imputed their chakra into prior and can only activate a single tag at a time. If more are needed, the tags explode in sequence, starting with one of the user's choice.
Transformation TechniqueShow[b]*[Transformation Technique][/b]

E-Ranked Ninjutsu

After completing the needed handseals, the user of this technique will be able to alter their physical appearance to match that of another person. By consistently emitting chakra throughout their body, the user is able to keep their appearance adjusted at the cost of their stamina draining over time. As this technique is quite strenuous to uphold, experienced shinobi may see more clearly through this delusive disguise. This technique lasts for a number of posts equal to that of the user's stamina.
Clone TechniqueShow[b]*[Clone Technique][/b]

E-Ranked Bushinjutsu

After completing a set of handseals, the user forms a slight chakra 'body', thus creating a single, massless clone. The clone created from this technique is very basic and will dissipate when hit with anything. These clones do not possess vital signs or a unique chakra signature, meaning they don't disrupt the environment, and anything on their person is superficial. The clone has 1 in each stat. They are limited to basic movements.
Kai TechniqueShow [b]*Kai [Release][/b]

D-Ranked Ninjutsu

A rather simple technique that allows the user to escape from a genjutsu. The stat requirements for this technique can be found in the [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=4614107/1/#new]genjutsu rules.[/url]
Change of Body Stance TechniqueShow [b]*[Change of Body Stance Technique][/b]

D-Ranked Ninjutsu

After completing the necessary handseals, the user is able to quickly substitute his/her body with a nearby object that is at least 2/3rds his/her size, but no bigger than their body. This substitution allows the object to take the force of the attack that was meant for the user, additionally allowing the user to create distance between him/her and the opponent. The object used in this jutsu may not be objects that are imbued with chakra or controlled by it, and they may also only be single, solid objects within a 20 yard radius of the user. This technique may only be used a total of one time in a single thread, give or take how many times Shunshin no Jutsu has already been used.
[b]Training Posts:[/b]

Clone Technique: [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=?p=1614974&t=5225309]29[/url], & [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=?p=1615263&t=5225309]31[/url]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=?p=1617010&t=5225309]37[/url], [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=?p=1617536&t=5225309]39[/url], & [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=?p=1618338&t=5225309]41[/url]

			Social Training Link: [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5206199/1/#new] Konoha Genin[/url]

Jutsu Trained: jutsuShowWind cutter

D-rank ninjutsu

After forming the signs,Kuro molds chakra into his hands until they are surrounded, faintly, by wind. The wind isn’t very strong, but it is capable of inflicting shallow cuts into the flesh of many common opponents. The strikes don’t get any stronger or faster just a edge like property. This jutsu lasts for three posts, or until the user stops it.

Training Posts: 19

Social Training link: [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5235263/1/#new] Rozan training[/url]

Jutsu Trained: jutsuShow
Creeping hold

C-rank Doton jutsu

By applying the hand signs and channeling chakra into the earth with his hands pressed against the surface, Rozan is able to manipulate the earth into latching onto his target, most times the feet but any limb will do, binding them to the earth. Because this is a sustained jutsu, the earth will start to creep up the targets limb, encasing it in stone but only to a certain extent. If the legs are grabbed it will creep all the way up to the wasit, making it that much harder to break free. If it's the arms, then it can cover up the targets face potentially sufficating them. It can be one or the other, but not both, and the creep takes a full post after contact to fully extend.  The hold's strength is the same as Rozan's control up to 7, but that's only while Rozan is constatnly giving the jutsu power, should he stop the strength would lessen to 4. The creeping effect can only happen so long as Rozan is giving the jutsu power.
Training post: 9 & 11

			[i]

			Ten Commandments of The LazyShow

1.   YOU'RE BORN TIRED AND YOU LIVE TO RELAX.

2.   YOU LOVE YOUR BED LIKE YOU LOVE YOUR BODY.

3.   IF YOU SEE SOMEONE RELAXING, HELP.

4.   WORK IS SACRED, DON'T TOUCH IT!!

5.   RELAX BY DAY, SO YOU CAN SLEEP AT NIGHT.

6.   WHAT YOU CAN DO TOMORROW, DON'T DO TODAY.

7.   WORK THE LEAST YOU CAN, WHAT YOU HAVE TO DO, LET SOMEONE ELSE DO IT.

8.   CALM DOWN, NO BODY EVER DIED FROM RELAXING.

9.   WHEN YOU GET THE URGE TO WORK, SIT DOWN AND WAIT UNTIL IT PASSES.

10.  IF WORK IS HEALTHY, LET THE SICK DO IT!

						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Fri Aug 02, 2013 12:01 am

			[color=#DC143C]"A partner? And you won't tell me who they are? And why is that?"[/color] Ryoga had a noticeably annoyed tone to his voice as he asked about the person that was to be accompanying him on his next mission. If there was one thing Ryoga hated, it was surprises, but for some reason, the man giving him his mission saw fit to hide this person's identity from him. [color=#5a70b3]"Look, I was told to give you your mission and to let your partner introduce themself, don't kill the messenger Ryoga. In fact, they should be here any moment, I sent for them as well. Just take a seat, they will be here shortly."[/color] The man seemed adamant in hiding his partners information from him, so Ryoga would simply take a seat in a chair inside the man's office and watch the door like a hawk, waiting to meet the person he would be working with on his next mission.

			[i]

[color=#DC143C]"A partner? And you won't tell me who they are? And why is that?"[/color] Ryoga had a noticeably annoyed tone to his voice as he asked about the person that was to be accompanying him on his next mission. If there was one thing Ryoga hated, it was surprises, but for some reason, the man giving him his mission saw fit to hide this person's identity from him. [color=#5a70b3]"Look, I was told to give you your mission and to let your partner introduce themself, don't kill the messenger Ryoga. In fact, they should be here any moment, I sent for them as well. Just take a seat, they will be here shortly."[/color] The man seemed adamant in hiding his partners information from him, so Ryoga would simply take a seat in a chair inside the man's office and watch the door like a hawk, waiting to meet the person he would be working with on his next mission.

			No sooner had Ryoga taken to watching the door when it burst open and an outre, orange haired woman came leaping in while making the noise of a trumpet. "[color=#8B7765]Ba-ba-ba-ba -ba – - ba-ba-bom – - ba-ba-ba-ba – ba – - bom-bom-bom![/color]" She landed on both of her feet, quickly straightening herself while spreading her arms upward in a V shape as she looked to the ceiling dramatically. Needless to say, the woman had already painted herself as a loon in everyone's eyes by her entrance.

Alas, she wouldn't give a flying fuck in the end. It's not like she'd explain herself to anyone either, at least not someone that didn't warrant such an explanation. Lowering her arms as she move to place them on her hips, she looked around the room. She saw a red haired man in old timey dress and a ninja guy behind a desk. "[color=#8B7765]SO! which one of you is Ryoga?[/color]"

No sooner had Ryoga taken to watching the door when it burst open and an outre, orange haired woman came leaping in while making the noise of a trumpet. "[color=#8B7765]Ba-ba-ba-ba -ba – - ba-ba-bom – - ba-ba-ba-ba – ba – - bom-bom-bom![/color]" She landed on both of her feet, quickly straightening herself while spreading her arms upward in a V shape as she looked to the ceiling dramatically. Needless to say, the woman had already painted herself as a loon in everyone's eyes by her entrance.

Alas, she wouldn't give a flying fuck in the end. It's not like she'd explain herself to anyone either, at least not someone that didn't warrant such an explanation. Lowering her arms as she move to place them on her hips, she looked around the room. She saw a red haired man in old timey dress and a ninja guy behind a desk. "[color=#8B7765]SO! which one of you is Ryoga?[/color]"

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Sat Aug 03, 2013 7:37 am

			As Ryoga began watching the door, it immediately burst open as an orange haired Toukai woman came into the room. Of course, he noticed she was a Toukai After her incredibly odd entrance, playing her own bugle and posing as if she was a hero or something. There was no way, no fucking way, the village decided to have them work together. But alas, as he was about to escort the woman out, believing she had the wrong room, she asked specifically for him.

[color=#DC143C]"Is this some sort of joke? Does the village seriously want me to work with someone like that?"[/color] Ryoga was talking specifically to the ninja behind the desk, as he simply couldn't believe that they would have him work with someone that appeared so... unrefined. He did take note of the incredulous amount of swords the woman was carrying on her side though, so perhaps her battle skills were up to speed, but so far her personality caused Ryoga to want nothing to do with her. [color=#5a70b3]"Look, I don't make the orders, I just give them out. If you want to complain, talk to the kage or something, thats not my department Ryoga."[/color] After raising hell to the man, he took one more look over to this Toukai woman, eyeing her up and down to assess her strengths and weaknesses, then simply took a seat and quietly thought to himself about how he would remedy this situation

			[i]

Author: Post

As Ryoga began watching the door, it immediately burst open as an orange haired Toukai woman came into the room. Of course, he noticed she was a Toukai After her incredibly odd entrance, playing her own bugle and posing as if she was a hero or something. There was no way, no fucking way, the village decided to have them work together. But alas, as he was about to escort the woman out, believing she had the wrong room, she asked specifically for him.

[color=#DC143C]"Is this some sort of joke? Does the village seriously want me to work with someone like that?"[/color] Ryoga was talking specifically to the ninja behind the desk, as he simply couldn't believe that they would have him work with someone that appeared so... unrefined. He did take note of the incredulous amount of swords the woman was carrying on her side though, so perhaps her battle skills were up to speed, but so far her personality caused Ryoga to want nothing to do with her. [color=#5a70b3]"Look, I don't make the orders, I just give them out. If you want to complain, talk to the kage or something, thats not my department Ryoga."[/color] After raising hell to the man, he took one more look over to this Toukai woman, eyeing her up and down to assess her strengths and weaknesses, then simply took a seat and quietly thought to himself about how he would remedy this situation

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Sat Aug 03, 2013 1:10 pm

			Kirio lowered her arm as she smiled contently with her entrance as Ryoga seemed to be miffed about something. It was quite amusing to watch as he couldn't believe he was paired with her, but Kirio assumed it was because she was gonna be such a joy to work with. At least she hoped that was the reason, she hated to think that he didn't wanna work with her. That'd just be another nail in the shoe of her day.... or something like that. Either way, the village deemed it so, meaning he was more than likely stuck with her.

Still, nothing like a training session to get to know your partner. 'Blood will out' as they say. But that day was not today. Today she would talk with this man, learn in inner most things and sample what his brain meats could create in the form of words. That's right, conversation was on the agenda for today. "[color=#8B7765]I see you're sufficiently excited about something. So tell me Ryoga, what do you bring to Kiri's collective of skills? I see you have a sword, but are you any good with it? It's not some massive over encumbering piece of shit so I assume you have no problems with the size of your penis. But you dress weird, why are you dressed like a weirdo?[/color]" She asked with a smile, her squinted eyes obscuring her most typical clan trait.

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5639545/1/]Toukai Mukade[/url] - Kirigakure Chuunin - [color=#8B7765][color=#8B7765][/color]

						[url=#top]
				[i][/i]
				Top
			[/url]

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: Post

Kirio lowered her arm as she smiled contently with her entrance as Ryoga seemed to be miffed about something. It was quite amusing to watch as he couldn't believe he was paired with her, but Kirio assumed it was because she was gonna be such a joy to work with. At least she hoped that was the reason, she hated to think that he didn't wanna work with her. That'd just be another nail in the shoe of her day.... or something like that. Either way, the village deemed it so, meaning he was more than likely stuck with her.

Still, nothing like a training session to get to know your partner. 'Blood will out' as they say. But that day was not today. Today she would talk with this man, learn in inner most things and sample what his brain meats could create in the form of words. That's right, conversation was on the agenda for today. "[color=#8B7765]I see you're sufficiently excited about something. So tell me Ryoga, what do you bring to Kiri's collective of skills? I see you have a sword, but are you any good with it? It's not some massive over encumbering piece of shit so I assume you have no problems with the size of your penis. But you dress weird, why are you dressed like a weirdo?[/color]" She asked with a smile, her squinted eyes obscuring her most typical clan trait.

------------------------------------------------------------

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Sun Aug 04, 2013 8:47 am

			Ryoga was simply at a loss. What could he even say to someone as eccentric and looney as this person? She spewed on and on, like diarrhea of the mouth, asking about his sword and penis size and clothing in a constant mash of words flowing out of her mouth in a continuous stream. Ryoga gave the man giving him his mission a very evil glare, promptly causing him to get up hastily and nervously. [color=#5a70b3]"weeellll I think i'll let you to have some alone time, don't let me get in the way."[/color] As he said this, he quickly shuffled out of the room, past Kirio, and down the hall somewhere into the building. [color=#DC143C][i]"Great. Just leave me alone with this crazy woman that i know NOTHING about!"[/i][/color] Ryoga let out a long drawn sigh, and began sifting through what his "partner" just said.

[color=#DC143C]"Okay, let's start from the top. I'm Ryoga, I was trained by my father to fight with my katana, and a taught myself how to use Blood Release as a means of tracking, earning myself the title of Sanguine Stalker. I dress this way because i simply don't like Kirigakure's generic outfit, though i do wear it underneath my Kimono. And just what is wrong with wearing a Kimono? They're light, traditional swordsman clothes. Of course i don't use some giant sword, it would be useless and impossible to use with the style i was taught. And how about you? You haven't even introduced yourself, unless you call that distraction your entrance. What's with the incredulous amount of swords? I've fought with Toukai before, but none with 18 swords on their hips."[/color]

			[i]

Author: Post

Ryoga was simply at a loss. What could he even say to someone as eccentric and looney as this person? She spewed on and on, like diarrhea of the mouth, asking about his sword and penis size and clothing in a constant mash of words flowing out of her mouth in a continuous stream. Ryoga gave the man giving him his mission a very evil glare, promptly causing him to get up hastily and nervously. [color=#5a70b3]"weeellll I think i'll let you to have some alone time, don't let me get in the way."[/color] As he said this, he quickly shuffled out of the room, past Kirio, and down the hall somewhere into the building. [color=#DC143C][i]"Great. Just leave me alone with this crazy woman that i know NOTHING about!"[/i][/color] Ryoga let out a long drawn sigh, and began sifting through what his "partner" just said.

[color=#DC143C]"Okay, let's start from the top. I'm Ryoga, I was trained by my father to fight with my katana, and a taught myself how to use Blood Release as a means of tracking, earning myself the title of Sanguine Stalker. I dress this way because i simply don't like Kirigakure's generic outfit, though i do wear it underneath my Kimono. And just what is wrong with wearing a Kimono? They're light, traditional swordsman clothes. Of course i don't use some giant sword, it would be useless and impossible to use with the style i was taught. And how about you? You haven't even introduced yourself, unless you call that distraction your entrance. What's with the incredulous amount of swords? I've fought with Toukai before, but none with 18 swords on their hips."[/color]

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Thu Aug 08, 2013 9:41 am

			"[color=#8B7765]Sooooooooo.....[/color]" Kiro seemed to start a statement then seemed distracted by something on the desk that once held the man that had been talking with Ryoga. She looked at him again and seemed to realize he was there once more as she gave him a big smile. "[color=#8B7765]I'm Toukai Kirio! I carry 18 swords, and I'm twice removed from the Clan leader. I don't know blood release, I don't dress like a weirdo, and barely use anything outside my own specialize style.[/color]"

Kirio snapped as she remembered something else, "[color=#8B7765]I also don't have a silly sounding title, but I kind of want one. Something cool, ya know? Like 'Master of a 1000 blades' or 'Hundred Handed Kirio'! Man, those sound good. Maybe one day I can get one like that. Certainly sounds better than Sahagin Stooler or whatever yours was. Your nickname makes you sound like a creeper or a pervert that wears red. Speaking of, why don't you wear red? Don't you feel like a goof for not wearing red?[/color]"

Kirio seemed to be a nonstop flow of useless prattling. If anything, Ryoga was getting a taste of what it would be like to deal with a 5 year old at that very moment.

			Ryoga was at a loss for words. This woman was talking a mile a minute, and he was having trouble keeping up. He caught the gist of what she was saying though, hearing her say she used her own style and insulting his clothes. [color=#DC143C]"Listen, the outfit of Kiri doesn't suit me. This feels better to me. In any case, looks are unimportant, skill is what matters. If we are to be partners, i'll want to experience your style first hand so i know what i'm working with."[/color]

As Kirio brought up her own title, Ryoga listened close to the names she listed. [color=#DC143C]"According to your names, your mutations must have something to do with holding those swords. An interesting Toukai mutation. It doesn't change the fact that i can't follow the words coming out of your mouth." [/color] Ryoga could respect that she had some degree of skill to use those swords, but he still couldn't deal with her ditzy personality, it was maddening to listen to her ramble on like an academy student.

Author: Post

Ryoga was at a loss for words. This woman was talking a mile a minute, and he was having trouble keeping up. He caught the gist of what she was saying though, hearing her say she used her own style and insulting his clothes. [color=#DC143C]"Listen, the outfit of Kiri doesn't suit me. This feels better to me. In any case, looks are unimportant, skill is what matters. If we are to be partners, i'll want to experience your style first hand so i know what i'm working with."[/color]

As Kirio brought up her own title, Ryoga listened close to the names she listed. [color=#DC143C]"According to your names, your mutations must have something to do with holding those swords. An interesting Toukai mutation. It doesn't change the fact that i can't follow the words coming out of your mouth." [/color] Ryoga could respect that she had some degree of skill to use those swords, but he still couldn't deal with her ditzy personality, it was maddening to listen to her ramble on like an academy student.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Tue Aug 27, 2013 9:19 am

			"[color=#8B7765]Or maybe I wanna take up being a masseuse and retire, didn't think of that did ya? Oh! That'd be a good nickname, 'Magic Fingers Kirio'![/color]" The woman seemed to be drifting into her own little world then she remembered something and turned back to Ryoga. "[color=#8B7765]By the way, if you wanna get your ass beat, we should probably not do it in here, they get mad when people destroy their offices. So if you wanna get pummeled, we should head to the training grounds, or maybe the roof, either is good with me, the roof is obviously closer, but you know.[/color]"

Kirio seemed to jabber on about distances and elevation differences between the two locations as she lost herself in Kirio-land again. Then for some reason she started talking about birds, which devolved into talking about food, which turned into monologue about how tasty the fried chicken her Uncle made was so amazing. At this point, it was evident that she was the master of all tangents and would carry on forever if she wasn't stopped, gagged, or dragged away.

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5639545/1/]Toukai Mukade[/url] - Kirigakure Chuunin - [color=#8B7765][color=#8B7765][/color]

				Top

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: Post

"[color=#8B7765]Or maybe I wanna take up being a masseuse and retire, didn't think of that did ya? Oh! That'd be a good nickname, 'Magic Fingers Kirio'![/color]" The woman seemed to be drifting into her own little world then she remembered something and turned back to Ryoga. "[color=#8B7765]By the way, if you wanna get your ass beat, we should probably not do it in here, they get mad when people destroy their offices. So if you wanna get pummeled, we should head to the training grounds, or maybe the roof, either is good with me, the roof is obviously closer, but you know.[/color]"

Kirio seemed to jabber on about distances and elevation differences between the two locations as she lost herself in Kirio-land again. Then for some reason she started talking about birds, which devolved into talking about food, which turned into monologue about how tasty the fried chicken her Uncle made was so amazing. At this point, it was evident that she was the master of all tangents and would carry on forever if she wasn't stopped, gagged, or dragged away.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Tue Aug 27, 2013 10:22 am

			For a moment Ryoga thought about Kirio as a masseuse, but quickly shook the thought out of his head as this girl wasn't the right kind of person for that. She'd probably get distracted by something and end up shifting someone's spine out of place or something. As she came back down to earth, she mentioned fighting him. Not only that, she mentioned beating his ass. [color=#DC143C]"Ha! As if it would be a contest. No, not today Kirio, but sometime within the near future we'll see what's what. In any case, this office is starting to feel a bit cramped to me, perhaps..."[/color]

Ryoga droned off as it was obvious Kirio was completely lost in space. He thought he saw a single drop of drool forming, and though he couldn't see her eyes he could tell there was absolutely no movement in them. He let out a drawn out sigh and put his hand on his forehead. [color=#DC143C][i]"I don't think this could get any worse. If she zones out during combat, there may be an accident of some kind..."[/i][/color] Ryoga began walking past kirio in her spaced out state, and grabbed her arm on the way out, attempting to get the zombie to follow him on his trek to the rooftop for some fresh air and a bit more spacious an area to converse.

			[i]

Author: Post

For a moment Ryoga thought about Kirio as a masseuse, but quickly shook the thought out of his head as this girl wasn't the right kind of person for that. She'd probably get distracted by something and end up shifting someone's spine out of place or something. As she came back down to earth, she mentioned fighting him. Not only that, she mentioned beating his ass. [color=#DC143C]"Ha! As if it would be a contest. No, not today Kirio, but sometime within the near future we'll see what's what. In any case, this office is starting to feel a bit cramped to me, perhaps..."[/color]

Ryoga droned off as it was obvious Kirio was completely lost in space. He thought he saw a single drop of drool forming, and though he couldn't see her eyes he could tell there was absolutely no movement in them. He let out a drawn out sigh and put his hand on his forehead. [color=#DC143C][i]"I don't think this could get any worse. If she zones out during combat, there may be an accident of some kind..."[/i][/color] Ryoga began walking past kirio in her spaced out state, and grabbed her arm on the way out, attempting to get the zombie to follow him on his trek to the rooftop for some fresh air and a bit more spacious an area to converse.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Mon Sep 02, 2013 3:00 pm

			As Ryoga dragged her to the roof, Kirio was too busy rambling about fried chicken to notice they were about to hit the roof. As they stepped onto the roof Kirio assumed the other man wanted to spare, missing what he said about not fighting today. She took the moment to slip out of her haori before silently leaping up onto the stairwell roof her chakra flowing through her body as she began to prepare to handle her new partner. As she landed, she spun on the ball of her foot like a pirouette before facing the towards Ryoga.

Kirio shifted her weight from one foot to the other and while stretching her arms and shoulders a bit, "[color=#8B7765]Oh I see, you wanna spar after all. If that's the case, then I guess we're gonna see who really is the strongest.[/color]" Kirio said as the skin along her arms started to darken to an umber color. If Ryoga was to see the back thanks to her halterneck shirt having no back, he'd see that her torso and arms were changed in color. Then the oddest thing happened, four additional arms seemed to sprout from her body, coming off her shoulders before she reached down and drew six of her swords.

"[color=#8B7765]Also, could you hang my haori somewhere safe? I would hate to lose it, It's really soft and I just had it cleaned.[/color]"

As Ryoga dragged her to the roof, Kirio was too busy rambling about fried chicken to notice they were about to hit the roof. As they stepped onto the roof Kirio assumed the other man wanted to spare, missing what he said about not fighting today. She took the moment to slip out of her haori before silently leaping up onto the stairwell roof her chakra flowing through her body as she began to prepare to handle her new partner. As she landed, she spun on the ball of her foot like a pirouette before facing the towards Ryoga.

Kirio shifted her weight from one foot to the other and while stretching her arms and shoulders a bit, "[color=#8B7765]Oh I see, you wanna spar after all. If that's the case, then I guess we're gonna see who really is the strongest.[/color]" Kirio said as the skin along her arms started to darken to an umber color. If Ryoga was to see the back thanks to her halterneck shirt having no back, he'd see that her torso and arms were changed in color. Then the oddest thing happened, four additional arms seemed to sprout from her body, coming off her shoulders before she reached down and drew six of her swords.

"[color=#8B7765]Also, could you hang my haori somewhere safe? I would hate to lose it, It's really soft and I just had it cleaned.[/color]"

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Thu Sep 05, 2013 2:18 am

			Ryoga watched as Kirio lept up onto the stairwell roof, and after mentioning sparring, Her mutation took place. 4 extra arms sprouted from her back, and each of her arms, including the normal ones, grabbed a sword, making 6 total. Ryoga couldn't help but feel impressed by the amount of skill it must take to wield so many weapons at once, but still, today was not the day for something like that, as much as he wanted to. [color=#DC143C]"As much fun as that would be Kirio, we should save this for a better day. I just don't like being cramped up in a tiny office, so i fugured the roof would be a good area to talk and get fresh air. I will compliment your mutation though, i've never seen anything like it from a Toukai. How do you keep track of all of your weapons at once? It must take incredible Tai skill."[/color] Ryoga was not one for compliments, but he had to find something he liked about Kirio, or he wouldn't be able to work with her. luckily, her mutation seemed more than adequate for combat, provided she could actually use all of those weapons simultaneously.

			[i]
