Author: Post

Ryoga watched as Kirio lept up onto the stairwell roof, and after mentioning sparring, Her mutation took place. 4 extra arms sprouted from her back, and each of her arms, including the normal ones, grabbed a sword, making 6 total. Ryoga couldn't help but feel impressed by the amount of skill it must take to wield so many weapons at once, but still, today was not the day for something like that, as much as he wanted to. [color=#DC143C]"As much fun as that would be Kirio, we should save this for a better day. I just don't like being cramped up in a tiny office, so i fugured the roof would be a good area to talk and get fresh air. I will compliment your mutation though, i've never seen anything like it from a Toukai. How do you keep track of all of your weapons at once? It must take incredible Tai skill."[/color] Ryoga was not one for compliments, but he had to find something he liked about Kirio, or he wouldn't be able to work with her. luckily, her mutation seemed more than adequate for combat, provided she could actually use all of those weapons simultaneously.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Fri Sep 06, 2013 11:04 am

			Kirio seemed lost for a minute as she seemed to be visually putting two and two together about what the man said. "[color=#8B7765]So..... we're not fighting but we came to the roof even then I said it was a great place to fight instead of the office. Okay, you've lost me. OH WAIT! Maybe you're trying to trick me and just wanna gain the upper hand like some kind of crafty sneaky snake person! Or.... you're telling the truth and now we're on the roof for some reason instead of walking out the front door of the building and walking the streets like normal folk. Why? No idea, but maybe you just like rooftops.[/color]"

Kirio seemed to go on a rant before she tossed a blade up and let it flip before catching the handle again. She seemed to trail off from her vocal line of reasoning, mostly because she was now juggling her swords, her tongue sticking out of her twisted up features like she was really concentrating hard. Suddenly she dropped all the blades, or rather let them fall as she dropped her arms. "[color=#8B7765]I forget, why am I up here?[/color]"

Kirio looked at Ryoga with her squinted eyes before snapping her fingers, "[color=#8B7765]That's right, I was talking about something. Massages? No....[/color]" Kirio thought for a minute before looking at Ryoga again and shrugging. "[color=#8B7765]Probably wasn't important anyway.[/color]"

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5639545/1/]Toukai Mukade[/url] - Kirigakure Chuunin - [color=#8B7765][color=#8B7765][/color]

				Top

Author: Post

Kirio seemed lost for a minute as she seemed to be visually putting two and two together about what the man said. "[color=#8B7765]So..... we're not fighting but we came to the roof even then I said it was a great place to fight instead of the office. Okay, you've lost me. OH WAIT! Maybe you're trying to trick me and just wanna gain the upper hand like some kind of crafty sneaky snake person! Or.... you're telling the truth and now we're on the roof for some reason instead of walking out the front door of the building and walking the streets like normal folk. Why? No idea, but maybe you just like rooftops.[/color]"

Kirio seemed to go on a rant before she tossed a blade up and let it flip before catching the handle again. She seemed to trail off from her vocal line of reasoning, mostly because she was now juggling her swords, her tongue sticking out of her twisted up features like she was really concentrating hard. Suddenly she dropped all the blades, or rather let them fall as she dropped her arms. "[color=#8B7765]I forget, why am I up here?[/color]"

Kirio looked at Ryoga with her squinted eyes before snapping her fingers, "[color=#8B7765]That's right, I was talking about something. Massages? No....[/color]" Kirio thought for a minute before looking at Ryoga again and shrugging. "[color=#8B7765]Probably wasn't important anyway.[/color]"

------------------------------------------------------------

			It was clearly obvious that Ryoga was boiling with rage, his entire body was trembling as though the force of his anger was too great for him to handle. [color=#DC143C]"I can't take this incessant rambling anymore, if you don't slow down I swear i'll cut your tongue!"[/color] Ryoga was starting to think a fight might be the perfect thing given the situation. But before he began an assault on the squinty eyed devil he was stuck with, he calmed himself, took a deep breath, and relaxed. [color=#DC143C]"Look, as of now i'm not entirely thrilled with the idea of working with you. You're loud, you clearly have attention problems, and you talk faster than i can comprehend. Maybe you can hold your own in a fight, but that doesn't change anything. However, we ARE stuck with each other, so I'll try to make the most of this, but you have to meet me halfway here."[/color]

			[i]

Author: Post

It was clearly obvious that Ryoga was boiling with rage, his entire body was trembling as though the force of his anger was too great for him to handle. [color=#DC143C]"I can't take this incessant rambling anymore, if you don't slow down I swear i'll cut your tongue!"[/color] Ryoga was starting to think a fight might be the perfect thing given the situation. But before he began an assault on the squinty eyed devil he was stuck with, he calmed himself, took a deep breath, and relaxed. [color=#DC143C]"Look, as of now i'm not entirely thrilled with the idea of working with you. You're loud, you clearly have attention problems, and you talk faster than i can comprehend. Maybe you can hold your own in a fight, but that doesn't change anything. However, we ARE stuck with each other, so I'll try to make the most of this, but you have to meet me halfway here."[/color]

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Sun Sep 08, 2013 8:01 am

			"[color=#8B7765]I think my Aunt could just grow me a new one.[/color]" Kirio said to herself quietly as she thought on it. At this point she was trying to remember if it was her Aunt or her cousin that was an iijutsu specialist that could use mass to regrow stuff. Then she looked back at Ryoga as she seemed to have been talking about something. "[color=#8B7765]Halfway for what? The reason we're on this roof? I'm so lost right now.[/color]"

The Jounin was laughing to herself inside as she was enjoying making the other man mad. He seemed to be genuinely upset with her, of course he didn't know the other half of this coin either. Ryoga was missing out on seeing that half by refusing to fight with her, alas that was his decision. Reaching down, Kirio picked up all six of the swords she'd had at the ready, returning them to their sheath since it was clear they wouldn't be sparring today.

			Ryoga was a little upset that Kirio completely blew off his rant, but in the end he didn't really care. chances were it wouldn't stick anyway. Instead he decided to just change the topic. [color=#DC143C]"So level with me here, why don't you explain a bit about your fighting style? How is it you're able to wield so many weapons at once? and just how powerful are your extra arms? Or better yet, what about affinities, and actual ninjutsu, assuming you aren't a one trick pony."[/color] As much as Ryoga loved to use his sword, even he had some skill with ninjutsu to make up for his lack of range. It would benefit him to know his partners affinities and plan accordingly, as well as what kind of ninjutsu his partner had.

Author: Post

Ryoga was a little upset that Kirio completely blew off his rant, but in the end he didn't really care. chances were it wouldn't stick anyway. Instead he decided to just change the topic. [color=#DC143C]"So level with me here, why don't you explain a bit about your fighting style? How is it you're able to wield so many weapons at once? and just how powerful are your extra arms? Or better yet, what about affinities, and actual ninjutsu, assuming you aren't a one trick pony."[/color] As much as Ryoga loved to use his sword, even he had some skill with ninjutsu to make up for his lack of range. It would benefit him to know his partners affinities and plan accordingly, as well as what kind of ninjutsu his partner had.

			"[color=#8B7765]They're as powerful as my arms? Bit of a silly question, isn't it? And I can use so many swords because I have multiple arms..... You know aside from the last question, I'm pretty sure the multiple arms thing answers a decent amount of them. Ya know, I don't normally have guys questioning about the whole multiple arms thing when they can do so much at once. I call it the super happy ending.[/color]" She smirked before wiggling all her fingers as if massaging the air. She stopped as she thought about something.

"[color=#8B7765]Uh, grow arms, use swords, jump off of the air into the air, Ninpou.... I think that's it for me. I'm like a leaf on the wind, I never touch the ground once I catch the breeze![/color]" Kirio said, lifting her leg in some mock kung fu stance. "[color=#8B7765]And if I'm not on the ground, a person like you can't hit me with their sword.[/color]"

Author: Post

"[color=#8B7765]They're as powerful as my arms? Bit of a silly question, isn't it? And I can use so many swords because I have multiple arms..... You know aside from the last question, I'm pretty sure the multiple arms thing answers a decent amount of them. Ya know, I don't normally have guys questioning about the whole multiple arms thing when they can do so much at once. I call it the super happy ending.[/color]" She smirked before wiggling all her fingers as if massaging the air. She stopped as she thought about something.

"[color=#8B7765]Uh, grow arms, use swords, jump off of the air into the air, Ninpou.... I think that's it for me. I'm like a leaf on the wind, I never touch the ground once I catch the breeze![/color]" Kirio said, lifting her leg in some mock kung fu stance. "[color=#8B7765]And if I'm not on the ground, a person like you can't hit me with their sword.[/color]"

------------------------------------------------------------

			[color=#DC143C]"well, you never know, I know little about the Toukai save for the fact they can mutate themselves, how was i to know whether or not it came at some sort of strength penalty? And... i'd rather not think about that."[/color] Ryoga said as Kirio waved her fingers through the air. The last thing he wanted to think about was what other uses there were for so many arms.

[color=#DC143C]"Ah, so you use Takai Ryuu as well? That's a bit abnormal for a swordsman to use, considering they're melee weapons."[/color] Ryoga was familiar with the infamous High style, it was one of the first Non-sword styles he had ever heard of. The idea always intrigued him, but he never saw much use for taking to the skies when he could just as easily dash and slice his opponent on the ground. Though, if Kirio had a use for it, maybe he would too. [color=#DC143C]"Perhaps you could teach me a bit of it sometime. If you can manage to use swords with Takai Ryuu, i'm sure i can probably manage as well."[/color]

			"[color=#8B7765]Abnormal? Have you seen how many arms I have? That's.... well it's normal for me so maybe it's not abnormal. Then again at least I don't turn into a big monster looking thing like the Clan head, that's abnormal. Of course my cousin grows a second thumb on each hand in his transformations.... Man, makes ya think about what qualifies as normal, doesn't it?[/color]" Kirio thought aloud as she hopped off the stairwell access and landed on the roof.

"[color=#8B7765]But of course by being abnormal to others, we catch them off guard. Nobody expects a swordsman to be so mobile that they can stay airborne. That and it makes it a helluva lot easier to dodge things like acid pools and stuff since you're mostly out of reach again it.[/color]" Kirio pointed out as she grabbed her Haori and slipped it back on, her limbs fading back to their original color as her arms receded back into her body like they had never existed in the first place.

			[color=#DC143C]"I mean, of course it's abnormal. Every clan is abnormal, that's what defines them. Your's just happens to be about growing extra digits and becoming a monster apparently."[/color] Ryoga had never met the leader of the Toukai clan, but based on Kirio's description he didn't want to anytime soon. [color=#DC143C]"And you absolutely right, abnormal is not always a bad thing. You'd be surprised how few ninjas can use Chiton.[/color]

Maybe Kirio wasn't all bad now that Ryoga thought about it. She seemed to know what she was talking about for the most part, she just said it really fast, and more importantly, it was almost impossible to keep her attention for longer than 10 seconds. And to kick it off, the village specifically placed them together. He doubted they would have done that if they thought he might snap, as his track record was quite well known. He was starting to learn how to tolerate her, for the most part.[color=#DC143C]"So, when are you free to train? I train every single day, so any day is good for me."[/color]

[color=#DC143C]"I mean, of course it's abnormal. Every clan is abnormal, that's what defines them. Your's just happens to be about growing extra digits and becoming a monster apparently."[/color] Ryoga had never met the leader of the Toukai clan, but based on Kirio's description he didn't want to anytime soon. [color=#DC143C]"And you absolutely right, abnormal is not always a bad thing. You'd be surprised how few ninjas can use Chiton.[/color]

Maybe Kirio wasn't all bad now that Ryoga thought about it. She seemed to know what she was talking about for the most part, she just said it really fast, and more importantly, it was almost impossible to keep her attention for longer than 10 seconds. And to kick it off, the village specifically placed them together. He doubted they would have done that if they thought he might snap, as his track record was quite well known. He was starting to learn how to tolerate her, for the most part.[color=#DC143C]"So, when are you free to train? I train every single day, so any day is good for me."[/color]

			"[color=#8B7765]Uhhhhhhhhh.[/color]" Kirio seemed to lose herself into her mind as if she was trying to dug up some mental wall calendar t check. "[color=#8B7765]I don't really have much.... Whenever I suppose, the only other thing I have to do is train, eat food, massage practice, then who knows what else.[/color]"

Kirio seemed to mentally be going through a list, at least that's what her mouth and hands said as she started pointing to invisible things and her mouth moved silently as if she was talking to herself. Then she just seemed to be doodling on the air before she visibly poked out a smiley face in the air and chuckled to herself.

			[color=#DC143C]"Right, good to know. I didn't think you were serious about the massage thing, but different strokes i suppose."[/color] Ryoga would proceed to walk over to the side of the roof, leaving kirio to talk with herself and draw faces in the air apparently. [color=#DC143C]"I'll be in touch, feel free to ask the man who introduced us for my address if you wish to come see me. If not, i'll probably see you in a few days for some sparring and training."[/color] With that, Ryoga would proceed to walk down the side of the building, into the streets, and out of sight.

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1767569]MedeaMoirae[/url][/b] » Sun Sep 01, 2013 2:44 pm

			Go easy on me?  This is my first attempt to actually put this down in written form.  Its the start of an idea, not the final product and there may be individual jutsu to go along with this.  But I need some help in developing this I think.  I want to know the ins and outs of this before I get too close to making it a reality.

[quote]
Ketsueki Tejina:Ketsueki Tejina is an advanced healing technique and immortality technique that has been developed by Masami Ren.  Through the mastery and study of Iijutsu, Fuuinjutsu, and Chiton she has gained the ability to heal her wounds or reattach her own limbs.  However it does have its weaknesses.  The most tell-tale signs of this ability are the fuuinjutsu seals that cover Ren's entire body, keeping her body together, but also making reattachment possible when a limb is lost, or making 'healing' possible when damage is done.  This healing is done by pulling the damaged tissue back together as well as increasing the production of blood in the body the moment a wound is received.  With this ability Ren can reduce herself to a puddle of blood in order to heal herself when severely damaged, or pull herself back together from such a state back to her own self again.

[b][color=#8B0000]Requirements:[/color][/b]
Chiton
50 Chiton Ninjutsu
Chiton Kinesis
50 Iijutsu
50 Fuuinjutsu
-1 Stamina (permanent)

[b][color=#8B0000]Weaknesses:[/color][/b]
Sankaton - [i]Complete Weakness, this ability does nothing to lessen the effects of Sankaton.[/i]
Katon & Acid - [i]Partial Weakness, can only slow the damaging effects of Katon and Acid, not completely negate them.  The effects of Katon and Acid take twice as long to complete, but are not halted.[/i]
[/quote]

I've edited to reflect the original idea to give a better idea of where this is starting at.  Also I cannot repeat enough, this is an endgame technique, not something she would get any time soon.

			[i]CharactersShow[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5219531/1/]Masami Ren[/url]16Chunin[color=dodgerblue]Kirigakure No Sato[/color][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5222562/1/]Airi[/url] , [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5254511/1/#new]Kazuki[/url][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5219552/1]The Blood Ritual[/url][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5021544/1/#new]Shoshiki Hikari[/url]16Genin[color=saddlebrown]Iwagakure No Sato[/color]N/A[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5063346/1]Splintered Glass[/url][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5302953/1/]Hyuuga Ami[/url]19Jounin[color=lightgreen]Konohagakure No Sato[/color]N/AN/A[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5341332/1/]Kouseki Hitomi[/url]20Jounin[color=peru]Sunagakure No Sato[/color]N/AN/A[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5385144/1/#new]Satomi Mio[/url]18D Rank Samurai[color=#15AABC]Frost Country[/color]N/AN/A

Go easy on me?  This is my first attempt to actually put this down in written form.  Its the start of an idea, not the final product and there may be individual jutsu to go along with this.  But I need some help in developing this I think.  I want to know the ins and outs of this before I get too close to making it a reality.

[quote]
Ketsueki Tejina:Ketsueki Tejina is an advanced healing technique and immortality technique that has been developed by Masami Ren.  Through the mastery and study of Iijutsu, Fuuinjutsu, and Chiton she has gained the ability to heal her wounds or reattach her own limbs.  However it does have its weaknesses.  The most tell-tale signs of this ability are the fuuinjutsu seals that cover Ren's entire body, keeping her body together, but also making reattachment possible when a limb is lost, or making 'healing' possible when damage is done.  This healing is done by pulling the damaged tissue back together as well as increasing the production of blood in the body the moment a wound is received.  With this ability Ren can reduce herself to a puddle of blood in order to heal herself when severely damaged, or pull herself back together from such a state back to her own self again.

[b][color=#8B0000]Requirements:[/color][/b]
Chiton
50 Chiton Ninjutsu
Chiton Kinesis
50 Iijutsu
50 Fuuinjutsu
-1 Stamina (permanent)

[b][color=#8B0000]Weaknesses:[/color][/b]
Sankaton - [i]Complete Weakness, this ability does nothing to lessen the effects of Sankaton.[/i]
Katon & Acid - [i]Partial Weakness, can only slow the damaging effects of Katon and Acid, not completely negate them.  The effects of Katon and Acid take twice as long to complete, but are not halted.[/i]
[/quote]

I've edited to reflect the original idea to give a better idea of where this is starting at.  Also I cannot repeat enough, this is an endgame technique, not something she would get any time soon.

			The weaknesses aren't actually weaknesses.  Weaknesses are things that are IMPROVED against you.  Sankaton/Katon/Acid do their normal thing against you.  An example of a weakness would be a Wood body's weakness to fire.  Instead of normal burning, it'll burn brighter/faster/stronger/etc due to the wood combusting at a much lower temperature and all that.

			CodingsShow[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=6145731/]Oohazure[/url]: [color=#AFAD00][b]""[/b][/color]

Author: Post

The weaknesses aren't actually weaknesses.  Weaknesses are things that are IMPROVED against you.  Sankaton/Katon/Acid do their normal thing against you.  An example of a weakness would be a Wood body's weakness to fire.  Instead of normal burning, it'll burn brighter/faster/stronger/etc due to the wood combusting at a much lower temperature and all that.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Fri Sep 06, 2013 12:33 am

			I really like the idea of this ability, It's similar to Earth Grudge but not done quite the same way. It's an immortality concept i haven't seen before, on the site or otherwise, and the idea of having various states of existence like a puddle and such is something i've always had a soft spot for. I'd love to see you get this on Masami and make blood into something viable, because at current the only people i've seen working with blood are you, me and Sia. I can't really think of anything to improve on that i haven't already said in Cbox, I just wanted to say how i felt about the ability itself.

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: Post

I really like the idea of this ability, It's similar to Earth Grudge but not done quite the same way. It's an immortality concept i haven't seen before, on the site or otherwise, and the idea of having various states of existence like a puddle and such is something i've always had a soft spot for. I'd love to see you get this on Masami and make blood into something viable, because at current the only people i've seen working with blood are you, me and Sia. I can't really think of anything to improve on that i haven't already said in Cbox, I just wanted to say how i felt about the ability itself.

						[url=#p1601491][Resolved]Some Blood techs for review.[/url]

									[url=./viewtopic.php?p=1601491#p1601491]
						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Thu Aug 29, 2013 7:33 am

			Hey all, i have a few Blood techniques that i'm not entirely sure on. This is just a sample of what i want my character to develop from Chiton, and any input i can get would be greatly appreciated. Also, i didn't rank them specifically because i have no idea what rank they would be, some input on that would be great too.

Chiton CustomsShow [color=#DC143C]Heartstopper[/color]

A-rank Ninjutsu

Ryoga performs a string of handseals, then slits his thumb on his sword, draining his blood into the blade while programming it. This jutsu Causes Ryoga's blood to coagulate inside of an enemy's body 1 post after it enters. As the name implies, an organ cut off from blood could fail, causing internal damage or death, while a vein that loses circulation could cause a limb to lose feeling and eventually become paralyzed. The effect is based on where Ryoga makes contact.

[color=#DC143C]Overflow[/color]

B-rank jutsu

Ryoga performs a string of handseals, and focuses on an enemy infected with his blood within 30 meters. This jutsu requres concentration and constant chakra flow to keep active, but it causes the opponents blood pressure to skyrocket, pushing the vascular system to the bursting point, causing intense crippling pain throughout their body.

[color=#DC143C]Living Bomb[/color]

B-rank Ninjutsu

Ryoga performs a string of handseals, then slits his thumb on his sword, draining his blood into the blade while programming it. This jutsu causes Ryoga's blood to become volatile. 1 post after the target is infected, an explosion with the force of 5 exploding tags occurs within the enemies body wherever Ryoga's blood was located.
Vascular GlimpseShow

[color=#DC143C]Vascular Glimpse[/color]

This ability is the result of extensive chiton sensing combined with Ryoga's infection style. In order to fully utilize his method of combat, Ryoga developed this Doujutsu. This doujutsu allows Ryoga to see the underlying vascular system of his target. It also allows him to tell the difference between someone else's blood and his own, which appears as blue compared to the red color of his target's blood. This doujutsu is constantly active, turning the iris of Ryoga's eyes red, and taking a permanent -1 stamina devoted solely to keeping it active.

Prerequisites:

25 chiton techniques

Chiton empathy sensing

15 chiton empathy techniques

-1 stamina dedicated to the Doujutsu

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1746186][i][/url]
								[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1746186]Darkarma[/url]

		[b]Posts:[/b] [url=./search.php?author_id=1746186&sr=posts]2472[/url]		[b]Joined:[/b] Sun May 27, 2012 6:00 pm

											[b]Location:[/b] Sea of Dirac

						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1746186]Darkarma[/url][/b] » Tue Sep 03, 2013 9:21 am

			Alright, I'm going to say I'm being very blunt for this review.

Frankly these techniques are (minus the last one, Cold Blood, is C-Rank) are all A-Ranks at least considering what your doing and affecting things inside your target's body.

At the very least, for these techniques to work your control will need to be higher than the target's control and your going to have to be much closer than 30 meters. Try 5 tops. Another aspect is your control would have to overcome the target's strength since flowing blood around would literally be fighting the target's muscles since that controls blood flow in the body.

Finally Razor Veins simply won't work because one the human body can't produce iron (its its own atomic element). Now if you cause the person to produce large amounts of blood to increase their blood pressure, that would work mostly and the breach in conservation of mass can be ignored.

The main fact that you will need to understand is most of these techniques are instant wins with no means of defending against. So if you can try and consider how to at least give them some form of weakness.

			[url=https://i.imgur.com/bKVTWrP.png][i][/url]
CharactersShow[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=88&t=8347752&p=4213169][img]https://i.imgur.com/A79bwka.png[/img][/url]

						[url=#top]
				[/i]
				Top
			[/url]

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: Post

Alright, I'm going to say I'm being very blunt for this review.

Frankly these techniques are (minus the last one, Cold Blood, is C-Rank) are all A-Ranks at least considering what your doing and affecting things inside your target's body.

At the very least, for these techniques to work your control will need to be higher than the target's control and your going to have to be much closer than 30 meters. Try 5 tops. Another aspect is your control would have to overcome the target's strength since flowing blood around would literally be fighting the target's muscles since that controls blood flow in the body.

Finally Razor Veins simply won't work because one the human body can't produce iron (its its own atomic element). Now if you cause the person to produce large amounts of blood to increase their blood pressure, that would work mostly and the breach in conservation of mass can be ignored.

The main fact that you will need to understand is most of these techniques are instant wins with no means of defending against. So if you can try and consider how to at least give them some form of weakness.

------------------------------------------------------------

																	[url=./ucp.php?i=pm&mode=compose&action=quotepost&p=1604536]
										Send private message
									[/url]

						[url=#p1604536][Resolved]Some Blood techs for review.[/url]

									[url=./viewtopic.php?p=1604536#p1604536]
						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Tue Sep 03, 2013 11:45 am

			please dark, be blunt, because no one else is helping me understand Chiton.

yeah, i figured they would be high ranked, and i'm totally fine with that. also the high control is fine, since control is a prerequisite for most high ranked blood jutsu. The range thing is kinda meh, because i'm going to have to get in close to infect them in the first place. Also i'm not quite sure someone could control their own muscles to stop their bloodflow, i think a battle of control is more plausible.

and yeah, i think your idea of razor veins works way better than mine actually, i can't believe i didn't think of that XD. also i didn't know the human body didn't produce natural iron, so shit on me it seems.

They are instant wins, you're absolutely right, but it requires me to get close enough to get at least one good strike in. That's the entire premise of my character: Rush down with speed, get one decent strike in, infect with blood, cause any effects i desire through my blood inside their body. I'll have to come up with things i can do at lower ranks though, more like cold blood, but i don't want to do a whole lot of debuffs.

Also, as a side note, am i crazy, or does chiton's persistence effect mean that i can have jutsu lasting for longer than average posts? i see jutsu on there lasting for 10-15 posts, and those are archives.

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

Author: Post

please dark, be blunt, because no one else is helping me understand Chiton.

yeah, i figured they would be high ranked, and i'm totally fine with that. also the high control is fine, since control is a prerequisite for most high ranked blood jutsu. The range thing is kinda meh, because i'm going to have to get in close to infect them in the first place. Also i'm not quite sure someone could control their own muscles to stop their bloodflow, i think a battle of control is more plausible.

and yeah, i think your idea of razor veins works way better than mine actually, i can't believe i didn't think of that XD. also i didn't know the human body didn't produce natural iron, so shit on me it seems.

They are instant wins, you're absolutely right, but it requires me to get close enough to get at least one good strike in. That's the entire premise of my character: Rush down with speed, get one decent strike in, infect with blood, cause any effects i desire through my blood inside their body. I'll have to come up with things i can do at lower ranks though, more like cold blood, but i don't want to do a whole lot of debuffs.

Also, as a side note, am i crazy, or does chiton's persistence effect mean that i can have jutsu lasting for longer than average posts? i see jutsu on there lasting for 10-15 posts, and those are archives.

I also added a custom ability that ties in with Ryoga's combat style.

=== THREAD: [Accepted]Henrin, Kiyori - Naruto Saigen Roleplay ===
Forum: Home Board index General Section Member Section Old Forum Archives and Discussion Archives Finished Applications > Home Board index

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: (unknown)

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/][/url]
				Naruto Saigen Roleplay
				Naruto Saigen RP is a text-based roleplay forum set in an alternate universe of the Naruto series.
				[url=#start_here]Skip to content[/url]

Author: 

[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325][i][/url]
								[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url]

		[b]Posts:[/b] [url=./search.php?author_id=1869325&sr=posts]7571[/url]		[b]Joined:[/b] Sat Apr 27, 2013 6:00 pm

											[b]Location:[/b] Moline, IL

				[b]Contact:[/b]

					[url=#]

										Send private message
									[/url]

						[url=#p1603974][Accepted]Henrin, Kiyori[/url]

									[url=./viewtopic.php?p=1603974#p1603974]
						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Mon Sep 02, 2013 11:54 am

			[b]Username:[/b] [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325/]Tydie[/url]

[b]Points:[/b] 0/0

[b]Coupon:[/b]

[b]Companions:[/b] (0/4)

[b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=4275503/1/#new]Henrin[/url], Kiyori[/b]

["This is my happy face."]

[b]General Information[/b]
[b]Age:[/b] 13

[b]Gender:[/b] Female

[b]Height:[/b] 5'4 feet

[b]Weight:[/b] 110 lbs.

[b]Hair:[/b] Kiyori's short black hair has an off center part, making her hair cover the right side of her face.

[b]Eyes:[/b] Kiroyi's eyes are a solid black when her doujutsu isn't active, the same as all Henrin

[b]Physical Features:[/b] Kiroyi has a very lean frame, with long thin legs and a small waist with a decent backside, as well as a lack of bust at almost B cups. Her skin is a pale white and is completely unblemished, with not a scar on her body. She usually has a very stoic look on her face, as though nothing phases her.

[b]Clothing/Accessories:[/b] During missions or when training, Kiyori wears an outfit tailored to her enviroment. The outfits are always the same design; a half face mask covering her nose to neck, a short sleeved black shirt with long sleeve mesh armor underneath, fingerless gloves, Tight mid thigh shorts with mesh armor from mid thigh to ankle, a belt with two shuriken holsters on the front, a ninja pouch attached to the right hip and right thigh, and Ninja sandles. Her current outfit colors are tan desert camo and pure black night camo. When not on misions, Kiyori's outfits are usually short sleeved tops and short shorts with sandles to mitigate the desert heat.

[b]Forehead Protector:[/b] Worn on her forehead, though only half is usually visible due to Kiyori's hair.

[b]Personality:[/b] Kiyori's constant emotionless expression leads most people to believe she's depressed or bored, but she feels all the normal things a 13 year old girl feels. She comes off as cold almost all of the time, having a bored, monotone voice in almost everything she says. In truth, Kiroyi is actually really goofy, and has a penchant for sarcasm in the face of stupidity.  Anyone who can get around her standoffish expression can find a loyal friend and ally.

She takes incredible pride in her work, following her missions to the letter whenever possible. She also takes her training very seriously, pouring hours of time into training her mind and body to perfect her abilities.

[b]Picture:[/b] [url=http://s1194.photobucket.com/user/tydie904/media/Kiyori.png.html]Kiyori Henrin[/url]

[b]Battle Information[/b]
[b]Rank:[/b] Genin

[b]Village:[/b] Sunagakure no Sato

[b]Chakra Affinity:[/b] [color=saddlebrown]Doton[/color]

[b]Second Chakra Affinity:[/b]

[b]Stats[/b]
[b]Ninjutsu:[/b] 2
[b]Taijutsu:[/b] 6
[b]Genjutsu:[/b] 1
[b]Stamina:[/b] 3
[b]Control:[/b] 2
[b]Strength:[/b] 2
[b]Speed:[/b] 2
[b]Wit: [/b] 6

[b]Equipment:[/b]

 20 shuriken in holsters, 10 in each holster on front of belt

5 exploding tags, 5 flash tags, and 5 smoke bombs, all located in pouch on right hip

A basic ninjato, 2 foot 6 inch blade, 6 inch handle, 3 feet altogether, on left hip

10 kunai in pouch on right hip

a canteen of water in pouch on right hip

[b]Combat Style:[/b]

 Kiyori's main tactics are ambush techniques, traps, and precise combat. She aims to remain undetected for as long as possible, and silently eliminate enemies to avoid raising alarms. if caught in open conflict, she relies on her Henrin taijutsu to deal with enemies, striking precise areas of the body using her Doujutsu.

Tripod

Prerequisite: Setting Up the Equipment, Snapshot

This is the main fighting style utilized by the Henrin clan. Unlike other fighting styles that revolve around balance with a firm base, clan members instead focus on offensive attacks and strikes. This does leave them open to more lower attacks, but, due to their doujutsu, they are able to see some of those moves and prepare for them ahead of time. The basic stance is with one leg firmly on the ground, with the body shifted to the direction of their leg, with both hands in a curved position.

[b]Jutsu Information[/b]
[b]Abilities:[/b]

Bloodline Limit:

- Shutter Eye -

This is the doujutsu of the Henrin clan, to the point that they're regarded all over the lands for their abilities, being a very well revered doujutsu. While active, the Shutter Eye memorizes every little thing that it sees, from sceneries, creatures, to certain movements very rapidly. Not only does the user have the ability to remember it, but they also possess the ability to recall any of it at a moment's notice. Any movement that is made, they can remember it and recall it, making them near experts at taijutsu. Most abilities do need jutsu to follow it, however.

Clan members are able to keep their doujutsu active for a number of posts equal to their stamina stat. Then, once the eye turns off, it must stay off for that same amount of time as a cooldown period. While their eye is 'off' they aren't able to recall any of the stored memories.

[b]Jutsu:[/b]
Tripod StyleShow
~Tripod – Setting Up the Equipment

D-Ranked Taijutsu

This is the basic stance of Henrin clan members. To start, the clan member raises their left or right leg (depending on their dominant hand), as if they were doing a side kick. This stance gives them extra reach with their leg, in a constant base stance for a kick, while both of their hands are in a striking position. This stance has some drawbacks, however. Due to only one leg constantly being on the ground, they are more susceptible to ground based attacks. However, due to constant training on that one leg being their pillar of support, it is a lot harder for someone to actually trip them or cause the leg to fall. It’s still possible, of course, but it would take more compared to a normal person.

 ~Tripod – Flash!

D-Ranked Taijutsu

This is more of a base technique, rather than a specific one, but, while using kicks and punches, the user aims for waiting for exactly the right moment, then, in a flash of movement, strikes with all of their power. To those with an average of taijutsu and wit stat less than the user’s speed, it can appear as if no movement was actually made.

~Tripod – Snapshot

C-Ranked Taijutsu

Prerequisite: Shutter Eye active

Since the clan member has the ability to remember exactly where they hit, they are able to utilize their Taijutsu skills to their maximum ability. Rather than putting their full power into each hit, they purposefully tone down their own hits, making their moves also just ‘barely’ miss, while in fact they are hitting with an incredible accuracy along with using the maximum power possible for the style. In doing so, each actual hit barely feels like anything at all, until the ‘final’ hit. This will make it seem like a whole lot more power was in the actual hit, due to the previous damage, while also causing a massive pain throughout the target’s body.
Henrin TaijutsuShow
~Shutter Eye - Storage

D-Ranked Taijutsu

This is the most basic jutsu and a requirement of all clan members and expected of them to learn by the time that they are 4 years old. This allows the clan member, while the Shutter Eye is active, to store data inside of it. This allows them to recall the data at a later date.

~Shutter Eye - Recall - Taijutsu - E

D-Ranked Taijutsu

By seeing and recording someone that has used a taijutsu skill, the clan member is able to see and play back the taijutsu. By studying that jutsu, the clan member is able to learn from that taijutsu and learn how to mimic it. This lets them take 200 words off of an E ranked taijutsu that they are training, that they have recorded, to a minimum 400.

~Shutter Eye - Recall - Taijutsu - D

C-Ranked Taijutsu

Prerequisite: Shutter Eye - Recall - Taijutsu - E

By seeing and recording someone that has used a taijutsu skill, the clan member is able to see and play back the taijutsu. By studying that jutsu, the clan member is able to learn from that taijutsu and learn how to mimic it. This lets them take 200 words off of a D ranked taijutsu that they are training, that they have recorded, to a minimum 400.
TaijutsuShow

[b]*Ambidexterity[/b]

D - Ranked Taijutsu

Requires: 5 Taijutsu

After extensive practice and training the character has gained equal strength and skill between their two hands. This allows them to perform any action with either hand at exactly the same skill level and strength.

[b]*Skillful Wield[/b]

D-Ranked Taijutsu

Prerequisite: 3 wit

With a solid foundation of knowledge on their choice of weaponry, those with the Skillful Wield technique are able to utilize their weapon more fully. By knowing the weapon's weakest points, the user is able to avoid presenting these areas to damage during combat, thus making their weapon less likely to break by means of recklessness.
NinpouShow

[b]*Chakra Kai[/b]

E-Ranked Ninjutsu

A jutsu used with the purpose of activating seals and a range of devices and weapons, this technique begins with a single handseal. Once this has been performed, the user will focus a dollop of his/her chakra into what s/he is looking to activate in order to complete the task. Seals activated with this technique must be within 20 yards of the user's position.

[b]*Grouping Chakra Kai[/b]

D-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Chakra Kai

By utilizing the fundamentals of Chakra Kai, this jutsu allows the user to activate multiple seals at a single time rather than needing to cast multiple uses of Chakra Kai. This can only be used on the same seal, meaning the user can't activate three different seals, but s/he can activate up to three of a single seal with this jutsu. This technique's range depends on the type of Chakra Kai used to activate it.

[b]History[/b]

Kiroyi was born to a normal branch of Henrin, with 5 sisters and 6 brothers, all born within a year of each other, with her being the last in line. Growing up with so many other siblings, It was easy to get pushed to the back, like the runt of the litter. This was the case with Kiyori, as she very rarely got a chance to express herself. As such, she developed sort of a monotone voice that showed no emotion, regardless of how she actually felt. Other than that, her upbringing was normal for that of the Henrin; Being trained in her doujutsu, as well as the basics of the Tripod style, in preparation for the acadamy.

During her academy years, Kiyori had little to do with her classmates, though not by choice. She wasn't quite shunned, but her tone did cause a good portion of students to avoid her, calling her "weird" and "depressed". This bothered her alot, as she didn't understand what the problem really was, she seemed normal to herself, even though it had been pointed out to her before. Drama aside though, she was a very skilled student, proving to be one of the smartest and physically skilled students in the academy, as most Henrin were. She discovered her affinity for Doton during the academy, but hasn't really made anything of it yet, as her ninjutsu was a bit lacking. despite this, she graduated the academy at the age of 13.

As Kiyori is fresh out of the academy, she hasn't had the opportunity to make any sort of name for herself. She aims to improve on her Doujutsu, and learn many of Suna's specialties, such as Puppetry and Sand. She longs to find teammates that she can call friends, and a sensei to teach her what it is to be a ninja.

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

[b]Picture:[/b] [url=http://s1194.photobucket.com/user/tydie904/media/Kiyori.png.html]Kiyori Henrin[/url]

[b]Battle Information[/b]
[b]Rank:[/b] Genin

[b]Village:[/b] Sunagakure no Sato

[b]Chakra Affinity:[/b] [color=saddlebrown]Doton[/color]

[b]Second Chakra Affinity:[/b]

[b]Stats[/b]
[b]Ninjutsu:[/b] 2
[b]Taijutsu:[/b] 6
[b]Genjutsu:[/b] 1
[b]Stamina:[/b] 3
[b]Control:[/b] 2
[b]Strength:[/b] 2
[b]Speed:[/b] 2
[b]Wit: [/b] 6

[b]Equipment:[/b]

 20 shuriken in holsters, 10 in each holster on front of belt

5 exploding tags, 5 flash tags, and 5 smoke bombs, all located in pouch on right hip

A basic ninjato, 2 foot 6 inch blade, 6 inch handle, 3 feet altogether, on left hip

10 kunai in pouch on right hip

a canteen of water in pouch on right hip

[b]Combat Style:[/b]

 Kiyori's main tactics are ambush techniques, traps, and precise combat. She aims to remain undetected for as long as possible, and silently eliminate enemies to avoid raising alarms. if caught in open conflict, she relies on her Henrin taijutsu to deal with enemies, striking precise areas of the body using her Doujutsu.

Tripod

Prerequisite: Setting Up the Equipment, Snapshot

This is the main fighting style utilized by the Henrin clan. Unlike other fighting styles that revolve around balance with a firm base, clan members instead focus on offensive attacks and strikes. This does leave them open to more lower attacks, but, due to their doujutsu, they are able to see some of those moves and prepare for them ahead of time. The basic stance is with one leg firmly on the ground, with the body shifted to the direction of their leg, with both hands in a curved position.

[b]Jutsu Information[/b]
[b]Abilities:[/b]

Bloodline Limit:

- Shutter Eye -

This is the doujutsu of the Henrin clan, to the point that they're regarded all over the lands for their abilities, being a very well revered doujutsu. While active, the Shutter Eye memorizes every little thing that it sees, from sceneries, creatures, to certain movements very rapidly. Not only does the user have the ability to remember it, but they also possess the ability to recall any of it at a moment's notice. Any movement that is made, they can remember it and recall it, making them near experts at taijutsu. Most abilities do need jutsu to follow it, however.

Clan members are able to keep their doujutsu active for a number of posts equal to their stamina stat. Then, once the eye turns off, it must stay off for that same amount of time as a cooldown period. While their eye is 'off' they aren't able to recall any of the stored memories.

[b]Jutsu:[/b]
Tripod StyleShow
~Tripod – Setting Up the Equipment

D-Ranked Taijutsu

This is the basic stance of Henrin clan members. To start, the clan member raises their left or right leg (depending on their dominant hand), as if they were doing a side kick. This stance gives them extra reach with their leg, in a constant base stance for a kick, while both of their hands are in a striking position. This stance has some drawbacks, however. Due to only one leg constantly being on the ground, they are more susceptible to ground based attacks. However, due to constant training on that one leg being their pillar of support, it is a lot harder for someone to actually trip them or cause the leg to fall. It’s still possible, of course, but it would take more compared to a normal person.

 ~Tripod – Flash!

D-Ranked Taijutsu

This is more of a base technique, rather than a specific one, but, while using kicks and punches, the user aims for waiting for exactly the right moment, then, in a flash of movement, strikes with all of their power. To those with an average of taijutsu and wit stat less than the user’s speed, it can appear as if no movement was actually made.

~Tripod – Snapshot

C-Ranked Taijutsu

Prerequisite: Shutter Eye active

Since the clan member has the ability to remember exactly where they hit, they are able to utilize their Taijutsu skills to their maximum ability. Rather than putting their full power into each hit, they purposefully tone down their own hits, making their moves also just ‘barely’ miss, while in fact they are hitting with an incredible accuracy along with using the maximum power possible for the style. In doing so, each actual hit barely feels like anything at all, until the ‘final’ hit. This will make it seem like a whole lot more power was in the actual hit, due to the previous damage, while also causing a massive pain throughout the target’s body.
Henrin TaijutsuShow
~Shutter Eye - Storage

D-Ranked Taijutsu

This is the most basic jutsu and a requirement of all clan members and expected of them to learn by the time that they are 4 years old. This allows the clan member, while the Shutter Eye is active, to store data inside of it. This allows them to recall the data at a later date.

~Shutter Eye - Recall - Taijutsu - E

D-Ranked Taijutsu

By seeing and recording someone that has used a taijutsu skill, the clan member is able to see and play back the taijutsu. By studying that jutsu, the clan member is able to learn from that taijutsu and learn how to mimic it. This lets them take 200 words off of an E ranked taijutsu that they are training, that they have recorded, to a minimum 400.

~Shutter Eye - Recall - Taijutsu - D

C-Ranked Taijutsu

Prerequisite: Shutter Eye - Recall - Taijutsu - E

By seeing and recording someone that has used a taijutsu skill, the clan member is able to see and play back the taijutsu. By studying that jutsu, the clan member is able to learn from that taijutsu and learn how to mimic it. This lets them take 200 words off of a D ranked taijutsu that they are training, that they have recorded, to a minimum 400.
TaijutsuShow

[b]*Ambidexterity[/b]

D - Ranked Taijutsu

Requires: 5 Taijutsu

After extensive practice and training the character has gained equal strength and skill between their two hands. This allows them to perform any action with either hand at exactly the same skill level and strength.

[b]*Skillful Wield[/b]

D-Ranked Taijutsu

Prerequisite: 3 wit

With a solid foundation of knowledge on their choice of weaponry, those with the Skillful Wield technique are able to utilize their weapon more fully. By knowing the weapon's weakest points, the user is able to avoid presenting these areas to damage during combat, thus making their weapon less likely to break by means of recklessness.
NinpouShow

[b]*Chakra Kai[/b]

E-Ranked Ninjutsu

A jutsu used with the purpose of activating seals and a range of devices and weapons, this technique begins with a single handseal. Once this has been performed, the user will focus a dollop of his/her chakra into what s/he is looking to activate in order to complete the task. Seals activated with this technique must be within 20 yards of the user's position.

[b]*Grouping Chakra Kai[/b]

D-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Chakra Kai

By utilizing the fundamentals of Chakra Kai, this jutsu allows the user to activate multiple seals at a single time rather than needing to cast multiple uses of Chakra Kai. This can only be used on the same seal, meaning the user can't activate three different seals, but s/he can activate up to three of a single seal with this jutsu. This technique's range depends on the type of Chakra Kai used to activate it.

[b]History[/b]

Kiroyi was born to a normal branch of Henrin, with 5 sisters and 6 brothers, all born within a year of each other, with her being the last in line. Growing up with so many other siblings, It was easy to get pushed to the back, like the runt of the litter. This was the case with Kiyori, as she very rarely got a chance to express herself. As such, she developed sort of a monotone voice that showed no emotion, regardless of how she actually felt. Other than that, her upbringing was normal for that of the Henrin; Being trained in her doujutsu, as well as the basics of the Tripod style, in preparation for the acadamy.

During her academy years, Kiyori had little to do with her classmates, though not by choice. She wasn't quite shunned, but her tone did cause a good portion of students to avoid her, calling her "weird" and "depressed". This bothered her alot, as she didn't understand what the problem really was, she seemed normal to herself, even though it had been pointed out to her before. Drama aside though, she was a very skilled student, proving to be one of the smartest and physically skilled students in the academy, as most Henrin were. She discovered her affinity for Doton during the academy, but hasn't really made anything of it yet, as her ninjutsu was a bit lacking. despite this, she graduated the academy at the age of 13.

As Kiyori is fresh out of the academy, she hasn't had the opportunity to make any sort of name for herself. She aims to improve on her Doujutsu, and learn many of Suna's specialties, such as Puppetry and Sand. She longs to find teammates that she can call friends, and a sensei to teach her what it is to be a ninja.

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

						[url=#top]

Author: Post

[b]Username:[/b] [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325/]Tydie[/url]

[b]Points:[/b] 0/0

[b]Coupon:[/b]

[b]Companions:[/b] (0/4)

[b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=4275503/1/#new]Henrin[/url], Kiyori[/b]

["This is my happy face."]

[b]General Information[/b]
[b]Age:[/b] 13

[b]Gender:[/b] Female

[b]Height:[/b] 5'4 feet

[b]Weight:[/b] 110 lbs.

[b]Hair:[/b] Kiyori's short black hair has an off center part, making her hair cover the right side of her face.

[b]Eyes:[/b] Kiroyi's eyes are a solid black when her doujutsu isn't active, the same as all Henrin

[b]Physical Features:[/b] Kiroyi has a very lean frame, with long thin legs and a small waist with a decent backside, as well as a lack of bust at almost B cups. Her skin is a pale white and is completely unblemished, with not a scar on her body. She usually has a very stoic look on her face, as though nothing phases her.

[b]Clothing/Accessories:[/b] During missions or when training, Kiyori wears an outfit tailored to her enviroment. The outfits are always the same design; a half face mask covering her nose to neck, a short sleeved black shirt with long sleeve mesh armor underneath, fingerless gloves, Tight mid thigh shorts with mesh armor from mid thigh to ankle, a belt with two shuriken holsters on the front, a ninja pouch attached to the right hip and right thigh, and Ninja sandles. Her current outfit colors are tan desert camo and pure black night camo. When not on misions, Kiyori's outfits are usually short sleeved tops and short shorts with sandles to mitigate the desert heat.

[b]Forehead Protector:[/b] Worn on her forehead, though only half is usually visible due to Kiyori's hair.

[b]Personality:[/b] Kiyori's constant emotionless expression leads most people to believe she's depressed or bored, but she feels all the normal things a 13 year old girl feels. She comes off as cold almost all of the time, having a bored, monotone voice in almost everything she says. In truth, Kiroyi is actually really goofy, and has a penchant for sarcasm in the face of stupidity.  Anyone who can get around her standoffish expression can find a loyal friend and ally.

She takes incredible pride in her work, following her missions to the letter whenever possible. She also takes her training very seriously, pouring hours of time into training her mind and body to perfect her abilities.

[b]Picture:[/b] [url=http://s1194.photobucket.com/user/tydie904/media/Kiyori.png.html]Kiyori Henrin[/url]

[b]Battle Information[/b]
[b]Rank:[/b] Genin

[b]Village:[/b] Sunagakure no Sato

[b]Chakra Affinity:[/b] [color=saddlebrown]Doton[/color]

[b]Second Chakra Affinity:[/b]

[b]Stats[/b]
[b]Ninjutsu:[/b] 2
[b]Taijutsu:[/b] 6
[b]Genjutsu:[/b] 1
[b]Stamina:[/b] 3
[b]Control:[/b] 2
[b]Strength:[/b] 2
[b]Speed:[/b] 2
[b]Wit: [/b] 6

[b]Equipment:[/b]

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Sun May 26, 2013 11:56 am

			Sanjuku woke up at 6AM, same as always, and started his daily routine as normal. After eating breakfast, showering, putting on his black sleeveless shirt and green baggy pants, and spiking his hair to the back-right side of his head like normal, he went out the door, and started his workout. Jogging through Suna, the village was starting to wake up, being that the time was around 8 at this point. After jogging to his usual training area, an open area with a bench to sit on and a few training dummies for practicing combat, about 3 miles from his house, he began his strength training, performing push-ups, sit-ups, and a little shadowboxing. the usual stuff. He always kept to his routine as best as possible, good routine sets up for greatness he always told himself.

After finishing his workout, it was time to do his favorite part of his routine: Weapon training. After tying his Kote to his arms, he began to practice his punches, following through and arcing to the opposite side of his body while shifting his weight from one leg to the other in a fluid motion, extending his elbows forward to catch with the blades. He had already worked up quite a sweat, and decided to take a break for a few minutes, wiping off his body with his towel and resting on a nearby bench.

			[i]

Author: Post

Sanjuku woke up at 6AM, same as always, and started his daily routine as normal. After eating breakfast, showering, putting on his black sleeveless shirt and green baggy pants, and spiking his hair to the back-right side of his head like normal, he went out the door, and started his workout. Jogging through Suna, the village was starting to wake up, being that the time was around 8 at this point. After jogging to his usual training area, an open area with a bench to sit on and a few training dummies for practicing combat, about 3 miles from his house, he began his strength training, performing push-ups, sit-ups, and a little shadowboxing. the usual stuff. He always kept to his routine as best as possible, good routine sets up for greatness he always told himself.

After finishing his workout, it was time to do his favorite part of his routine: Weapon training. After tying his Kote to his arms, he began to practice his punches, following through and arcing to the opposite side of his body while shifting his weight from one leg to the other in a fluid motion, extending his elbows forward to catch with the blades. He had already worked up quite a sweat, and decided to take a break for a few minutes, wiping off his body with his towel and resting on a nearby bench.

						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Mon May 27, 2013 5:45 am

			Shigekuni had spent the past few weeks training himself stupid it seemed. When he wasn't pushing his muscles to their limits he was putting his brains threshold for information intake. He had been pouring over books just as much as he had been pounding a punching bag. However he had discovered his bodies threshold for such endeavors and he decided that it was just a little too much at this point to keep going. A break of some kind was necessary, and he wasn't thinking of a small one hour break, oh no. He needed a few days to let his body sooth itself before he took to physical or mental training again.

If anything, he could plan out his next move for how he was gonna find more information. This 'Sage' style he had been hunting information down for was proving to be rather illusive. He was definitely going to need to check the Scribes library and see if they had any information that would shed some light on this style. All he could tell from the information he'd been looking up was that it was old, possibly on the verge of being forgotten to most everyone save the small percentage that still had records of these things or first hand encounters with practitioners.

Shigekuni had been walking as he brainstormed, passing through various parts of the village before he wound up at the training ground. "[color=#95BD4F]Hmmm, must have walked here on instinct. Then again I was heavy in thought, maybe I'm just so used to coming here.[/color]" Shigekuni said to himself as he looked around the training ground and saw only one person here. They were sitting on a bench and looked to be wearing some bizarre gauntlets with blades attached to them.

 "[color=#95BD4F]Why would you have such limited use weapons on your gauntlets? Even if you train yourself to be useful with them, you still leave yourself wide open I'm betting.[/color]" The Genin stated openly to the other youth.

Author: Post

Shigekuni had spent the past few weeks training himself stupid it seemed. When he wasn't pushing his muscles to their limits he was putting his brains threshold for information intake. He had been pouring over books just as much as he had been pounding a punching bag. However he had discovered his bodies threshold for such endeavors and he decided that it was just a little too much at this point to keep going. A break of some kind was necessary, and he wasn't thinking of a small one hour break, oh no. He needed a few days to let his body sooth itself before he took to physical or mental training again.

If anything, he could plan out his next move for how he was gonna find more information. This 'Sage' style he had been hunting information down for was proving to be rather illusive. He was definitely going to need to check the Scribes library and see if they had any information that would shed some light on this style. All he could tell from the information he'd been looking up was that it was old, possibly on the verge of being forgotten to most everyone save the small percentage that still had records of these things or first hand encounters with practitioners.

Shigekuni had been walking as he brainstormed, passing through various parts of the village before he wound up at the training ground. "[color=#95BD4F]Hmmm, must have walked here on instinct. Then again I was heavy in thought, maybe I'm just so used to coming here.[/color]" Shigekuni said to himself as he looked around the training ground and saw only one person here. They were sitting on a bench and looked to be wearing some bizarre gauntlets with blades attached to them.

 "[color=#95BD4F]Why would you have such limited use weapons on your gauntlets? Even if you train yourself to be useful with them, you still leave yourself wide open I'm betting.[/color]" The Genin stated openly to the other youth.

------------------------------------------------------------

			Sanjuku didn't even notice the boy approach him until he started speaking. And after hearing what he had to say, he wasn't too pleased with him being there either. [color=#ee4a2d]"Heh... these weapons were given to my by my father because i wanted something that stands out. Besides, you can't honestly tell me these bad-boys dont look amazing!"[/color] He said as he flourished the blades by taking a battle ready stance. [color=#ee4a2d]"and to answer your question, anything can be used effectively with enough training. its all about style, and i've got plenty of that."[/color] He said taking a seat on the bench again.

He didn't know who this kid was, but from the looks of his outfit he didn't know anything about style. [color=#ee4a2d]"i suppose i could use a bit more ofbreak from the training for a few minutes, why don't you stick around and talk for a bit huh?"[/color] He said, motioning for the kid to take a seat. [color=#ee4a2d]"Names Ouji Sanjuku. what brings you around here anyways? you don't look like you're training or anything."[/color]

Sanjuku didn't even notice the boy approach him until he started speaking. And after hearing what he had to say, he wasn't too pleased with him being there either. [color=#ee4a2d]"Heh... these weapons were given to my by my father because i wanted something that stands out. Besides, you can't honestly tell me these bad-boys dont look amazing!"[/color] He said as he flourished the blades by taking a battle ready stance. [color=#ee4a2d]"and to answer your question, anything can be used effectively with enough training. its all about style, and i've got plenty of that."[/color] He said taking a seat on the bench again.

He didn't know who this kid was, but from the looks of his outfit he didn't know anything about style. [color=#ee4a2d]"i suppose i could use a bit more ofbreak from the training for a few minutes, why don't you stick around and talk for a bit huh?"[/color] He said, motioning for the kid to take a seat. [color=#ee4a2d]"Names Ouji Sanjuku. what brings you around here anyways? you don't look like you're training or anything."[/color]

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Mon May 27, 2013 12:04 pm

			The boy before him must have favored fashion over function, he seemed obsessed with looks more than how functional something was. As he struck a battle stance, Shigekuni could already point out at least three flaws in his posture, if anything he had the eagerness a typical genin possessed but he didn't seem to be that experienced with real combat. Obviously he was a nitwit.

"[color=#95BD4F]I'll stand, I've been sitting for quite a while lately.[/color]" Shigekuni replied to the offer to sit, yet he didn't make any move to leave yet. He was here, he may as well converse with this Ouji Sanjuku person. "[color=#95BD4F]If I was training, I'd be wearing the same clothing I do now. If anything I might remove my jacket in order to keep from over heating. But training wasn't my goal today, I'm taking a hiatus from all physical and mental training.[/color]" He didn't bother mentioning the Sage Style he was researching, he would have preferred to kept that close to the vest for now.

"[color=#95BD4F]Also you realize your stance is sloppy, right?[/color]" Shigekuni added casually like it was so simple to bring up that the way one has been practicing their combat style for years is still flawed.

Obviously he was a nitwit.

But training wasn't my goal today, I'm taking a hiatus from all physical and mental training.[/color]" He didn't bother mentioning the Sage Style he was researching, he would have preferred to kept that close to the vest for now.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Mon May 27, 2013 2:55 pm

			[color=#ee4a2d]"Alright, suit yourself then stiffy."[/color] Sanjuku wasn't sure how he felt about this Genin. He obviously had a sense of skill, but he also seemed to be too sure of himself. Then again, who was he to talk? He was totally prideful and he knew it, but he hadn't talked to someone like this before, something about him seemed... weird. like he wasn't afraid of what Sanjuku might say or do in response to his smartass's remarks.

Sanjuku was also completely taken aback by this Genin's forwardness. To openly insult the way he fought was infuriating, but he kept his cool for the time being. He sounded incredibly defensive when he spoke.[color=#ee4a2d]" It's a work in progress. And pray tell, how would YOU know my fighting style is sloppy?"[/color] Sanjuku wasn't thrilled with this kids attitude, but he sensed a certainty in him that he envied. He stood from the bench, brandished his weapons once more, and went at a nearby training dummy, punching and slashing right to left, beating the dummy to a pulp. [color=#ee4a2d]"Why don't you tell me what i did wrong then, if your so smart."[/color] Sanjuku retorted.

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

[color=#ee4a2d]"Alright, suit yourself then stiffy."[/color] Sanjuku wasn't sure how he felt about this Genin. He obviously had a sense of skill, but he also seemed to be too sure of himself. Then again, who was he to talk? He was totally prideful and he knew it, but he hadn't talked to someone like this before, something about him seemed... weird. like he wasn't afraid of what Sanjuku might say or do in response to his smartass's remarks.

Sanjuku was also completely taken aback by this Genin's forwardness. To openly insult the way he fought was infuriating, but he kept his cool for the time being. He sounded incredibly defensive when he spoke.[color=#ee4a2d]" It's a work in progress. And pray tell, how would YOU know my fighting style is sloppy?"[/color] Sanjuku wasn't thrilled with this kids attitude, but he sensed a certainty in him that he envied. He stood from the bench, brandished his weapons once more, and went at a nearby training dummy, punching and slashing right to left, beating the dummy to a pulp. [color=#ee4a2d]"Why don't you tell me what i did wrong then, if your so smart."[/color] Sanjuku retorted.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Sat Jun 01, 2013 8:45 am

			Shigekuni motioned toward the practice ground "[color=#95BD4F]Take a stance and strike at the target. When you hit it, hold that position and I'll point out where you are lacking.[/color]" Shigekuni was practically an expert on pointing out sloppy strikes and stances thanks to his parents. They often helped him learn about his the hard way. While he was grateful for it, back then it left him a bit sore when they smacked a switch against his ribs to point out the opening in his attacks.

"[color=#95BD4F]Why bladed gauntlets? Why not Tekagi-Shuko or Tonfa? They're just as under utilized but they provide greater diversity then those things.[/color]" Shigekuni asked as he examined the other genin's weapons. To him, they just seemed so flawed and unreliable it seemed. There were a plethora of other weapons that could be used to fight in far more effective ways. When it came down to it, Shigekuni just felt that the use of those gauntlets just irked him a little.

Shigekuni motioned toward the practice ground "[color=#95BD4F]Take a stance and strike at the target. When you hit it, hold that position and I'll point out where you are lacking.[/color]" Shigekuni was practically an expert on pointing out sloppy strikes and stances thanks to his parents. They often helped him learn about his the hard way. While he was grateful for it, back then it left him a bit sore when they smacked a switch against his ribs to point out the opening in his attacks.

"[color=#95BD4F]Why bladed gauntlets? Why not Tekagi-Shuko or Tonfa? They're just as under utilized but they provide greater diversity then those things.[/color]" Shigekuni asked as he examined the other genin's weapons. To him, they just seemed so flawed and unreliable it seemed. There were a plethora of other weapons that could be used to fight in far more effective ways. When it came down to it, Shigekuni just felt that the use of those gauntlets just irked him a little.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Thu Aug 01, 2013 9:59 am

			[color=#ee4a2d]"Hmph, suit yourself, i'll humor you I guess."[/color] He wasn't particularly thrilled with this boy pointing out his flaws, but deep down he knew he wasn't exactly an expert fighter. He had a lot left to learn, and an entire fighting style to develop, so while he was too proud to say it, he could use the help. He attacked the dummy again, punching with his right arm, then continuing the motion to slash with the blade, then while switching momentum punched with the left arm going across and slicing with the blade as he switched back over to his starting stance. He repeated this movement a few times, slowly gliding through it, so as to let the boy examine his stance.

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

Author: Post

[color=#ee4a2d]"Hmph, suit yourself, i'll humor you I guess."[/color] He wasn't particularly thrilled with this boy pointing out his flaws, but deep down he knew he wasn't exactly an expert fighter. He had a lot left to learn, and an entire fighting style to develop, so while he was too proud to say it, he could use the help. He attacked the dummy again, punching with his right arm, then continuing the motion to slash with the blade, then while switching momentum punched with the left arm going across and slicing with the blade as he switched back over to his starting stance. He repeated this movement a few times, slowly gliding through it, so as to let the boy examine his stance.
