=== THREAD: [Accepted]Kazuki, Ryoga - Naruto Saigen Roleplay ===
Forum: Home Board index General Section Member Section Old Forum Archives and Discussion Archives Finished Applications > Home Board index

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: (unknown)

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/][/url]
				Naruto Saigen Roleplay
				Naruto Saigen RP is a text-based roleplay forum set in an alternate universe of the Naruto series.
				[url=#start_here]Skip to content[/url]

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: 

[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325][i][/url]
								[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url]

		[b]Posts:[/b] [url=./search.php?author_id=1869325&sr=posts]7571[/url]		[b]Joined:[/b] Sat Apr 27, 2013 6:00 pm

											[b]Location:[/b] Moline, IL
												[b]Grading Tier:[/b] Seinen

				[b]Contact:[/b]

					[url=#]
						PM
					[/url]

																	[url=./ucp.php?i=pm&mode=compose&action=quotepost&p=1549810]
										Send private message
									[/url]

						[url=#p1549810][Accepted]Kazuki, Ryoga[/url]

									[url=./viewtopic.php?p=1549810#p1549810]
						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Tue Jun 11, 2013 12:27 pm

			[b]Username:[/b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325/]TyDie[/url]

[b]Points:[/b] 0/0

[b]Coupon:[/b]

[b]Companions:[/b] (0/4)

[b] Kazuki, Ryoga[/b]

The Sanguine Stalker

["They should feel privileged...in their last moments, they bleed at my feet." ]

[b]General Information[/b]
[b]Age:[/b] 28

[b]Gender:[/b] Male

[b]Height:[/b] 5’11 feet

[b]Weight:[/b] 150 pounds

[b]Hair:[/b] Ryoga’s hair is about mid back in length, an orange-red in color, and usually kept tied in a ponytail about 14 inches long. The bangs flow straight down, though not long enough to obscure his vision, only coming to about mid brow.

[b]Eyes:[/b] His eyes are a grayish blue in color, appearing very serious and sharp.

[b]Physical Features:[/b] Ryoga is a slender, toned man, showing some decent muscle growth while retaining a slim physique. He bears scars all over his body, all from fights and training exercises. His most specific scar is a claw mark going across his chest, given to him by his Toukai rival. He almost always has a straight face, even during combat, and his gaze is enough to strike fear into those who know him.

[b]Clothing/Accessories:[/b] Ryoga wears a standard Kiri sleeveless top and long pants, both black in color. Overtop of this, he wears a kimono outfit, the top being blue while the bottom is white. He wears standard ninja sandals for footwear, and his belt is a simple white cloth tied around his waist, with his sword sheath holstered on it.

[b]Forehead Protector:[/b] His headband is tied around his left bicep, on display.

[b]Personality:[/b] Ryoga is a man that believes power is everything. If you lack it, you are worthless, not even worth the effort of swinging his blade. He is incredibly loyal to the ideology of Kirigakure, believing that the weak should be disposed of, leaving the strong to lead. On the opposite side, anyone who proves to have power, regardless of their specialty, has Ryoga’s respect. If he hasn't met the person before, he gives them some time to prove themselves. If they fail, they don’t get a second thought.

As far as personal interest goes, Ryoga spends his time hunting ninja whenever possible. He trains every single day, for hours if he has the time to. He has little interest in romance, though he has found one or two women that he had “feelings” for. As far as friendship goes, he isn’t exactly “close” to anyone, though he is somewhat friendly to a few people, and he can work with others should the need arise. Ryoga treats everything seriously, almost oblivious to sarcasm or jokes. His seriousness, combined with his mentality, makes him an iconic display of Kirigakure’s might.

[b]Picture:[/b]

[b]Battle Information[/b]
[b]Rank:[/b] Jounin

[b]Village:[/b] Kirigakure no Sato

[b]Chakra Affinity:[/b] [color=dodgerblue]Suiton[/color]

[b]Second Chakra Affinity:[/b] [color=dodgerblue]Suiton[/color]

[b]Stats[/b]
[b]Ninjutsu:[/b] 8
[b]Taijutsu:[/b] 8
[b]Genjutsu:[/b] 5
[b]Stamina:[/b] 7
[b]Control:[/b] 8
[b]Strength:[/b] 5
[b]Speed:[/b] 8
[b]Wit: [/b] 7

[b]Equipment:[/b]

Ryoga carries a specially crafted Katana with him on his left hip. The blade is about 24 inches in length, while the hilt is 12 inches long, making the weapon 3 feet altogether. Right above the hilt, on the back end of the blade, is a sharpened edge for Ryoga to slit his finger on, allowing his blood to flow into small crevices laced throughout the weapon’s blade. This is for allowing his blood to enter an opponent’s bloodstream, to use specific Chiton techniques afterwards.

[b]Combat Style:[/b] Ryoga uses his sword as a means of infecting his enemies body with his blood, then utilizing Chiton jutsu to use it as an internal weapon. He can just as easily take someones head off with his sword however, as he is an incredible swordsmen. He relies on his speed as a means of closing the gap, as he only has a few ranged options.

[quote]
Iaido:Iaido Kenjutsu is a sword style originating from the Land of Tea that focuses on the fact that when first drawn, the linear motion and force of pulling a katana from its sheath are able to generate unusually fast slashes. Iaido capitalizes on this, it's samurai equally skilled in close range hand-to-hand fighting and then being able to switch to single fast slashes and stabs before returning to previous combat, making them unpredictable fighters.
[/quote]

[b]Jutsu Information[/b]
[b]Abilities:[/b] 2/3

Sensor

Sensors are people that are able to sense chakra and locate it. This can be done in a number of ways, but most often in the form of some sort of environmental empathy with the elements. Masters of these techniques are usually built around support or subterfuge, but usually both. Because the source of a ninja’s power is chakra, those that are able to detect it with any kind of accuracy are able to access tactical options that other ninja are incapable of.

Chiton

By being a master of Suiton and using the secrets of Kirigakure no Sato, the user is able to use the next step of the Suiton element, Chiton. Chiton is the elemental release that is able to manipulate the user's blood for their jutsu, while also enabling them to reproduce that blood at tremendous levels. Users of Chiton can manipulate other people's blood, as long as it's outside of their bodies. Chiton's unique quality is persisting. Unlike other chakra affinities, Chiton techniques can last for a longer duration.

[b]Jutsu:[/b]
SuitonShow [color=dodgerblue][b]*Water Purifier[/b][/color]

D-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Minimum Control Stat of 5

After forming the needed hand seals, the user touches a body of water. Then, the water becomes purified of germs, bacteria, disease and other organic materials. In addition, the water becomes 'pure' which can be used for many different things. However, this does not eliminate foreign chakra from the water. This technique can purify up to five gallons of water per post, and can be used for every point of stamina the user has, meaning that the user may simply purify five gallons in one post, ten gallons in two and so forth. While using this technique, the user must be constantly touching the water and cannot use any other techniques.

[color=dodgerblue][b]*Vision Modifier[/b][/color]

D-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu

Meant as a supplementary technique, the user will use water as a medium to enhance their vision. After performing the needed seals, the user will create a circular shape with their hand. They will then generate chakra to create a film of water that expands in the void created by their hands and will increase the distance one can see comfortably, depending on the user’s control stat. The user is also able to use this as a magnifying lens, in the sense that they are able to adjust the distance to meet their wanted field of vision. This technique lasts for three posts before dissipating.
 Control Stat – 1 to 2 – Able to see distances up to thirty feet as if they were at twenty feet.
 Control Stat – 3 to 4 – Able to see distances up to one hundred feet as if they were at twenty feet.
 Control Stat – 5 to 6 – Able to see distances up to two hundred feet as if they were at twenty feet.
 Control Stat – 7+ – Able to see distances up to five hundred feet as if they were at twenty feet.

[color=dodgerblue][b]*Slippery Catch Technique[/b][/color]

D-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu

After performing a string of seals, the user will coat their body in Suiton chakra. What this technique does is give their whole body a slippery feel to it. This may aid in escaping binds, grappling techniques and may even deflect weak physical blows. This technique lasts for three posts and can only affect the user.

[color=dodgerblue][b]*Water Clone Technique[/b][/color]

C-ranked Suiton Ninjutsu

After performing the required seals, the user will be able to create clones made of water. Unlike a normal clone, the water clone has the ability to interact more with the environment due to it having physical substance. This allows the clone to carry out limited attacks on its target. The range of the clone is limited, only able to travel about fifty meters from the user. The user distributes a sufficient amount of chakra equally amongst their other clones, allowing them to use any C or D-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu the user knows.
Taijutsu – 1
Stamina – 3
Strength – 1
Speed – 3

[color=dodgerblue][b]*Guardian Fountain[/b][/color]

C-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Control Stat of 6

Requiring a slightly above average level of control, this technique generates a large amount of water as a defense mechanism. By performing a string of seals, the user will stomp and create a fountain of water from the ground that flows at a speed of five. The fountain is three meters in diameter and four meters in height. This technique lasts for three posts. All in all, this creates just over eight thousand cubic meters of water.

[color=dodgerblue][b]*Water Prison[/b][/color]

B-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu

By forming a string of seals, the user is able to spew a large ball of water that stands at three meters in diameter. This ball rolls at the target at a speed of seven. Should this strike a target, they will become engulfed within the sphere. However, if this manages to strike multiple targets, it will envelop them as well, up to a total of three prisoners. One can resist being pulled into the ball if they have a strength of seven or higher. The ball will roll thirty meters, regardless of whether or not anyone has been captured. Once inside, the targets will spin with the sphere and may cause dizziness, nausea and disorientation. The technique lasts for a total of five posts, rolling included, before bursting.

Iaido StyleShow *[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Swift Draw[/b][/color]

D-Rank Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: 5 Taijutsu, 4 Speed

With the most widely recognized attack of Iaido style, the user draws their katana at a very quick speed, making a powerful slash in tangent with the draw. This technique is dependent on the user's overall reaction speed as it is usually only used when an opening presents itself or when the user needs to draw their sword quickly.

*[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Quick Sheath[/b][/color]

D-Rank Utility Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: 4 Speed

Through hours of practice the user has learned to quickly sheath their weapon with one hand. This allows the user sheath their weapon as quickly as possible, even if their other hand is not on the sheath.

*[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Block[/b][/color]

D-Rank Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: 4 Speed

A technique developed out of need to protect himself from other weapon users, Block is simple in its use, but highly effective when used right. By partially drawing their sword, the user of this technique is able to use the back of their blade to block incoming weapon attacks should they time it correctly. The user must be careful when using this technique, should the attacker have a high enough strength, this technique could very well shatter the user's weapon.

*[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Reverse Stab[/b][/color]

D-Rank Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: 4 Speed

By gripping their blade, the user draws their sword as if a dagger in an earth facing grip, but instead of attacking a target in front of them they will turn their sword mid-swing in an attempt to stab a target that is behind them.

*[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Double Back Draw[/b][/color]

C-Rank Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: 6 Speed

The technique realizes the concept of a draw's momentum increasing attack speed rather than the technique of drawing itself. With this concept, the user draws their weapon and then makes an upwards slash followed by a second downward slash, and then an immediate re-sheath. This causes two deep diagonal cuts in the direction of the draw and re-sheath that happen near instantaneously.

*[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Beheading Draw[/b][/color]

C-Rank Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: 6 Speed

The user draws their katana with one hand and slams their palm into the back of their blade to increase the force behind the swing made in any direction. This works with blunted side of a sword, but it can also draw out their strength and the blade's cutting power in full to quickly slash apart obstacles. Re-sheathing after this technique may take a bit longer; the placement of the hands following this technqiue make it difficult to resheath properly.

*[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Iai Beheading Draw[/b][/color]

B-Rank Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: [color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Beheading Draw[/b][/color], 8 Speed

With a Variation of the Beheading Draw technique, the user forces a very quick snap of tension and torque through their arm as they draw their sword sending it vertically or across with great speed. With its speed, the strike takes on a blur, many times not even appearing to be drawn from its sheath. Opponents will not see the slash unless they have a Taijutsu or Speed equal to or greater than half of the user's Taijutsu stat. This slash is also incredibly powerful with its speed, able to slice through stone in most cases with enough power.

ChitonShow [b]*[color=#DC143C]Miracle Water[/color][/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed seals, the user will make contact with a body of water up to 10 pints large. After channelling Chiton chakra through the water, the user slowly converts the water into blood of their blood-type to use for other jutsu. In order to achieve the complete effects on a full body of water, the user must channel for a whole post. Smaller amounts require less channelling time, however.

[b]*[color=#DC143C]Bold Clotting[/color][/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed seals, the user will place their hand over an open wound up to five inches wide and two inches deep. After channeling Chiton chakra for a full post, the user will form a superficial blood-clot covering over the wound to prevent further bloodflow from it. While this cover doesn't completely heal the wound, it allows the target's body to recover from the wound naturally without agitation.

[b]*[color=#DC143C]Venipuncture[/color][/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed seals, the user will channel Chiton chakra into a subdued or willing body. As long as the target doesn't struggle, the user can draw up to a pint of blood from the target. This technique works best on[ recently deceased corpses as the user can draw out blood repeatedly from them to fuel their jutsu.

[b][color=#DC143C]Infection[/color][/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After Ryoga makes contact with his sword on anyones bare flesh, performing a quick one handed seal ensures that the blood on his sword enters his opponents body. this jutsu causes any of his blood on his sword or on his opponents body to enter his opponents bloodstream by means of open wounds on their body. If the opponents has no open wounds, this jutsu has no effect.

[b][color=#DC143C]Blood Fountain[/color][/b]

D-rank Ninjutsu

Prerequisites: [color=dodgerblue]*Guardian Fountain[/color][/b], Control stat of 8

After creating the Guardian Fountain, Ryoga adds a few additional handseals and puts his palms to the ground near the fountain, channeling Chiton chakra into the stream. One post later, the fountain changes from a stream of water to a stream of blood matching Ryoga's bloodtype. The fountain is only 2 feet tall, and flows a bit slower then the Guardian Fountain, therefore producing only about 4000 cubic meters of blood. The blood will completely vanish from the field after 10 posts.

[b]*[color=#DC143C]Plasmic Transfusion[/color][/b]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed seals, the user will channel Chiton chakra into a quantity of blood, converting its bloodtype to match that of the user's target. If the target is subdued or willing, the user can then perform a blood transfusion, replacing the target's lost blood with the quantity of blood collected. This technique is capable of both changing the blood type, and transfusing the blood.

[b]*[color=#DC143C]Red Cell Multiplication[/color][/b]

B-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed seals, the user will channel Chiton chakra into their own body or into the body of a willing or subdued target. After the chakra has been channeled, as long as the user or target avoids strenuous movement, the amount of blood cells in their body will regenerate 3 gallons of blood every post for a duration of four posts. If the user engages in strenuous activity, however, then they will regenerate only 1 gallon of blood instead. The technique will not end once the user returns to their maximum amount of blood, but rather simply stop multiplication until further replacement is needed or the duration of the jutsu ends.

Empathy JutsuShow [color=#DC143C]Blood Trail [/color]

C-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Control 6

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels chiton chakra into at least a pint of someone's blood, and attempts to locate the target at a speed equal to the user's control. If the target is within 30 yards of the user, the user can sense the direction, distance and location of the targets blood.

[color=#DC143C]Feel the Pulse[/color]

C-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Control 6

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels their chakra into the surrounding area, travelling at a speed equal to the user's control, up to 30 yards away. This allows the user to sense nearby blood pulses. At this level, it doesn't allow for pinpoint movements, but it does allow for the user to sense direction and distance.

[color=#DC143C]Singled Out[/color]

C-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Feel the Pulse, control 6

After sensing someone through Feel the Pulse and adding a few additional hand seals, the user can focus in on a specific person's blood signature. The user hones in on this specific signature if it is within a 30 yard range, and begins to track it down.

[color=#DC143C]Blood Scent[/color]

B-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Control 8, Blood Trail

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels chiton chakra into at least a pint of someone's blood, and attempts to locate the target at a speed equal to the user's control. If the target is within 60 yards of the user, the user can sense the direction, distance, and location of the target's blood.

[color=#DC143C]Hemopulse[/color]

B-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Feel the Pulse, Control 8

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels their chakra into the surrounding area, travelling at a speed equal to the user's control, up to 60 yards away. This allows the user to sense nearby blood pulses. At this level, it doesn't allow for pinpoint movements, but it does allow for the user to sense direction and distance.

[b]History[/b]

Ryoga was born as an only child on a moonlit night in Kirigakure. Both of his parents were incredible Jounin, his mother a master of Iijutsu and his father an expert of Iaido style. Ryoga was raised in an odd way compared to most, there was no affection between him and his parents, though the boy did respect them and care for them, and his parents loved him greatly. He was raised to be a ninja, being taught the way of Iaido by his father, while not really gathering much from his mother, though he did learn a deal about human anatomy from her. He was enrolled in the academy at the age of 10 by his father.

His academy years were the days that Ryoga truly found himself. While his first year wasn’t much outside of rigorous training, after he was put on a team during his second year and the fighting began, he proved to be one of the most adept swordsmen in the academy. Near the end of his second year, he slashed a student’s artery by “accident”, killing the boy within a minute. Ryoga argued it was the students fault for dropping his guard, and he felt no pity for the weak boy. The teachers looked oddly at this, though he was not penalized for it. He also discovered his affinity for Suiton jutsu during his academy years, proving to be decent with basic Suiton techniques. During the last half of his final year, he was always supervised while fighting or training to prevent any more deaths. He graduated at the top of his class with most of his class’s respect and fear.

As a genin, Ryoga began truly learning the Iaido techniques his father learned as a kid. He also learned Suiton techniques from his mother. His partner during his genin days, a Toukai, proved to be an equal match for him in skill, and gave him some of his first real scars during their sparring matches. This would be the first person Ryoga really respected as an equal rival. His ability with Ninjutsu and his speed with a blade would compete against his claws and chakra vent speed almost everyday, each one learning from the other through their spars and occasional training. On missions, they were very competitive, each one using every advantage they could get on the other to do the job the best. When he turned 17, Ryoga and his rival entered the chuunin exams together, and their familiarity with each other and incredible speed ended up catching the chuunin off guard, bringing him to his knees within a few minutes. They graduated to chuunin rank, and talked very little afterwards, having gained everything they needed from each other.

Ryoga’s chuunin years were some of his favorite times. He began to come into his own with the Kenjutsu he learned from his father, his speed proving to be his greatest strength. He also began his research into the art of chiton jutsu. The idea of using blood fascinated Ryoga, using someone’s lifesource as a weapon was an incredible power, and he wanted it. So after much practice, research, and training, he managed to teach himself some basic chiton techniques by the age of 19. It felt incredible to be able to manifest his blood in such ways, and he became almost obsessed with blood. His missions normally had messy results if they involved combat, as he normally slashed his victims throat or midsection in a few swipes. He realized the potential of using someone’s blood as a tracking source, and at the age of 22 Ranked to a Special Jounin who specialized in Tracking and Execution.

As a Special Jounin, Ryoga took every opportunity he could to hunt Missing Ninja of Kiri. He felt that their continued presence was a blemish on Kiri’s image, and that he was doing Kirigakure a service by hunting the runaway dogs of the village. Because of his methods of Chiton empathy sensing and blood tracking, He earned the title “Sanguine Stalker”. When he was 24 years old, he had his custom made Katana forged, with Grooves in the blade and a sharpened edge near the hilt, where the thumb rests. Ryoga would begin crafting ways to use his blood as a catalyst in his opponents body, using his sword as a method of transfer. Ryoga decided to rank up to jounin at the age of 25, after garnering a rack of 10 Missing Ninja kills.

When he became a Jounin, the idea to join the Seven Swordsmen of the Mist dawned on him. They were truly on his level, and he could be considered their equal with a bit more training. He began hammering into his Kenjutsu training, taking it to all new heights, and training for hours a day everyday if possible. His only aim at this point is training and proving himself to Kiri so that he might be recognized by the Seven Swordsmen as a brother.

			[i]

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Tue Jun 11, 2013 12:27 pm

			[b]Username:[/b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325/]TyDie[/url]

[b]Points:[/b] 0/0

[b]Coupon:[/b]

[b]Companions:[/b] (0/4)

[b] Kazuki, Ryoga[/b]

The Sanguine Stalker

["They should feel privileged...in their last moments, they bleed at my feet." ]

[b]General Information[/b]
[b]Age:[/b] 28

[b]Gender:[/b] Male

[b]Height:[/b] 5’11 feet

[b]Weight:[/b] 150 pounds

[b]Hair:[/b] Ryoga’s hair is about mid back in length, an orange-red in color, and usually kept tied in a ponytail about 14 inches long. The bangs flow straight down, though not long enough to obscure his vision, only coming to about mid brow.

[b]Eyes:[/b] His eyes are a grayish blue in color, appearing very serious and sharp.

[b]Physical Features:[/b] Ryoga is a slender, toned man, showing some decent muscle growth while retaining a slim physique. He bears scars all over his body, all from fights and training exercises. His most specific scar is a claw mark going across his chest, given to him by his Toukai rival. He almost always has a straight face, even during combat, and his gaze is enough to strike fear into those who know him.

[b]Clothing/Accessories:[/b] Ryoga wears a standard Kiri sleeveless top and long pants, both black in color. Overtop of this, he wears a kimono outfit, the top being blue while the bottom is white. He wears standard ninja sandals for footwear, and his belt is a simple white cloth tied around his waist, with his sword sheath holstered on it.

[b]Forehead Protector:[/b] His headband is tied around his left bicep, on display.

[b]Personality:[/b] Ryoga is a man that believes power is everything. If you lack it, you are worthless, not even worth the effort of swinging his blade. He is incredibly loyal to the ideology of Kirigakure, believing that the weak should be disposed of, leaving the strong to lead. On the opposite side, anyone who proves to have power, regardless of their specialty, has Ryoga’s respect. If he hasn't met the person before, he gives them some time to prove themselves. If they fail, they don’t get a second thought.

As far as personal interest goes, Ryoga spends his time hunting ninja whenever possible. He trains every single day, for hours if he has the time to. He has little interest in romance, though he has found one or two women that he had “feelings” for. As far as friendship goes, he isn’t exactly “close” to anyone, though he is somewhat friendly to a few people, and he can work with others should the need arise. Ryoga treats everything seriously, almost oblivious to sarcasm or jokes. His seriousness, combined with his mentality, makes him an iconic display of Kirigakure’s might.

[b]Picture:[/b]

[b]Battle Information[/b]
[b]Rank:[/b] Jounin

[b]Village:[/b] Kirigakure no Sato

[b]Chakra Affinity:[/b] [color=dodgerblue]Suiton[/color]

[b]Second Chakra Affinity:[/b] [color=dodgerblue]Suiton[/color]

[b]Stats[/b]
[b]Ninjutsu:[/b] 8
[b]Taijutsu:[/b] 8
[b]Genjutsu:[/b] 5
[b]Stamina:[/b] 7
[b]Control:[/b] 8
[b]Strength:[/b] 5
[b]Speed:[/b] 8
[b]Wit: [/b] 7

[b]Equipment:[/b]

Ryoga carries a specially crafted Katana with him on his left hip. The blade is about 24 inches in length, while the hilt is 12 inches long, making the weapon 3 feet altogether. Right above the hilt, on the back end of the blade, is a sharpened edge for Ryoga to slit his finger on, allowing his blood to flow into small crevices laced throughout the weapon’s blade. This is for allowing his blood to enter an opponent’s bloodstream, to use specific Chiton techniques afterwards.

[b]Combat Style:[/b] Ryoga uses his sword as a means of infecting his enemies body with his blood, then utilizing Chiton jutsu to use it as an internal weapon. He can just as easily take someones head off with his sword however, as he is an incredible swordsmen. He relies on his speed as a means of closing the gap, as he only has a few ranged options.

[quote]
Iaido:Iaido Kenjutsu is a sword style originating from the Land of Tea that focuses on the fact that when first drawn, the linear motion and force of pulling a katana from its sheath are able to generate unusually fast slashes. Iaido capitalizes on this, it's samurai equally skilled in close range hand-to-hand fighting and then being able to switch to single fast slashes and stabs before returning to previous combat, making them unpredictable fighters.
[/quote]

[b]Jutsu Information[/b]
[b]Abilities:[/b] 2/3

Sensor

Sensors are people that are able to sense chakra and locate it. This can be done in a number of ways, but most often in the form of some sort of environmental empathy with the elements. Masters of these techniques are usually built around support or subterfuge, but usually both. Because the source of a ninja’s power is chakra, those that are able to detect it with any kind of accuracy are able to access tactical options that other ninja are incapable of.

Chiton

By being a master of Suiton and using the secrets of Kirigakure no Sato, the user is able to use the next step of the Suiton element, Chiton. Chiton is the elemental release that is able to manipulate the user's blood for their jutsu, while also enabling them to reproduce that blood at tremendous levels. Users of Chiton can manipulate other people's blood, as long as it's outside of their bodies. Chiton's unique quality is persisting. Unlike other chakra affinities, Chiton techniques can last for a longer duration.

[b]Jutsu:[/b]
SuitonShow [color=dodgerblue][b]*Water Purifier[/b][/color]

D-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Minimum Control Stat of 5

After forming the needed hand seals, the user touches a body of water. Then, the water becomes purified of germs, bacteria, disease and other organic materials. In addition, the water becomes 'pure' which can be used for many different things. However, this does not eliminate foreign chakra from the water. This technique can purify up to five gallons of water per post, and can be used for every point of stamina the user has, meaning that the user may simply purify five gallons in one post, ten gallons in two and so forth. While using this technique, the user must be constantly touching the water and cannot use any other techniques.

[color=dodgerblue][b]*Vision Modifier[/b][/color]

D-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu

Meant as a supplementary technique, the user will use water as a medium to enhance their vision. After performing the needed seals, the user will create a circular shape with their hand. They will then generate chakra to create a film of water that expands in the void created by their hands and will increase the distance one can see comfortably, depending on the user’s control stat. The user is also able to use this as a magnifying lens, in the sense that they are able to adjust the distance to meet their wanted field of vision. This technique lasts for three posts before dissipating.
 Control Stat – 1 to 2 – Able to see distances up to thirty feet as if they were at twenty feet.
 Control Stat – 3 to 4 – Able to see distances up to one hundred feet as if they were at twenty feet.
 Control Stat – 5 to 6 – Able to see distances up to two hundred feet as if they were at twenty feet.
 Control Stat – 7+ – Able to see distances up to five hundred feet as if they were at twenty feet.

[color=dodgerblue][b]*Slippery Catch Technique[/b][/color]

D-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu

After performing a string of seals, the user will coat their body in Suiton chakra. What this technique does is give their whole body a slippery feel to it. This may aid in escaping binds, grappling techniques and may even deflect weak physical blows. This technique lasts for three posts and can only affect the user.

[color=dodgerblue][b]*Water Clone Technique[/b][/color]

C-ranked Suiton Ninjutsu

After performing the required seals, the user will be able to create clones made of water. Unlike a normal clone, the water clone has the ability to interact more with the environment due to it having physical substance. This allows the clone to carry out limited attacks on its target. The range of the clone is limited, only able to travel about fifty meters from the user. The user distributes a sufficient amount of chakra equally amongst their other clones, allowing them to use any C or D-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu the user knows.
Taijutsu – 1
Stamina – 3
Strength – 1
Speed – 3

[color=dodgerblue][b]*Guardian Fountain[/b][/color]

C-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Control Stat of 6

Requiring a slightly above average level of control, this technique generates a large amount of water as a defense mechanism. By performing a string of seals, the user will stomp and create a fountain of water from the ground that flows at a speed of five. The fountain is three meters in diameter and four meters in height. This technique lasts for three posts. All in all, this creates just over eight thousand cubic meters of water.

[color=dodgerblue][b]*Water Prison[/b][/color]

B-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu

By forming a string of seals, the user is able to spew a large ball of water that stands at three meters in diameter. This ball rolls at the target at a speed of seven. Should this strike a target, they will become engulfed within the sphere. However, if this manages to strike multiple targets, it will envelop them as well, up to a total of three prisoners. One can resist being pulled into the ball if they have a strength of seven or higher. The ball will roll thirty meters, regardless of whether or not anyone has been captured. Once inside, the targets will spin with the sphere and may cause dizziness, nausea and disorientation. The technique lasts for a total of five posts, rolling included, before bursting.

Iaido StyleShow *[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Swift Draw[/b][/color]

D-Rank Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: 5 Taijutsu, 4 Speed

With the most widely recognized attack of Iaido style, the user draws their katana at a very quick speed, making a powerful slash in tangent with the draw. This technique is dependent on the user's overall reaction speed as it is usually only used when an opening presents itself or when the user needs to draw their sword quickly.

*[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Quick Sheath[/b][/color]

D-Rank Utility Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: 4 Speed

Through hours of practice the user has learned to quickly sheath their weapon with one hand. This allows the user sheath their weapon as quickly as possible, even if their other hand is not on the sheath.

*[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Block[/b][/color]

D-Rank Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: 4 Speed

A technique developed out of need to protect himself from other weapon users, Block is simple in its use, but highly effective when used right. By partially drawing their sword, the user of this technique is able to use the back of their blade to block incoming weapon attacks should they time it correctly. The user must be careful when using this technique, should the attacker have a high enough strength, this technique could very well shatter the user's weapon.

*[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Reverse Stab[/b][/color]

D-Rank Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: 4 Speed

By gripping their blade, the user draws their sword as if a dagger in an earth facing grip, but instead of attacking a target in front of them they will turn their sword mid-swing in an attempt to stab a target that is behind them.

*[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Double Back Draw[/b][/color]

C-Rank Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: 6 Speed

The technique realizes the concept of a draw's momentum increasing attack speed rather than the technique of drawing itself. With this concept, the user draws their weapon and then makes an upwards slash followed by a second downward slash, and then an immediate re-sheath. This causes two deep diagonal cuts in the direction of the draw and re-sheath that happen near instantaneously.

*[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Beheading Draw[/b][/color]

C-Rank Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: 6 Speed

The user draws their katana with one hand and slams their palm into the back of their blade to increase the force behind the swing made in any direction. This works with blunted side of a sword, but it can also draw out their strength and the blade's cutting power in full to quickly slash apart obstacles. Re-sheathing after this technique may take a bit longer; the placement of the hands following this technqiue make it difficult to resheath properly.

*[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Iai Beheading Draw[/b][/color]

B-Rank Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: [color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Beheading Draw[/b][/color], 8 Speed

With a Variation of the Beheading Draw technique, the user forces a very quick snap of tension and torque through their arm as they draw their sword sending it vertically or across with great speed. With its speed, the strike takes on a blur, many times not even appearing to be drawn from its sheath. Opponents will not see the slash unless they have a Taijutsu or Speed equal to or greater than half of the user's Taijutsu stat. This slash is also incredibly powerful with its speed, able to slice through stone in most cases with enough power.

ChitonShow [b]*[color=#DC143C]Miracle Water[/color][/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed seals, the user will make contact with a body of water up to 10 pints large. After channelling Chiton chakra through the water, the user slowly converts the water into blood of their blood-type to use for other jutsu. In order to achieve the complete effects on a full body of water, the user must channel for a whole post. Smaller amounts require less channelling time, however.

[b]*[color=#DC143C]Bold Clotting[/color][/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed seals, the user will place their hand over an open wound up to five inches wide and two inches deep. After channeling Chiton chakra for a full post, the user will form a superficial blood-clot covering over the wound to prevent further bloodflow from it. While this cover doesn't completely heal the wound, it allows the target's body to recover from the wound naturally without agitation.

[b]*[color=#DC143C]Venipuncture[/color][/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed seals, the user will channel Chiton chakra into a subdued or willing body. As long as the target doesn't struggle, the user can draw up to a pint of blood from the target. This technique works best on[ recently deceased corpses as the user can draw out blood repeatedly from them to fuel their jutsu.

[b][color=#DC143C]Infection[/color][/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After Ryoga makes contact with his sword on anyones bare flesh, performing a quick one handed seal ensures that the blood on his sword enters his opponents body. this jutsu causes any of his blood on his sword or on his opponents body to enter his opponents bloodstream by means of open wounds on their body. If the opponents has no open wounds, this jutsu has no effect.

[b][color=#DC143C]Blood Fountain[/color][/b]

D-rank Ninjutsu

Prerequisites: [color=dodgerblue]*Guardian Fountain[/color][/b], Control stat of 8

After creating the Guardian Fountain, Ryoga adds a few additional handseals and puts his palms to the ground near the fountain, channeling Chiton chakra into the stream. One post later, the fountain changes from a stream of water to a stream of blood matching Ryoga's bloodtype. The fountain is only 2 feet tall, and flows a bit slower then the Guardian Fountain, therefore producing only about 4000 cubic meters of blood. The blood will completely vanish from the field after 10 posts.

[b]*[color=#DC143C]Plasmic Transfusion[/color][/b]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed seals, the user will channel Chiton chakra into a quantity of blood, converting its bloodtype to match that of the user's target. If the target is subdued or willing, the user can then perform a blood transfusion, replacing the target's lost blood with the quantity of blood collected. This technique is capable of both changing the blood type, and transfusing the blood.

[b]*[color=#DC143C]Red Cell Multiplication[/color][/b]

B-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed seals, the user will channel Chiton chakra into their own body or into the body of a willing or subdued target. After the chakra has been channeled, as long as the user or target avoids strenuous movement, the amount of blood cells in their body will regenerate 3 gallons of blood every post for a duration of four posts. If the user engages in strenuous activity, however, then they will regenerate only 1 gallon of blood instead. The technique will not end once the user returns to their maximum amount of blood, but rather simply stop multiplication until further replacement is needed or the duration of the jutsu ends.

Empathy JutsuShow [color=#DC143C]Blood Trail [/color]

C-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Control 6

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels chiton chakra into at least a pint of someone's blood, and attempts to locate the target at a speed equal to the user's control. If the target is within 30 yards of the user, the user can sense the direction, distance and location of the targets blood.

[color=#DC143C]Feel the Pulse[/color]

C-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Control 6

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels their chakra into the surrounding area, travelling at a speed equal to the user's control, up to 30 yards away. This allows the user to sense nearby blood pulses. At this level, it doesn't allow for pinpoint movements, but it does allow for the user to sense direction and distance.

[color=#DC143C]Singled Out[/color]

C-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Feel the Pulse, control 6

After sensing someone through Feel the Pulse and adding a few additional hand seals, the user can focus in on a specific person's blood signature. The user hones in on this specific signature if it is within a 30 yard range, and begins to track it down.

[color=#DC143C]Blood Scent[/color]

B-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Control 8, Blood Trail

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels chiton chakra into at least a pint of someone's blood, and attempts to locate the target at a speed equal to the user's control. If the target is within 60 yards of the user, the user can sense the direction, distance, and location of the target's blood.

[color=#DC143C]Hemopulse[/color]

B-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Feel the Pulse, Control 8

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels their chakra into the surrounding area, travelling at a speed equal to the user's control, up to 60 yards away. This allows the user to sense nearby blood pulses. At this level, it doesn't allow for pinpoint movements, but it does allow for the user to sense direction and distance.

[b]History[/b]

Ryoga was born as an only child on a moonlit night in Kirigakure. Both of his parents were incredible Jounin, his mother a master of Iijutsu and his father an expert of Iaido style. Ryoga was raised in an odd way compared to most, there was no affection between him and his parents, though the boy did respect them and care for them, and his parents loved him greatly. He was raised to be a ninja, being taught the way of Iaido by his father, while not really gathering much from his mother, though he did learn a deal about human anatomy from her. He was enrolled in the academy at the age of 10 by his father.

His academy years were the days that Ryoga truly found himself. While his first year wasn’t much outside of rigorous training, after he was put on a team during his second year and the fighting began, he proved to be one of the most adept swordsmen in the academy. Near the end of his second year, he slashed a student’s artery by “accident”, killing the boy within a minute. Ryoga argued it was the students fault for dropping his guard, and he felt no pity for the weak boy. The teachers looked oddly at this, though he was not penalized for it. He also discovered his affinity for Suiton jutsu during his academy years, proving to be decent with basic Suiton techniques. During the last half of his final year, he was always supervised while fighting or training to prevent any more deaths. He graduated at the top of his class with most of his class’s respect and fear.

As a genin, Ryoga began truly learning the Iaido techniques his father learned as a kid. He also learned Suiton techniques from his mother. His partner during his genin days, a Toukai, proved to be an equal match for him in skill, and gave him some of his first real scars during their sparring matches. This would be the first person Ryoga really respected as an equal rival. His ability with Ninjutsu and his speed with a blade would compete against his claws and chakra vent speed almost everyday, each one learning from the other through their spars and occasional training. On missions, they were very competitive, each one using every advantage they could get on the other to do the job the best. When he turned 17, Ryoga and his rival entered the chuunin exams together, and their familiarity with each other and incredible speed ended up catching the chuunin off guard, bringing him to his knees within a few minutes. They graduated to chuunin rank, and talked very little afterwards, having gained everything they needed from each other.

Ryoga’s chuunin years were some of his favorite times. He began to come into his own with the Kenjutsu he learned from his father, his speed proving to be his greatest strength. He also began his research into the art of chiton jutsu. The idea of using blood fascinated Ryoga, using someone’s lifesource as a weapon was an incredible power, and he wanted it. So after much practice, research, and training, he managed to teach himself some basic chiton techniques by the age of 19. It felt incredible to be able to manifest his blood in such ways, and he became almost obsessed with blood. His missions normally had messy results if they involved combat, as he normally slashed his victims throat or midsection in a few swipes. He realized the potential of using someone’s blood as a tracking source, and at the age of 22 Ranked to a Special Jounin who specialized in Tracking and Execution.

As a Special Jounin, Ryoga took every opportunity he could to hunt Missing Ninja of Kiri. He felt that their continued presence was a blemish on Kiri’s image, and that he was doing Kirigakure a service by hunting the runaway dogs of the village. Because of his methods of Chiton empathy sensing and blood tracking, He earned the title “Sanguine Stalker”. When he was 24 years old, he had his custom made Katana forged, with Grooves in the blade and a sharpened edge near the hilt, where the thumb rests. Ryoga would begin crafting ways to use his blood as a catalyst in his opponents body, using his sword as a method of transfer. Ryoga decided to rank up to jounin at the age of 25, after garnering a rack of 10 Missing Ninja kills.

When he became a Jounin, the idea to join the Seven Swordsmen of the Mist dawned on him. They were truly on his level, and he could be considered their equal with a bit more training. He began hammering into his Kenjutsu training, taking it to all new heights, and training for hours a day everyday if possible. His only aim at this point is training and proving himself to Kiri so that he might be recognized by the Seven Swordsmen as a brother.

			[i]

Author: Post

[b]Username:[/b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325/]TyDie[/url]

[b]Points:[/b] 0/0

[b]Coupon:[/b]

[b]Companions:[/b] (0/4)

[b] Kazuki, Ryoga[/b]

The Sanguine Stalker

["They should feel privileged...in their last moments, they bleed at my feet." ]

[b]General Information[/b]
[b]Age:[/b] 28

[b]Gender:[/b] Male

[b]Height:[/b] 5’11 feet

[b]Weight:[/b] 150 pounds

[b]Hair:[/b] Ryoga’s hair is about mid back in length, an orange-red in color, and usually kept tied in a ponytail about 14 inches long. The bangs flow straight down, though not long enough to obscure his vision, only coming to about mid brow.

[b]Eyes:[/b] His eyes are a grayish blue in color, appearing very serious and sharp.

[b]Physical Features:[/b] Ryoga is a slender, toned man, showing some decent muscle growth while retaining a slim physique. He bears scars all over his body, all from fights and training exercises. His most specific scar is a claw mark going across his chest, given to him by his Toukai rival. He almost always has a straight face, even during combat, and his gaze is enough to strike fear into those who know him.

[b]Clothing/Accessories:[/b] Ryoga wears a standard Kiri sleeveless top and long pants, both black in color. Overtop of this, he wears a kimono outfit, the top being blue while the bottom is white. He wears standard ninja sandals for footwear, and his belt is a simple white cloth tied around his waist, with his sword sheath holstered on it.

[b]Forehead Protector:[/b] His headband is tied around his left bicep, on display.

[b]Personality:[/b] Ryoga is a man that believes power is everything. If you lack it, you are worthless, not even worth the effort of swinging his blade. He is incredibly loyal to the ideology of Kirigakure, believing that the weak should be disposed of, leaving the strong to lead. On the opposite side, anyone who proves to have power, regardless of their specialty, has Ryoga’s respect. If he hasn't met the person before, he gives them some time to prove themselves. If they fail, they don’t get a second thought.

As far as personal interest goes, Ryoga spends his time hunting ninja whenever possible. He trains every single day, for hours if he has the time to. He has little interest in romance, though he has found one or two women that he had “feelings” for. As far as friendship goes, he isn’t exactly “close” to anyone, though he is somewhat friendly to a few people, and he can work with others should the need arise. Ryoga treats everything seriously, almost oblivious to sarcasm or jokes. His seriousness, combined with his mentality, makes him an iconic display of Kirigakure’s might.

[b]Picture:[/b]

[b]Battle Information[/b]
[b]Rank:[/b] Jounin

[b]Village:[/b] Kirigakure no Sato

[b]Chakra Affinity:[/b] [color=dodgerblue]Suiton[/color]

[b]Second Chakra Affinity:[/b] [color=dodgerblue]Suiton[/color]

[b]Stats[/b]
[b]Ninjutsu:[/b] 8
[b]Taijutsu:[/b] 8
[b]Genjutsu:[/b] 5
[b]Stamina:[/b] 7
[b]Control:[/b] 8
[b]Strength:[/b] 5
[b]Speed:[/b] 8
[b]Wit: [/b] 7

[b]Equipment:[/b]

Ryoga carries a specially crafted Katana with him on his left hip. The blade is about 24 inches in length, while the hilt is 12 inches long, making the weapon 3 feet altogether. Right above the hilt, on the back end of the blade, is a sharpened edge for Ryoga to slit his finger on, allowing his blood to flow into small crevices laced throughout the weapon’s blade. This is for allowing his blood to enter an opponent’s bloodstream, to use specific Chiton techniques afterwards.

[b]Combat Style:[/b] Ryoga uses his sword as a means of infecting his enemies body with his blood, then utilizing Chiton jutsu to use it as an internal weapon. He can just as easily take someones head off with his sword however, as he is an incredible swordsmen. He relies on his speed as a means of closing the gap, as he only has a few ranged options.

[quote]
Iaido:Iaido Kenjutsu is a sword style originating from the Land of Tea that focuses on the fact that when first drawn, the linear motion and force of pulling a katana from its sheath are able to generate unusually fast slashes. Iaido capitalizes on this, it's samurai equally skilled in close range hand-to-hand fighting and then being able to switch to single fast slashes and stabs before returning to previous combat, making them unpredictable fighters.
[/quote]

[b]Jutsu Information[/b]
[b]Abilities:[/b] 2/3

Sensor

Sensors are people that are able to sense chakra and locate it. This can be done in a number of ways, but most often in the form of some sort of environmental empathy with the elements. Masters of these techniques are usually built around support or subterfuge, but usually both. Because the source of a ninja’s power is chakra, those that are able to detect it with any kind of accuracy are able to access tactical options that other ninja are incapable of.

Chiton

By being a master of Suiton and using the secrets of Kirigakure no Sato, the user is able to use the next step of the Suiton element, Chiton. Chiton is the elemental release that is able to manipulate the user's blood for their jutsu, while also enabling them to reproduce that blood at tremendous levels. Users of Chiton can manipulate other people's blood, as long as it's outside of their bodies. Chiton's unique quality is persisting. Unlike other chakra affinities, Chiton techniques can last for a longer duration.

[b]Jutsu:[/b]
SuitonShow [color=dodgerblue][b]*Water Purifier[/b][/color]

D-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Minimum Control Stat of 5

After forming the needed hand seals, the user touches a body of water. Then, the water becomes purified of germs, bacteria, disease and other organic materials. In addition, the water becomes 'pure' which can be used for many different things. However, this does not eliminate foreign chakra from the water. This technique can purify up to five gallons of water per post, and can be used for every point of stamina the user has, meaning that the user may simply purify five gallons in one post, ten gallons in two and so forth. While using this technique, the user must be constantly touching the water and cannot use any other techniques.

[color=dodgerblue][b]*Vision Modifier[/b][/color]

D-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu

Meant as a supplementary technique, the user will use water as a medium to enhance their vision. After performing the needed seals, the user will create a circular shape with their hand. They will then generate chakra to create a film of water that expands in the void created by their hands and will increase the distance one can see comfortably, depending on the user’s control stat. The user is also able to use this as a magnifying lens, in the sense that they are able to adjust the distance to meet their wanted field of vision. This technique lasts for three posts before dissipating.
 Control Stat – 1 to 2 – Able to see distances up to thirty feet as if they were at twenty feet.
 Control Stat – 3 to 4 – Able to see distances up to one hundred feet as if they were at twenty feet.
 Control Stat – 5 to 6 – Able to see distances up to two hundred feet as if they were at twenty feet.
 Control Stat – 7+ – Able to see distances up to five hundred feet as if they were at twenty feet.

[color=dodgerblue][b]*Slippery Catch Technique[/b][/color]

D-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu

After performing a string of seals, the user will coat their body in Suiton chakra. What this technique does is give their whole body a slippery feel to it. This may aid in escaping binds, grappling techniques and may even deflect weak physical blows. This technique lasts for three posts and can only affect the user.

[color=dodgerblue][b]*Water Clone Technique[/b][/color]

C-ranked Suiton Ninjutsu

After performing the required seals, the user will be able to create clones made of water. Unlike a normal clone, the water clone has the ability to interact more with the environment due to it having physical substance. This allows the clone to carry out limited attacks on its target. The range of the clone is limited, only able to travel about fifty meters from the user. The user distributes a sufficient amount of chakra equally amongst their other clones, allowing them to use any C or D-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu the user knows.
Taijutsu – 1
Stamina – 3
Strength – 1
Speed – 3

[color=dodgerblue][b]*Guardian Fountain[/b][/color]

C-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Control Stat of 6

Requiring a slightly above average level of control, this technique generates a large amount of water as a defense mechanism. By performing a string of seals, the user will stomp and create a fountain of water from the ground that flows at a speed of five. The fountain is three meters in diameter and four meters in height. This technique lasts for three posts. All in all, this creates just over eight thousand cubic meters of water.

[color=dodgerblue][b]*Water Prison[/b][/color]

B-Rank Suiton Ninjutsu

By forming a string of seals, the user is able to spew a large ball of water that stands at three meters in diameter. This ball rolls at the target at a speed of seven. Should this strike a target, they will become engulfed within the sphere. However, if this manages to strike multiple targets, it will envelop them as well, up to a total of three prisoners. One can resist being pulled into the ball if they have a strength of seven or higher. The ball will roll thirty meters, regardless of whether or not anyone has been captured. Once inside, the targets will spin with the sphere and may cause dizziness, nausea and disorientation. The technique lasts for a total of five posts, rolling included, before bursting.

Iaido StyleShow *[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Swift Draw[/b][/color]

D-Rank Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: 5 Taijutsu, 4 Speed

With the most widely recognized attack of Iaido style, the user draws their katana at a very quick speed, making a powerful slash in tangent with the draw. This technique is dependent on the user's overall reaction speed as it is usually only used when an opening presents itself or when the user needs to draw their sword quickly.

*[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Quick Sheath[/b][/color]

D-Rank Utility Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: 4 Speed

Through hours of practice the user has learned to quickly sheath their weapon with one hand. This allows the user sheath their weapon as quickly as possible, even if their other hand is not on the sheath.

*[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Block[/b][/color]

D-Rank Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: 4 Speed

A technique developed out of need to protect himself from other weapon users, Block is simple in its use, but highly effective when used right. By partially drawing their sword, the user of this technique is able to use the back of their blade to block incoming weapon attacks should they time it correctly. The user must be careful when using this technique, should the attacker have a high enough strength, this technique could very well shatter the user's weapon.

*[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Reverse Stab[/b][/color]

D-Rank Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: 4 Speed

By gripping their blade, the user draws their sword as if a dagger in an earth facing grip, but instead of attacking a target in front of them they will turn their sword mid-swing in an attempt to stab a target that is behind them.

*[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Double Back Draw[/b][/color]

C-Rank Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: 6 Speed

The technique realizes the concept of a draw's momentum increasing attack speed rather than the technique of drawing itself. With this concept, the user draws their weapon and then makes an upwards slash followed by a second downward slash, and then an immediate re-sheath. This causes two deep diagonal cuts in the direction of the draw and re-sheath that happen near instantaneously.

*[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Beheading Draw[/b][/color]

C-Rank Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: 6 Speed

The user draws their katana with one hand and slams their palm into the back of their blade to increase the force behind the swing made in any direction. This works with blunted side of a sword, but it can also draw out their strength and the blade's cutting power in full to quickly slash apart obstacles. Re-sheathing after this technique may take a bit longer; the placement of the hands following this technqiue make it difficult to resheath properly.

*[color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Iai Beheading Draw[/b][/color]

B-Rank Kenjutsu

Prerequisite: [color=#8B658B][b]Iaido • Beheading Draw[/b][/color], 8 Speed

With a Variation of the Beheading Draw technique, the user forces a very quick snap of tension and torque through their arm as they draw their sword sending it vertically or across with great speed. With its speed, the strike takes on a blur, many times not even appearing to be drawn from its sheath. Opponents will not see the slash unless they have a Taijutsu or Speed equal to or greater than half of the user's Taijutsu stat. This slash is also incredibly powerful with its speed, able to slice through stone in most cases with enough power.

ChitonShow [b]*[color=#DC143C]Miracle Water[/color][/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed seals, the user will make contact with a body of water up to 10 pints large. After channelling Chiton chakra through the water, the user slowly converts the water into blood of their blood-type to use for other jutsu. In order to achieve the complete effects on a full body of water, the user must channel for a whole post. Smaller amounts require less channelling time, however.

[b]*[color=#DC143C]Bold Clotting[/color][/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed seals, the user will place their hand over an open wound up to five inches wide and two inches deep. After channeling Chiton chakra for a full post, the user will form a superficial blood-clot covering over the wound to prevent further bloodflow from it. While this cover doesn't completely heal the wound, it allows the target's body to recover from the wound naturally without agitation.

[b]*[color=#DC143C]Venipuncture[/color][/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed seals, the user will channel Chiton chakra into a subdued or willing body. As long as the target doesn't struggle, the user can draw up to a pint of blood from the target. This technique works best on[ recently deceased corpses as the user can draw out blood repeatedly from them to fuel their jutsu.

[b][color=#DC143C]Infection[/color][/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After Ryoga makes contact with his sword on anyones bare flesh, performing a quick one handed seal ensures that the blood on his sword enters his opponents body. this jutsu causes any of his blood on his sword or on his opponents body to enter his opponents bloodstream by means of open wounds on their body. If the opponents has no open wounds, this jutsu has no effect.

[b][color=#DC143C]Blood Fountain[/color][/b]

D-rank Ninjutsu

Prerequisites: [color=dodgerblue]*Guardian Fountain[/color][/b], Control stat of 8

After creating the Guardian Fountain, Ryoga adds a few additional handseals and puts his palms to the ground near the fountain, channeling Chiton chakra into the stream. One post later, the fountain changes from a stream of water to a stream of blood matching Ryoga's bloodtype. The fountain is only 2 feet tall, and flows a bit slower then the Guardian Fountain, therefore producing only about 4000 cubic meters of blood. The blood will completely vanish from the field after 10 posts.

[b]*[color=#DC143C]Plasmic Transfusion[/color][/b]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

If the target is subdued or willing, the user can then perform a blood transfusion, replacing the target's lost blood with the quantity of blood collected. This technique is capable of both changing the blood type, and transfusing the blood.

[b]*[color=#DC143C]Red Cell Multiplication[/color][/b]

B-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the needed seals, the user will channel Chiton chakra into their own body or into the body of a willing or subdued target. After the chakra has been channeled, as long as the user or target avoids strenuous movement, the amount of blood cells in their body will regenerate 3 gallons of blood every post for a duration of four posts. If the user engages in strenuous activity, however, then they will regenerate only 1 gallon of blood instead. The technique will not end once the user returns to their maximum amount of blood, but rather simply stop multiplication until further replacement is needed or the duration of the jutsu ends.

Empathy JutsuShow [color=#DC143C]Blood Trail [/color]

C-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Control 6

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels chiton chakra into at least a pint of someone's blood, and attempts to locate the target at a speed equal to the user's control. If the target is within 30 yards of the user, the user can sense the direction, distance and location of the targets blood.

[color=#DC143C]Feel the Pulse[/color]

C-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Control 6

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels their chakra into the surrounding area, travelling at a speed equal to the user's control, up to 30 yards away. This allows the user to sense nearby blood pulses. At this level, it doesn't allow for pinpoint movements, but it does allow for the user to sense direction and distance.

[color=#DC143C]Singled Out[/color]

C-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Feel the Pulse, control 6

After sensing someone through Feel the Pulse and adding a few additional hand seals, the user can focus in on a specific person's blood signature. The user hones in on this specific signature if it is within a 30 yard range, and begins to track it down.

[color=#DC143C]Blood Scent[/color]

B-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Control 8, Blood Trail

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels chiton chakra into at least a pint of someone's blood, and attempts to locate the target at a speed equal to the user's control. If the target is within 60 yards of the user, the user can sense the direction, distance, and location of the target's blood.

[color=#DC143C]Hemopulse[/color]

B-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Feel the Pulse, Control 8

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels their chakra into the surrounding area, travelling at a speed equal to the user's control, up to 60 yards away. This allows the user to sense nearby blood pulses. At this level, it doesn't allow for pinpoint movements, but it does allow for the user to sense direction and distance.

[b]History[/b]

Ryoga was born as an only child on a moonlit night in Kirigakure. Both of his parents were incredible Jounin, his mother a master of Iijutsu and his father an expert of Iaido style. Ryoga was raised in an odd way compared to most, there was no affection between him and his parents, though the boy did respect them and care for them, and his parents loved him greatly. He was raised to be a ninja, being taught the way of Iaido by his father, while not really gathering much from his mother, though he did learn a deal about human anatomy from her. He was enrolled in the academy at the age of 10 by his father.

His academy years were the days that Ryoga truly found himself. While his first year wasn’t much outside of rigorous training, after he was put on a team during his second year and the fighting began, he proved to be one of the most adept swordsmen in the academy. Near the end of his second year, he slashed a student’s artery by “accident”, killing the boy within a minute. Ryoga argued it was the students fault for dropping his guard, and he felt no pity for the weak boy. The teachers looked oddly at this, though he was not penalized for it. He also discovered his affinity for Suiton jutsu during his academy years, proving to be decent with basic Suiton techniques. During the last half of his final year, he was always supervised while fighting or training to prevent any more deaths. He graduated at the top of his class with most of his class’s respect and fear.

As a genin, Ryoga began truly learning the Iaido techniques his father learned as a kid. He also learned Suiton techniques from his mother. His partner during his genin days, a Toukai, proved to be an equal match for him in skill, and gave him some of his first real scars during their sparring matches. This would be the first person Ryoga really respected as an equal rival. His ability with Ninjutsu and his speed with a blade would compete against his claws and chakra vent speed almost everyday, each one learning from the other through their spars and occasional training. On missions, they were very competitive, each one using every advantage they could get on the other to do the job the best. When he turned 17, Ryoga and his rival entered the chuunin exams together, and their familiarity with each other and incredible speed ended up catching the chuunin off guard, bringing him to his knees within a few minutes. They graduated to chuunin rank, and talked very little afterwards, having gained everything they needed from each other.

Ryoga’s chuunin years were some of his favorite times. He began to come into his own with the Kenjutsu he learned from his father, his speed proving to be his greatest strength. He also began his research into the art of chiton jutsu. The idea of using blood fascinated Ryoga, using someone’s lifesource as a weapon was an incredible power, and he wanted it. So after much practice, research, and training, he managed to teach himself some basic chiton techniques by the age of 19. It felt incredible to be able to manifest his blood in such ways, and he became almost obsessed with blood. His missions normally had messy results if they involved combat, as he normally slashed his victims throat or midsection in a few swipes. He realized the potential of using someone’s blood as a tracking source, and at the age of 22 Ranked to a Special Jounin who specialized in Tracking and Execution.

As a Special Jounin, Ryoga took every opportunity he could to hunt Missing Ninja of Kiri. He felt that their continued presence was a blemish on Kiri’s image, and that he was doing Kirigakure a service by hunting the runaway dogs of the village. Because of his methods of Chiton empathy sensing and blood tracking, He earned the title “Sanguine Stalker”. When he was 24 years old, he had his custom made Katana forged, with Grooves in the blade and a sharpened edge near the hilt, where the thumb rests. Ryoga would begin crafting ways to use his blood as a catalyst in his opponents body, using his sword as a method of transfer. Ryoga decided to rank up to jounin at the age of 25, after garnering a rack of 10 Missing Ninja kills.

When he became a Jounin, the idea to join the Seven Swordsmen of the Mist dawned on him. They were truly on his level, and he could be considered their equal with a bit more training. He began hammering into his Kenjutsu training, taking it to all new heights, and training for hours a day everyday if possible. His only aim at this point is training and proving himself to Kiri so that he might be recognized by the Seven Swordsmen as a brother.

------------------------------------------------------------

			Alright, nice looking app.

Just a few things to point out:

Eyes: His eyes are a hazel blue in color- Hazel blue eyes? those are two distinctly different colors, just stick to saying grayish blue.

Physical features seems a little short, especially because you don't include a picture. Maybe go into more detail about the other scars and where they're located. Also, I know eye scars are cool and all but how would something like that not damage the eye itself?

Personality: He comes across as quite the loner, how does he respond to working with others?

Equipment: Are you sure you don't want anything else? You don't have anything in the way of ranged weaponry or explosives, smoke grenades etc..

For combat style, write a description of how he uses his various techniques together rather than just the description of one aspect of his arsenal.

Put in the 2/3 under the abilities section

Jutsu looks good, so does history though a Kiri OOC will have to approve it. One thing though: "Ryoga decided to rank up to jounin at the age of 25" - Pretty sure Kiri ninja don't get to choose when they are promoted but again the history is Kiri OOC jurisdiction and not mine.

Overall though very concise and well done, shouldn't take long to get accepted!

Author: Post

The only thing I see wrong is your Chiton pyramid.

Right now you have

  DDD

CCCCC

  BBB

To have five C's you need six D's

Other than that everything looks good as far as I'm concerned

			Your chiton empathy and your chiton would technically count into the same pyramid. But are house in separate pyramids, it's a bit confusing that way but its how it goes. The empathy sensory pyramid starts at C-Rank sure, but you still need supporting chiton D-Ranks to support it.

Your chiton empathy and your chiton would technically count into the same pyramid. But are house in separate pyramids, it's a bit confusing that way but its how it goes. The empathy sensory pyramid starts at C-Rank sure, but you still need supporting chiton D-Ranks to support it.

						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Sun Jun 09, 2013 9:15 pm

			So what im trying to do is invent a way to use blood as a catalyst for empathy sensor jutsu. i made a basic 5 jutsu pyramid, but i've never made sensory techs before, so some constructive criticism would be great =)

Chiton EmpathyShow [b][color=#DC143C]Blood Trail[/color][/b]

C-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Control 6

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels chiton chakra into at least a pint of someone's blood, and attempts to locate the target at a speed equal to the user's control. If the target is within 30 yards of the user, the user can sense the direction, distance and location of the targets blood.

[b][color=#DC143c]Feel the Pulse[/color][/b]

C-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Control 6

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels their chakra into the surrounding area, travelling at a speed equal to the user's control, up to 30 yards away. This allows the user to sense nearby blood pulses. At this level, it doesn't allow for pinpoint movements, but it does allow for the user to sense direction and distance.

[b][color=#DC143c]Singled Out[/color][/b]

C-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: [b][color=#DC143C]Feel the Pulse[/color][/b], control 6

After sensing someone through Feel the Pulse and adding a few additional hand seals, the user can focus in on a specific person's blood signature. The user hones in on this specific signature if it is within a 30 yard range, and begins to track it down.

[b][color=#DC143c]Blood Scent[/color][/b]

B-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Control 8, [b][color=#DC143C]Blood Trail[/color][/b]

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels chiton chakra into at least a pint of someone's blood, and attempts to locate the target at a speed equal to the user's control. If the target is within 60 yards of the user, the user can sense the direction, distance, and location of the target's blood.

[b][color=#DC143c]Hemopulse[/color][/b]

B-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: [b][color=#DC143C]Feel the Pulse[/color][/b], Control 8

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels their chakra into the surrounding area, travelling at a speed equal to the user's control, up to 60 yards away. This allows the user to sense nearby blood pulses. At this level, it doesn't allow for pinpoint movements, but it does allow for the user to sense direction and distance.

			[i]

Author: Post

So what im trying to do is invent a way to use blood as a catalyst for empathy sensor jutsu. i made a basic 5 jutsu pyramid, but i've never made sensory techs before, so some constructive criticism would be great =)

Chiton EmpathyShow [b][color=#DC143C]Blood Trail[/color][/b]

C-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Control 6

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels chiton chakra into at least a pint of someone's blood, and attempts to locate the target at a speed equal to the user's control. If the target is within 30 yards of the user, the user can sense the direction, distance and location of the targets blood.

[b][color=#DC143c]Feel the Pulse[/color][/b]

C-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Control 6

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels their chakra into the surrounding area, travelling at a speed equal to the user's control, up to 30 yards away. This allows the user to sense nearby blood pulses. At this level, it doesn't allow for pinpoint movements, but it does allow for the user to sense direction and distance.

[b][color=#DC143c]Singled Out[/color][/b]

C-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: [b][color=#DC143C]Feel the Pulse[/color][/b], control 6

After sensing someone through Feel the Pulse and adding a few additional hand seals, the user can focus in on a specific person's blood signature. The user hones in on this specific signature if it is within a 30 yard range, and begins to track it down.

[b][color=#DC143c]Blood Scent[/color][/b]

B-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: Control 8, [b][color=#DC143C]Blood Trail[/color][/b]

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels chiton chakra into at least a pint of someone's blood, and attempts to locate the target at a speed equal to the user's control. If the target is within 60 yards of the user, the user can sense the direction, distance, and location of the target's blood.

[b][color=#DC143c]Hemopulse[/color][/b]

B-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: [b][color=#DC143C]Feel the Pulse[/color][/b], Control 8

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels their chakra into the surrounding area, travelling at a speed equal to the user's control, up to 60 yards away. This allows the user to sense nearby blood pulses. At this level, it doesn't allow for pinpoint movements, but it does allow for the user to sense direction and distance.

------------------------------------------------------------
Author:

			Just a simple thing first, remove the gaps between each jutsu and add a bold code to the name of the jutsu and any prerequisite jutsu should be in colour also.

[b][color=#DC143C] Hemopulse [/color][/b]

B-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: [b][color=#DC143C]Feel the Pulse [/color][/b],Control 8

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels their chakra into the surrounding area, travelling at a speed equal to the user's control, up to 60 yards away. This allows the user to sense nearby blood pulses. At this level, it doesn't allow for pinpoint movements, but it does allow for the user to sense direction and distance.

I have a small issue with bloodtype Analyzation in all this jutsu sounds fine, but I don’t know why you’d need to know unless it’s for medical purposes. But it’s not required on our apps to add the bloodtype and would rely on asking the person you are targeting breaking up roleplay.  May I suggest Blood Scent should have a prerequisite of Blood Trail as this is an advanced form.  Other than that I like them, though I’m not sure if it would require they require a Sensor ability.
