Author: Post

Just a simple thing first, remove the gaps between each jutsu and add a bold code to the name of the jutsu and any prerequisite jutsu should be in colour also.

[b][color=#DC143C] Hemopulse [/color][/b]

B-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: [b][color=#DC143C]Feel the Pulse [/color][/b],Control 8

After doing the needed hand seals, the user channels their chakra into the surrounding area, travelling at a speed equal to the user's control, up to 60 yards away. This allows the user to sense nearby blood pulses. At this level, it doesn't allow for pinpoint movements, but it does allow for the user to sense direction and distance.

I have a small issue with bloodtype Analyzation in all this jutsu sounds fine, but I don’t know why you’d need to know unless it’s for medical purposes. But it’s not required on our apps to add the bloodtype and would rely on asking the person you are targeting breaking up roleplay.  May I suggest Blood Scent should have a prerequisite of Blood Trail as this is an advanced form.  Other than that I like them, though I’m not sure if it would require they require a Sensor ability.

			Blood trail has no previous jutsu to be used, and requires a pint of someones blood to be used as a catalyst for the tracking, but because of this, its more reliable to use if you have the blood available. Singled out is meant to be used in tandem with Feel the pulse or a similar ability, and is basically a method of ignoring the vast amount of blood signatures in favor of focusing in and tracking a specific person down.

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

Author: Post

Blood trail has no previous jutsu to be used, and requires a pint of someones blood to be used as a catalyst for the tracking, but because of this, its more reliable to use if you have the blood available. Singled out is meant to be used in tandem with Feel the pulse or a similar ability, and is basically a method of ignoring the vast amount of blood signatures in favor of focusing in and tracking a specific person down.

------------------------------------------------------------

=== THREAD: [Graded]Hellloooooo nurse! - Naruto Saigen Roleplay ===
Forum: Home Board index Role Play Lightning Empire Kumogakure no Sato > Home Board index

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: (unknown)

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/][/url]
				Naruto Saigen Roleplay
				Naruto Saigen RP is a text-based roleplay forum set in an alternate universe of the Naruto series.
				[url=#start_here]Skip to content[/url]

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: 

[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882][i][/url]
								[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url]

		[b]Posts:[/b] [url=./search.php?author_id=948882&sr=posts]4378[/url]		[b]Joined:[/b] Wed Dec 16, 2009 6:00 pm

											[b]Location:[/b] Site 17
												[b]Grading Tier:[/b] Mangaka

				[b]Contact:[/b]

					[url=#]
						PM
					[/url]

																	[url=./ucp.php?i=pm&mode=compose&action=quotepost&p=1539986]
										Send private message
									[/url]

						[url=#p1539986][Graded]Hellloooooo nurse![/url]

							[url=/forums/app.php/post/1539986/report]
								REPORT
							[/url]

							[url=./posting.php?mode=quote&f=63&p=1539986]
								QUOTE
							[/url]

			[url=./viewtopic.php?f=63&p=1539986&thanks=1539986&to_id=948882&from_id=1869325]
				LIKE
			[/url]

									[url=./viewtopic.php?p=1539986#p1539986]
						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Mon May 27, 2013 6:46 am

			The sound of metal rings sliding across a metal bar as someone yanked open curtains made the noise feel like a blast of agony that just pounded upon the ear drums of a hung over member of the Ishiguro clan. She groaned and curled up in her bed as she slung curses at the fool stupid enough to wake her from her victory slumber. A soft tap and a few quiet rattles made her pry open one eye to see a glass of water and a few pills on her night stand. The soft chuckle of a familiar voice made her grumble something incoherently as her youngest older brother left the room, closing the door so it was ajar enough for the smell of food to flood into her room.

A hand blindly reached out and grabbed the pills before she put them in her mouth and dry swallowed, having practiced this for months just to keep from having to sit up in bed after a hard night of drinking. And of course, Jin would try drawing her from her sheets with the smell of food. Nui was a bizarre person like that, she was always hungry when she was hungover. Slipping out of bed, the woman opened the door and left her room as she made her way toward the kitchen nook of her apartment.

"Oh come on! At least put clothes on!" Jin protested as Nui gave him the finger. "[color=brown]You're in my house, so I can dress as I please.[/color]" Nui responded as she had made it a well known fact to her family that in her home she was 'king'. They'd protest but ultimately they would shut up since it was her house rules. At least she was wearing her under garments however Jin had a way to fix this, "Put some clothes on or I scrap breakfast."

Nui wanted to glare at him but that required opening her eyes. As she worked her way back toward her bedroom she called him a something that rhymed with itch mass s'more while beginning her search for clothes. As she returned with a fresh set of clothing on, Jin place a plate on the table and a glass of water. Nui wanted OJ but she knew she needed the water just a little bit more. "[color=brown]Th'nks[/color]" She mumbled as she started to eat.

"By the way, while you were snoring the morning away, a messenger popped by. Believe it or not they're trying to put you back on a genin team to help train them. Your new 'partner' will be by a little later to discuss things. Try to be sober... and showered." Jin said as he started washing dishes. Nui finished chewing only to swallow her food and open her mouth, "[color=brown]Yes mom.[/color]" She drawled half heartedly.

Jin finished washing before long and ruffled Nui's still messy bed hair, "Be good, it's your first day with a new partner so don't kill him just yet." "[color=brown]I make no promises.[/color]" Nui responded, more coherent now than she was. The food was doing well in starting up her system and the water was gonna help flush her out, but mostly it was the aspirin kicking in and dulling all that hangover crap.

And with that she wanted a shower. Standing up and leaving the plate on the table she removed all her clothing and wandered toward the bathroom.

[url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_Oqmby3igoUKiR_pd4sGiA]Red Buster Gaming Youtube[/url] ||| [url=https://www.twitch.tv/redbustergaming]Red Buster Gaming Twitch[/url]

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Mon May 27, 2013 6:46 am

			The sound of metal rings sliding across a metal bar as someone yanked open curtains made the noise feel like a blast of agony that just pounded upon the ear drums of a hung over member of the Ishiguro clan. She groaned and curled up in her bed as she slung curses at the fool stupid enough to wake her from her victory slumber. A soft tap and a few quiet rattles made her pry open one eye to see a glass of water and a few pills on her night stand. The soft chuckle of a familiar voice made her grumble something incoherently as her youngest older brother left the room, closing the door so it was ajar enough for the smell of food to flood into her room.

A hand blindly reached out and grabbed the pills before she put them in her mouth and dry swallowed, having practiced this for months just to keep from having to sit up in bed after a hard night of drinking. And of course, Jin would try drawing her from her sheets with the smell of food. Nui was a bizarre person like that, she was always hungry when she was hungover. Slipping out of bed, the woman opened the door and left her room as she made her way toward the kitchen nook of her apartment.

"Oh come on! At least put clothes on!" Jin protested as Nui gave him the finger. "[color=brown]You're in my house, so I can dress as I please.[/color]" Nui responded as she had made it a well known fact to her family that in her home she was 'king'. They'd protest but ultimately they would shut up since it was her house rules. At least she was wearing her under garments however Jin had a way to fix this, "Put some clothes on or I scrap breakfast."

Nui wanted to glare at him but that required opening her eyes. As she worked her way back toward her bedroom she called him a something that rhymed with itch mass s'more while beginning her search for clothes. As she returned with a fresh set of clothing on, Jin place a plate on the table and a glass of water. Nui wanted OJ but she knew she needed the water just a little bit more. "[color=brown]Th'nks[/color]" She mumbled as she started to eat.

"By the way, while you were snoring the morning away, a messenger popped by. Believe it or not they're trying to put you back on a genin team to help train them. Your new 'partner' will be by a little later to discuss things. Try to be sober... and showered." Jin said as he started washing dishes. Nui finished chewing only to swallow her food and open her mouth, "[color=brown]Yes mom.[/color]" She drawled half heartedly.

Jin finished washing before long and ruffled Nui's still messy bed hair, "Be good, it's your first day with a new partner so don't kill him just yet." "[color=brown]I make no promises.[/color]" Nui responded, more coherent now than she was. The food was doing well in starting up her system and the water was gonna help flush her out, but mostly it was the aspirin kicking in and dulling all that hangover crap.

And with that she wanted a shower. Standing up and leaving the plate on the table she removed all her clothing and wandered toward the bathroom.

The sound of metal rings sliding across a metal bar as someone yanked open curtains made the noise feel like a blast of agony that just pounded upon the ear drums of a hung over member of the Ishiguro clan. She groaned and curled up in her bed as she slung curses at the fool stupid enough to wake her from her victory slumber. A soft tap and a few quiet rattles made her pry open one eye to see a glass of water and a few pills on her night stand. The soft chuckle of a familiar voice made her grumble something incoherently as her youngest older brother left the room, closing the door so it was ajar enough for the smell of food to flood into her room.

A hand blindly reached out and grabbed the pills before she put them in her mouth and dry swallowed, having practiced this for months just to keep from having to sit up in bed after a hard night of drinking. And of course, Jin would try drawing her from her sheets with the smell of food. Nui was a bizarre person like that, she was always hungry when she was hungover. Slipping out of bed, the woman opened the door and left her room as she made her way toward the kitchen nook of her apartment.

"Oh come on! At least put clothes on!" Jin protested as Nui gave him the finger. "[color=brown]You're in my house, so I can dress as I please.[/color]" Nui responded as she had made it a well known fact to her family that in her home she was 'king'. They'd protest but ultimately they would shut up since it was her house rules. At least she was wearing her under garments however Jin had a way to fix this, "Put some clothes on or I scrap breakfast."

Nui wanted to glare at him but that required opening her eyes. As she worked her way back toward her bedroom she called him a something that rhymed with itch mass s'more while beginning her search for clothes. As she returned with a fresh set of clothing on, Jin place a plate on the table and a glass of water. Nui wanted OJ but she knew she needed the water just a little bit more. "[color=brown]Th'nks[/color]" She mumbled as she started to eat.

"By the way, while you were snoring the morning away, a messenger popped by. Believe it or not they're trying to put you back on a genin team to help train them. Your new 'partner' will be by a little later to discuss things. Try to be sober... and showered." Jin said as he started washing dishes. Nui finished chewing only to swallow her food and open her mouth, "[color=brown]Yes mom.[/color]" She drawled half heartedly.

Jin finished washing before long and ruffled Nui's still messy bed hair, "Be good, it's your first day with a new partner so don't kill him just yet." "[color=brown]I make no promises.[/color]" Nui responded, more coherent now than she was. The food was doing well in starting up her system and the water was gonna help flush her out, but mostly it was the aspirin kicking in and dulling all that hangover crap.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Mon May 27, 2013 9:55 am

			[color=#090]"[i]ahhh... i love this village!"[/i][/color] Tokaido thought to himself as he walked through Kumo, happy as he could be due to the amount of good looking women currently walking the street. As he walked, a few caught him staring more than once and shot a smile in his direction. He would've stopped and "conversed" with them, but unfortunately he had places to be. specifically, he was going to meet a partner for training a genin team. He didn't particularly want to train the youngsters, but he had been there before, and knew that everyone needed someone to look up to, and in his eyes he was quite the role model.

After a good while of walking through the village, Tokaido finally arrived at his destination: an apartment complex, full of apartments. [color=#090]"Damnit, they would have to live in an apartment complex... good thing i have the address."[/color] he said aloud as he read the address off the paper. He had been given no prior information about his partner, and had no idea who they were. He was simply told by a messenger that he was being "called to train a Genin team with a partner who had "bad" history with training them, and required a partner to keep them in check" and given the address and a time to show up. he was a bit early, but he figured his partner would be up and presentable at this hour.

after spending some time going through the complex, he finally arrived at his partner's apartment. Tokaido did a once-over on his appearance, making sure his mission outfit looked nice and tidy to make that good first impression. His black vest, red pants, boots and pouches looked alright enough, and his hair was in its usual ponytail with the part down the middle. after confirming all of this, He proceeded to knock on the door and wait patiently for someone to answer.

			[i]

Author: Post

[color=#090]"[i]ahhh... i love this village!"[/i][/color] Tokaido thought to himself as he walked through Kumo, happy as he could be due to the amount of good looking women currently walking the street. As he walked, a few caught him staring more than once and shot a smile in his direction. He would've stopped and "conversed" with them, but unfortunately he had places to be. specifically, he was going to meet a partner for training a genin team. He didn't particularly want to train the youngsters, but he had been there before, and knew that everyone needed someone to look up to, and in his eyes he was quite the role model.

After a good while of walking through the village, Tokaido finally arrived at his destination: an apartment complex, full of apartments. [color=#090]"Damnit, they would have to live in an apartment complex... good thing i have the address."[/color] he said aloud as he read the address off the paper. He had been given no prior information about his partner, and had no idea who they were. He was simply told by a messenger that he was being "called to train a Genin team with a partner who had "bad" history with training them, and required a partner to keep them in check" and given the address and a time to show up. he was a bit early, but he figured his partner would be up and presentable at this hour.

after spending some time going through the complex, he finally arrived at his partner's apartment. Tokaido did a once-over on his appearance, making sure his mission outfit looked nice and tidy to make that good first impression. His black vest, red pants, boots and pouches looked alright enough, and his hair was in its usual ponytail with the part down the middle. after confirming all of this, He proceeded to knock on the door and wait patiently for someone to answer.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Mon May 27, 2013 11:05 am

			Nui had gotten the water to a temperature she always used and was standing under the down pour of warmth that cascaded over her body. She had quickly scrubbed herself down with soap and had just finished rinsing the various products out of her hair, getting them out of the way so she could just soak for a bit. It was relaxing to say the least and as she tilted her head back within the stream of droplets that rained down on her she sighed at the relaxation. It was then that some damned fool knocked on her door.

Her eyes opened as she righted her head, her hand reaching for the handle that controlled the flow of water. The water ceased and silence echoed through the bathroom as she waited. Sure enough there was another knock before long and she narrowed her sharp eyes with distaste at the person who was interrupting her alone time. She pulled open the sliding door of her shower and grabbed the first towel on the rack, drying herself off at a hurried pace before wrapping it around her torso.

She trod through her apartment and made a bee line for the door and yanked it open. "[color=brown]You'd better have a good reason for interrupting my shower.[/color]" She threatened while standing there in nothing more than the towel wrapped around her body. The Ishiguro's timberwolf gray hair was still wet and hung loose, clinging to her neck as she glared at the dark haired, green eyed man at her door.

Author: Post

Nui had gotten the water to a temperature she always used and was standing under the down pour of warmth that cascaded over her body. She had quickly scrubbed herself down with soap and had just finished rinsing the various products out of her hair, getting them out of the way so she could just soak for a bit. It was relaxing to say the least and as she tilted her head back within the stream of droplets that rained down on her she sighed at the relaxation. It was then that some damned fool knocked on her door.

Her eyes opened as she righted her head, her hand reaching for the handle that controlled the flow of water. The water ceased and silence echoed through the bathroom as she waited. Sure enough there was another knock before long and she narrowed her sharp eyes with distaste at the person who was interrupting her alone time. She pulled open the sliding door of her shower and grabbed the first towel on the rack, drying herself off at a hurried pace before wrapping it around her torso.

She trod through her apartment and made a bee line for the door and yanked it open. "[color=brown]You'd better have a good reason for interrupting my shower.[/color]" She threatened while standing there in nothing more than the towel wrapped around her body. The Ishiguro's timberwolf gray hair was still wet and hung loose, clinging to her neck as she glared at the dark haired, green eyed man at her door.

			Tokaido stood before an incredibly gorgeous woman, clad in nothing but a towel, with long gray hair dripping to the side. [color=#090]"Man oh man, it must be my birthday. I dont know who you are but i'd love to find out."[/color] Tokaido said in his usual charming tone. This woman was way above average in his book. Great bust, Luscious hips, and the "get the hell away from me" attitude only served to increase his interest. But her most captivating feature, her eyes, totally caught him off guard. He had never seen eyes of that color, black with a circle of silver around it. [color=#090]"But i digress, i'm actually here to meet a ninja i'm supposed to be partnering up with. Is there anyone else here?"[/color] The thought that this woman was indeed meant to be his partner hadn't even crossed his mind.

			'[i][color=brown]You're so lucky there is no room for me to build up momentum in here you fucker.[/color][/i]' Nui thought to herself as the guy ogled her rather openly. She was about to slap him in the side of his head to fix where he was looking when he stared into her eyes. He had saved her the trouble of fixing where he was looking but then he opened his mouth again. He mentioned a partner and she wanted to crack some of her joints, this was the guy she'd be dealing with it seemed.

"[color=brown]I'm the only one who lives here. If you're my partner then come in, sit down at the table, and don't friggin move or I will ensure you join a society of eunuchs very, very soon.[/color]" Nui said as she turned away from the door leaving it open for the man to come through. She walked toward her room as she grumbled to herself that she was beginning to have a decent day too. As she went into her room she pulled the towel off before using her heel to kick the door closed, using the towel to finish drying herself off.

It wasn't long before she grabbed a change of clothes and threw them on, the set looking like most of her average attire. She didn't bother with her vest as she settled for the just the low cut pants and crop top, leaving her feet bare she she opened the door while walking back out into the common area of her apartment as she was tying her hair back into a ponytail that barely tickled past her shoulders.

"[color=brown]Who are you and why shou-Stop staring at my tits![/color]" Nui almost growled as she turned and headed toward her fridge. She opened it up and pulled out a can and popped the top before taking a chug from it. If Tokaido bothered to look he'd see the can was a brand of beer. "[color=brown]Let me guess, you're some deities gift to women? At least that's what you think or want to think. Am I right?[/color]" She asked as she leaned against her fridge after closing the door and stared at this guy in front of her.

			Tokaido's face lit up when she said that she was his partner, his day had just gotten a whole lot better. [color=#090]"haha, dont mind if I do."[/color] He said as he walked into the house and sat down at the table, paying her threat no mind. He would win this fight yet, she was fiesty but that just made it so much more interesting. He couldn't believe that they decided to put him with a female Chuunin, let alone one as attractive as this girl was. it was like a dream come true to Tokaido.

As she walked back to the kitchen, he couldn't help but stare at her breasts as they bounced. Unfortunately, she didn't seem to take kindly to that. [color=#090]"Hey hey, lighten up a little, i can't help but admire a great girl when i see one."[/color] He noticed her grab a beer out of the fridge, and couldn't help but attempt to impress. [color=#090]"mind if i grab one? a couple friendly beers between us will help to talk about business. I hate to be too serious, especially with such a pretty face. And as for me being a gift to women...well thats not really for me to say, i'm not a woman. I think i'll leave you to make that deduction for me."[/color] He couldn't say for sure, but he thought he could see at least a little bit of interest in this womans expression. it was obvious to see she was an alpha, but he'd win this fight yet.

Tokaido's face lit up when she said that she was his partner, his day had just gotten a whole lot better. [color=#090]"haha, dont mind if I do."[/color] He said as he walked into the house and sat down at the table, paying her threat no mind. He would win this fight yet, she was fiesty but that just made it so much more interesting. He couldn't believe that they decided to put him with a female Chuunin, let alone one as attractive as this girl was. it was like a dream come true to Tokaido.

As she walked back to the kitchen, he couldn't help but stare at her breasts as they bounced. Unfortunately, she didn't seem to take kindly to that. [color=#090]"Hey hey, lighten up a little, i can't help but admire a great girl when i see one."[/color] He noticed her grab a beer out of the fridge, and couldn't help but attempt to impress. [color=#090]"mind if i grab one? a couple friendly beers between us will help to talk about business. I hate to be too serious, especially with such a pretty face. And as for me being a gift to women...well thats not really for me to say, i'm not a woman. I think i'll leave you to make that deduction for me."[/color] He couldn't say for sure, but he thought he could see at least a little bit of interest in this womans expression. it was obvious to see she was an alpha, but he'd win this fight yet.

			"[color=brown]You still haven't told me who you are.[/color]" She threw out before she took a swig from the can in her hand. This fool was a little too familiar with her, especially without earning that right. When he asked for a beer she looked at the can in her hand then shifted her gaze back to him with a rather incredulous look. "[color=brown]You haven't earn it. The beer in my fridge is reserved for people who've earned my respect, drunk me under the table, or managed to earn their place in my bed. You fall under none of those categories.[/color]"

There must have been a reason they partnered her with this guy, maybe it was to make her focus all her 'attitude' toward this man instead of the genin. If that was their plan, it was gonna work quite well. "[color=brown]Now, what do you know about this team?[/color]" Nui asked as she finished the beer and tossed the can into the nearby trashcan. It had been full yesterday but Jin must have done some cleaning. It would explain why there were no more dishes stacked in the sink, dirty clothes strewn about the floor, and various other things. She hated when he played house maid for her since it usually meant she'd try and pay him back somehow.

"[color=brown]And what are you capable of? I don't mean that in some stupid flirting fashion either. I'm talking combat skills, the capabilities that helped make you a CHuunin.[/color]" If she was gonna be paired with this fool, she'd need to know what he was capable of at least. That way she could find out if she was gonna be depriving the village of a useful tool or a bumbling idiot when she inevitably snapped and stabbed him in the neck from his wandering eyes. Most other men she's met were at least subtle about it.

The beer in my fridge is reserved for people who've earned my respect, drunk me under the table, or managed to earn their place in my bed. You fall under none of those categories.[/color]"

There must have been a reason they partnered her with this guy, maybe it was to make her focus all her 'attitude' toward this man instead of the genin. If that was their plan, it was gonna work quite well. "[color=brown]Now, what do you know about this team?[/color]" Nui asked as she finished the beer and tossed the can into the nearby trashcan. It had been full yesterday but Jin must have done some cleaning. It would explain why there were no more dishes stacked in the sink, dirty clothes strewn about the floor, and various other things. She hated when he played house maid for her since it usually meant she'd try and pay him back somehow.

"[color=brown]And what are you capable of? I don't mean that in some stupid flirting fashion either. I'm talking combat skills, the capabilities that helped make you a CHuunin.[/color]" If she was gonna be paired with this fool, she'd need to know what he was capable of at least. That way she could find out if she was gonna be depriving the village of a useful tool or a bumbling idiot when she inevitably snapped and stabbed him in the neck from his wandering eyes. Most other men she's met were at least subtle about it.

------------------------------------------------------------

			[color=#090]"Of course, how rude of me. Hideyoshi Tokaido."[/color] Tokaido had forgotten his formalities, which wasn't very like him. It was like something else was catching his attention. She denied him the beer, and it seemed she was pretty straight forward about it, though he still made a sly look at her conditions for respect.[color=#090]"And it will all come in due time, we've only just met."[/color]

Tokaido pondered why they would ever knowingly pair him with a Female chuunin. Just about every guy that knows him knows he's a bit of a playboy. Though he wasn't complaining about it. [color=#090]"I don't know anymore then you do, the only thing they told me was to show up here to talk to a partner about training some genin."[/color] Tokaido seriously didn't have a clue about why he was here, or why they specifically asked for him to do this, but it wasn't as though he could go against his orders.

[color=#090]"Well, I'm an expert in ranged combat specializing in multiple manners of throwing weapons. I earned the nickname Farshot in the academy, so i excel at long range shots. And how about yourself? What are you capable of?" [/color] He wanted to make an extra comment about specifics of her "capabilities" but he didn't want to risk it, she didn't seem to like the comments too much.

			[i]

Author: Post

[color=#090]"Of course, how rude of me. Hideyoshi Tokaido."[/color] Tokaido had forgotten his formalities, which wasn't very like him. It was like something else was catching his attention. She denied him the beer, and it seemed she was pretty straight forward about it, though he still made a sly look at her conditions for respect.[color=#090]"And it will all come in due time, we've only just met."[/color]

Tokaido pondered why they would ever knowingly pair him with a Female chuunin. Just about every guy that knows him knows he's a bit of a playboy. Though he wasn't complaining about it. [color=#090]"I don't know anymore then you do, the only thing they told me was to show up here to talk to a partner about training some genin."[/color] Tokaido seriously didn't have a clue about why he was here, or why they specifically asked for him to do this, but it wasn't as though he could go against his orders.

[color=#090]"Well, I'm an expert in ranged combat specializing in multiple manners of throwing weapons. I earned the nickname Farshot in the academy, so i excel at long range shots. And how about yourself? What are you capable of?" [/color] He wanted to make an extra comment about specifics of her "capabilities" but he didn't want to risk it, she didn't seem to like the comments too much.

			'[i][color=brown]That explains why they partnered him with me. Fucking village and their making 'functional' teams and shit.[/color][/i]' She wanted to make a comment about his stupid nickname and long shots about him earning her respect but he might take that as an invitation to try, or worse that a long shot was better than no shot. Maybe if she just said she was a lesbian he'd give up. Then she realized that she'd be working with this guy and he'd try and see the girlfriend and then probably try for a three way.

She decided to focus on explaining her own skills just to get it over with since he didn't seem to know much about this team the village was shoving into her life. "[color=brown]Ishiguro Nui, no nickname or silly moniker of any kind. I use Denjiton, Sensor abilities, and Taijutsu. I specialize in hit and run tactics mostly. Good money says we have some stupid mid range jutsu user on the team or maybe a medic or something.[/color]" Nui crossed her arms under her chest as she huffed, looking away from the other Chuunin.

She never liked the way the village coddled the genin so much. Then again, if they were putting her on a team with a genin then maybe there was hope for the people in charge. Then again, maybe they're hoping she's changed her ideas on teaching but she was hoping they weren't that stupid.

"[color=brown]Ishiguro Nui, no nickname or silly moniker of any kind. I use Denjiton, Sensor abilities, and Taijutsu. I specialize in hit and run tactics mostly. Good money says we have some stupid mid range jutsu user on the team or maybe a medic or something.[/color]" Nui crossed her arms under her chest as she huffed, looking away from the other Chuunin.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Thu May 30, 2013 10:36 am

			Tokaido couldn't help but keep a smile on his face the entire time she was talking. It was just something about her, probably her attitude towards him, that made him happy. It was as if his charm and good looks weren't doing anything for him, and as weird as that was it was also incredibly fun, he'd never met a girl immune to his silver tongue. A girl like this takes kinder to action, not words, so he'd need to step up his game a bit, while not being overly outgoing.

[color=#090]"A great name like yours doesn't need a nickname. but on a more serious note, if we are to be working together it's imperative we spar sometime. I could always use practice with someone fast enough to use hit and run tactics, it's pretty hard to hit someone that fast with a kunai knife."[/color] as he pulled one of his own kunai out and twirled it around in his hand, he seriously thought about that for a moment. If this girl was fast enough to fight hand to hand, as an ishiguro no less, she must have some incredible speed. It would be nigh impossible for Tokaido to accurately get a shot on her if she was expecting it.

He was liking this team so far, getting to work with someone like this was a great training experience, in more ways then one. If the rest of the team was like this, he wouldn't have any problem going on missions with this team for weeks at a time. The thought was almost enough to make his eyes roll back.

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

Author: Post

Tokaido couldn't help but keep a smile on his face the entire time she was talking. It was just something about her, probably her attitude towards him, that made him happy. It was as if his charm and good looks weren't doing anything for him, and as weird as that was it was also incredibly fun, he'd never met a girl immune to his silver tongue. A girl like this takes kinder to action, not words, so he'd need to step up his game a bit, while not being overly outgoing.

[color=#090]"A great name like yours doesn't need a nickname. but on a more serious note, if we are to be working together it's imperative we spar sometime. I could always use practice with someone fast enough to use hit and run tactics, it's pretty hard to hit someone that fast with a kunai knife."[/color] as he pulled one of his own kunai out and twirled it around in his hand, he seriously thought about that for a moment. If this girl was fast enough to fight hand to hand, as an ishiguro no less, she must have some incredible speed. It would be nigh impossible for Tokaido to accurately get a shot on her if she was expecting it.

He was liking this team so far, getting to work with someone like this was a great training experience, in more ways then one. If the rest of the team was like this, he wouldn't have any problem going on missions with this team for weeks at a time. The thought was almost enough to make his eyes roll back.

			She wanted to punch him, there was just that nagging sensation at the back of her mind like some kind of devil was sitting on her shoulder telling her to do it. Just ball up her fist and slam it into his jaw. But that might hurt her too and she didn't have nearly enough room to maneuver within her apartment to try and take him down. Then again she was fast and might be able to out maneuver him.

Then she realized it would make a huge mess in her place and she didn't want to deal with the hassle of cleaning it up, especially after Jin just cleaned it too. In the end, laziness won out and she stayed her hand as she felt her eye twitch for an instance. "[color=brown]Heh, I doubt you'd be able to hit me on a training field and if you take that as a challenge to throw something at me now, I will chop your balls off and shove them up your ass. This place just got cleaned and you are not throwing shit in my home. If you want me to kick your ass so bad then when we 'train' I'll freely kick your ass into next week.[/color]"

Nui was wondering if the rest of this team would be a group she could actually stand, hopefully they would be more subtle than Mr. Testosterone. That was it! That was a the perfect nickname for this pair of walking genitals. "[color=brown]So now the question becomes why the hell the village wanted us to meet before the entire team got together. I'm assuming they were hoping we'd kill each other off or something. Well, that's a little absurd, more like I'd have to kill you if anything.[/color]"

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5635886/1/]Ishiguro Nui[/url] - Kumogakure Chuunin -  [color=brown][color=brown][/color]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5648698/1/]Awai Mariko[/url] - Konohagakure Chuunin - [color=#B2397F][color=#B2397F][/color]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5802714/1/]Jinrai Setsuko[/url] - Kumogakure Chuunin - [color=#D60270][color=#D60270][/color]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5639545/1/]Toukai Mukade[/url] - Kirigakure Chuunin - [color=#8B7765][color=#8B7765][/color]

						[url=#top]
				[i][/i]
				Top
			[/url]

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: Post

She wanted to punch him, there was just that nagging sensation at the back of her mind like some kind of devil was sitting on her shoulder telling her to do it. Just ball up her fist and slam it into his jaw. But that might hurt her too and she didn't have nearly enough room to maneuver within her apartment to try and take him down. Then again she was fast and might be able to out maneuver him.

Then she realized it would make a huge mess in her place and she didn't want to deal with the hassle of cleaning it up, especially after Jin just cleaned it too. In the end, laziness won out and she stayed her hand as she felt her eye twitch for an instance. "[color=brown]Heh, I doubt you'd be able to hit me on a training field and if you take that as a challenge to throw something at me now, I will chop your balls off and shove them up your ass. This place just got cleaned and you are not throwing shit in my home. If you want me to kick your ass so bad then when we 'train' I'll freely kick your ass into next week.[/color]"

Nui was wondering if the rest of this team would be a group she could actually stand, hopefully they would be more subtle than Mr. Testosterone. That was it! That was a the perfect nickname for this pair of walking genitals. "[color=brown]So now the question becomes why the hell the village wanted us to meet before the entire team got together. I'm assuming they were hoping we'd kill each other off or something. Well, that's a little absurd, more like I'd have to kill you if anything.[/color]"

------------------------------------------------------------

			This woman just hated Tokaido's guts more than anyone else ever had, but thats what kept him interested. He didn't know how she fought, but he could guess in order to hit and run you'd need space to do so, and inside of a house... probably not the best place to try that. But more importantly, he didn't want to wreck her house, as it was easy to see it was just recently cleaned.

[color=#090]"Haha, I would never throw something in someone else's house unless they told me otherwise, that's just plain disrespectful.

And the genital mutilation I could live without thanks. But I would love to train with you sometime, see how your body moves and such... for combat of course."[/color] Tokaido added the last part in order to hopefully avoid the wrath of this Ishiguro with an anger management problem.

[color=#090]"And to answer your question, I think we are the most experienced members of the team they are creating. If that's the case, they may have expected us to take over and lead the team. Other then that, the only thing i can think of is i was blessed by some higher power to meet you in private, because i'd never kill you, hahaha."[/color]

			[i]

Author: Post

This woman just hated Tokaido's guts more than anyone else ever had, but thats what kept him interested. He didn't know how she fought, but he could guess in order to hit and run you'd need space to do so, and inside of a house... probably not the best place to try that. But more importantly, he didn't want to wreck her house, as it was easy to see it was just recently cleaned.

[color=#090]"Haha, I would never throw something in someone else's house unless they told me otherwise, that's just plain disrespectful.

And the genital mutilation I could live without thanks. But I would love to train with you sometime, see how your body moves and such... for combat of course."[/color] Tokaido added the last part in order to hopefully avoid the wrath of this Ishiguro with an anger management problem.

[color=#090]"And to answer your question, I think we are the most experienced members of the team they are creating. If that's the case, they may have expected us to take over and lead the team. Other then that, the only thing i can think of is i was blessed by some higher power to meet you in private, because i'd never kill you, hahaha."[/color]

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Wed Jun 05, 2013 10:46 am

			'[i][color=brown]I can't say the same, I'm very tempted to harm you.[/color][/i]' Nui thought to herself as she wanted this guy out of her apartment. She knew kicking him out was not gonna work, nor would telling him to leave. Although, she still needed to get the paperwork concerning this new team from the village to know what their purpose would be since the team was mostly higher ranks with a genin or two thrown in. "[color=brown]Yeah well your ass kicking is gonna wait, I've gotta head out and you're not staying in my place while I'm gone.[/color]"

Nui walked back into her room, grabbing her jacket and sandals as she slipped them on. Walking back out she motioned for the door. "[color=brown]That means get out.[/color]" The female chuunin was also gonna ask why she was paired with this basket case. She could understand the complimenting skill sets, but he was more likely to get stabbed by her than the enemy. If she wasn't so sure that she would get in trouble for it, she would jam something pointy into him too.

"[color=brown]Fucking village and their god damn teams. Why can't I be on the team of drunks?[/color]" She mumbled to herself as she grabbed her keys from her room and headed for the door to her apartment.

She knew kicking him out was not gonna work, nor would telling him to leave. "[color=brown]Yeah well your ass kicking is gonna wait, I've gotta head out and you're not staying in my place while I'm gone.[/color]"

Nui walked back into her room, grabbing her jacket and sandals as she slipped them on. Walking back out she motioned for the door. 			Tokaido got the foreboding feeling that Nui didn't want him around her right now. He could take a hint when he wanted to, but part of him wanted to go with her to talk about their team. [color=#090]"I understand you probably don't care very much for me, but still, a team is a team. I'd like to learn a bit about our team as well, why don't i come with you and we converse a bit about ourselves, try to make this "Getting Along" thing work."[/color]

This was Tokaido's last attempt, if she was really insistent about getting away from him, forcing himself onto her would probably result in alot of pain. He thought she was beautiful, but he could only get so close before he found a fist in his stomach, or worse. [color=#090]"You can't lie though, someone as fast as you makes the perfect cover for someone who needs to line up a shot like me. Maybe that's what the village had in mind, our abilities complement each other perfectly."[/color] Tokaido's expression was a bit more serious than he was when he originally arrived, he had put aside the fact that she was a woman at this point, for now at least.

			[i]

Author: Post

Tokaido got the foreboding feeling that Nui didn't want him around her right now. He could take a hint when he wanted to, but part of him wanted to go with her to talk about their team. [color=#090]"I understand you probably don't care very much for me, but still, a team is a team. I'd like to learn a bit about our team as well, why don't i come with you and we converse a bit about ourselves, try to make this "Getting Along" thing work."[/color]

This was Tokaido's last attempt, if she was really insistent about getting away from him, forcing himself onto her would probably result in alot of pain. He thought she was beautiful, but he could only get so close before he found a fist in his stomach, or worse. [color=#090]"You can't lie though, someone as fast as you makes the perfect cover for someone who needs to line up a shot like me. Maybe that's what the village had in mind, our abilities complement each other perfectly."[/color] Tokaido's expression was a bit more serious than he was when he originally arrived, he had put aside the fact that she was a woman at this point, for now at least.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Wed Jun 05, 2013 12:32 pm

			'[i][color=brown]Wait, did he just get serious for a second there? Holy shit, it's a miracle.[/color][/i]' Nui thought to herself as she was practically shoving him out the door. She closed it and locked it, slipping the key into her pocket before she looked at Tokaido. "[color=brown]Getting along depends more on how much you wanna keep hitting on me without earning some respect. To me you're no different than the guys in the bar that try to hit on me. I usually drink those lightweights under the table and go home to get myself off because very few prove themselves to be worth my time. And you're just like so far, all talk without earning your keep.[/color]"

Nui started down the hall as she pulled a pack of cigarettes out and light one up, flipping the lid on her engraved Ishiguro lighter closed as she looked back at Tokaido. "[color=brown]It will take more than sweet talk on me, and I doubt you can out drink me. Which means you're gonna have to earn my respect the hard way.[/color]" Nui said as her final say on the matter before she walked down the stairs off the complex.

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5635886/1/]Ishiguro Nui[/url] - Kumogakure Chuunin -  [color=brown][color=brown][/color]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5648698/1/]Awai Mariko[/url] - Konohagakure Chuunin - [color=#B2397F][color=#B2397F][/color]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5802714/1/]Jinrai Setsuko[/url] - Kumogakure Chuunin - [color=#D60270][color=#D60270][/color]

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5639545/1/]Toukai Mukade[/url] - Kirigakure Chuunin - [color=#8B7765][color=#8B7765][/color]

						[url=#top]
				[i][/i]
				Top
			[/url]

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: Post

'[i][color=brown]Wait, did he just get serious for a second there? Holy shit, it's a miracle.[/color][/i]' Nui thought to herself as she was practically shoving him out the door. She closed it and locked it, slipping the key into her pocket before she looked at Tokaido. "[color=brown]Getting along depends more on how much you wanna keep hitting on me without earning some respect. To me you're no different than the guys in the bar that try to hit on me. I usually drink those lightweights under the table and go home to get myself off because very few prove themselves to be worth my time. And you're just like so far, all talk without earning your keep.[/color]"

Nui started down the hall as she pulled a pack of cigarettes out and light one up, flipping the lid on her engraved Ishiguro lighter closed as she looked back at Tokaido. "[color=brown]It will take more than sweet talk on me, and I doubt you can out drink me. Which means you're gonna have to earn my respect the hard way.[/color]" Nui said as her final say on the matter before she walked down the stairs off the complex.

------------------------------------------------------------

			[color=#090]"Let me just say you're the only girl i've ever met that's completely immune to my charm. Most of the time I can hear their hearts pounding as I swoon them, but not you, you're different. I'll ease up on the hitting for now, but this isn't over."[/color] Tokaido decided to give her some space for now. Better to leave now and devise a strategy for this catch then stay and risk fumbling what chance he had left. This battle was lost, but now that he knew what he was up against, the war was sure to be an interesting sight. He left down the complex stairs, then went in the opposite direction of Nui, to go back to his house and think about his game-plan.

Author: Post

[color=#090]"Let me just say you're the only girl i've ever met that's completely immune to my charm. Most of the time I can hear their hearts pounding as I swoon them, but not you, you're different. I'll ease up on the hitting for now, but this isn't over."[/color] Tokaido decided to give her some space for now. Better to leave now and devise a strategy for this catch then stay and risk fumbling what chance he had left. This battle was lost, but now that he knew what he was up against, the war was sure to be an interesting sight. He left down the complex stairs, then went in the opposite direction of Nui, to go back to his house and think about his game-plan.

Now, here you can keep all the topics that you've been in with each character.  You can format it however you like, but make sure you have it so you can keep track.

This will help you out if you need to make sure you have enough topics for a rank up. <o/

Searching for his parents
His parents are alive

Archives/records

All affiliates to his grandfather

Birth records

Academy graduation records

Searching for his surname
The discovery of the name (Mother’s maiden name)
He tracks them down
Learns he has a sister
Finds his sister
Same girl that he had met [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=?p=905627&t=4006296]that day[/url]

Archives/records

All affiliates to his grandfather

Birth records

Learns he has a sister

=== THREAD: [Accepted]Hideyoshi, Tokaido - Naruto Saigen Roleplay ===
Forum: Home Board index General Section Member Section Old Forum Archives and Discussion Archives Finished Applications > Home Board index

Author: (unknown)

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/][/url]
				Naruto Saigen Roleplay
				Naruto Saigen RP is a text-based roleplay forum set in an alternate universe of the Naruto series.

Author: 

[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325][i][/url]
								[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url]

		[b]Posts:[/b] [url=./search.php?author_id=1869325&sr=posts]7571[/url]		[b]Joined:[/b] Sat Apr 27, 2013 6:00 pm

											[b]Location:[/b] Moline, IL
												[b]Grading Tier:[/b] Seinen

				[b]Contact:[/b]

					[url=#]

																	[url=./ucp.php?i=pm&mode=compose&action=quotepost&p=1539322]

									[/url]

						[url=#p1539322][Accepted]Hideyoshi, Tokaido[/url]

									[url=./viewtopic.php?p=1539322#p1539322]
						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Sat May 25, 2013 4:05 pm

			[b]Username:[/b] [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325/]TyDie[/url]

[b]Points:[/b] 0/0

[b]Coupon:[/b]

[b]Companions:[/b] (0/4)

[b]Hideyoshi, Tokaido[/b]

“Farshot”

[throwing weapons and women… what else do I need?]

[b]General Information[/b]

[b]Age:[/b] 19

[b]Gender:[/b] Male

[b]Height:[/b] 6’1 feet

[b]Weight:[/b] 160 pounds

[b]Hair:[/b] Tokaido’s hair is black and usually kept in a ponytail about 6 inches long, with his bangs coming down on the sides and a part going down the middle of his scalp.

[b]Eyes:[/b] His eyes are bright green, and change between easygoing and sharp based on his personality.

[b]Physical Features:[/b] Tokaido’s body is reasonably toned, but not incredibly muscular. He bears quite a few scars on his body, mainly from training and messing up with his weapons. His most notable feature is his eyes, being very bright green they catch a lot of attention, and his largest scar goes across his left eye diagonally, from eyebrow to cheek.

[b]Clothing/Accessories:[/b] Tokaido’s mission outfit is pretty simple compared to most. He wears a black vest with a sleeveless black shirt underneath, form-fitting dark red pants, and a belt with 2 different shuriken holster positioned on the front of it. Two pouches hangs from the sides of his hips, each filled with his throwing weapons and tags. He also wears a pair of black boots that end at the bottom of the shin. Outside of missions, he usually tries to wear nice looking clothing, in order to look good for the ladies. This can range from formal dress clothing to a simple shirt and pants outfit, depending on where he’s located.

[b]Forehead Protector:[/b] Tokaido wears it on his right arm, around the bicep.

[b]Personality:[/b] Tokaido is a ladies man, pure and simple. He loves being around women, and uses his “loner” style to help him along the way. He is incredibly charming, quick to compliment, and a silver tongued devil when it comes to anything having to do with women. He goes out of his way to attempt to impress them, and very rarely does he take “no” for an answer, and even if he does, he’ll try again later.

Outside of the womanizing, Tokaido is actually a pretty sweet guy. He cares about most everyone he knows, and he’s generally friendly towards everyone. The only exception to this is when he’s on a mission or something serious. When this happens, his entire persona changes to that of a truly serious ninja, and puts mission success above all else, even his own life. He prefers not to mention this to others, because he doesn’t particularly like this side of himself, but he understands its necessity.

[b]Picture:[/b]

[b]Battle Information[/b]
[b]Rank:[/b] Chuunin

[b]Village:[/b] Kumogakure no Sato

[b]Chakra Affinity:[/b] Raiton

[b]Second Chakra Affinity:[/b]

[b]Stats[/b]
[b]Ninjutsu:[/b]7
[b]Taijutsu:[/b]5
[b]Genjutsu:[/b]1
[b]Stamina:[/b]5
[b]Control:[/b]7
[b]Strength:[/b]5
[b]Speed:[/b]5
[b]Wit: [/b]5

[b]Equipment:[/b]

40x shuriken kept in 2 separate holsters on the front of his belt, each holding 20.

40x Makibishi kept in a pouch on his left hip

40x Kunai kept in a pouch on his right hip

10 exploding tags and 5 flash tags kept in a separate pocket in the pouch on his left hip

[b]Combat Style:[/b] Tokaido is an expert at throwing weapons. shuriken, kunai and Makibishi are his standard weaponry.

His specialty is long distance shots, and he makes them with surprising accuracy. He uses Flawless aim for ranged combat, and relies on Raiton techniques for close range combat and defense.

Flawless Aim: This is a style of weaponry skills long favored by specialists in ranged weapons. Users of this style focus on their eyes and hands, trying as best they can to achieve perfect synergy between their ability to analyze information and their ability to act on it.

[b]Jutsu Information[/b]
[b]Abilities:[/b]

[b]Jutsu:[/b]

Flawless AimShow *[color=indigo][b]Rotation Shot[/b][/color]

D-Rank Taijutsu

The user has perfected the art of adding spiral on the release of a thrown projectile, increasing the distance and accuracy of such attacks. Throws made using Rotation Shot are considered +1 Strength solely for the purpose of determining range.

*[color=indigo][b]Sighting[/b][/color]

D-Rank Taijutsu

[b]Prerequisite:[/b] Wit 4

After many hours of training with ranged weaponry, the user is much better able to estimate distances and track moving targets in hectic situations. Such assessments become completely instinctive, allowing the user to change targets seemlessly without losing time between attacks. This technique forms the basis for many of the other techniques in this style.

*[color=indigo][b]Dangerous Position[/b][/color]

D-Rank Taijutsu

[b]Prerequisite:[/b] Taijutsu 4

The difference between combat and training is danger and unpredictability. The user of this technique is experienced at loosing weapons from positions other than a set stance, maintaining offense even while acting on the defense or recovering from a fall. Such attacks are made at full Strength and accuracy.

*[color=indigo][b]Prediction Shot[/b][/color]

C-Rank Taijutsu

[b]Prerequisite:[/b] Sighting

Relying on the ability to discern distance and track targets, the user makes a ranged attack on a moving target. Assuming that the target's speed and direction remain the same, shots made with this technique "lead" the correct amount to almost certainly strike true.

*[color=indigo][b]Bursting Shot[/b][/color]

C-Rank Nintaijutsu

The user performs the necessary handseals, channeling chakra into a projectile weapon as they draw it. The weapon flies normally, though it will appear to glow faintly with visible chakra. Upon impact, any damage the ranged attack would normally inflict is augmented with the force of 1.5 exploding tags.
TaijutsuShow [b]*Ambidexterity[/b]

D - Ranked Taijutsu

Requires: 5 Taijutsu

After extensive practice and training the character has gained equal strength and skill between their two hands. This allows them to perform any action with either hand at exactly the same skill level and strength.

[b]*Skillful Wield[/b]

D-Ranked Taijutsu

Prerequisite: 3 wit

With a solid foundation of knowledge on their choice of weaponry, those with the Skillful Wield technique are able to utilize their weapon more fully. By knowing the weapon's weakest points, the user is able to avoid presenting these areas to damage during combat, thus making their weapon less likely to break by means of recklessness.

[b]*Seamless Skill[/b]

D-Ranked Taijutsu

Prerequisite: 3 wit

A skill utilized by those on the path to mastery of their weapon, users of Seamless Skill are actively able to transition between offensive and defensive usage of the aforementioned weapon. By transitioning so seamlessly, the user is able to save a marginal amount of energy while attacking.

[b]*Shadow Shuriken Technique[/b]

D-Ranked Taijutsu

Prerequisite: User must possess shuriken of some variation

With little to its application, this technique requires the user to have at least two shuriken to use. When throwing the shuriken at the opponent, the user will throw another that will travel beneath the first, concealing itself within its shadow. By doing so, this allows the second shuriken to go undetected as it makes its approach toward the target. Both shuriken travel at a speed dictated by the user's strength stat unless stated otherwise.
RaitonShow [b][color=#fe0]*[Raiton • Clone][/color][/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After the user does the needed hand seals, a clone, lacking substance and the ability to interact with its environment, will form. These clones are destroyed after coming into contact with any physical object. As these clones have no free will, they are unable to do more than mimic the user's movements. However, unlike normal clones, these are filled with Raiton chakra. Whenever they disperse, they create a small blast of Raiton chakra in 1 meter in each direction causing slight shocks and numbness. The clone has the following stats:
Taijutsu: 1
Stamina: 1
Strength: 1
Speed: 1

[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element• Shock Treatment][/color]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the proper hand seals, the user's hands become electrically charged and they are able to use small currents of electricity to wake up someone who was knocked out. To add to this, these charges can stimulate the brain of someone who's conscious. This stimulation can wake those drifting to sleep or momentarily get rid of any grogginess caused by fatigue for four posts. This jutsu can’t bring targets out of genjutsu, however nor can it add wit.

[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element • Ground Spike Technique][/color]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing a string of hand seals and stomping on the ground, the user emits five bolts of lightning in a line. Each bolt is two yards apart from the one before it (giving the jutsu a total range of ten yards from the user), rising 3 feet into the air from the ground in succession, starting from the farthest one with a speed equal to the user's control with a maximum of six. These bolts are pure energy; they aren’t solid so they aren’t effective in stopping objects. The shock created by the jutsu, however, causes the targets body to jerk and sends a mild pain equivalent to getting stabbed in the hand throughout the body for a brief second. This technique isn’t very devastating, but it’s useful in stopping charging enemies.

[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element • Thunder Blade][/color]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

The user generates a length of arching electricity, up to five feet long, from their fist after performing the necessary hand seals. This 'blade' of lightning can strike a single enemy once, leaving behind a pain as bad as a shallow stab to the area of impact. The impact also cause minor first and second degree electrical burns. If something comes between the 'blade' and the user it will disrupt the jutsu, ending it prematurely. If this blade isn’t used or destroyed, it stays together for up to 6 posts.

[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element • Electric Wire Technique][/color]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

The user creates a wire of electricity between their hands. This wire can be placed between two objects, like two trees or two rocks that are up to 10 meters apart. The user has to touch one of the objects and then drag the Raiton wire to the other object and attach it there. Upon being touched, the wire can trip targets while also delivering a painful shock to the limb that touched it, followed by paralysis to said limb. The paralysis lasts for one post, and the wire can sustain itself for up to 4 posts or until dismissed.

[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element • Elephant Fist][/color]

B-Rank Ninjutsu

By performing some hand seals and focusing Raiton chakra into their fist, causing it to spark and crackle, the user can greatly amplify the power of one punch. Once the user delivers a punch with the hand that this jutsu was used on, the Raiton will suddenly rush forwards into the targets body. This creates a blast with a power that pushes the target back at least ten feet if they have less than seven strength. The punch also causes the area it hit to go numb for another three posts, limiting the targets mobility with said limb.

[b]History[/b]

Tokaido Hideyoshi was born 19 years ago to an average family with no real notoriety. his mother died shortly after birth, so his father raised Tokaido by himself. Growing up as a child, Tokaido's life was much like every other kids. He had a few friends here and there, but for some reason he always had more female friends than male. His father always told him he would grow up to be a heartbreaker, but at the time he had no idea what that meant. When he was 4, Tokaido was accidently caught in the sights of an academy student's kunai knife, heading straight for his head. Out of complete reaction, he caught the blade and threw it back with unerring accuracy, striking the boy in his leg. While he was punished for injuring the boy by his father, this event was the moment when he realized his life's calling: Becoming a ninja.

He entered the academy at age 5, and at first was kind of shunned for having no innate talent or recognition. When it came to throwing weapon training though, everything changed. His accuracy was uncanny for a new student, and he quickly earned the respect of his classmates, outdoing everyone else by a wide margin in weapon throwing. He then knew that throwing weapons were to be his specialty. After growing up a bit, around the age of 10, he quickly started to realize that many of the female academy students had crushes on him. He decided to roll with it, and from then on, his charm and charisma won the heart of just about any girl he wanted. His father was slightly concerned with this, thinking maybe it was a means of coping with not having a mother, but he was mainly proud of his son for being great with the girls. Tokaido graduated from the academy at the age of 13, with slightly below average grades, due to his newfound "skill" with girls taking up most of his study time.

After becoming a Genin, Tokaido was a bit more full of himself, especially when it came to women. He took his missions very seriously though, to a point that most people didn't even recognize him. He realized this quickly, but for some reason couldn't change it. it was like an alternate personality would come out whenever a situation turned serious. At first he hated it, he felt like he wasn't himself, and it put a stop to his romance for a time while he found himself. After a lot of thought, he finally deduced that this "other side" was his method of suppressing his normal attitude in favor of a more serious one, for the purposes of doing his job. While he still didn't truly like it, he grew to accept it, though he still hides it from people if possible. After completing various Genin missions and spending a few years practicing his methods, he entered the Chuunin exams with a Female Ishiguro. They passed on their first try with flying colors, proving to be adept both as a team and individually. Tokaido became a Chuunin at the age of 18, just before his 19th birthday.

Tokaido spent alot more time with the girls after he became a chuunin, becoming a total womanizer at this point. He became so confident in himself that he would challenge himself to get a different girl to be with him every night. He never actually slept with the girls he womanized though, and is still a virgin to this day. His only real drive in life nowadays is hitting on pretty women and improving his ninja abilities.

			[i]
