			[b]Username:[/b] [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325/]TyDie[/url]

[b]Points:[/b] 0/0

[b]Coupon:[/b]

[b]Companions:[/b] (0/4)

[b]Hideyoshi, Tokaido[/b]

“Farshot”

[throwing weapons and women… what else do I need?]

[b]General Information[/b]

[b]Age:[/b] 19

[b]Gender:[/b] Male

[b]Height:[/b] 6’1 feet

[b]Weight:[/b] 160 pounds

[b]Hair:[/b] Tokaido’s hair is black and usually kept in a ponytail about 6 inches long, with his bangs coming down on the sides and a part going down the middle of his scalp.

[b]Eyes:[/b] His eyes are bright green, and change between easygoing and sharp based on his personality.

[b]Physical Features:[/b] Tokaido’s body is reasonably toned, but not incredibly muscular. He bears quite a few scars on his body, mainly from training and messing up with his weapons. His most notable feature is his eyes, being very bright green they catch a lot of attention, and his largest scar goes across his left eye diagonally, from eyebrow to cheek.

[b]Clothing/Accessories:[/b] Tokaido’s mission outfit is pretty simple compared to most. He wears a black vest with a sleeveless black shirt underneath, form-fitting dark red pants, and a belt with 2 different shuriken holster positioned on the front of it. Two pouches hangs from the sides of his hips, each filled with his throwing weapons and tags. He also wears a pair of black boots that end at the bottom of the shin. Outside of missions, he usually tries to wear nice looking clothing, in order to look good for the ladies. This can range from formal dress clothing to a simple shirt and pants outfit, depending on where he’s located.

[b]Forehead Protector:[/b] Tokaido wears it on his right arm, around the bicep.

[b]Personality:[/b] Tokaido is a ladies man, pure and simple. He loves being around women, and uses his “loner” style to help him along the way. He is incredibly charming, quick to compliment, and a silver tongued devil when it comes to anything having to do with women. He goes out of his way to attempt to impress them, and very rarely does he take “no” for an answer, and even if he does, he’ll try again later.

Outside of the womanizing, Tokaido is actually a pretty sweet guy. He cares about most everyone he knows, and he’s generally friendly towards everyone. The only exception to this is when he’s on a mission or something serious. When this happens, his entire persona changes to that of a truly serious ninja, and puts mission success above all else, even his own life. He prefers not to mention this to others, because he doesn’t particularly like this side of himself, but he understands its necessity.

[b]Picture:[/b]

[b]Battle Information[/b]
[b]Rank:[/b] Chuunin

[b]Village:[/b] Kumogakure no Sato

[b]Chakra Affinity:[/b] Raiton

[b]Second Chakra Affinity:[/b]

[b]Stats[/b]
[b]Ninjutsu:[/b]7
[b]Taijutsu:[/b]5
[b]Genjutsu:[/b]1
[b]Stamina:[/b]5
[b]Control:[/b]7
[b]Strength:[/b]5
[b]Speed:[/b]5
[b]Wit: [/b]5

[b]Equipment:[/b]

40x shuriken kept in 2 separate holsters on the front of his belt, each holding 20.

40x Makibishi kept in a pouch on his left hip

40x Kunai kept in a pouch on his right hip

10 exploding tags and 5 flash tags kept in a separate pocket in the pouch on his left hip

[b]Combat Style:[/b] Tokaido is an expert at throwing weapons. shuriken, kunai and Makibishi are his standard weaponry.

His specialty is long distance shots, and he makes them with surprising accuracy. He uses Flawless aim for ranged combat, and relies on Raiton techniques for close range combat and defense.

Flawless Aim: This is a style of weaponry skills long favored by specialists in ranged weapons. Users of this style focus on their eyes and hands, trying as best they can to achieve perfect synergy between their ability to analyze information and their ability to act on it.

[b]Jutsu Information[/b]
[b]Abilities:[/b]

[b]Jutsu:[/b]

Flawless AimShow *[color=indigo][b]Rotation Shot[/b][/color]

D-Rank Taijutsu

The user has perfected the art of adding spiral on the release of a thrown projectile, increasing the distance and accuracy of such attacks. Throws made using Rotation Shot are considered +1 Strength solely for the purpose of determining range.

*[color=indigo][b]Sighting[/b][/color]

D-Rank Taijutsu

[b]Prerequisite:[/b] Wit 4

After many hours of training with ranged weaponry, the user is much better able to estimate distances and track moving targets in hectic situations. Such assessments become completely instinctive, allowing the user to change targets seemlessly without losing time between attacks. This technique forms the basis for many of the other techniques in this style.

*[color=indigo][b]Dangerous Position[/b][/color]

D-Rank Taijutsu

[b]Prerequisite:[/b] Taijutsu 4

The difference between combat and training is danger and unpredictability. The user of this technique is experienced at loosing weapons from positions other than a set stance, maintaining offense even while acting on the defense or recovering from a fall. Such attacks are made at full Strength and accuracy.

*[color=indigo][b]Prediction Shot[/b][/color]

C-Rank Taijutsu

[b]Prerequisite:[/b] Sighting

Relying on the ability to discern distance and track targets, the user makes a ranged attack on a moving target. Assuming that the target's speed and direction remain the same, shots made with this technique "lead" the correct amount to almost certainly strike true.

*[color=indigo][b]Bursting Shot[/b][/color]

C-Rank Nintaijutsu

The user performs the necessary handseals, channeling chakra into a projectile weapon as they draw it. The weapon flies normally, though it will appear to glow faintly with visible chakra. Upon impact, any damage the ranged attack would normally inflict is augmented with the force of 1.5 exploding tags.
TaijutsuShow [b]*Ambidexterity[/b]

D - Ranked Taijutsu

Requires: 5 Taijutsu

After extensive practice and training the character has gained equal strength and skill between their two hands. This allows them to perform any action with either hand at exactly the same skill level and strength.

[b]*Skillful Wield[/b]

D-Ranked Taijutsu

Prerequisite: 3 wit

With a solid foundation of knowledge on their choice of weaponry, those with the Skillful Wield technique are able to utilize their weapon more fully. By knowing the weapon's weakest points, the user is able to avoid presenting these areas to damage during combat, thus making their weapon less likely to break by means of recklessness.

[b]*Seamless Skill[/b]

D-Ranked Taijutsu

Prerequisite: 3 wit

A skill utilized by those on the path to mastery of their weapon, users of Seamless Skill are actively able to transition between offensive and defensive usage of the aforementioned weapon. By transitioning so seamlessly, the user is able to save a marginal amount of energy while attacking.

[b]*Shadow Shuriken Technique[/b]

D-Ranked Taijutsu

Prerequisite: User must possess shuriken of some variation

With little to its application, this technique requires the user to have at least two shuriken to use. When throwing the shuriken at the opponent, the user will throw another that will travel beneath the first, concealing itself within its shadow. By doing so, this allows the second shuriken to go undetected as it makes its approach toward the target. Both shuriken travel at a speed dictated by the user's strength stat unless stated otherwise.
RaitonShow [b][color=#fe0]*[Raiton • Clone][/color][/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After the user does the needed hand seals, a clone, lacking substance and the ability to interact with its environment, will form. These clones are destroyed after coming into contact with any physical object. As these clones have no free will, they are unable to do more than mimic the user's movements. However, unlike normal clones, these are filled with Raiton chakra. Whenever they disperse, they create a small blast of Raiton chakra in 1 meter in each direction causing slight shocks and numbness. The clone has the following stats:
Taijutsu: 1
Stamina: 1
Strength: 1
Speed: 1

[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element• Shock Treatment][/color]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the proper hand seals, the user's hands become electrically charged and they are able to use small currents of electricity to wake up someone who was knocked out. To add to this, these charges can stimulate the brain of someone who's conscious. This stimulation can wake those drifting to sleep or momentarily get rid of any grogginess caused by fatigue for four posts. This jutsu can’t bring targets out of genjutsu, however nor can it add wit.

[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element • Ground Spike Technique][/color]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing a string of hand seals and stomping on the ground, the user emits five bolts of lightning in a line. Each bolt is two yards apart from the one before it (giving the jutsu a total range of ten yards from the user), rising 3 feet into the air from the ground in succession, starting from the farthest one with a speed equal to the user's control with a maximum of six. These bolts are pure energy; they aren’t solid so they aren’t effective in stopping objects. The shock created by the jutsu, however, causes the targets body to jerk and sends a mild pain equivalent to getting stabbed in the hand throughout the body for a brief second. This technique isn’t very devastating, but it’s useful in stopping charging enemies.

[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element • Thunder Blade][/color]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

The user generates a length of arching electricity, up to five feet long, from their fist after performing the necessary hand seals. This 'blade' of lightning can strike a single enemy once, leaving behind a pain as bad as a shallow stab to the area of impact. The impact also cause minor first and second degree electrical burns. If something comes between the 'blade' and the user it will disrupt the jutsu, ending it prematurely. If this blade isn’t used or destroyed, it stays together for up to 6 posts.

[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element • Electric Wire Technique][/color]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

The user creates a wire of electricity between their hands. This wire can be placed between two objects, like two trees or two rocks that are up to 10 meters apart. The user has to touch one of the objects and then drag the Raiton wire to the other object and attach it there. Upon being touched, the wire can trip targets while also delivering a painful shock to the limb that touched it, followed by paralysis to said limb. The paralysis lasts for one post, and the wire can sustain itself for up to 4 posts or until dismissed.

[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element • Elephant Fist][/color]

B-Rank Ninjutsu

By performing some hand seals and focusing Raiton chakra into their fist, causing it to spark and crackle, the user can greatly amplify the power of one punch. Once the user delivers a punch with the hand that this jutsu was used on, the Raiton will suddenly rush forwards into the targets body. This creates a blast with a power that pushes the target back at least ten feet if they have less than seven strength. The punch also causes the area it hit to go numb for another three posts, limiting the targets mobility with said limb.

[b]History[/b]

Tokaido Hideyoshi was born 19 years ago to an average family with no real notoriety. his mother died shortly after birth, so his father raised Tokaido by himself. Growing up as a child, Tokaido's life was much like every other kids. He had a few friends here and there, but for some reason he always had more female friends than male. His father always told him he would grow up to be a heartbreaker, but at the time he had no idea what that meant. When he was 4, Tokaido was accidently caught in the sights of an academy student's kunai knife, heading straight for his head. Out of complete reaction, he caught the blade and threw it back with unerring accuracy, striking the boy in his leg. While he was punished for injuring the boy by his father, this event was the moment when he realized his life's calling: Becoming a ninja.

He entered the academy at age 5, and at first was kind of shunned for having no innate talent or recognition. When it came to throwing weapon training though, everything changed. His accuracy was uncanny for a new student, and he quickly earned the respect of his classmates, outdoing everyone else by a wide margin in weapon throwing. He then knew that throwing weapons were to be his specialty. After growing up a bit, around the age of 10, he quickly started to realize that many of the female academy students had crushes on him. He decided to roll with it, and from then on, his charm and charisma won the heart of just about any girl he wanted. His father was slightly concerned with this, thinking maybe it was a means of coping with not having a mother, but he was mainly proud of his son for being great with the girls. Tokaido graduated from the academy at the age of 13, with slightly below average grades, due to his newfound "skill" with girls taking up most of his study time.

After becoming a Genin, Tokaido was a bit more full of himself, especially when it came to women. He took his missions very seriously though, to a point that most people didn't even recognize him. He realized this quickly, but for some reason couldn't change it. it was like an alternate personality would come out whenever a situation turned serious. At first he hated it, he felt like he wasn't himself, and it put a stop to his romance for a time while he found himself. After a lot of thought, he finally deduced that this "other side" was his method of suppressing his normal attitude in favor of a more serious one, for the purposes of doing his job. While he still didn't truly like it, he grew to accept it, though he still hides it from people if possible. After completing various Genin missions and spending a few years practicing his methods, he entered the Chuunin exams with a Female Ishiguro. They passed on their first try with flying colors, proving to be adept both as a team and individually. Tokaido became a Chuunin at the age of 18, just before his 19th birthday.

Tokaido spent alot more time with the girls after he became a chuunin, becoming a total womanizer at this point. He became so confident in himself that he would challenge himself to get a different girl to be with him every night. He never actually slept with the girls he womanized though, and is still a virgin to this day. His only real drive in life nowadays is hitting on pretty women and improving his ninja abilities.

			[i]

[b]Companions:[/b] (0/4)

[b]Hideyoshi, Tokaido[/b]

“Farshot”

[throwing weapons and women… what else do I need?]

[b]General Information[/b]

[b]Age:[/b] 19

[b]Gender:[/b] Male

[b]Height:[/b] 6’1 feet

[b]History[/b]

Tokaido Hideyoshi was born 19 years ago to an average family with no real notoriety. his mother died shortly after birth, so his father raised Tokaido by himself. Growing up as a child, Tokaido's life was much like every other kids. He had a few friends here and there, but for some reason he always had more female friends than male. His father always told him he would grow up to be a heartbreaker, but at the time he had no idea what that meant. When he was 4, Tokaido was accidently caught in the sights of an academy student's kunai knife, heading straight for his head. Out of complete reaction, he caught the blade and threw it back with unerring accuracy, striking the boy in his leg. While he was punished for injuring the boy by his father, this event was the moment when he realized his life's calling: Becoming a ninja.

He entered the academy at age 5, and at first was kind of shunned for having no innate talent or recognition. When it came to throwing weapon training though, everything changed. His accuracy was uncanny for a new student, and he quickly earned the respect of his classmates, outdoing everyone else by a wide margin in weapon throwing. He then knew that throwing weapons were to be his specialty. After growing up a bit, around the age of 10, he quickly started to realize that many of the female academy students had crushes on him. He decided to roll with it, and from then on, his charm and charisma won the heart of just about any girl he wanted. His father was slightly concerned with this, thinking maybe it was a means of coping with not having a mother, but he was mainly proud of his son for being great with the girls. Tokaido graduated from the academy at the age of 13, with slightly below average grades, due to his newfound "skill" with girls taking up most of his study time.

After becoming a Genin, Tokaido was a bit more full of himself, especially when it came to women. He took his missions very seriously though, to a point that most people didn't even recognize him. He realized this quickly, but for some reason couldn't change it. it was like an alternate personality would come out whenever a situation turned serious. At first he hated it, he felt like he wasn't himself, and it put a stop to his romance for a time while he found himself. After a lot of thought, he finally deduced that this "other side" was his method of suppressing his normal attitude in favor of a more serious one, for the purposes of doing his job. While he still didn't truly like it, he grew to accept it, though he still hides it from people if possible. After completing various Genin missions and spending a few years practicing his methods, he entered the Chuunin exams with a Female Ishiguro. They passed on their first try with flying colors, proving to be adept both as a team and individually. Tokaido became a Chuunin at the age of 18, just before his 19th birthday.

Tokaido spent alot more time with the girls after he became a chuunin, becoming a total womanizer at this point. He became so confident in himself that he would challenge himself to get a different girl to be with him every night. He never actually slept with the girls he womanized though, and is still a virgin to this day. His only real drive in life nowadays is hitting on pretty women and improving his ninja abilities.

			How long is the ponytail?

[quote]

His specialty is long distance shots, and his focus is sniping from a hidden area, then changing positions to confuse the enemy. He uses Flawless aim for ranged combat, and relies on Raiton techniques for close range combat and defense.
[/quote] Mind combining the sentences into a neater paragraph? It looks choppy this way.

Nothing else wrong to me.

[quote]

His specialty is long distance shots, and his focus is sniping from a hidden area, then changing positions to confuse the enemy. He uses Flawless aim for ranged combat, and relies on Raiton techniques for close range combat and defense.

Actually Vy, we had a talk about this last year and as long as he's strong enough to carry them, he can have more or less as many non-ability weapons as he wants at startup, [i]especially[/i] with a character that specializes in weapon heavy combat.

=== THREAD: [Accepted]Ouji, Sanjuku - Naruto Saigen Roleplay ===
Forum: Home Board index General Section Member Section Old Forum Archives and Discussion Archives Finished Applications > Home Board index

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: (unknown)

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/][/url]
				Naruto Saigen Roleplay
				Naruto Saigen RP is a text-based roleplay forum set in an alternate universe of the Naruto series.
				[url=#start_here]Skip to content[/url]

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: 

[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325][i][/url]
								[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url]

		[b]Posts:[/b] [url=./search.php?author_id=1869325&sr=posts]7571[/url]		[b]Joined:[/b] Sat Apr 27, 2013 6:00 pm

											[b]Location:[/b] Moline, IL
												[b]Grading Tier:[/b] Seinen

				[b]Contact:[/b]

					[url=#]
						PM
					[/url]

																	[url=./ucp.php?i=pm&mode=compose&action=quotepost&p=1530896]
										Send private message
									[/url]

						[url=#p1530896][Accepted]Ouji, Sanjuku[/url]

									[url=./viewtopic.php?p=1530896#p1530896]
						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Sat May 11, 2013 4:55 am

			[b]Username:[/b] [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325/] TyDie[/url]

[b]Points:[/b] 0/0

[b]Coupon:[/b]

[b]Companions:[/b] (0/4)

[b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=2678381/1/#new] Ouji[/url], Sanjuku [/b]

[“No matter what you do, do it with style”]

[b]General Information[/b]
[b]Age:[/b] 13

[b]Gender:[/b] Male

[b]Height:[/b] 5'6

[b]Weight:[/b] 130 Pounds

[b]Hair:[/b] Sanjuku's Hair is about 5 inches long, spiked to the back right side of his head, and black in color.

[b]Eyes:[/b] Sanjuku's eyes are emerald, appearing very sharp and refined.

[b]Physical Features:[/b] Sanjuku has a lean muscular frame, with traces of muscle definition usually showing through his regular clothing. He has broad shoulders and long legs, and smooth olive skin showing he takes his appearance seriously.

He has no scars on his body, as he prefers to have them all healed as best as possible to avoid "messing up his appearance".

[b]Clothing/Accessories:[/b] He normally wears a black sleeveless tank-top underneath a red jacket and a pair of baggy pants in matching color. The Symbol of Suna is sown into the back of his jacket. When not on missions he normally wears something akin to his mission outfit, the pants are usually a different color ranging from dark green to bright yellow and the tank top is always black. He usually doesn't wear his red jacket unless its cold or hes wearing his mission outfit. But he usually wears his Mission outfit whenever possible.

[b]Forehead Protector:[/b] He wears it on his head, like a normal ninja would.

[b]Personality:[/b] To put it simply, Sanjuku thinks he's top shit. He doesn't try to put anyone else down, but he's very prideful and full of himself. Some would even call him selfish, and that he cares only for himself, but anyone close to him knows he can be very loyal as a friend. He takes insulting remarks very poorly, but only if the person knows him, strangers words dont mean anything, Although he doesn't let on about this at all.

Sanjuku doesnt actively seek fights, but he isn't one to shirk away from one either. He prefers not to terribly injure someone unless he has to though. However, he is very protective of anyone he calls friend, and will quickly end the life of anyone endangering one, no questions asked. It isn't easy to impress Sanjuku, but doing so is a quick way to get on his good side, as he admires those with power. He is indifferent to people he hasn't met, giving everyone a fair chance to earn his respect, but rarely does he give anyone a second oppurtunity should they get on his bad side.

[b]Battle Information[/b]
[b]Rank:[/b] Genin

[b]Village:[/b] Sunagakure no Sato

[b]Chakra Affinity:[/b] Fuuton

[b]Second Chakra Affinity:[/b]

[b]Stats[/b]
[b]Ninjutsu:[/b] 4
[b]Taijutsu:[/b] 4
[b]Genjutsu:[/b] 1
[b]Stamina:[/b] 3
[b]Control:[/b] 3
[b]Strength:[/b] 3
[b]Speed:[/b] 3
[b]Wit: [/b]3

[b]Equipment:[/b]

20 shuriken in a holster on his right hip

5 smoke bombs in his pouch

5 explosive tags in his pouch

10 kunai in his pouch

5 flash tags in his pouch

He wears a pair of bladed gauntlets, one on each arm. the blade starts along the outside of the forearm, just off the wrist, and continues past the elbow by a foot. The blades are each about 2 feet in length overall. The gauntlet itself is a fingerless kote made of black leather and lacquer, tying along the inside of the forearm. because it's fingerless and light, it doesn't interfere with handseal construction. The blades themselves are chakra sensitive and capable of being utilized in conjunction with ninjutsu.

[b]Combat Style:[/b] Sanjuku focuses on using his bladed gauntlets in combat, backed up by the slashing power of his fuuton techniques and the Ouji's time stop Doujutsu. He trains Taijutsu techniques revolved around using his elbows or punches to maximize the effectiveness of the blades.

[b]Jutsu Information[/b]
[b]Abilities:[/b][b][color=gold][Todomeru Me [i][Freezing Eye][/i][/color][/b]

The Freezing Eye is the doujutsu of the Ouji clan. Whenever it isn't activated, nothing is different about the clan member, and all of their clan jutsu are sealed. Whenever activated, the eye of the clan member turns a light gold color and forms 72 black tick marks in the user's eye, with roman numerals at each hour mark. There are five ticks between each number, with a tick on each number, totalling 72 ticks. The ticker, which is easily seen and keeps track of the number of ticks that have been used up starts at 12 and makes it way around the eye in a clockwise manner. Once it hits 12 again, everything the clan member has stopped will become animated again, and the doujutsu will force the owner's eyes shut, as it changes back to a normal eye, sealing itself for 48 hours.

The ability to use the doujutsu is controlled by the user's control, and ninjutsu stats. Control is how well the user can stop an object, while the ninjutsu stat regulates how large of an object the clan member can stop. Additionally, all clan jutsu require stamina, just as every other ninjutsu.

The main prize of this doujutsu is the ability to 'stop time' which effectively is suspending a non-living, visible object in space. This is limited to non-living objects that aren't connected to a living object, meaning that clothing that is attached to someone is unaffected. Also, this goes in terms of all equipment, so people are treated as a singular object, with anything on their person being immune to the stop effects. However, a technique that has a prerequisite of 15 or higher is able to bypass this drawback. However, the jutsu will only work at 3/4ths of the user's control, rather than the full amount.

Todomeru Me jutsu go in the Ninpou pyramid.

[b]Jutsu:[/b]

NinpouShow ~Stop: Microscopic Solid

E-Ranked Ninjutsu

The user concentrates on a solid object that is 2 inches squared or less (standard senbon). The object will then be stopped, based on the user's control. Based on the user's ninjutsu stat, the ticker moves X ticks.

Ninjutsu stat of 3: 10 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 5: 5 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 7: 1 tick

~Stop: Microscopic Plasma

E-Ranked Ninjutsu

The user concentrates on a plasma that is around the size of a finger. The plasma will then be stopped, based on the user's control minus one. Based on the user's ninjutsu stat, the ticker moves X ticks.

Ninjutsu stat of 3: 10 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 5: 5 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 7: 1 tick

~Stop: Small Solid

D-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: ~Stop: Microscopic Solid

The user concentrates on a solid object that is about the size of a football The object will then be stopped, based on the user's control. Based on the user's ninjutsu stat, the ticker moves X ticks.

Ninjutsu stat of 3: 15 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 5: 10 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 7: 5 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 9: 1 tick

~Stop: Small Plasma

D-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: ~Stop: Microscopic Plasma

The user concentrates on a plasma that is around the size of a tennis ball. The plasma will then be stopped, based on the user's control minus one. Based on the user's ninjutsu stat, the ticker moves X ticks.

Ninjutsu stat of 3: 15 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 5: 10 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 7: 5 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 9: 1 tick

~Stop: Medium Solid

C-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: ~Stop: Small Solid

The user concentrates on a solid object that is around the size of a medicine ball. The object will then be stopped, based on the user's control. Based on the user's ninjutsu stat, the ticker moves X ticks.

Ninjutsu stat of 3: 20 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 5: 15 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 7: 10 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 9: 5 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 11: 1 tick
FuutonShow [color=lightgreen]*Wind Element • Wind Screw[/color]

D-ranked Ninjutsu

After doing the needed hand seals, the user creates a small vortex of Fuuton chakra around a projectile in their hand. This creates a small drill bit which can be used to “drill” into whatever the object hits. It lasts for three posts or if the projectile is thrown, twenty yards from the user before dissipating. This doesn't make the projectile any faster, only increases its ability to cut.

[color=lightgreen]*Wind Element • Air Cushion[/color]

D-rank Ninjutsu

After forming a short string of hand seals, air will compact itself into a 4 meter radius "cushion" of sorts that is used to soften a fall from a great height. This won't prevent all damage but it will prevent major injury. It can be used up to twenty yards away from the user. It lasts until the end of the post it’s used in and dissipates after one use.

[color=lightgreen]*Wind Element • Guided Projectile[/color]

C-Ranked Ninjutsu

Performing the needed hand-seals, the user can cover an object within three meters that is roughly the same size as a shuriken or kunai with a thin Fuuton shell that allows them to guide the object’s path in flight. With the shell, the user can change the direction of the object three times while it is in the air. The technique lasts for three posts or until all turns are used; in both cases the shell dissipates from around the object. If the object still has the shell when it hits it mark, it will pierce more easily, due to the Fuuton surrounding it. If the user goes more than ten meters away from the object in question, they will lose the ability to guide it.
TaijutsuShow[b]Elbow strike[/b]

D-rank Taijutsu

Sanjuku thrusts his elbow forward, balling his thrusting arm’s fist and pushing with the opposite hand to increase the thrust of the attack. When used with his bladed gauntlets this technique is even more effective, instead stabbing with the blade rather then impacting with the elbow.

[b]*Seamless Skill[/b]

D-Ranked Taijutsu

Prerequisite: 3 wit

A skill utilized by those on the path to mastery of their weapon, users of Seamless Skill are actively able to transition between offensive and defensive usage of the aforementioned weapon. By transitioning so seamlessly, the user is able to save a marginal amount of energy while attacking.

[b]History[/b]
Sanjuku’s life so far hasn’t been too far out of the ordinary. Born to the Ouji 13 years ago, Sanjuku’s mother and father took him home and everything was peaceful. At the age of 5, Sanjuku’s heart was set on doing what all Ouji want to do: become a great ninja and bring honor to the Ouji name. He did just this, enrolling in the academy at the same age as everyone else. His father was a Jounin in his days and was very proud of his son. He taught Sanjuku the ways of the Ouji clan’s Doujutsu and everything it could do, and it fascinated Him more than anything else.

It wasn’t until he joined the academy that he found his ability with the Ouji bloodline. He was a natural at it, impressing the other kids by suspending things in midair. He was the only Ouji in the academy, and that combined with the praise from the other kids contributed to his Full-of-himself personality. He was very self absorbed, but he had reason to be, proving to be one of the top students in the academy and acing every test or assignment that was given to him. He graduated at the age of 13, with almost straight A’s.

As a present from his father for graduation, he gave Sanjuku his Bladed Kote, a pair of ninja kote with chakra sensitive blades extending behind the elbow off the Wrist. Sanjuku wanted a weapon that would stand out, and they did just that, very few people had these. From then on they were his weapon of choice, although he hasn’t had a chance to really use them yet, being only a genin.

His goals in life are to become a master of the Time Stopping power he possesses. Being fresh out of the academy, he hasn't even been on his first mission. He dedicates most of his time to practicing his time stopping and fighting style. Overall, Sanjuku only wants one thing: to prove to himself that he is the best. And he’s willing to do anything to make that happen.

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

[b]Control:[/b] 3
[b]Strength:[/b] 3

[b]Abilities:[/b][b][color=gold][Todomeru Me [i][Freezing Eye][/i][/color][/b]

The Freezing Eye is the doujutsu of the Ouji clan. Whenever it isn't activated, nothing is different about the clan member, and all of their clan jutsu are sealed. Whenever activated, the eye of the clan member turns a light gold color and forms 72 black tick marks in the user's eye, with roman numerals at each hour mark. There are five ticks between each number, with a tick on each number, totalling 72 ticks. The ticker, which is easily seen and keeps track of the number of ticks that have been used up starts at 12 and makes it way around the eye in a clockwise manner. Once it hits 12 again, everything the clan member has stopped will become animated again, and the doujutsu will force the owner's eyes shut, as it changes back to a normal eye, sealing itself for 48 hours.

The ability to use the doujutsu is controlled by the user's control, and ninjutsu stats. Control is how well the user can stop an object, while the ninjutsu stat regulates how large of an object the clan member can stop. Additionally, all clan jutsu require stamina, just as every other ninjutsu.

The main prize of this doujutsu is the ability to 'stop time' which effectively is suspending a non-living, visible object in space. This is limited to non-living objects that aren't connected to a living object, meaning that clothing that is attached to someone is unaffected. Also, this goes in terms of all equipment, so people are treated as a singular object, with anything on their person being immune to the stop effects. However, a technique that has a prerequisite of 15 or higher is able to bypass this drawback. However, the jutsu will only work at 3/4ths of the user's control, rather than the full amount.

Todomeru Me jutsu go in the Ninpou pyramid.

[b]Jutsu:[/b]

NinpouShow ~Stop: Microscopic Solid

E-Ranked Ninjutsu

The user concentrates on a solid object that is 2 inches squared or less (standard senbon). The object will then be stopped, based on the user's control. Based on the user's ninjutsu stat, the ticker moves X ticks.

Ninjutsu stat of 3: 10 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 5: 5 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 7: 1 tick

~Stop: Microscopic Plasma

E-Ranked Ninjutsu

The user concentrates on a plasma that is around the size of a finger. The plasma will then be stopped, based on the user's control minus one. Based on the user's ninjutsu stat, the ticker moves X ticks.

Ninjutsu stat of 3: 10 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 5: 5 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 7: 1 tick

~Stop: Small Solid

D-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: ~Stop: Microscopic Solid

The user concentrates on a solid object that is about the size of a football The object will then be stopped, based on the user's control. Based on the user's ninjutsu stat, the ticker moves X ticks.

Ninjutsu stat of 3: 15 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 5: 10 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 7: 5 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 9: 1 tick

~Stop: Small Plasma

D-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: ~Stop: Microscopic Plasma

The user concentrates on a plasma that is around the size of a tennis ball. The plasma will then be stopped, based on the user's control minus one. Based on the user's ninjutsu stat, the ticker moves X ticks.

Ninjutsu stat of 3: 15 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 5: 10 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 7: 5 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 9: 1 tick

~Stop: Medium Solid

C-Ranked Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: ~Stop: Small Solid

The user concentrates on a solid object that is around the size of a medicine ball. The object will then be stopped, based on the user's control. Based on the user's ninjutsu stat, the ticker moves X ticks.

Ninjutsu stat of 3: 20 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 5: 15 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 7: 10 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 9: 5 ticks

Ninjutsu stat of 11: 1 tick
FuutonShow [color=lightgreen]*Wind Element • Wind Screw[/color]

D-ranked Ninjutsu

After doing the needed hand seals, the user creates a small vortex of Fuuton chakra around a projectile in their hand. This creates a small drill bit which can be used to “drill” into whatever the object hits. It lasts for three posts or if the projectile is thrown, twenty yards from the user before dissipating. This doesn't make the projectile any faster, only increases its ability to cut.

[color=lightgreen]*Wind Element • Air Cushion[/color]

D-rank Ninjutsu

After forming a short string of hand seals, air will compact itself into a 4 meter radius "cushion" of sorts that is used to soften a fall from a great height. This won't prevent all damage but it will prevent major injury. It can be used up to twenty yards away from the user. It lasts until the end of the post it’s used in and dissipates after one use.

[color=lightgreen]*Wind Element • Guided Projectile[/color]

C-Ranked Ninjutsu

Performing the needed hand-seals, the user can cover an object within three meters that is roughly the same size as a shuriken or kunai with a thin Fuuton shell that allows them to guide the object’s path in flight. With the shell, the user can change the direction of the object three times while it is in the air. The technique lasts for three posts or until all turns are used; in both cases the shell dissipates from around the object. If the object still has the shell when it hits it mark, it will pierce more easily, due to the Fuuton surrounding it. If the user goes more than ten meters away from the object in question, they will lose the ability to guide it.
TaijutsuShow[b]Elbow strike[/b]

D-rank Taijutsu

Sanjuku thrusts his elbow forward, balling his thrusting arm’s fist and pushing with the opposite hand to increase the thrust of the attack. When used with his bladed gauntlets this technique is even more effective, instead stabbing with the blade rather then impacting with the elbow.

[b]*Seamless Skill[/b]

D-Ranked Taijutsu

Prerequisite: 3 wit

A skill utilized by those on the path to mastery of their weapon, users of Seamless Skill are actively able to transition between offensive and defensive usage of the aforementioned weapon. By transitioning so seamlessly, the user is able to save a marginal amount of energy while attacking.

[b]History[/b]
Sanjuku’s life so far hasn’t been too far out of the ordinary. Born to the Ouji 13 years ago, Sanjuku’s mother and father took him home and everything was peaceful. At the age of 5, Sanjuku’s heart was set on doing what all Ouji want to do: become a great ninja and bring honor to the Ouji name. He did just this, enrolling in the academy at the same age as everyone else. His father was a Jounin in his days and was very proud of his son. He taught Sanjuku the ways of the Ouji clan’s Doujutsu and everything it could do, and it fascinated Him more than anything else.

It wasn’t until he joined the academy that he found his ability with the Ouji bloodline. He was a natural at it, impressing the other kids by suspending things in midair. He was the only Ouji in the academy, and that combined with the praise from the other kids contributed to his Full-of-himself personality. He was very self absorbed, but he had reason to be, proving to be one of the top students in the academy and acing every test or assignment that was given to him. He graduated at the age of 13, with almost straight A’s.

As a present from his father for graduation, he gave Sanjuku his Bladed Kote, a pair of ninja kote with chakra sensitive blades extending behind the elbow off the Wrist. Sanjuku wanted a weapon that would stand out, and they did just that, very few people had these. From then on they were his weapon of choice, although he hasn’t had a chance to really use them yet, being only a genin.

His goals in life are to become a master of the Time Stopping power he possesses. Being fresh out of the academy, he hasn't even been on his first mission. He dedicates most of his time to practicing his time stopping and fighting style. Overall, Sanjuku only wants one thing: to prove to himself that he is the best. And he’s willing to do anything to make that happen.

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

						[url=#top]

Author: Post

[b]Username:[/b] [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325/] TyDie[/url]

[b]Points:[/b] 0/0

[b]Coupon:[/b]

[b]Companions:[/b] (0/4)

[b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=2678381/1/#new] Ouji[/url], Sanjuku [/b]

[“No matter what you do, do it with style”]

[b]General Information[/b]
[b]Age:[/b] 13

[b]Gender:[/b] Male

[b]Height:[/b] 5'6

[b]Weight:[/b] 130 Pounds

[b]Hair:[/b] Sanjuku's Hair is about 5 inches long, spiked to the back right side of his head, and black in color.

[b]Eyes:[/b] Sanjuku's eyes are emerald, appearing very sharp and refined.

[b]Physical Features:[/b] Sanjuku has a lean muscular frame, with traces of muscle definition usually showing through his regular clothing. He has broad shoulders and long legs, and smooth olive skin showing he takes his appearance seriously.

He has no scars on his body, as he prefers to have them all healed as best as possible to avoid "messing up his appearance".

[b]Clothing/Accessories:[/b] He normally wears a black sleeveless tank-top underneath a red jacket and a pair of baggy pants in matching color. The Symbol of Suna is sown into the back of his jacket. When not on missions he normally wears something akin to his mission outfit, the pants are usually a different color ranging from dark green to bright yellow and the tank top is always black. He usually doesn't wear his red jacket unless its cold or hes wearing his mission outfit. But he usually wears his Mission outfit whenever possible.

[b]Forehead Protector:[/b] He wears it on his head, like a normal ninja would.

[b]Personality:[/b] To put it simply, Sanjuku thinks he's top shit. He doesn't try to put anyone else down, but he's very prideful and full of himself. Some would even call him selfish, and that he cares only for himself, but anyone close to him knows he can be very loyal as a friend. He takes insulting remarks very poorly, but only if the person knows him, strangers words dont mean anything, Although he doesn't let on about this at all.

Sanjuku doesnt actively seek fights, but he isn't one to shirk away from one either. He prefers not to terribly injure someone unless he has to though. However, he is very protective of anyone he calls friend, and will quickly end the life of anyone endangering one, no questions asked. It isn't easy to impress Sanjuku, but doing so is a quick way to get on his good side, as he admires those with power. He is indifferent to people he hasn't met, giving everyone a fair chance to earn his respect, but rarely does he give anyone a second oppurtunity should they get on his bad side.

[b]Battle Information[/b]
[b]Rank:[/b] Genin

[b]Village:[/b] Sunagakure no Sato

[b]Chakra Affinity:[/b] Fuuton

[b]Second Chakra Affinity:[/b]

[b]Stats[/b]
[b]Ninjutsu:[/b] 4
[b]Taijutsu:[/b] 4
[b]Genjutsu:[/b] 1
[b]Stamina:[/b] 3
[b]Control:[/b] 3
[b]Strength:[/b] 3
[b]Speed:[/b] 3
[b]Wit: [/b]3

[b]Equipment:[/b]

20 shuriken in a holster on his right hip

5 smoke bombs in his pouch

5 explosive tags in his pouch

10 kunai in his pouch

5 flash tags in his pouch

He wears a pair of bladed gauntlets, one on each arm. the blade starts along the outside of the forearm, just off the wrist, and continues past the elbow by a foot. The blades are each about 2 feet in length overall. The gauntlet itself is a fingerless kote made of black leather and lacquer, tying along the inside of the forearm. because it's fingerless and light, it doesn't interfere with handseal construction. The blades themselves are chakra sensitive and capable of being utilized in conjunction with ninjutsu.

[b]Combat Style:[/b] Sanjuku focuses on using his bladed gauntlets in combat, backed up by the slashing power of his fuuton techniques and the Ouji's time stop Doujutsu. He trains Taijutsu techniques revolved around using his elbows or punches to maximize the effectiveness of the blades.

[b]Jutsu Information[/b]
[b]Abilities:[/b][b][color=gold][Todomeru Me [i][Freezing Eye][/i][/color][/b]

The Freezing Eye is the doujutsu of the Ouji clan. Whenever it isn't activated, nothing is different about the clan member, and all of their clan jutsu are sealed. Whenever activated, the eye of the clan member turns a light gold color and forms 72 black tick marks in the user's eye, with roman numerals at each hour mark. There are five ticks between each number, with a tick on each number, totalling 72 ticks. The ticker, which is easily seen and keeps track of the number of ticks that have been used up starts at 12 and makes it way around the eye in a clockwise manner. Once it hits 12 again, everything the clan member has stopped will become animated again, and the doujutsu will force the owner's eyes shut, as it changes back to a normal eye, sealing itself for 48 hours.

The ability to use the doujutsu is controlled by the user's control, and ninjutsu stats. Control is how well the user can stop an object, while the ninjutsu stat regulates how large of an object the clan member can stop. Additionally, all clan jutsu require stamina, just as every other ninjutsu.

The main prize of this doujutsu is the ability to 'stop time' which effectively is suspending a non-living, visible object in space. This is limited to non-living objects that aren't connected to a living object, meaning that clothing that is attached to someone is unaffected. Also, this goes in terms of all equipment, so people are treated as a singular object, with anything on their person being immune to the stop effects. However, a technique that has a prerequisite of 15 or higher is able to bypass this drawback. However, the jutsu will only work at 3/4ths of the user's control, rather than the full amount.

Todomeru Me jutsu go in the Ninpou pyramid.

[b]History[/b]
Sanjuku’s life so far hasn’t been too far out of the ordinary. Born to the Ouji 13 years ago, Sanjuku’s mother and father took him home and everything was peaceful. At the age of 5, Sanjuku’s heart was set on doing what all Ouji want to do: become a great ninja and bring honor to the Ouji name. It wasn’t until he joined the academy that he found his ability with the Ouji bloodline. He was a natural at it, impressing the other kids by suspending things in midair. He was the only Ouji in the academy, and that combined with the praise from the other kids contributed to his Full-of-himself personality. He was very self absorbed, but he had reason to be, proving to be one of the top students in the academy and acing every test or assignment that was given to him. He graduated at the age of 13, with almost straight A’s.

As a present from his father for graduation, he gave Sanjuku his Bladed Kote, a pair of ninja kote with chakra sensitive blades extending behind the elbow off the Wrist. Sanjuku wanted a weapon that would stand out, and they did just that, very few people had these. From then on they were his weapon of choice, although he hasn’t had a chance to really use them yet, being only a genin.

His goals in life are to become a master of the Time Stopping power he possesses. Being fresh out of the academy, he hasn't even been on his first mission. He dedicates most of his time to practicing his time stopping and fighting style. Overall, Sanjuku only wants one thing: to prove to himself that he is the best. And he’s willing to do anything to make that happen.

[/quote]

Other than these minor fixes, I don't see anything glaring.  I hope to rp with you soon. [i]

			aiight, fixed the appearance and clothing. also, by "reverse blade" i meant that the blade goes towards my elbow, not my fist. but i realize its pretty redundant, and since you understood what it is without the Reverse, i removed it.

			Mission InfoShow
[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5130397/1/]Original Request[/url]

[b]Mission Rank[/b]: C

[b]Hidden Village/Country Assigning Mission[/b]: Konohagakure no Sato

[b]Post Time Limit[/b]: 96 hours

[b]Detail[/b]: Apparently, some thugs invested some money in enlisting the services of a ninja. They were hardly on the radar before, but now they've gotten ambitious with some extra muscle on their side, and their territory is now just passed the Fire Country border. Go to our border with the Hot Spring Country and find out if there is a threat. If there is, neutralize it. Then, see if you can't get any information on whose bright idea it was to hire a ninja and take his group so close to us. The enemy shouldn't be very strong; we're not even sure where they got the funding to hire a ninja, let alone a good one.

[b]Pass[/b]: Eliminate the ninja threat.

[b]Additional Objectives:[/b] Get intel on who made the call to hire the ninja (1)

[b]Failure[/b]: you die; the threat isn't neutralized.[/url]

Making it to the border and asking around, it was easy to hear about this group. They had been just a small time ragtag bunch of crooks and thieves and hired swords and suddenly their territory jumped from one neighborhood to three whole towns! There were definitely whispers and rumors about a ninja, but nobody would be able to tell Kyuzo anything about if they were wearing a headband, or how he fought. He heard stories about stores that refused to pay protection money being set on fire, livestock slaughtered, there were even a couple of mysterious kidnappings that nobody could figure out.

Kyuzo's mission wasn't to stop them, though. He just needed to get rid of this mysterious new guy of theirs, whoever it was. The rest would hopefully sort itself out. Eventually, he found himself in the town where they had gotten their start, which now seemed half dead. Nobody was out for a walk in the humid afternoon. He was, for the moment, in a residential district of the town. Maybe he could find out something around here?

Good luck.

			Mission InfoShow
[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5130397/1/]Original Request[/url]

[b]Mission Rank[/b]: C

[b]Hidden Village/Country Assigning Mission[/b]: Konohagakure no Sato

[b]Post Time Limit[/b]: 96 hours

[b]Detail[/b]: Apparently, some thugs invested some money in enlisting the services of a ninja. They were hardly on the radar before, but now they've gotten ambitious with some extra muscle on their side, and their territory is now just passed the Fire Country border. Go to our border with the Hot Spring Country and find out if there is a threat. If there is, neutralize it. Then, see if you can't get any information on whose bright idea it was to hire a ninja and take his group so close to us. The enemy shouldn't be very strong; we're not even sure where they got the funding to hire a ninja, let alone a good one.

[b]Pass[/b]: Eliminate the ninja threat.

[b]Additional Objectives:[/b] Get intel on who made the call to hire the ninja (1)

[b]Failure[/b]: you die; the threat isn't neutralized.[/url]

Making it to the border and asking around, it was easy to hear about this group. They had been just a small time ragtag bunch of crooks and thieves and hired swords and suddenly their territory jumped from one neighborhood to three whole towns! There were definitely whispers and rumors about a ninja, but nobody would be able to tell Kyuzo anything about if they were wearing a headband, or how he fought. He heard stories about stores that refused to pay protection money being set on fire, livestock slaughtered, there were even a couple of mysterious kidnappings that nobody could figure out.

Kyuzo's mission wasn't to stop them, though. He just needed to get rid of this mysterious new guy of theirs, whoever it was. The rest would hopefully sort itself out. Eventually, he found himself in the town where they had gotten their start, which now seemed half dead. Nobody was out for a walk in the humid afternoon. He was, for the moment, in a residential district of the town. Maybe he could find out something around here?

Good luck.

Author: Post

Mission InfoShow
[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=5130397/1/]Original Request[/url]

[b]Mission Rank[/b]: C

[b]Hidden Village/Country Assigning Mission[/b]: Konohagakure no Sato

[b]Post Time Limit[/b]: 96 hours

[b]Detail[/b]: Apparently, some thugs invested some money in enlisting the services of a ninja. They were hardly on the radar before, but now they've gotten ambitious with some extra muscle on their side, and their territory is now just passed the Fire Country border. Go to our border with the Hot Spring Country and find out if there is a threat. If there is, neutralize it. Then, see if you can't get any information on whose bright idea it was to hire a ninja and take his group so close to us. The enemy shouldn't be very strong; we're not even sure where they got the funding to hire a ninja, let alone a good one.

[b]Pass[/b]: Eliminate the ninja threat.

[b]Additional Objectives:[/b] Get intel on who made the call to hire the ninja (1)

[b]Failure[/b]: you die; the threat isn't neutralized.[/url]

Making it to the border and asking around, it was easy to hear about this group. They had been just a small time ragtag bunch of crooks and thieves and hired swords and suddenly their territory jumped from one neighborhood to three whole towns! There were definitely whispers and rumors about a ninja, but nobody would be able to tell Kyuzo anything about if they were wearing a headband, or how he fought. He heard stories about stores that refused to pay protection money being set on fire, livestock slaughtered, there were even a couple of mysterious kidnappings that nobody could figure out.

Kyuzo's mission wasn't to stop them, though. He just needed to get rid of this mysterious new guy of theirs, whoever it was. The rest would hopefully sort itself out. Eventually, he found himself in the town where they had gotten their start, which now seemed half dead. Nobody was out for a walk in the humid afternoon. He was, for the moment, in a residential district of the town. Maybe he could find out something around here?

Good luck.

			Kyuzo walked through the desolate town in search of something he could use to ascertain the location of the thugs hideout. If he knew anything, the place where a group gets its start is usually their base of operations. The most effective way of locating the neighborhood where the group got started would obviously be to ask around, but since there wasn't anyone around, he started by simply walking through the various districts of the town, looking for someone who knew of the thugs group, perhaps someone who had been targeted such as a store clerk, or someone who looked to be a part of the group.

It was also important to note that Kyuzo was not wearing his normal all-black outfit, he wasn't dumb enough to walk in broad daylight wearing all black. His ninja apparel was in a backpack on his back. the only thing that might give him away is the pouch on his left side, but there wasn't anything out of the ordinary about it, just a normal looking fanny pack to the average person.

[also, feel free to let me know if and how i mess up so i can know what not to do, especially with post length.]

Author: Post

Kyuzo walked through the desolate town in search of something he could use to ascertain the location of the thugs hideout. If he knew anything, the place where a group gets its start is usually their base of operations. The most effective way of locating the neighborhood where the group got started would obviously be to ask around, but since there wasn't anyone around, he started by simply walking through the various districts of the town, looking for someone who knew of the thugs group, perhaps someone who had been targeted such as a store clerk, or someone who looked to be a part of the group.

It was also important to note that Kyuzo was not wearing his normal all-black outfit, he wasn't dumb enough to walk in broad daylight wearing all black. His ninja apparel was in a backpack on his back. the only thing that might give him away is the pouch on his left side, but there wasn't anything out of the ordinary about it, just a normal looking fanny pack to the average person.

[also, feel free to let me know if and how i mess up so i can know what not to do, especially with post length.]

		[b]Posts:[/b] [url=./search.php?author_id=1020724&sr=posts]5799[/url]		[b]Joined:[/b] Sun Jan 31, 2010 6:00 pm

				[b]Contact:[/b]

						[url=#p1531844][Mission]Hokey Pokey Redux[/url]

							[url=/forums/app.php/post/1531844/report]
								REPORT
							[/url]

							[url=./posting.php?mode=quote&f=51&p=1531844]
								QUOTE

			[url=./viewtopic.php?f=51&p=1531844&thanks=1531844&to_id=1020724&from_id=1869325]
				LIKE

									[url=./viewtopic.php?p=1531844#p1531844]
						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1020724]seiuchiblarg[/url][/b] » Mon May 13, 2013 7:40 am

			(This post was fine. No worries at all. I'll give you a heads-up, though, that it's the job of the RP Mod to talk about the people and set the world and stuff. I control all the NPCs and random events, and if something will count on luck or require someone reacting in a certain way, I'm the guy to handle what happens as a result of it. You didn't do anything wrong here, I'm just letting you know because you're new that the words "Tried to" and "Attempted" and things of its kind will be your friend.)

As he walked, he'd be able to see people looking at him from out their windows, but once they caught his eye they would close their curtains quickly, wanting to avoid his attention. This was a fairly small town and he was a stranger here, and given their circumstances that meant that he was dangerous. Continuing his trip, however, he found himself int he business district. Some of the shops had closed, and at one point he passed the black, ashy rubble of what was probably once a general store. The shops didn't call out their wares to shoppers who were now few and far between, and instead sat quietly behind their bars, quietly hoping that business would come their way.

The important thing was, there were people here. The streets had a few shoppers getting things they needed, and not every shop was being kept, but there were people on the street, and that wasn't nothing.

Author: Post

(This post was fine. No worries at all. I'll give you a heads-up, though, that it's the job of the RP Mod to talk about the people and set the world and stuff. I control all the NPCs and random events, and if something will count on luck or require someone reacting in a certain way, I'm the guy to handle what happens as a result of it. You didn't do anything wrong here, I'm just letting you know because you're new that the words "Tried to" and "Attempted" and things of its kind will be your friend.)

As he walked, he'd be able to see people looking at him from out their windows, but once they caught his eye they would close their curtains quickly, wanting to avoid his attention. This was a fairly small town and he was a stranger here, and given their circumstances that meant that he was dangerous. Continuing his trip, however, he found himself int he business district. Some of the shops had closed, and at one point he passed the black, ashy rubble of what was probably once a general store. The shops didn't call out their wares to shoppers who were now few and far between, and instead sat quietly behind their bars, quietly hoping that business would come their way.

The important thing was, there were people here. The streets had a few shoppers getting things they needed, and not every shop was being kept, but there were people on the street, and that wasn't nothing.

			As Kyuzo arrived in the business district, and noticed all of the people around, he quickly analyzed everyone in the vicinity. realizing all he saw was a few shoppers and a few shopkeepers, he didn't feel anything was out of place. Now that he had located people, the next step is to actually talk to them. So he walked over to the nearest stall and attempted to talk to the keeper. If for some reason they didn't want to talk to him, due to his suspicious appearance, he would continue to the other stalls until he either got the info he wanted or attempted to talk to every shopkeeper he saw, all to no avail.

Author: Post

As Kyuzo arrived in the business district, and noticed all of the people around, he quickly analyzed everyone in the vicinity. realizing all he saw was a few shoppers and a few shopkeepers, he didn't feel anything was out of place. Now that he had located people, the next step is to actually talk to them. So he walked over to the nearest stall and attempted to talk to the keeper. If for some reason they didn't want to talk to him, due to his suspicious appearance, he would continue to the other stalls until he either got the info he wanted or attempted to talk to every shopkeeper he saw, all to no avail.

			It should have been noticed how quiet everybody was being.This town was small, but on a given day should have had twice the numbers of shoppers at least, and the retailers themselves would normally have been much more vocal. As he approached a shopkeeper, he would see fear in his face. Kyuzo was a stranger here, which meant he may have been dangerous. The shopkeep was a brave one, however, and chose to approach the counter. His voice was timid and full of care when he spoke.

[b]"May I help you, sir?"[/b]

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Thu May 16, 2013 8:52 am

			Kyuzo was callous to the unnerving quiet around the town, as quiet was something he was used to, being the kind of person to purposely separate himself from people to enjoy his solitude. nevertheless, he did understand that a quiet business district was obviously abnormal, and it wasn't hard to see that the people around him had a certain "feel" about them, as though they were all scared of something, be it the thugs or Kyuzo himself. It mattered little though, he didn't particularly care how they felt about him. Kyuzo's voice was as stoic as ever, but he tried his best to let his guard down, if only for a moment, and leaned on the counter by his elbows to show his hands, to let the man know he meant him no harm.

[color=#ffff00]"I'm not looking to buy anything, but i am not an enemy. I want to know who's been terrorizing the area, and more importantly, where i can find them."[/color]

			[i]

Author: Post

Kyuzo was callous to the unnerving quiet around the town, as quiet was something he was used to, being the kind of person to purposely separate himself from people to enjoy his solitude. nevertheless, he did understand that a quiet business district was obviously abnormal, and it wasn't hard to see that the people around him had a certain "feel" about them, as though they were all scared of something, be it the thugs or Kyuzo himself. It mattered little though, he didn't particularly care how they felt about him. Kyuzo's voice was as stoic as ever, but he tried his best to let his guard down, if only for a moment, and leaned on the counter by his elbows to show his hands, to let the man know he meant him no harm.

[color=#ffff00]"I'm not looking to buy anything, but i am not an enemy. I want to know who's been terrorizing the area, and more importantly, where i can find them."[/color]

Author:

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1020724]seiuchiblarg[/url][/b] » Mon May 20, 2013 4:58 am

			The man's eyes darted one way to another, looking to be sure it was safe. He turned around back of him and reached up to the top of a shelf. He seemed to be a merchant of hunter's equipment. He pulled down a bear trap; he had to make it look like he was trying to make a sale.

[i]"I'm sorry, sir, but if I tell you too much they'll burn down the store! They're making every business here pay protection money, and I'm short for the month. . . So I'll tell you a little bit if you can help my business."[/i]

Whether he was just being a sly salesman or genuinely wanted to help but needed help himself would be hard to determine, but Kanjo would have the money to make the purchase if he wanted to. The bear trap [i]did[/i] seem to be a quality make, produced with sturdy steel and sharp, gripping teeth and a nice, hardy spring mechanism.

Or, he might be able to force some information out of the man, or bring someone out of hiding if he attacked. It wouldn't make the Leaf Village look good exactly, and he wouldn't be seen as a friend to this place, but it might get some results a bit faster.

				[/i]
				Top
			[/url]

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: Post

The man's eyes darted one way to another, looking to be sure it was safe. He turned around back of him and reached up to the top of a shelf. He seemed to be a merchant of hunter's equipment. He pulled down a bear trap; he had to make it look like he was trying to make a sale.

[i]"I'm sorry, sir, but if I tell you too much they'll burn down the store! They're making every business here pay protection money, and I'm short for the month. . . So I'll tell you a little bit if you can help my business."[/i]

Whether he was just being a sly salesman or genuinely wanted to help but needed help himself would be hard to determine, but Kanjo would have the money to make the purchase if he wanted to. The bear trap [i]did[/i] seem to be a quality make, produced with sturdy steel and sharp, gripping teeth and a nice, hardy spring mechanism.

Or, he might be able to force some information out of the man, or bring someone out of hiding if he attacked. It wouldn't make the Leaf Village look good exactly, and he wouldn't be seen as a friend to this place, but it might get some results a bit faster.

------------------------------------------------------------

			Kyuzo immediately realized what the man was doing before he did it, you can't openly talk about these sort of things. He also didn't care whether he was just trying to make his living or not, as long as the shopkeeper provided the information he required, Kyuzo was satisfied. So in order to make it seem a bit more realistic, and therefore avoid as much attention as possible, he agreed to buy the bear trap from the salesman. if nothing else he could find some sort of use for a trap, as long as it was sturdy and well made. Kyuzo paid for the trap and tucked it away in his pouch, then immediately started again. [color=#ffff00]"Now, calmly explain the situation."[/color]

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: Post

Kyuzo immediately realized what the man was doing before he did it, you can't openly talk about these sort of things. He also didn't care whether he was just trying to make his living or not, as long as the shopkeeper provided the information he required, Kyuzo was satisfied. So in order to make it seem a bit more realistic, and therefore avoid as much attention as possible, he agreed to buy the bear trap from the salesman. if nothing else he could find some sort of use for a trap, as long as it was sturdy and well made. Kyuzo paid for the trap and tucked it away in his pouch, then immediately started again. [color=#ffff00]"Now, calmly explain the situation."[/color]

------------------------------------------------------------

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1020724]seiuchiblarg[/url][/b] » Thu May 23, 2013 8:57 am

			He nodded, making something of a show of taking the money and fiddling with the register, trying to make it look like he was just giving casual conversation to a customer rather than spilling vital information. What he was giving wouldn't be enough to call the mission a success, but it would give Kyuzo a nice start. [i]"The group was small time, until recently, when they hired a ninja. Then they started exploding. . . They've been calling themselves "The Vine," and I've never really heard of anybody by that name before... I think it might just be a bigger group that sort of took this one in!"[/i] he was speaking in a rushed whisper, and handed Kyuzo the bear trap. It would be big, but it had a slim chain and a hook, so he could attach it into hi shirt and carry it on his back if he liked.

[i]"I don't know if I can tell you much more, but they make us pay them to get protected from street thugs, and if we don't, they come and attack us themselves! The ninja around here has a sword he likes to threaten people with. Some of the people around here say he sliced an entire building in half!"[/i]

Kyuzo now had something to go on. What he did with it from there was up to him.

What he was giving wouldn't be enough to call the mission a success, but it would give Kyuzo a nice start. [i]"The group was small time, until recently, when they hired a ninja. Then they started exploding. . . They've been calling themselves "The Vine," and I've never really heard of anybody by that name before... I think it might just be a bigger group that sort of took this one in!"[/i] he was speaking in a rushed whisper, and handed Kyuzo the bear trap. It would be big, but it had a slim chain and a hook, so he could attach it into hi shirt and carry it on his back if he liked.

[i]"I don't know if I can tell you much more, but they make us pay them to get protected from street thugs, and if we don't, they come and attack us themselves! The ninja around here has a sword he likes to threaten people with. Some of the people around here say he sliced an entire building in half!"[/i]

			Kyuzo took his leave without a word, his business with the clerk finished. Slinging the trap onto his back by the chain, he walked away from the clerk, but remained in the business district for the time being. [i][color=#ffff00]"If these people are supposed to "protect" the stores, the quickest method of drawing them out would be to cause a scene. I don't want to resort to that yet though..."[/color][/i]. As he pondered this quandary, Kyuzo began searching the town for anything that might turn him on to a hideout or location of some form. Specifically, he was looking for someone with a distinct sword, one that looked as though it could slice a building in two, as wild as the claim sounded.

(if this was too specific i'm sorry. its what he would search for at this point though.)

			(Not too specific at all. You have a lead and you're going with it. That's a good thing. I would remind you, though, that this is a ninja world, and your target is supposedly a ninja, so with the proper use of jutsu any sword has that potential.)

As Kyuzo walked, things would mostly seem normal, although he would notice some well-armed men passing buy now and then. He'd notice quickly that some of the passersby had swords. It stood to reason that these guys weren't friendly: in a place where terror was being used to control, the good guys wouldn't get weapons. There were four or five of them in the area, though, and none of them were wearing headbands. To take one on might mean taking all of them on, but it might also get him the information he needed without harming anybody.

None of them were wearing headband, but that didn't mean by definition that one of them wasn't the ninja.

(Not too specific at all. You have a lead and you're going with it. That's a good thing. I would remind you, though, that this is a ninja world, and your target is supposedly a ninja, so with the proper use of jutsu any sword has that potential.)

As Kyuzo walked, things would mostly seem normal, although he would notice some well-armed men passing buy now and then. He'd notice quickly that some of the passersby had swords. It stood to reason that these guys weren't friendly: in a place where terror was being used to control, the good guys wouldn't get weapons. There were four or five of them in the area, though, and none of them were wearing headbands. To take one on might mean taking all of them on, but it might also get him the information he needed without harming anybody.

None of them were wearing headband, but that didn't mean by definition that one of them wasn't the ninja.

=== THREAD: [Graded]Stop! Hammer Time! - Naruto Saigen Roleplay ===
Forum: Home Board index Role Play Fire Country Konohagakure no Sato > Home Board index

							[/url]

					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Thu May 02, 2013 2:58 pm

			Nagisa had been reclining on a bench in a park, tree and the like all around to provide privacy. It was actually one of the best places to get some reading done, much like she was doing now. Sitting beside a path, the bench set next to a pair of small steps that led up a short embankment and often a haven of tress. In front of the bench there was a small clearing, a path passing in front of the bench, and plenty of trees around. All in all, it wasn't easily found unless you've traveled these paths before.

And as if on cue Nagisa shifted her gaze to someone who was jogging along the path. They didn't acknowledge her and kept going as she returned to reading. As they disappeared, the young Yamanaka felt a strange sensation. It was like a tossed up between someone watching you and hearing that twig snap in absolute silence when you were 100% sure no one was around for miles. She looked around and saw nothing and that made her worry a bit, she didn't like the idea of being out here alone all of a sudden.

Closing her eyes she concentrated and her mind reached out, like a pulse. It wove a path through the trees, under the bushes, and across the tree tops. Expanding out, it sent back a red flag right away. Someone was out there and not on the path. Nagisa was on her feet in an instant as she opened her mouth. "[color=coral]I know you're out there, show yourself![/color]"

To put the icing on the cake, she pointed in their direction and looking with a determination that masked her uneasiness.

			Nagisa had been reclining on a bench in a park, tree and the like all around to provide privacy. It was actually one of the best places to get some reading done, much like she was doing now. She looked around and saw nothing and that made her worry a bit, she didn't like the idea of being out here alone all of a sudden.

Closing her eyes she concentrated and her mind reached out, like a pulse. It wove a path through the trees, under the bushes, and across the tree tops. Expanding out, it sent back a red flag right away. Someone was out there and not on the path. Nagisa was on her feet in an instant as she opened her mouth. "[color=coral]I know you're out there, show yourself![/color]"

To put the icing on the cake, she pointed in their direction and looking with a determination that masked her uneasiness.

Author: Post

Nagisa had been reclining on a bench in a park, tree and the like all around to provide privacy. It was actually one of the best places to get some reading done, much like she was doing now. Sitting beside a path, the bench set next to a pair of small steps that led up a short embankment and often a haven of tress. In front of the bench there was a small clearing, a path passing in front of the bench, and plenty of trees around. All in all, it wasn't easily found unless you've traveled these paths before.

And as if on cue Nagisa shifted her gaze to someone who was jogging along the path. They didn't acknowledge her and kept going as she returned to reading. As they disappeared, the young Yamanaka felt a strange sensation. It was like a tossed up between someone watching you and hearing that twig snap in absolute silence when you were 100% sure no one was around for miles. She looked around and saw nothing and that made her worry a bit, she didn't like the idea of being out here alone all of a sudden.

Closing her eyes she concentrated and her mind reached out, like a pulse. It wove a path through the trees, under the bushes, and across the tree tops. Expanding out, it sent back a red flag right away. Someone was out there and not on the path. Nagisa was on her feet in an instant as she opened her mouth. "[color=coral]I know you're out there, show yourself![/color]"

To put the icing on the cake, she pointed in their direction and looking with a determination that masked her uneasiness.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Thu May 02, 2013 3:36 pm

			Kyuzo wandered through the trees of the park for what seemed like hours. He had roamed this particular area so many times he almost had the trees memorized. He roamed this area so frequently because of the lack of people in the area. normally people dont walk to far off the park paths, and with the exception of the benched area he was approaching, most people dont even come this far into the park. He noticed a jogger to his Left, but payed him no mind as he didnt notice Kyuzo at all.

As he approached the benched area, however, Kyuzo noticed a girl sitting on the bench at the bottom of the steps to the treeline he was wandering in. Just as he was about to turn around and go the other way to avoid notice, he heard the girl call him out. [color=#ffff00][i]"she's bluffing, she didnt notice me"[/i][/color] he thought, until she pointed directly at him through the treeline. Although he was shocked she found him, he walked out, cold-faced, and stared at her, unmoved. [color=#ffff00]"How did you spot me?"[/color] Kyuzo said after a long pause.

			[i]
