Author: Post

Kyuzo wandered through the trees of the park for what seemed like hours. He had roamed this particular area so many times he almost had the trees memorized. He roamed this area so frequently because of the lack of people in the area. normally people dont walk to far off the park paths, and with the exception of the benched area he was approaching, most people dont even come this far into the park. He noticed a jogger to his Left, but payed him no mind as he didnt notice Kyuzo at all.

As he approached the benched area, however, Kyuzo noticed a girl sitting on the bench at the bottom of the steps to the treeline he was wandering in. Just as he was about to turn around and go the other way to avoid notice, he heard the girl call him out. [color=#ffff00][i]"she's bluffing, she didnt notice me"[/i][/color] he thought, until she pointed directly at him through the treeline. Although he was shocked she found him, he walked out, cold-faced, and stared at her, unmoved. [color=#ffff00]"How did you spot me?"[/color] Kyuzo said after a long pause.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Thu May 02, 2013 5:00 pm

			The person who emerge from the trees was dress in black and looked like some kind of ninja from picture books one reads as a child. He seemed cold faced, almost frumpy, by the way that someone had found him. Even his statement voice frumpiness about being caught. "[color=coral]You honestly think a Sensor wouldn't pick you up? The only way you're gonna hide from me is if you're a better Sensor than me. Now why were you lurking about?[/color]"

Nagisa lowered her hand as she finished asking her question. It was a bit odd that someone would be wandering about in the woods and not running on the path. Then again maybe he was trying not to get laughed at for his attire. Hell it was out of place amongst the trees anyway, why he hadn't gotten some kind of camouflage was beyond her.

Still, she used her thumb to mark her place as she closed the book and awaited an answer from the man. "[color=coral]Also, what's with the get up?[/color]" She added, really wanting to know what was with the traditional picture book ninja looking get up.

			Kyuzo could tell the girl was not as weak as she appeared, despite her slender figure and simple clothing. And while he had heard of sensors, he knew little of what they actually were. Paying the woman's smartass tone and remarks about his attire no mind, he went back to what she said, being a sensor. [color=#ffff00]"what is a sensor? and it isn't against the law to wander off the paths."[/color]

As he said this, Kyuzo walked completely into the open and stood about 5 feet from the girl, noticing that with all the trees around, shadows werent an issue. From here he could see that the girl held an erotic novel of some sort. This was odd compared to what most girls spent their time reading, although he cared little. He stood motionless, waiting on the girl to answer his question and hopefully learn a thing or two to help him counteract this "sensor" he was speaking to.

			"[color=coral]No, but you're lurking like a creepy person. So you're either trying to accomplish some kind of training or you're just a creepy stalker person. Either way, still doesn't explain the outfit.[/color]" Nagisa said, motioning to his appearance once more. It was really distracting, especially out in the open. How could someone be sneaky in broad daylight? It seemed a bit odd if anything, more eye catching than camouflage.

"[color=coral]What is a sensor.....[/color]" Nagisa was having trouble not being a completely wiseass at that moment. So many things she could say but this person didn't seem the type to take those kinds of comments with a grain of salt. "[color=coral]Well Frumpy, a sensor is someone who can sense the chakra signature of others. Mind's Eye sensors like me can pick you up from long distances away. Make for good tracking and recon. It also makes a good counter measure against invaders and sneaks. how do you think the village knows when it's being attacked? Sensors.[/color]"

Author: Post

"[color=coral]No, but you're lurking like a creepy person. So you're either trying to accomplish some kind of training or you're just a creepy stalker person. Either way, still doesn't explain the outfit.[/color]" Nagisa said, motioning to his appearance once more. It was really distracting, especially out in the open. How could someone be sneaky in broad daylight? It seemed a bit odd if anything, more eye catching than camouflage.

"[color=coral]What is a sensor.....[/color]" Nagisa was having trouble not being a completely wiseass at that moment. So many things she could say but this person didn't seem the type to take those kinds of comments with a grain of salt. "[color=coral]Well Frumpy, a sensor is someone who can sense the chakra signature of others. Mind's Eye sensors like me can pick you up from long distances away. Make for good tracking and recon. It also makes a good counter measure against invaders and sneaks. how do you think the village knows when it's being attacked? Sensors.[/color]"

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Thu May 02, 2013 8:34 pm

			[color=#ffff00]"sensing chakra signatures..."[/color] Kyuzo couldn't believe he overlooked this. While he could hide himself very well from sight and sound, He'd never thought about his Chakra. If this average looking girl saw him coming, he'd stand no chance against more skilled sensors. [color=#ffff00]"this outfit is my everyday attire, its meant for night, not day. But that's not important." [/color]

As Kyuzo pondered the question of hiding from the Mind's eye, he came to a quick realization. rather then ponder these questions with no knowledge of how these techniques work, it would be much more beneficial to learn how it works from someone who is actually trained in the style. [color=#ffff00]"Where there are ways to detect someone, there are ways to hide from it. Is there a way to hide my Chakra signature?" [/color]

As he waited for his reply, Kyuzo noticed the woman's unease at his presence. He was used to this feeling, but he didn't want to spook her, thus ending his information gathering. So he took a seat on the bench in order to drop the tension and relax things a bit.

			[i]

Author: Post

[color=#ffff00]"sensing chakra signatures..."[/color] Kyuzo couldn't believe he overlooked this. While he could hide himself very well from sight and sound, He'd never thought about his Chakra. If this average looking girl saw him coming, he'd stand no chance against more skilled sensors. [color=#ffff00]"this outfit is my everyday attire, its meant for night, not day. But that's not important." [/color]

As Kyuzo pondered the question of hiding from the Mind's eye, he came to a quick realization. rather then ponder these questions with no knowledge of how these techniques work, it would be much more beneficial to learn how it works from someone who is actually trained in the style. [color=#ffff00]"Where there are ways to detect someone, there are ways to hide from it. Is there a way to hide my Chakra signature?" [/color]

As he waited for his reply, Kyuzo noticed the woman's unease at his presence. He was used to this feeling, but he didn't want to spook her, thus ending his information gathering. So he took a seat on the bench in order to drop the tension and relax things a bit.

			"[color=coral]Be a better Sensor than the other guy? I've never seen a way to counter act Sensors that didn't involve being a Sensor. The stronger you are, the more likely you are to find a way to suppress your own signature. That's the most obvious way, I think it may even be the only way. I have yet to hear of an alternative method.[/color]" Nagisa said before  reaching down and scratching her shin. She had had her own chakra signature suppression technique in mind for later on down the road, but she wasn't about to let him know she wasn't capable of doing it yet.

"[color=coral]What's the big deal about subverting Sensors?[/color]" She asked, not sure why his everyday attire looked like it did. She'd seen most ninjas wearing their own personal attire on duty, or switching to the village uniform when needed, but nothing this.... well odd. She'd seen old attire from shinobi wars that looked less silly. Still he was obviously being serious about it being his clothes, so she left it at that.

"[color=coral]And why were you lurking in the woods?[/color]"

			[color=#ffff00]"You should always attempt to eliminate every weakness, and take every opportunity to surpass one's enemies. By subverting Sensors, my chances of mission success increases. Its something every ninja should take seriously." [/color] Kyuzo bluntly said before standing up and starting to walk away. This girl was somewhat helpful in pointing out his flaws at least, but that helped little. Still, the girl wasn't completely useless, he had to at least give her that.

[color=#ffff00] "you were... somewhat helpful. I wander the woods because I prefer the solitude, and I was lurking to improve upon my skills in stealth. I would've remained unseen had it not been for your Mind's eye"[/color] Kyuzo said as he stopped about 15 feet away from the girl, back still turned. He could tell this girl could still help him, perhaps with training or even a method of subverting or at least identifying Sensors. While he didnt care for social interaction, a partner to train with is a better way to gauge one's ability.

[color=#ffff00]"I'd like to train with you sometime, it may benefit me to learn how Sensors work first hand. My name is Nara Kyuzo."[/color]

Its something every ninja should take seriously." [/color] Kyuzo bluntly said before standing up and starting to walk away. This girl was somewhat helpful in pointing out his flaws at least, but that helped little. Still, the girl wasn't completely useless, he had to at least give her that.

[color=#ffff00] "you were... somewhat helpful. I wander the woods because I prefer the solitude, and I was lurking to improve upon my skills in stealth. I would've remained unseen had it not been for your Mind's eye"[/color] Kyuzo said as he stopped about 15 feet away from the girl, back still turned. While he didnt care for social interaction, a partner to train with is a better way to gauge one's ability.

[color=#ffff00]"I'd like to train with you sometime, it may benefit me to learn how Sensors work first hand. My name is Nara Kyuzo."[/color]

			'[i][color=coral]Wow, this guy is a little too serious about his job. I almost wanna see if there's a tree branch poking out of his ass or something.[/color][/i]' As the young man stood and started moving away form the bench, Nagisa remained quite to hear what he had to say since he started talking again. When it was an explanation on his lurking she almost wanted to nod. She wasn't gonna argue, the solitude made it a nice place for her to read, would explain why he'd wander in the woods for a little training.

As he stated his intent to train and his desire to train, Nagisa took a moment to think on it. She wondered what he could do with training with her, Sensor techniques weren't about who would block or attack better, it was about honing your 6th sense to track down someone. Then again if he wanted to learn how they worked she could just explain it to him... to the best of her abilities that is.

"[color=coral]Yamanaka Nagisa.... So you want to learn about sensors or learn to be a sensor? Cause I'm not sure how training with me would work for you. I could track you down if you were trying to be stealthy normally like today, but unless you try to become a sensor, then good luck trying to subvert one. I've never heard of a way to do it without being a sensor yourself.[/color]"

Author: Post

'[i][color=coral]Wow, this guy is a little too serious about his job. I almost wanna see if there's a tree branch poking out of his ass or something.[/color][/i]' As the young man stood and started moving away form the bench, Nagisa remained quite to hear what he had to say since he started talking again. When it was an explanation on his lurking she almost wanted to nod. She wasn't gonna argue, the solitude made it a nice place for her to read, would explain why he'd wander in the woods for a little training.

As he stated his intent to train and his desire to train, Nagisa took a moment to think on it. She wondered what he could do with training with her, Sensor techniques weren't about who would block or attack better, it was about honing your 6th sense to track down someone. Then again if he wanted to learn how they worked she could just explain it to him... to the best of her abilities that is.

"[color=coral]Yamanaka Nagisa.... So you want to learn about sensors or learn to be a sensor? Cause I'm not sure how training with me would work for you. I could track you down if you were trying to be stealthy normally like today, but unless you try to become a sensor, then good luck trying to subvert one. I've never heard of a way to do it without being a sensor yourself.[/color]"

			[color=#ffff00]"Learning Sensor Jutsu would be helpful to someone trying to avoid detection. We could learn much from each other."[/color] Kyuzo said as he approached Nagisa again, his interest rekindled. [color=#ffff00]"Stealth is only one of my weapons, I have much more than that." [/color] He didn't want to admit it, but he needed someone to train with, and this girl fit the role well.

[color=#ffff00]"You would be one of the few people I train with, as I prefer that my techniques stay relatively unheard of for personal reasons. I usually train by myself, but that only goes so far." [/color] Kyuzo felt a growing discomfort in the pit of his stomach. He hated admitting he actually needed someone for once, even though its human nature to do so. Nevertheless, since she hadn't already left he knew that she was at least somewhat interested.

[color=#ffff00]"it's up to you." [/color] He said as he stood like a stone awaiting his answer.

[color=#ffff00]"You would be one of the few people I train with, as I prefer that my techniques stay relatively unheard of for personal reasons. I usually train by myself, but that only goes so far." 			"[color=coral]Well then I guess I can help, but when it comes to learning sensor techniques, the process tends to be very difficult. It's not like normal training so you'll have to be prepared for a long bout of training. We won't be able to get to that today, I've got my wall patrol coming up.[/color]" Nagisa wondered how she'd be able to contact him again, but then she recalled he said his name was Nara. Someone at the compound would know how to pass a message along to him.

"[color=coral]Still, no reason we can't plan out this upcoming training. So you wanna learn Mind's Eye, that much I'm guessing, but you'll wanna read up on it, maybe check a library in the village or find a store that stocks scrolls for training. like I said, Mind's Eye training isn't exactly easy to train, especially your first time around.[/color]" Nagisa pointed out, remembering her first time trying to train Mind's Eye. She had been trained by another Yamanaka so they compared it to their clan techniques which helped her grasp onto it a hell of a lot easier, but she had no idea how well Kyuzo would fair.

"[color=coral]I'm not entirely sure what else to recommend before training. I mean, I know how I can instruct you a little easier when the time comes, but I suppose there's not much else that can be done without actually attempting the training first. Oh, do you have any questions that I can answer?[/color]" Nagisa asked, pondering what else she could do to help.... then she wondered why she was helping him learn Sensor jutsu. This guy wasn't exactly the friendly sort, but then her Aunt's voice would kick in saying 'it's the polite thing' or some other bullshit like that.

Maybe she was just looking for something new to do with her time. Maybe she was looking for an excuse to train her own sensor abilities, who knew?

"[color=coral]Well then I guess I can help, but when it comes to learning sensor techniques, the process tends to be very difficult. It's not like normal training so you'll have to be prepared for a long bout of training. We won't be able to get to that today, I've got my wall patrol coming up.[/color]" Nagisa wondered how she'd be able to contact him again, but then she recalled he said his name was Nara. Someone at the compound would know how to pass a message along to him.

"[color=coral]Still, no reason we can't plan out this upcoming training. So you wanna learn Mind's Eye, that much I'm guessing, but you'll wanna read up on it, maybe check a library in the village or find a store that stocks scrolls for training. like I said, Mind's Eye training isn't exactly easy to train, especially your first time around.[/color]" Nagisa pointed out, remembering her first time trying to train Mind's Eye. She had been trained by another Yamanaka so they compared it to their clan techniques which helped her grasp onto it a hell of a lot easier, but she had no idea how well Kyuzo would fair.

"[color=coral]I'm not entirely sure what else to recommend before training. I mean, I know how I can instruct you a little easier when the time comes, but I suppose there's not much else that can be done without actually attempting the training first. Oh, do you have any questions that I can answer?[/color]" Nagisa asked, pondering what else she could do to help.... then she wondered why she was helping him learn Sensor jutsu. This guy wasn't exactly the friendly sort, but then her Aunt's voice would kick in saying 'it's the polite thing' or some other bullshit like that.

Maybe she was just looking for something new to do with her time. Maybe she was looking for an excuse to train her own sensor abilities, who knew?

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Mon May 06, 2013 6:50 pm

			Kyuzo paused for a moment, not sure of what to ask, or if he could ask anything at all. without a proper grip on the subject, he knew very little of the details of Mind's Eye Sensor techniques, making it hard to not sound like an idiot when talking about them. [color=#ffff00]"Your Yamanaka, so i assume you are generally better at using your mind and chakra together. Sensory jutsu should come more naturally to you then to others. It will be more challenging for me to learn, but I don't mind the challenge if its useful to know."[/color]

He didn't care how easy or hard it would be, he couldn't allow someone else to be able to sense him in this way. It completely destroyed his methods of remaining anonymous and unseen. His shadow couldn't even hide him from that kind of scouting. [color=#ffff00]"My only question is how does learning how to sense someone teach me how to prevent myself from being sensed?" [/color] Kyuzo said as he wondered how masking chakra would work in the first place. It wasn't as easy as hiding on a roof or in a bush. Still though, maybe he could reverse engineer the technique or something.

At the end of the day though, it doesn't matter. Being able to sense an oncoming enemy would help Kyuzo better prepare his hiding spots, and that was enough for him to want to learn Mind's eye Sensory Jutsu.

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

Author: Post

Kyuzo paused for a moment, not sure of what to ask, or if he could ask anything at all. without a proper grip on the subject, he knew very little of the details of Mind's Eye Sensor techniques, making it hard to not sound like an idiot when talking about them. [color=#ffff00]"Your Yamanaka, so i assume you are generally better at using your mind and chakra together. Sensory jutsu should come more naturally to you then to others. It will be more challenging for me to learn, but I don't mind the challenge if its useful to know."[/color]

He didn't care how easy or hard it would be, he couldn't allow someone else to be able to sense him in this way. It completely destroyed his methods of remaining anonymous and unseen. His shadow couldn't even hide him from that kind of scouting. [color=#ffff00]"My only question is how does learning how to sense someone teach me how to prevent myself from being sensed?" [/color] Kyuzo said as he wondered how masking chakra would work in the first place. It wasn't as easy as hiding on a roof or in a bush. Still though, maybe he could reverse engineer the technique or something.

At the end of the day though, it doesn't matter. Being able to sense an oncoming enemy would help Kyuzo better prepare his hiding spots, and that was enough for him to want to learn Mind's eye Sensory Jutsu.

								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=948882]Tsedas[/url][/b] » Tue May 07, 2013 11:04 pm

			'[i][color=coral]Talk about commitment. Still if he wants to learn, maybe it can help me train my own sensor abilities at the same time. Teaching someone is the best way to test your own abilities, I may even learn a thing or two myself.[/color][/i]' Nagisa thought to herself as she thought on when she had free next. "[color=coral]I recall having a day off next week from patrol duties and missions, Wednesday if I recall. When is you next free day, we might be able to begin training sooner rather than later.[/color]"

Kyuzo brought up the question about masking his aura. It wasn't hard to reply to, especially since she'd done it before in this conversation. "[color=coral]Like I said, you suppress your chakra signature. Only the more skilled sensors are capable of it, I recall hearing it's an A rank jutsu too. Honestly, it'll be like flexing a muscle in time, it's not too hard to use Mind's Eye when you get the hang of it. Plus it can let you gather different types of info in various ways.[/color]"

"[color=coral]But I can explain Sensor stuff in more detail on our training day, so when do you have free next?[/color]" nagisa asked, getting a little antsy it would seem, mostly because she hadn't had a chance to train her sensor abilities in a while and this would be the best chance she'd have for a long time.

[url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_Oqmby3igoUKiR_pd4sGiA]Red Buster Gaming Youtube[/url] ||| [url=https://www.twitch.tv/redbustergaming]Red Buster Gaming Twitch[/url]

Author: Post

'[i][color=coral]Talk about commitment. Still if he wants to learn, maybe it can help me train my own sensor abilities at the same time. Teaching someone is the best way to test your own abilities, I may even learn a thing or two myself.[/color][/i]' Nagisa thought to herself as she thought on when she had free next. "[color=coral]I recall having a day off next week from patrol duties and missions, Wednesday if I recall. When is you next free day, we might be able to begin training sooner rather than later.[/color]"

Kyuzo brought up the question about masking his aura. It wasn't hard to reply to, especially since she'd done it before in this conversation. "[color=coral]Like I said, you suppress your chakra signature. Only the more skilled sensors are capable of it, I recall hearing it's an A rank jutsu too. Honestly, it'll be like flexing a muscle in time, it's not too hard to use Mind's Eye when you get the hang of it. Plus it can let you gather different types of info in various ways.[/color]"

"[color=coral]But I can explain Sensor stuff in more detail on our training day, so when do you have free next?[/color]" nagisa asked, getting a little antsy it would seem, mostly because she hadn't had a chance to train her sensor abilities in a while and this would be the best chance she'd have for a long time.

			[color=#ffff00]"If i'm not on a mission, i'm training or wandering about. I do little else. I can arrange to meet you somewhere on Wednesday if that is best."[/color] Kyuzo said. Kyuzo really didn't do anything outside of training, missions, or simply wandering about in solitude. He was willing to dedicate as much time as possible to training, though he wasn't sure how much Nagisa had in her. [color=#ffff00][i]'She doesn't look as though she would collapse from prolonged training... [/i][/color] he thought after looking her over once more.

[color=#ffff00]"I am ready whenever you are, give me a time and a place. and no one but you."[/color] Kyuzo didn't want anyone to see what he was up to except for those who needed to, in this case Nagisa. If he could, he'd get her to swear to secrecy, but it seemed a bit early to push that idea. For now he would just have to hope she didn't spill the beans about her "new training partner".

			[i]

Kyuzo really didn't do anything outside of training, missions, or simply wandering about in solitude. He was willing to dedicate as much time as possible to training, though he wasn't sure how much Nagisa had in her. [color=#ffff00]"I am ready whenever you are, give me a time and a place. and no one but you."[/color] Kyuzo didn't want anyone to see what he was up to except for those who needed to, in this case Nagisa. 			"[color=coral]Great, next Wednesday it is. We can probably just meet here. There is plenty of space to work with and plenty of distance we can put between us to test you ability to sense chakra signatures. Anyway, I'm gonna go ahead and get going, don't wanna be late for wall duty.[/color]" Nagisa turned, her 'appointment' to train sensor techniques with this Nara set for next week. It was a bit daunting how it all happened so fast, let alone that she was suddenly gonna play teacher but in the end it might be useful to her. Hell she could train a variety of sensor techniques on her own, all in all a win-win kind of scenario for her and him.

With that she turned, heading off down the path to return to the buildings and streets of Konoha so she could get to her village duties.

=== THREAD: [Accepted]Nara, Kyuzo - Naruto Saigen Roleplay ===
Forum: Home Board index General Section Member Section Old Forum Archives and Discussion Archives Finished Applications > Home Board index

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: (unknown)

[url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/][/url]
				Naruto Saigen Roleplay
				Naruto Saigen RP is a text-based roleplay forum set in an alternate universe of the Naruto series.
				[url=#start_here]Skip to content[/url]

Author: 

[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325][i][/url]
								[url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url]

		[b]Posts:[/b] [url=./search.php?author_id=1869325&sr=posts]7571[/url]		[b]Joined:[/b] Sat Apr 27, 2013 6:00 pm

										Send private message
									[/url]

						[url=#p1524648][Accepted]Nara, Kyuzo[/url]

									[url=./viewtopic.php?p=1524648#p1524648]
						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Sun Apr 28, 2013 9:43 pm

			[b]Username:[/b] [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325/]TyDie[/url]

[b]Points:[/b] 0/0

[b]Coupon:[/b]

[b]Companions:[/b] (0/4)

[b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=908613/1/#new]Nara[/url] Kyuzo [/b]

[“In the shadows of the night, the unseen blade is the deadliest”]

[b]General Information[/b]

[b]Age:[/b] 16

[b]Gender:[/b] Male

[b]Height:[/b] 6'0

[b]Weight:[/b] 185 Pounds

[b]Hair:[/b] Kyuzo's pitch black hair is kept short, barely concealing his scalp.

[b]Eyes:[/b] thin eyes with small pupils, blue in color.

[b]Physical Features:[/b] Kyuzo's body is very muscular. In order to fulfill the physical demands of his occupation, he keeps his body in great condition. His only scars are under his clothing, all wounds from various weapons.  His most notable feature, his eyes, are bright blue with a sharp, penetrating stare that offsets most people.

[b]Clothing/Accessories:[/b] His normal clothing is as black as cloth can be, in order to remain unseen at night. This is essentially a standard japanese ninja outfit, including a mask and soft sole shoes to conceal sound, with black pants, a form fitting long sleeved top, gloves, and a belt with shuriken holders and pouches for carrying various tools in. The Konoha village symbols are on the back of his gloves, and the Nara clan symbol is on his back, both in a dull red color to prevent much notice. He does carry a change of normal everyday clothing to blend in during the day.

[b]Forehead Protector:[/b] Carries it in his ninja pouch

[b]Personality:[/b] Kyuzo is almost mechanical, showing almost no emotion, and speaking only when its needed. He is always aware of his surrounding, and ready for any situation to turn deadly. He has absolutely no qualms over killing someone, but he wont kill without purpose. He strives to be a perfectionist in everything he does, and it shows in his features and ability. When others would panic or quake, Kyuzo is always calm and collected, as if nothing phases him. Kyuzo is very professional in his work, doing very little outside of the required mission. He will do anything to accomplish a mission or objective, but because of this, these are all that matter to him. Outside of his missions, his only concern is furthering his own training.

Due to his stealthy methods, Kyuzo attempts to keep everyones positions in mind at all times, and rarely does he ever let anyone behind him. If someone does get behind him, he will not hesitate to begin fighting right then and there. This paranoia keeps him constantly vigilant. He tends to be by himself often, as he prefers it, and only goes with others if he is required to, or he feels they are useful to him. While he is by no means an outcast, he simply has no interest in a social life with no reason. He's perfectly willing to train or work with someone if he feels they are on his level, if not they are completely disregarded or dealt with if they become a nuisance.

[b]Battle Information[/b]
[b]Rank:[/b] Chuunin

[b]Village:[/b] Konoha

[b]Chakra Affinity:[/b] Raiton

[b]Second Chakra Affinity:[/b]

[b]Stats[/b]
[b]Ninjutsu:[/b] 6
[b]Taijutsu:[/b]6
[b]Genjutsu:[/b]3
[b]Stamina:[/b]5
[b]Control:[/b]4
[b]Strength:[/b]5
[b]Speed:[/b]5
[b]Wit: [/b]6

[b]Equipment:[/b]

5 flashtags in pouch on left hip

5 explosive tags in pouch

5 smoke bombs in pouch

40 shuriken, 20 in each of two holders on the front of his belt

10 kunai in ninja pouch

canteen of water in pouch

Ninjato,2 1/2 foot long blade with a 6 inch handle, overall 3 feet, positioned on right hip for an underhand draw

Binoculars with a zoom of about 500 meters in pouch

[b]Combat Style:[/b] Kyuzo focuses on a stealthier approach, the fewer people who know hes there the better. He uses his shadow jutsu to suppress enemies and hide from vision, and his skill in tai allows him to pass silently. His most preferred method of killing is his shadow blade, but Kyuzo can use anything as a weapon if needed.

[b]Jutsu Information[/b]
[b]Abilities:[/b]

[b]Shadow Manipulation[/b]

Less of an element and more like a specialty, the members of the Nara Clan are able to manipulate both their own shadows and shadows in the surrounding area in ways that normal ninja are not able to due to their 'shadow chakra'. This chakra allows them to use various techniques that allow them to create effective traps to use against an opponent as long as there is enough light in the area to create the shadows needed to do so. If there is absolutely no light present in the area of the Nara member, they are unable to use their shadow techniques. Unfortunately, because the shadows produced by clones is not the same as those made by humans, clones cannot utilize shadow binding techniques.

[b]Jutsu:[/b] Shadow TechsShow

[b]~Shadow Kunai[/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra the user will cause a shadow on their body to move toward their hand, forming into a solid kunai when it reaches their hand. The kunai is just like any other kunai in terms of durability and sharpness, but cannot be thrown, and lasts for up to three posts.

[b]~Shadow Tendril[/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra, the user will cause their shadow to rise up off the ground in the form of a single tendril, about three inches in diameter. The tendril can be manipulated with a strength of 3 and a speed equal to the user's control up to 6. This technique may be held for a number of posts equal to the user's stamina with a maximum of six before reverting back into the normal shadows. The shadows can move out to a max of 10 meters without the use of other shadows.

[b]~Shadow Projectile Counter[/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: ~Shadow Tendril, 6 tai

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra, the user will cause their shadow to rise up out of the ground in the form of a tendril. They will then have the tendril catch an incoming projectile. So long as the projectile was thrown at a speed less than [Control+Taijutsu]/2, it may be caught. The tendril will then flick the weapon back at the opponent at a speed of three.

[b]~Shadow Walking[/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra, the user is able to raise it off of the ground, if only slightly, causing it to become solid. This creates a sort of platform to walk on, but only where the user's foot would land, making it quite efficient. This lasts for up to three posts, and can go no more than one inch off of the ground.

[b]~Static Shadow Imitation[/b]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra, the user will send their shadow out at a speed equal to their control to a max of 8 toward the target, aiming to connect the target's shadow with their own. If successful, the opponent will be trapped, only able to make the same movements as the user. This lasts for a number of posts equal to half the user's stamina, and can be broken out of if the target has at least 5 strength. The shadow, unaided, can stretch up to 10 meters, but can use up to 6 other shadows to move through.

[b]~Shadow Transportation[/b]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

After adding the needed hand seals onto either Shadow Sewing or Shadow Stitch, the user will cause the tendril to shoot out and latch onto something before contracting, either pulling the item toward the user at a strength of 5, or pulling the user toward it at a speed of 6, depending on the resisting force of the object.

[b]~Shadow Skin[/b]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra, the user will cause their shadow to crawl up their body, covering them from head to toe in a protective armor that is capable of resisting strikes of less than 4 strength. While using this technique, the user is unable to use other shadow jutsu, as this requires their full shadow. This may be held for a number of posts equal to the user's stamina with a maximum of 6, or until broken.

[b] Shadow Form  [/b]

B-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra, the user will cause their shadow to cover them from head to toe in shadow, making them difficult to see. To see the User, an enemy must have higher wit then the users Ninjutsu, to a cap of 7, otherwise the user remains unseen. This is not invisibility, the user cannot walk into plain view. this jutsu only makes the user harder to detect, and lasts for 3 posts.

[b]~Shadow Blade[/b]

B-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra, the user will cause the shadow to crawl up their body, eventually ending up in one of their hands, lengthening itself to form into the likeness of a sword, with a 2 foot blade and a six inch handle. The blade is as sharp as any normal blade, and lasts for a number of posts equal to the user's stamina up to 4.
Tai TechsShow

[b] Sneak [/b]

D-Rank Taijutsu

The user quiets their footsteps , but moves at half normal speed. Enemies must have an equal or higher wit vs the users tai to notice the user, otherwise the user remains unheard.
Rai TechsShow
[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element• Shock Treatment][/color]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the proper hand seals, the user's hands become electrically charged and they are able to use small currents of electricity to wake up someone who was knocked out. To add to this, these charges can stimulate the brain of someone who's conscious. This stimulation can wake those drifting to sleep or momentarily get rid of any grogginess caused by fatigue for four posts. This jutsu can’t bring targets out of genjutsu, however nor can it add wit.

[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element • Lightning Shock][/color]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

This is a technique utilized by Raiton users to deliver a small but powerful shock to an opponent. By performing a short set of hand seals and focusing Raiton into his/her own hands, the user can wrap the appendages in electricity. For two posts, any direct contact between the user's hand and the target will send a shock through the target's body. The pain caused is equivalent to being stabbed by a senbon.

[color=#fe0] Lightning element • Shocking grasp [/color]

D-Rank ninjutsu

After forming the hand seals needed, the user will coat his hand in Raiton chakra while holding a weapon. He can transfer this chakra into the weapon, adding additional piercing power to the technique. This charge lasts for 3 posts and produes a small shock that creates a tingling, numbing sensation where it hits.

[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element • Lightning Cutter][/color]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: User must have a sword.

After completing a short set of hand seals the user will imbue their bladed weapon with electricity. Next he or she will swipe the air in front of them. The lightning stored in the blade will give the weapon an amplified swing, causing a 3 foot crescent shaped lightning bolt to fly towards the opponent within a five meter range. If the attack touches any part of the target’s body it will create a painful jolt that lasts a whole post. The jolt shocks the target every couple of seconds during the post and the pain each time is equivalent to getting stabbed in the hand. Upon impact with the target, the attack also causes some physical damage, creating an impact like a punch thrown by somebody with three strength.

[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element • Rifle Technique][/color]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

After completing a set of hand seals the user will either focus chakra into a bladed weapon or index finger. He/she then points his/her hand (or the tip of his/her weapon) at the target and fires off a bolt of lightning that travels out a max of five meters. The lightning bolt itself will only cause minor damage, but due to the speed of the attack the impact is more than enough to knock the air out of someone or send them backwards about five meters as if they had just been rammed into. The opponent can resist being knocked backwards if they have a strength stat that is at least equal to the user's control stat. The speed of this bolt is equal to the user's control stat with a max of 8.

[b]History[/b]
SpoilerShow Kyuzo was born on a moonless night, his father a Nara ninja who was killed in action 5 months after his mother became pregnant with him, and his mother died soon after childbirth. From that day through to his days at the academy, he was raised by Nara caregivers, and rarely spoken of except by his primary caregiver, Nara Ayame. She raised him as her own and told him the stories of his parents, which did little to the boys cold attitude towards everyone. Ayame always tried to get the boy to show just a little emotion, but he rarely did, the occasional smirk or chuckle was the most she could get from him.

It didn’t take long for Kyuzo to join the academy, he was naturally gifted and aced all of his exams. His classmates never talked to him or about him for fear of what may happen, the one person who tried to bully kyuzo got held outside a window by shadows until he wet himself. The children rarely had anything to do with him, which is exactly what he wanted. He developed a habit of using sleight of hand to swipe classmates pencils in order to start fights between classmates. This deception came naturally to Kyuzo, as did his stealthiness. He graduated the academy at the top of his class at the age of 13.

Kyuzo’s genin team was undesirable to say the least, a ditzy clumsy girl and an annoying Hyuuga boy that thought he was better then everyone because of his “heritage”. The Hyuuga would constantly jeer Kyuzo in an attempt to get some competition out of him, but it always ended in a stupid look followed by Kyuzo walking away shaking his head. He never understood the concept of competition, why should he prove hes the best? No, he knew what he was, he didn’t need to beat someone else to prove it.

As soon as he could, Kyuzo took the chuunin exams and quickly got away from those undesirables. Soon after becoming a chuunin, he developed more of his sneaky ability by hunting animals on foot with only a kunai. he has developed a callous disregard of emotion as a whole, feeling almost nothing at this point. He spends most of his time on the Nara grounds when not on missions, roaming the forests in silence, as he has always preferred it.

			[i]
Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

						[url=#p1524648][Accepted]Nara, Kyuzo[/url]

									[url=./viewtopic.php?p=1524648#p1524648]
						[/i]Post
					[/url]
								by [b][url=./memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325]Jin the Sugar Glider[/url][/b] » Sun Apr 28, 2013 9:43 pm

			[b]Username:[/b] [url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=1869325/]TyDie[/url]

[b]Points:[/b] 0/0

[b]Coupon:[/b]

[b]Companions:[/b] (0/4)

[b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?&t=908613/1/#new]Nara[/url] Kyuzo [/b]

[“In the shadows of the night, the unseen blade is the deadliest”]

[b]General Information[/b]

[b]Age:[/b] 16

[b]Gender:[/b] Male

[b]Height:[/b] 6'0

[b]Weight:[/b] 185 Pounds

[b]Hair:[/b] Kyuzo's pitch black hair is kept short, barely concealing his scalp.

[b]Eyes:[/b] thin eyes with small pupils, blue in color.

[b]Physical Features:[/b] Kyuzo's body is very muscular. In order to fulfill the physical demands of his occupation, he keeps his body in great condition. His only scars are under his clothing, all wounds from various weapons.  His most notable feature, his eyes, are bright blue with a sharp, penetrating stare that offsets most people.

[b]Clothing/Accessories:[/b] His normal clothing is as black as cloth can be, in order to remain unseen at night. This is essentially a standard japanese ninja outfit, including a mask and soft sole shoes to conceal sound, with black pants, a form fitting long sleeved top, gloves, and a belt with shuriken holders and pouches for carrying various tools in. The Konoha village symbols are on the back of his gloves, and the Nara clan symbol is on his back, both in a dull red color to prevent much notice. He does carry a change of normal everyday clothing to blend in during the day.

[b]Forehead Protector:[/b] Carries it in his ninja pouch

[b]Personality:[/b] Kyuzo is almost mechanical, showing almost no emotion, and speaking only when its needed. He is always aware of his surrounding, and ready for any situation to turn deadly. He has absolutely no qualms over killing someone, but he wont kill without purpose. He strives to be a perfectionist in everything he does, and it shows in his features and ability. When others would panic or quake, Kyuzo is always calm and collected, as if nothing phases him. Kyuzo is very professional in his work, doing very little outside of the required mission. He will do anything to accomplish a mission or objective, but because of this, these are all that matter to him. Outside of his missions, his only concern is furthering his own training.

Due to his stealthy methods, Kyuzo attempts to keep everyones positions in mind at all times, and rarely does he ever let anyone behind him. If someone does get behind him, he will not hesitate to begin fighting right then and there. This paranoia keeps him constantly vigilant. He tends to be by himself often, as he prefers it, and only goes with others if he is required to, or he feels they are useful to him. While he is by no means an outcast, he simply has no interest in a social life with no reason. He's perfectly willing to train or work with someone if he feels they are on his level, if not they are completely disregarded or dealt with if they become a nuisance.

[b]Battle Information[/b]
[b]Rank:[/b] Chuunin

[b]Village:[/b] Konoha

[b]Chakra Affinity:[/b] Raiton

[b]Second Chakra Affinity:[/b]

[b]Stats[/b]
[b]Ninjutsu:[/b] 6
[b]Taijutsu:[/b]6
[b]Genjutsu:[/b]3
[b]Stamina:[/b]5
[b]Control:[/b]4
[b]Strength:[/b]5
[b]Speed:[/b]5
[b]Wit: [/b]6

[b]Equipment:[/b]

5 flashtags in pouch on left hip

5 explosive tags in pouch

5 smoke bombs in pouch

40 shuriken, 20 in each of two holders on the front of his belt

10 kunai in ninja pouch

canteen of water in pouch

Ninjato,2 1/2 foot long blade with a 6 inch handle, overall 3 feet, positioned on right hip for an underhand draw

Binoculars with a zoom of about 500 meters in pouch

[b]Combat Style:[/b] Kyuzo focuses on a stealthier approach, the fewer people who know hes there the better. He uses his shadow jutsu to suppress enemies and hide from vision, and his skill in tai allows him to pass silently. His most preferred method of killing is his shadow blade, but Kyuzo can use anything as a weapon if needed.

[b]Jutsu Information[/b]
[b]Abilities:[/b]

[b]Shadow Manipulation[/b]

Less of an element and more like a specialty, the members of the Nara Clan are able to manipulate both their own shadows and shadows in the surrounding area in ways that normal ninja are not able to due to their 'shadow chakra'. This chakra allows them to use various techniques that allow them to create effective traps to use against an opponent as long as there is enough light in the area to create the shadows needed to do so. If there is absolutely no light present in the area of the Nara member, they are unable to use their shadow techniques. Unfortunately, because the shadows produced by clones is not the same as those made by humans, clones cannot utilize shadow binding techniques.

[b]Jutsu:[/b] Shadow TechsShow

[b]~Shadow Kunai[/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra the user will cause a shadow on their body to move toward their hand, forming into a solid kunai when it reaches their hand. The kunai is just like any other kunai in terms of durability and sharpness, but cannot be thrown, and lasts for up to three posts.

[b]~Shadow Tendril[/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra, the user will cause their shadow to rise up off the ground in the form of a single tendril, about three inches in diameter. The tendril can be manipulated with a strength of 3 and a speed equal to the user's control up to 6. This technique may be held for a number of posts equal to the user's stamina with a maximum of six before reverting back into the normal shadows. The shadows can move out to a max of 10 meters without the use of other shadows.

[b]~Shadow Projectile Counter[/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: ~Shadow Tendril, 6 tai

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra, the user will cause their shadow to rise up out of the ground in the form of a tendril. They will then have the tendril catch an incoming projectile. So long as the projectile was thrown at a speed less than [Control+Taijutsu]/2, it may be caught. The tendril will then flick the weapon back at the opponent at a speed of three.

[b]~Shadow Walking[/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra, the user is able to raise it off of the ground, if only slightly, causing it to become solid. This creates a sort of platform to walk on, but only where the user's foot would land, making it quite efficient. This lasts for up to three posts, and can go no more than one inch off of the ground.

[b]~Static Shadow Imitation[/b]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra, the user will send their shadow out at a speed equal to their control to a max of 8 toward the target, aiming to connect the target's shadow with their own. If successful, the opponent will be trapped, only able to make the same movements as the user. This lasts for a number of posts equal to half the user's stamina, and can be broken out of if the target has at least 5 strength. The shadow, unaided, can stretch up to 10 meters, but can use up to 6 other shadows to move through.

[b]~Shadow Transportation[/b]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

After adding the needed hand seals onto either Shadow Sewing or Shadow Stitch, the user will cause the tendril to shoot out and latch onto something before contracting, either pulling the item toward the user at a strength of 5, or pulling the user toward it at a speed of 6, depending on the resisting force of the object.

[b]~Shadow Skin[/b]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra, the user will cause their shadow to crawl up their body, covering them from head to toe in a protective armor that is capable of resisting strikes of less than 4 strength. While using this technique, the user is unable to use other shadow jutsu, as this requires their full shadow. This may be held for a number of posts equal to the user's stamina with a maximum of 6, or until broken.

[b] Shadow Form  [/b]

B-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra, the user will cause their shadow to cover them from head to toe in shadow, making them difficult to see. To see the User, an enemy must have higher wit then the users Ninjutsu, to a cap of 7, otherwise the user remains unseen. This is not invisibility, the user cannot walk into plain view. this jutsu only makes the user harder to detect, and lasts for 3 posts.

[b]~Shadow Blade[/b]

B-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra, the user will cause the shadow to crawl up their body, eventually ending up in one of their hands, lengthening itself to form into the likeness of a sword, with a 2 foot blade and a six inch handle. The blade is as sharp as any normal blade, and lasts for a number of posts equal to the user's stamina up to 4.
Tai TechsShow

[b] Sneak [/b]

D-Rank Taijutsu

The user quiets their footsteps , but moves at half normal speed. Enemies must have an equal or higher wit vs the users tai to notice the user, otherwise the user remains unheard.
Rai TechsShow
[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element• Shock Treatment][/color]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the proper hand seals, the user's hands become electrically charged and they are able to use small currents of electricity to wake up someone who was knocked out. To add to this, these charges can stimulate the brain of someone who's conscious. This stimulation can wake those drifting to sleep or momentarily get rid of any grogginess caused by fatigue for four posts. This jutsu can’t bring targets out of genjutsu, however nor can it add wit.

[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element • Lightning Shock][/color]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

This is a technique utilized by Raiton users to deliver a small but powerful shock to an opponent. By performing a short set of hand seals and focusing Raiton into his/her own hands, the user can wrap the appendages in electricity. For two posts, any direct contact between the user's hand and the target will send a shock through the target's body. The pain caused is equivalent to being stabbed by a senbon.

[color=#fe0] Lightning element • Shocking grasp [/color]

D-Rank ninjutsu

After forming the hand seals needed, the user will coat his hand in Raiton chakra while holding a weapon. He can transfer this chakra into the weapon, adding additional piercing power to the technique. This charge lasts for 3 posts and produes a small shock that creates a tingling, numbing sensation where it hits.

[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element • Lightning Cutter][/color]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: User must have a sword.

After completing a short set of hand seals the user will imbue their bladed weapon with electricity. Next he or she will swipe the air in front of them. The lightning stored in the blade will give the weapon an amplified swing, causing a 3 foot crescent shaped lightning bolt to fly towards the opponent within a five meter range. If the attack touches any part of the target’s body it will create a painful jolt that lasts a whole post. The jolt shocks the target every couple of seconds during the post and the pain each time is equivalent to getting stabbed in the hand. Upon impact with the target, the attack also causes some physical damage, creating an impact like a punch thrown by somebody with three strength.

[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element • Rifle Technique][/color]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

After completing a set of hand seals the user will either focus chakra into a bladed weapon or index finger. He/she then points his/her hand (or the tip of his/her weapon) at the target and fires off a bolt of lightning that travels out a max of five meters. The lightning bolt itself will only cause minor damage, but due to the speed of the attack the impact is more than enough to knock the air out of someone or send them backwards about five meters as if they had just been rammed into. The opponent can resist being knocked backwards if they have a strength stat that is at least equal to the user's control stat. The speed of this bolt is equal to the user's control stat with a max of 8.

[b]History[/b]
SpoilerShow Kyuzo was born on a moonless night, his father a Nara ninja who was killed in action 5 months after his mother became pregnant with him, and his mother died soon after childbirth. From that day through to his days at the academy, he was raised by Nara caregivers, and rarely spoken of except by his primary caregiver, Nara Ayame. She raised him as her own and told him the stories of his parents, which did little to the boys cold attitude towards everyone. Ayame always tried to get the boy to show just a little emotion, but he rarely did, the occasional smirk or chuckle was the most she could get from him.

It didn’t take long for Kyuzo to join the academy, he was naturally gifted and aced all of his exams. His classmates never talked to him or about him for fear of what may happen, the one person who tried to bully kyuzo got held outside a window by shadows until he wet himself. The children rarely had anything to do with him, which is exactly what he wanted. He developed a habit of using sleight of hand to swipe classmates pencils in order to start fights between classmates. This deception came naturally to Kyuzo, as did his stealthiness. He graduated the academy at the top of his class at the age of 13.

Kyuzo’s genin team was undesirable to say the least, a ditzy clumsy girl and an annoying Hyuuga boy that thought he was better then everyone because of his “heritage”. The Hyuuga would constantly jeer Kyuzo in an attempt to get some competition out of him, but it always ended in a stupid look followed by Kyuzo walking away shaking his head. He never understood the concept of competition, why should he prove hes the best? No, he knew what he was, he didn’t need to beat someone else to prove it.

As soon as he could, Kyuzo took the chuunin exams and quickly got away from those undesirables. Soon after becoming a chuunin, he developed more of his sneaky ability by hunting animals on foot with only a kunai. he has developed a callous disregard of emotion as a whole, feeling almost nothing at this point. He spends most of his time on the Nara grounds when not on missions, roaming the forests in silence, as he has always preferred it.

			[i]

[b]Battle Information[/b]
[b]Rank:[/b] Chuunin

[b]Village:[/b] Konoha

[b]Chakra Affinity:[/b] Raiton

[b]Second Chakra Affinity:[/b]

[b]Stats[/b]
[b]Ninjutsu:[/b] 6
[b]Taijutsu:[/b]6
[b]Genjutsu:[/b]3
[b]Stamina:[/b]5
[b]Control:[/b]4
[b]Strength:[/b]5
[b]Speed:[/b]5
[b]Wit: [/b]6

[b]Equipment:[/b]

5 flashtags in pouch on left hip

5 explosive tags in pouch

5 smoke bombs in pouch

40 shuriken, 20 in each of two holders on the front of his belt

10 kunai in ninja pouch

canteen of water in pouch

Ninjato,2 1/2 foot long blade with a 6 inch handle, overall 3 feet, positioned on right hip for an underhand draw

Binoculars with a zoom of about 500 meters in pouch

He uses his shadow jutsu to suppress enemies and hide from vision, and his skill in tai allows him to pass silently. His most preferred method of killing is his shadow blade, but Kyuzo can use anything as a weapon if needed.

[b]Jutsu Information[/b]
[b]Abilities:[/b]

[b]Shadow Manipulation[/b]

Less of an element and more like a specialty, the members of the Nara Clan are able to manipulate both their own shadows and shadows in the surrounding area in ways that normal ninja are not able to due to their 'shadow chakra'. This chakra allows them to use various techniques that allow them to create effective traps to use against an opponent as long as there is enough light in the area to create the shadows needed to do so. If there is absolutely no light present in the area of the Nara member, they are unable to use their shadow techniques. Unfortunately, because the shadows produced by clones is not the same as those made by humans, clones cannot utilize shadow binding techniques.

[b]Jutsu:[/b] Shadow TechsShow

[b]~Shadow Kunai[/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra the user will cause a shadow on their body to move toward their hand, forming into a solid kunai when it reaches their hand. The kunai is just like any other kunai in terms of durability and sharpness, but cannot be thrown, and lasts for up to three posts.

[b]~Shadow Tendril[/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra, the user will cause their shadow to rise up off the ground in the form of a single tendril, about three inches in diameter. The tendril can be manipulated with a strength of 3 and a speed equal to the user's control up to 6. This technique may be held for a number of posts equal to the user's stamina with a maximum of six before reverting back into the normal shadows. The shadows can move out to a max of 10 meters without the use of other shadows.

[b]~Shadow Projectile Counter[/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: ~Shadow Tendril, 6 tai

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra, the user will cause their shadow to rise up out of the ground in the form of a tendril. They will then have the tendril catch an incoming projectile. So long as the projectile was thrown at a speed less than [Control+Taijutsu]/2, it may be caught. The tendril will then flick the weapon back at the opponent at a speed of three.

[b]~Shadow Walking[/b]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra, the user is able to raise it off of the ground, if only slightly, causing it to become solid. This creates a sort of platform to walk on, but only where the user's foot would land, making it quite efficient. This lasts for up to three posts, and can go no more than one inch off of the ground.

[b]~Static Shadow Imitation[/b]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra, the user will send their shadow out at a speed equal to their control to a max of 8 toward the target, aiming to connect the target's shadow with their own. If successful, the opponent will be trapped, only able to make the same movements as the user. This lasts for a number of posts equal to half the user's stamina, and can be broken out of if the target has at least 5 strength. The shadow, unaided, can stretch up to 10 meters, but can use up to 6 other shadows to move through.

[b]~Shadow Transportation[/b]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

After adding the needed hand seals onto either Shadow Sewing or Shadow Stitch, the user will cause the tendril to shoot out and latch onto something before contracting, either pulling the item toward the user at a strength of 5, or pulling the user toward it at a speed of 6, depending on the resisting force of the object.

[b]~Shadow Skin[/b]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra, the user will cause their shadow to crawl up their body, covering them from head to toe in a protective armor that is capable of resisting strikes of less than 4 strength. While using this technique, the user is unable to use other shadow jutsu, as this requires their full shadow. This may be held for a number of posts equal to the user's stamina with a maximum of 6, or until broken.

[b] Shadow Form  [/b]

B-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra, the user will cause their shadow to cover them from head to toe in shadow, making them difficult to see. To see the User, an enemy must have higher wit then the users Ninjutsu, to a cap of 7, otherwise the user remains unseen. This is not invisibility, the user cannot walk into plain view. this jutsu only makes the user harder to detect, and lasts for 3 posts.

[b]~Shadow Blade[/b]

B-Rank Ninjutsu

After forming the needed hand seals and flooding their shadow with chakra, the user will cause the shadow to crawl up their body, eventually ending up in one of their hands, lengthening itself to form into the likeness of a sword, with a 2 foot blade and a six inch handle. The blade is as sharp as any normal blade, and lasts for a number of posts equal to the user's stamina up to 4.
Tai TechsShow

[b] Sneak [/b]

D-Rank Taijutsu

The user quiets their footsteps , but moves at half normal speed. Enemies must have an equal or higher wit vs the users tai to notice the user, otherwise the user remains unheard.
Rai TechsShow
[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element• Shock Treatment][/color]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

After performing the proper hand seals, the user's hands become electrically charged and they are able to use small currents of electricity to wake up someone who was knocked out. To add to this, these charges can stimulate the brain of someone who's conscious. This stimulation can wake those drifting to sleep or momentarily get rid of any grogginess caused by fatigue for four posts. This jutsu can’t bring targets out of genjutsu, however nor can it add wit.

[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element • Lightning Shock][/color]

D-Rank Ninjutsu

This is a technique utilized by Raiton users to deliver a small but powerful shock to an opponent. By performing a short set of hand seals and focusing Raiton into his/her own hands, the user can wrap the appendages in electricity. For two posts, any direct contact between the user's hand and the target will send a shock through the target's body. The pain caused is equivalent to being stabbed by a senbon.

[color=#fe0] Lightning element • Shocking grasp [/color]

D-Rank ninjutsu

After forming the hand seals needed, the user will coat his hand in Raiton chakra while holding a weapon. He can transfer this chakra into the weapon, adding additional piercing power to the technique. This charge lasts for 3 posts and produes a small shock that creates a tingling, numbing sensation where it hits.

[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element • Lightning Cutter][/color]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

Prerequisite: User must have a sword.

After completing a short set of hand seals the user will imbue their bladed weapon with electricity. Next he or she will swipe the air in front of them. The lightning stored in the blade will give the weapon an amplified swing, causing a 3 foot crescent shaped lightning bolt to fly towards the opponent within a five meter range. If the attack touches any part of the target’s body it will create a painful jolt that lasts a whole post. The jolt shocks the target every couple of seconds during the post and the pain each time is equivalent to getting stabbed in the hand. Upon impact with the target, the attack also causes some physical damage, creating an impact like a punch thrown by somebody with three strength.

[color=#fe0]*[Lightning Element • Rifle Technique][/color]

C-Rank Ninjutsu

After completing a set of hand seals the user will either focus chakra into a bladed weapon or index finger. He/she then points his/her hand (or the tip of his/her weapon) at the target and fires off a bolt of lightning that travels out a max of five meters. The lightning bolt itself will only cause minor damage, but due to the speed of the attack the impact is more than enough to knock the air out of someone or send them backwards about five meters as if they had just been rammed into. The opponent can resist being knocked backwards if they have a strength stat that is at least equal to the user's control stat. The speed of this bolt is equal to the user's control stat with a max of 8.

[b]History[/b]
SpoilerShow Kyuzo was born on a moonless night, his father a Nara ninja who was killed in action 5 months after his mother became pregnant with him, and his mother died soon after childbirth. From that day through to his days at the academy, he was raised by Nara caregivers, and rarely spoken of except by his primary caregiver, Nara Ayame. She raised him as her own and told him the stories of his parents, which did little to the boys cold attitude towards everyone. Ayame always tried to get the boy to show just a little emotion, but he rarely did, the occasional smirk or chuckle was the most she could get from him.

It didn’t take long for Kyuzo to join the academy, he was naturally gifted and aced all of his exams. His classmates never talked to him or about him for fear of what may happen, the one person who tried to bully kyuzo got held outside a window by shadows until he wet himself. The children rarely had anything to do with him, which is exactly what he wanted. He developed a habit of using sleight of hand to swipe classmates pencils in order to start fights between classmates. This deception came naturally to Kyuzo, as did his stealthiness. He graduated the academy at the top of his class at the age of 13.

Kyuzo’s genin team was undesirable to say the least, a ditzy clumsy girl and an annoying Hyuuga boy that thought he was better then everyone because of his “heritage”. The Hyuuga would constantly jeer Kyuzo in an attempt to get some competition out of him, but it always ended in a stupid look followed by Kyuzo walking away shaking his head. He never understood the concept of competition, why should he prove hes the best? No, he knew what he was, he didn’t need to beat someone else to prove it.

As soon as he could, Kyuzo took the chuunin exams and quickly got away from those undesirables. Soon after becoming a chuunin, he developed more of his sneaky ability by hunting animals on foot with only a kunai. he has developed a callous disregard of emotion as a whole, feeling almost nothing at this point. He spends most of his time on the Nara grounds when not on missions, roaming the forests in silence, as he has always preferred it.

------------------------------------------------------------

			alright, updated his eyes to reflect the Nara traits, but i was a little unfamiliar with "thin" eyes, i guess its like shikamaru's eyes, always almost closed? also updated his equipment, added a bit more depth to his personality, primarily his views on other people and his work, and removed the part in his history about the Hyuuga dying.

Active Characters[b]Village of Origin[/b][b]Character Name & Link[/b][b]Rank[/b][b]Color[/b][b]Sunagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=87&t=8344128]Henrin Emi[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=darkgoldenrod][b][/b][/color][/b][b]Konohagakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=85&t=8342815]Ibakuro Aiya[/url][/b][b]Chuunin[/b][b][color=#8CD600][/color][/b][b]Kumogakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=86&t=8346848]Jinrai Shizune[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#de2c9b][/color][/b][b]Kirigakure no Sato[/b][b][url=https://www.narutosaigen.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=84&t=8346175]Tsukino Kazushige[/url][/b][b]Genin[/b][b][color=#FCA311][b][/b][/color][/b]

------------------------------------------------------------
Author: Post

alright, updated his eyes to reflect the Nara traits, but i was a little unfamiliar with "thin" eyes, i guess its like shikamaru's eyes, always almost closed? also updated his equipment, added a bit more depth to his personality, primarily his views on other people and his work, and removed the part in his history about the Hyuuga dying.

2 questions of clarification: does this mean that the Hyuuga i just made up out of the blue is going to interact with Kyuzo since hes not dead? i have no problem with this, i just didnt want to make an NPC or anything without permission.

also, Kyuzo isnt so much a bloodthirsty killer, more of a professional who takes his work very seriously. OOC i want him in the Root organization, specializing in assassination. how would Konoha view that?
